h4.p: [03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathājātānaṃ ^a^P2.0001^ea^^a^V2.0001^ea^^a^M2.0001^ea^ karerirukkhānaṃ ghanapattasākhāviṭapehi maṇḍapasaṅkhepehi sañchanno padeso ^b^‘‘karerimaṇḍapo’’^eb^ti adhippeto. ^b^Dvāre^eb^ti dvārasamīpe. Dvāre ṭhitarukkhavasena aññatthāpi samaññā atthīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana bhagavā mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃ avasitvā tadā karerikuṭikāyaṃ vihāsīti? Sāpi buddhassa bhagavato vasanagandhakuṭi evāti dassento ^b^‘‘antojetavane’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Salaḷāgāra^eb^nti devadārurukkhehi katagehaṃ. ^b^Pakatibhattassa pacchato^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ pākatikabhattakālato pacchā, ṭhitamajjhanhikato uparīti attho. ^b^Piṇḍapātato paṭikkantāna^eb^nti piṇḍapātabhojanato apetānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhattakicca’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]Maṇḍalasaṇṭhānā ^a^V2.0002^ea^ māḷasaṅkhepena katā nisīdanasālā ^b^‘‘maṇḍalamāḷa’’^eb^nti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘nisīdanasālāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā^eb^ti ettha pubba-saddo atītavisayo, nivāsa-saddo kammasādhano, khandhavinimutto ca nivasitadhammo natthi, khandhā ca santānavaseneva pavattantīti āha ^b^‘‘pubbenivutthakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yojetvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0002^ea^ visayabhāvena yojetvā. ^b^Pavattitā^eb^ti kathitā. Dhammūpasaṃhitattā dhammato anapetāti ^b^dhammī.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammasaṃyuttā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Udapādī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0002^ea^ paduddhāro, tassa uppannā jātāti iminā sambandho. Taṃ panassā uppannākāraṃ pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhepatova dassitaṃ, vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aho acchariya’’^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^ke anussaranti, ke nānussarantī^eb^ti padadvaye paṭhamaṃyeva sappapañcanaṃ, na itaranti tadeva puggalabhedato, kālavibhāgato, anussaraṇākārato, opammato niddisantena ^b^‘‘titthiyā anussarantī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aggappattakammavādino^eb^ti sikhāppattakammavādino ‘‘atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.234) evaṃ kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhitā tāpasaparibbājakā. ^b^Cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussarantī^eb^ti brahmajālādīsu (dī. ni. 1.33) bhagavatā tathā paricchijja vuttattā. ^b^Tato paraṃ na anussarantī^eb^ti tathāvacanañca diṭṭhigatopaṭṭhakassa tesaṃ ñāṇassa paridubbalabhāvato.

[03]^b^Sāvakā^eb^ti mahāsāvakā tesañhi kappasatasahassaṃ pubbābhinīhāro. Pakatisāvakā pana tato ūnakameva anussaranti. Yasmā ‘‘kappānaṃ lakkhādhikaṃ ekaṃ, dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānī’’ti kālavasena evaṃ parimāṇo yathākkamaṃ aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro, sāvakabodhipaccekabodhipāramitāsambharaṇañca, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve aggasāvakā…pe… kappasatasahassañcā’’^eb^ti. Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo, evaṃ sante buddhānampissa saparicchedatā āpannāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ pana ettakanti paricchedo natthi, yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhanti, tāvatakaṃ anussarantī’’^eb^ti ‘‘yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa’’nti (mahāni. 156; cūḷani. 85; paṭi. ma. 3, 5) vacanato. Sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya hi buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi savisaye paricchedo nāma natthi, tasmā yaṃ ^a^P2.0003^ea^ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti, te taṃ taṃ jānanti eva. Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya pavattiānubhāvassa paricchedo nāma natthi, kuto tannimittakānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ…pe… natthī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Khandhapaṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0003^ea^^a^M2.0003^ea^ yathāpaccayaṃ anupubbapavattamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ anupubbiyā. ^b^Khandhappavatti^eb^nti vedanādikkhandhappavattiṃ. Tesañhi anubhavanādiākāraggahaṇamassa sātisayaṃ, taṃ saññābhave tattha tattha anussaraṇavasena gahetvā gacchantā ekavokārabhave alabhantā ‘‘na passantī’’ti vuttā, jāle patitā viya sakuṇā, macchā viya cāti adhippāyo. ^b^Kuṇṭhā viyā^eb^ti dandhā viya. ^b^Paṅguḷā viyā^eb^ti pīṭhasappino viya. ^b^Diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhantī^eb^ti adhiccasamuppannikadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti. Yaṭṭhikoṭihetukaṃ gamanaṃ ^b^yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ^eb^ khandhapaṭipāṭiyā amuñcanato.

[03]^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti kāmaṃ buddhasāvakāpi asaññabhave khandhappavattiṃ na passanti, evaṃ santepi ^b^te^eb^ buddhasāvakā asaññabhavaṃ laṅghitvā parato anussaranti. ^b^‘‘Vaṭṭe’’^eb^tiādi tathā tesaṃ anussaraṇākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Buddhehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā^eb^ti ‘‘yattha pañcakappasatāni rūpappavattiyeva, na arūpappavatti, so asaññabhavo’’ti evaṃ sammāsambuddhehi desitāyaṃ dhammanettiyaṃ ṭhatvā. Evañhi antarā cutipaṭisandhiyo apassantā ^b^parato anussaranti seyyathāpi āyasmā sobhito^eb^ti (theragā. aṭṭha. 1.2.164 sobhitattheragāthāvaṇṇanā). So kira pubbenivāse ciṇṇavasī hutvā anupaṭipāṭiyā attano nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^P2.0004^ea^ anussaranto yāva asaññabhave attano acittakapaṭisandhi tāva addasa, tato paraṃ pañcakappasataparimāṇe kāle cutipaṭisandhiyo adisvā avasāne cutiṃ disvā ‘‘kiṃ nāmeta’’nti āvajjayamāno nayavasena ‘‘asaññabhavo bhavissatī’’ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ bhagavā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. ^b^‘‘Cutipaṭisandhiṃ oloketvā’’^eb^ti idaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena tesaṃ ñāṇassa saṅkamanadassanaṃ, tena sabbaso bhave anāmasitvā gantuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti.

[03]^b^Taṃ tadeva passantī^eb^ti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāya caturatanike gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ, siyā pana tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā. Na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā, atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti ^a^M2.0004^ea^ tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattā. Tenāha ‘‘buddhā pana attanā vā parehi vā diṭṭhakatasutaṃ, sūriyamaṇḍalobhāsasadisa’’nti ca ādi.

[03]^b^Tathā sāvakā ca paccekabuddhā cā^eb^ti. Ettha ^b^tathā^eb^-saddena ‘‘attanā diṭṭhakatasutameva anussarantī’’ti ^a^V2.0004^ea^ idaṃ upasaṃharati, tena sappadesameva nesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ, na nippadesanti nidasseti.

[03]^b^Khajjopanakaobhāsasadisaṃ^eb^ ñāṇassa ativiya appānubhāvatāya. ^b^Sāvakāna^eb^nti ettha pakatisāvakānaṃ pākatika^b^padīpobhāsasadisaṃ.^eb^ Mahāsāvakānaṃ (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.21 vaṅgīsettharagāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāro) mahā^b^padīpobhāsasadisaṃ. ^eb^ Tenāha ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.402) ‘‘ukkāpabhāsadisa’’nti. ^b^Osadhitārakobhāsasadisa^eb^nti ^a^P2.0005^ea^ ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyati, osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyakattā ‘‘osadhī’’ti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhāsadisaṃ. ^b^Saradasūriyamaṇḍalobhāsasadisaṃ^eb^ sabbaso andhakāravidhamanato. Apaṭubhāvahetuko visayaggahaṇe cañcalabhāvo ^b^khalitaṃ,^eb^ kuṇṭhibhāvahetuko visayassa anabhisamayo ^b^paṭighāto.^eb^^b^Āvajjanapaṭibaddhamevā^eb^ti āvajjanamattādhīnaṃ, āvajjitamatte eva yathicchitassa paṭivijjhanakanti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03]Asaṅgāppaṭihataṃ pavattamānaṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ lahutarepi visaye, garutare ca ekasadisamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dubbalapattapuṭe’’^eb^tiādinā upamādvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammakāyattā bhagavato guṇaṃ ārabbha pavattā ^b^‘‘bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha uppannā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ sabbampi pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ. Titthiyānaṃ, sāvakānañca pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ bhagavato pubbenivāsānussaraṇassa hīnudāharaṇadassanavasenettha kathitaṃ. Evañhi bhagavato mahantabhāvo visesato pakāsito hotīti. ^b^Saṅkhepato^eb^ti samāsato. Yattakopi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa pavattibhedo attano ñāṇassa visayabhūto, taṃ sabbaṃ tadā yathākathitaṃ te bhikkhū saṅkhipitvā ^b^‘‘itipī’’^eb^ti āhaṃsu. Tassa ca anekākāratāya āmeḍitavacanaṃ, ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, ‘‘iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.124; a. ni. 3.1) viya ākārattho ^b^iti^eb^-saddoti dassento ^b^‘‘evampī’’^eb^ti tadatthamāha.

[03]^b^2-3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0005^ea^ ettha ca idha pāṭhe yaṃ vattabbaṃ tena pāṭhena sādhāraṇaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti adhippetaṃ, na asādhāraṇaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanāya adhikatattāti taṃ dassento ^a^P2.0006^ea^^b^‘‘ayameva hi viseso’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^‘‘Assosī’’^eb^ti idaṃ savanakiccanipphattiyā vuttaṃ saddaggahaṇamukhena tadatthāvabodhassa siddhattā. Tattha pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘imaṃ saṃkhiyadhammaṃ viditvā’’ icceva (dī. ni. 1.2) vuttaṃ. Ime bhikkhū mama guṇe thomenti, kathaṃ? Mama pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbhāti yojanā. ^b^Nipphatti^eb^nti kiccanipphattiṃ, tena kātabbakiccasiddhanti attho. ^b^No^eb^ti pucchāvācī ^a^V2.0005^ea^^b^nu^eb^-iti iminā samānattho nipātoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iccheyyātha nū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ. ‘‘Yaṃ bhagavā’’ti ettha yaṃ-saddena kiriyāparāmasanabhūtena ‘‘dhammiṃ kathaṃ katheyyā’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammikathākaraṇaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ ‘‘etassā’’ti padassa atthoti āha ^b^‘‘etassa dhammikathākaraṇassā’’^eb^ti, ādaravasena pana taṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suṇāthā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, etena ‘‘manasi karothā’’ti padaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sotāvadhānaṃ^eb^ sotassa odahanaṃ, sussūsāti attho. Chinnaṃ upacchinnaṃ vaṭumaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ etesanti ^b^chinnavaṭumakā,^eb^ sammāsambuddhā, aññe ca khīṇāsavā, idha pana sammāsambuddhā adhippetā. Tesañhi sabbaso anussaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ avisayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññesaṃ asādhāraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paccattavacane dissati yaṃ-saddo^eb^ kammatthadīpanato. ^b^Upayogavacane^eb^ dissati yaṃ-saddo pucchanakiriyāya kammatthadīpanato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ca upayogavacanameva pucchati-saddassa dvikammakabhāvato. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yena kāraṇenāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘karaṇavacane dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhummeti daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti yathā yaṃ-saddo na kevalaṃ paccattaupayogesu eva, atha kho karaṇepi dissati, evaṃ idha bhummeti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Dasasahassilokadhātu^eb^nti jātikkhettabhūtaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ. ^b^Unnādento uppajji^eb^^a^P2.0007^ea^ anekacchariyapātubhāvapaṭimaṇḍitattā buddhuppādassa.

[03]Kālassa bhaddatā nāma tattha sattānaṃ guṇavibhūtiyā, buddhuppādaparamā ca guṇavibhūtīti tabbahulatā yassa kappassa bhaddatāti āha ^b^‘‘pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe’’^eb^ti, tathā sārabhūtaguṇavasena ^b^‘‘sārakappe’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0006^ea^. ‘‘Imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāhā’’ti vatvā imassa kappassa tathā thometabbatā anaññasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^yato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti yato pabhuti ^b^abhinīhāro kato^eb^ti manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato abhinīhāro pavattito. Saṃsārassa anādibhāvato imassa bhagavato abhinīhārato puretaraṃ uppannā sammāsambuddhā anantā aparimeyyāti tehi uppannakappe nivattento ^b^‘‘etasmiṃ antare’’^eb^ti āha. Kāmaṃ dīpaṅkarabuddhuppāde ayaṃ bhagavā abhinīhāramakāsi, tassa pana bhagavato nibbatti imassa abhinīhārato purimatarāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘amhākaṃ…pe… nibbattiṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne^eb^ti mahākappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyapariyosāne. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^‘‘Ito tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ uparī’’^eb^ti etena padumuttarassa bhagavato, sumedhassa ca bhagavato antare ekūnasattatikappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Ito aṭṭhārasannaṃ kappasahassānaṃ uparī’’^eb^ti iminā sujātassa bhagavato, atthadassissa ca bhagavato antare ^a^V2.0006^ea^ ekenūnāni dvādasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Ito catunavute kappe’’^eb^ti iminā dhammadassissa bhagavato, siddhatthassa ca bhagavato antare chādhikanavasatuttarāni sattarasakappasahassāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Ekatiṃse kappe’’^eb^ti iminā vipassissa bhagavato, sikhissa ca bhagavato antare saṭṭhi kappāni buddhasuññāni ahesunti dasseti. Te sabbepi padumuttarassa bhagavato oraṃ sumedhādīhi uppannakappehi saddhiṃ samodhāniyamānā satasahassā kappā honti, yattha mahāsāvakādayo (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.21 vaṅgīsattheragāthāvaṇṇanā) vivaṭṭū panissayāni ^a^P2.0008^ea^ kusalāni sambhariṃsu. Buddhasuññepi loke paccekabuddhā uppajjitvā tesaṃ purisavisesānaṃ puññābhisandābhibuddhiyā paccayā honti. ^b^‘‘Evamaya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena vadati.

[03]^b^‘‘Kiṃ paneta’’^eb^ntiādi pubbanimittavibhāvanatthāya āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti buddhānaṃ uppajjanaṃ. ^b^Kappasaṇṭhānakālasmi^eb^nti vivaṭṭakappassa saṇṭhahanakāle. ^b^Ekamasaṅkhyeyya^eb^nti saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite^eb^ti pabbatarukkhagacchādīnaṃ, meghādīnañca abhāvena vivaṭaṃaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite. ^b^Lokasannivāse^eb^ti ^a^M2.0007^ea^ bhājanalokena sannivisitabbaṭṭhāne. Vīsati yaṭṭhiyo ^b^usabhaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Usabhamattā, dve usabhamattā’’tiādinā paccekaṃ mattā-saddo yojetabbo. ^b^Yojanasahassamattā hutvā^eb^ti patamānāva udakadhārā yojanasahassamattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhānaṃ pharitvā pavattiyā yojanasahassamattā hutvā. ^b^Yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokā^eb^ti yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā, yāva subhakiṇhabrahmalokā, yāva vehapphalabrahmalokāti attho.

[03]^b^Vātavasenā^eb^ti saṭṭhisahassādhikanavayojanasatasahassubbedhassa sandhārakavātamaṇḍalassa vasena. ^b^Mahābodhipallaṅko^eb^ti mahābodhipallaṅkappadesamāha. Tassa pacchā vināso, paṭhamaṃ saṇṭhahanañca dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ padese. ^b^Pubbanimittaṃ hutvā^eb^ti buddhappādassa pubbanimittaṃ hutvā. Pubbanimittasannissayo hi gaccho nissitavohārena tathā vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kaṇṇikābaddhāni hutvā^eb^ti ābaddhakaṇṇikā viya hutvā. Suddhāvāsabrahmāno attamanā…pe… gacchantīti yojanā. Vehapphalepi subhakiṇhe saṅgahetvā ^b^‘‘nava brahmalokā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi te ^a^P2.0009^ea^ catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti. ^b^Nikkhamantesū^eb^ti mahābhinikkhamanaṃ abhinikkhamantesu. Abhijāti panettha jātibhāvasāmaññena gabbhokkantiyāva saṅgahitā. Nimīyati anumīyati phalaṃ etenāti ^b^nimittaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. Ñāpakampi hi kāraṇaṃ disvā tassa abyabhicārībhāvena phalaṃ siddhameva katvā gaṇhi, yathā taṃ asito isi abhijātiyaṃ mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇāni disvā tesaṃ abyabhicārībhāvena buddhaguṇe siddhe eva katvā gaṇhi, evaṃ ^a^V2.0007^ea^ pana gayhamānaṃ tannimittakaṃ phalaṃ tadānubhāvena siddhaṃ viya voharīyati tabbhāve bhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ānubhāvenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā cāha bhagavā ‘‘so tena lakkhaṇena samannāgato…pe… rājā samāno kiṃ labhati, buddho samāno kiṃ labhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.202, 204) ca evamādi. ^b^Imamattha^eb^nti pañca buddhā imasmiṃ kappe uppajjissantīti imamatthaṃ yāthāvato ^b^jāniṃsu.^eb^

[03]^b^5-7^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kappaparicchedavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0008^ea^ ‘‘ito so ekanavute kappe’’tiādinā yattha yattha kappe te te buddhā uppannā, tassa tassa kappassa paricchindanavasena parijānanavasena. ‘‘Idaṃ ta’’nti hi niyametvā paricchijja jānanaṃ paricchindanaṃ ^b^paricchedo. Paritta^eb^nti ittaraṃ. ^b^Lahuka^eb^nti sallahukaṃ, āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubhayametaṃ appakasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^‘‘Appaṃ vā bhiyyo’’^eb^ti avisesajotanaṃ ‘‘vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā’’tiādinā aniyamitavaseneva yathālābhato ^a^P2.0010^ea^ vavatthapetvā ayañca nayo apacuroti dassento ^b^‘‘evaṃ dīghāyuko pana atidullabho’’^eb^ti āha. Idaṃ taṃ visesavavatthāpanaṃ puggalesu pakkhipitvā dassento ^b^‘‘tattha visākhā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Yadi evaṃ kasmā amhākaṃ bhagavā tattakampi kālaṃ na jīvi, nanu mahābodhisattā carimabhave ativiyauḷāratamena puññābhisaṅkhārena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti? Saccametanti. Tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vipassīādayo panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijātiyā mettāṭhānatāya abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa mettāpubbabhāgatā. Tadanuguṇañhi tesaṃ visesato paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ. Tassa visesato bahulaṃ khemavitakkūpanissayatāya somanassasahagatatā, anaññasādhāraṇaparopadesarahitañāṇavisesūpanissayatāya ñāṇasampayuttatā, asaṅkhārikatā ca veditabbā, ^b^asaṅkhyeyyaṃ āyu^eb^ ādhāravisesato, nissayavisesato, paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato, pavattiākāravisesato ca aparimeyyānubhāvatāya kāraṇassa. Tattha cirataraṃ kālaṃ santānassa pāramitāparibhāvitatā ^b^ādhāravisesatā. ^eb^ Alobhajjhāsayādiāsayasampadā ^b^nissayavisesatā.^eb^ Lābhamacchariyādipāpadhammavikkhambhanaṃ ^b^paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo.^eb^ Sabbasattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthāya āyūhanā ^b^pavattiākāraviseso^eb^ veditabbo.

[03]Ayañca ^a^V2.0008^ea^ nayo sabbesaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhavābhinibbattakakammāyūhane sādhāraṇoti tassa phalenāpi ekasadiseneva bhavitabbanti ^a^M2.0009^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘iti sabbe buddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā’’^eb^ti, asaṅkhyeyyakālāvatthānāyukāti attho. Asaṅkhyeyyāyukasaṃvattanasamatthaṃ paricitaṃ kammaṃ hoti, buddhā pana tadā manussānaṃ ^a^P2.0011^ea^ paramāyuppamāṇānurūpameva kālaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyanti tato paraṃ ṭhatvā sādhetabbapayojanābhāvato, dhammatāvesāti vā veditabbā. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana tato paraṃ pana aṭṭhānassa ‘‘utubhojanavipattiyā’’ti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.5) kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘‘taṃ lokasādhāraṇaṃ loke jātasaṃvuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ na hotī’’ti na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hi nesaṃ rogakilamathādayo hontiyeva. ^b^Utubhojanavasenā^eb^ti asampannassa, sampannassa ca utuno, bhojanassa ca vasena yathākkamaṃ ^b^āyu hāyatipi vaḍḍhatipi. Āyū^eb^ti ca paramāyu adhippetaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^brahmajālādiṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.40) vuttameva.

[03]Idāni tamatthaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha yadā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhamme niyuttā ^b^dhammikā,^eb^ na dhammikā ^b^adhammikā,^eb^ hiṃsādiadhammapasutā. ^b^Adhammikameva hoti^eb^ issarajanānaṃ anuvattanena, paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena ca. ^b^Uṇhavalāhakā devatā^eb^ti uṇhautuno paccayabhūtameghamālāsamuṭṭhāpakā devaputtā. Tesaṃ kira tathā cittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vitanoti. Esa nayo ^b^sītavalāhakavassavalāhakā^eb^su.^b^ Abbhavalāhakā^eb^ pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā veditabbā. ^b^Tāsa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘mittā’’ti padaṃ ānetvā yojanā. Kāmaṃ heṭṭhā vuttā sattavidhāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘cātumahārājikā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tāsaṃ adhammikatāyā^eb^ti rājūnaṃ adhammikabhāvamūlakena uparājādiadhammikabhāvaparamparābhatena tāsaṃ devatānaṃ adhammikabhāvena. ^b^Visamaṃ candimasūriyā pariharantī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0012^ea^ bahvābādhatādi aniṭṭhaphalūpanissayabhūtassa yathāvuttādhammikatāsaññitassa sādhāraṇassa pāpakammassa balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā pīḷiyamānā candimasūriyā sineruṃ parikkhipantā visamaṃ parivattanti yathāmaggena nappavattantīti ^a^M2.0010^ea^. Assidaṃ yathā candimasūriyānaṃ visamaparivattanaṃ visamavātasaṅkhobhahetukaṃ, evaṃ utuvassādivisamappavattīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vāto yathāmaggena na vāyatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Devatāna^eb^nti sītavalāhakadevatādidevatānaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘sītuṇhabhedo utū’’tiādi. ^b^Tasmiṃ asampajjante^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathāvutte vassabījabhūte utumhi yathākālaṃ sampattiṃ anupagacchante.

[03]‘‘Na ^a^V2.0009^ea^ sammā devo vassatī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘kadācī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^kadāci vassatī^eb^ti kadāci avassanakāle vassati. ^b^Kadāci na vassatī^eb^ti kadāci vassitabbakāle na vassati. ^b^Katthaci vassati, katthaci na vassatī^eb^ti padesamāha. ^b^‘‘Vassantopī’’^eb^tiādi ‘‘kadāci vassati, kadāci na vassatī’’ti padadvayasseva atthavivaraṇaṃ. ^b^Vigatagandhavaṇṇarasādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nirojataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Ekasmiṃ padese^eb^ti bhattapacanabhājanassa ekapasse. ^b^Uttaṇḍula^eb^nti pākato ukkantataṇḍulaṃ. ^b^Tīhākārehī^eb^ti sabbaso apariṇataṃ, ekadesena pariṇataṃ, dupariṇatañcāti evaṃ tīhākārehi. ^b^Paccati^eb^ pakkāsayaṃ upagacchati. ^b^Appāyukā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘dubbaṇṇā cā’’tipi vattabbaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ utubhojanavasena āyu hāyati^eb^ hetumhi aparikkhīṇepi paccayassa paridubbalattā.
[03]^b^‘‘Yadā panā’’^eb^tiādi sukkapakkhassa attho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vaḍḍhitvā^eb^^a^P2.0013^ea^^b^vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ.^eb^ Kasmā? Na hi ekasmiṃ antarakappe aneke buddhā uppajjanti, eko eva pana uppajjatīti. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Cattāri ṭhatvā^eb^ti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Yaṃyaṃāyuparimāṇesū^eb^ti yattakayattakaparamāyuppamāṇesu. ^b^Tesampī^eb^ti buddhānaṃ. ^b^Taṃ tadeva āyuparimāṇaṃ hoti,^eb^ tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
[06]Jātiparicchedādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mūle^eb^ti ^a^M2.0011^ea^ mūlāvayavassa samīpe. Taṃ pana tassā heṭṭhāpadeso hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pāṭalirukkhassa heṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃdivasa^eb^nti attanā jātadivase, ^b^taṃdivasa^eb^nti vā taṃ bhagavato abhisambodhidivase. So kira bodhirukkho sālakalyāṇī viya pathaviyā abbhantare eva puretaraṃ vaḍḍhento abhisambodhidivase pathaviṃ ubbhijjitvā uṭṭhito ratanasataṃ ucco, tāvadeva ca vitthato hutvā nabhaṃ pūrento aṭṭhāsi. Ayampi kiretassa rukkhabhāvena viya aññehi vemattatā. Ghanasaṃhatanāḷavaṇṭatāya ^b^kaṇṇikabaddhehi viya pupphehi. Ekasañchannā^eb^ti pupphānaṃ nirantaratāya ^a^V2.0010^ea^ ekajjhaṃ sañchannā, ^b^tattha tattha nibaddha…pe… samujjala^eb^nti tahaṃ tahaṃ olambitakusumadāmehi ceva tahaṃ tahaṃ khittamālāpiṇḍīhi ca ito cito vippakiṇṇavividhavaṇṭamuttapupphehi ca sammadeva ujjalaṃ. ^b^Aññamaññaṃ sirīsampattānī^eb^ti aññamaññassa siriyā sobhāya sampannāni. ^b^Buddhaguṇavibhavasiri^eb^nti sammāsambuddhehi abhigantabbaguṇavibhūtisobhaṃ. ^b^Paṭivijjhamāno^eb^ti adhigacchanto.
[03]^b^Setambarukkho^eb^ti setavaṇṇaphalo ambarukkho. ^b^Tadevā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0014^ea^ pāṭaliyā vuttappamāṇameva. ^b^Ekato^eb^ti ekapasse. ^b^Surasānī^eb^ti sumadhurarasāni.
[03]^b^Ekova pallaṅko^eb^ti ekova pallaṅkappadeso. ^b^So so^eb^ rukkho ^b^‘‘bodhī’’ti vuccati^eb^ bujjhanti etthāti katvā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāvakaparicchede^eb^ti sāvakayugaparicchede. ‘‘Khaṇḍatissa’’nti dvepi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ekattavasena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘khaṇḍo ca tisso cā’’^eb^ti, buddhānaṃ sahodaro, vemātikopi vā jeṭṭhabhātā na hotīti ^b^‘‘ekapitiko kaniṭṭhabhātā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Avasesehi^eb^ puttehi. ‘‘Paññāpāramiyā matthakaṃ patto’’ti vatvā tassa matthakappattaṃ guṇavisesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sikhinā bhagavatā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Uttaro^eb^ti uttamo. Puna ^b^uttaro^eb^ti theraṃ nāmena vadati. ^b^Pāra^eb^nti parakoṭimatthakaṃ. ^b^Paññāvisaye^eb^ti paññādhikāre. Pavattiṭṭhānavasena hi pavattiṃ vadati.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uposatha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0012^ea^ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ. ^b^Dutiyatatiyesū^eb^ti dutiye, tatiye ca sāvakasannipāte. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti caturaṅgikataṃ atidisati. ^b^Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vatthuṃ kathetvā pabbajjā dīpetabbā,^eb^ sā pana yasmā ^b^manorathapūraṇiyaṃ^eb^ aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.211) vitthārato āgatā, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāva^eb^nti ^a^V2.0011^ea^ ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā niyataupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ. Aniyatūpaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavato hī’’^eb^tiādi. Idāni ānandatthero yena kāraṇena satthu nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ upagato, yathā ca upagato, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha ekadā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī’’ti āha^eb^ anayabyasanāpādakena kammunā codiyamāno ^a^P2.0015^ea^. ^b^Atha naṃ bhagavā^eb^ tamatthaṃ anārocetvāva khemaṃ maggaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ehi bhikkhu iminā gacchāmā’’ti āha. ^eb^ Kasmā panassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ nārocesīti? Ārocitepi asaddahanto nādiyissati. Tañhi tassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyātiti. ^b^Te^eb^ti te gamanaṃ, ^b^‘‘ta’’^eb^nti vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^Anvāsatto^eb^ti anubaddho, upadduto vā. Dhammagāravanissito saṃvego ^b^dhammasaṃvego^eb^ ‘‘amhesu nāma tiṭṭhantesu bhagavatopi īdisaṃ jāta’’nti. ‘‘Ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī’’ti vadanto dhammasenāpati atthato evaṃ vadanto nāma hotīti ^b^‘‘ahaṃ bhante tumhe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Asuññāyeva me sā disā^eb^ti asuññāyeva mama sā disā. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘tava ovādo buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vasituṃ na dassatī^eb^ti ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ na labhissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Parammukhā desitassāpi dhammassā^eb^ti suttantadesanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Abhidhammadesanā panassa parammukhāva pavattā pageva yācanāya. Tassā vācanāmaggopi sāriputtattherappabhavo. Kasmā? So niddesapaṭisambhidā viya ^a^M2.0013^ea^ therassa bhikkhuto gahitadhammakkhandhapakkhiyo. Apare pana ‘‘dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭipāṭiyā tikadukesu devasikaṃ katokāso bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavāpissa pucchitapucchitaṃ nayadānavasena vissajjesi. Evaṃ abhidhammopi satthārā parammukhā desitopi therena sammukhā paṭiggahitova ahosī’’ti vadanti. Sabbaṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Aggupaṭṭhāko^eb^ti upaṭṭhāne sakkaccakāritāya aggabhūto upaṭṭhāko. Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena, tividhena dantakaṭṭhena, pādaparikammena, gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto ‘‘imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti cintetvā ^a^P2.0016^ea^ taṃ taṃ nipphādento mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati. Evaṃ hissa ahosi ^a^V2.0012^ea^ ‘‘sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya, bhagavati pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti, tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘aggupaṭṭhāko’’ti.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pitumātujātanagaraparicchedo pitumukhena āgatattā ^b^‘‘pitiparicchedo’’^eb^ti vutto.

[03]^b^Vihāraṃ pāvisī^eb^ti gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. ^b^Ettakaṃ kathetvā^eb^ti kappaparicchedādinavavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ettāvatā desanaṃ desetvā. Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi, na ^b^buddhavaṃsa^eb^desanāyaṃ (bu. vaṃ. 64 gāthādayo) viya pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ, tato vā pana bhiyyoti? Anadhikārato, payojanābhāvato ca. Buddhavaṃsadesanāyañhi (bu. vaṃ. 75) –
[21]‘‘Kīdiso te mahāvīra, abhinīhāro naruttama;
[22]Kamhi kāle tayā vīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā’’ti. ādinā –

[07]Pavattaṃ taṃ pucchaṃ adhikāraṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā yassa sammāsambuddhassa pādamūle attanā mahābhinīhāro kato, taṃ dīpaṅkaraṃ bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā yesaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santikā bodhiyā laddhabyākaraṇo hutvā tattha tattha pāramiyo pūresi, tesaṃ paṭipattisaṅkhāto pubbenivāso, attano ca paṭipatti kathitā, idha pana tādiso adhikāro natthi ^a^M2.0014^ea^, yena dīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya, tato vā pana purato buddhe ārabbha pubbenivāsaṃ katheyya. Tasmā na ettha buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pubbenivāso vitthārito. Yasmā ca buddhānaṃ desanā nāma desanāya bhājanabhūtānaṃ puggalānaṃ ñāṇabalānurūpā, na attano ñāṇabalānurūpā, tasmā tattha aggasāvakānaṃ, mahāsāvakānaṃ, (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.21 vaṅgīsattheragāthāvaṇṇanā) tādisānañca ^a^P2.0017^ea^ devabrahmānaṃ vasena desanā vitthāritā. Idha pana pakatisāvakānaṃ, tādisānañca devatānaṃ vasena pubbenivāsaṃ kathento sattannameva buddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi. Tathā hi ne bhagavā palobhanavasena samuttejetuṃ sappapañcatāya kathāya desanaṃ matthakaṃ apāpetvāva gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. Tathā ca imissā eva desanāya anusārato ^b^āṭānāṭiya^eb^paritta- (dī. ni. 3.275) desanādayo pavattā.

[03]Apicettha ^a^V2.0013^ea^ bhagavā attano suddhāvāsacārikāvibhāviniyā uparidesanāya saṅgahatthaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ eva sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ kathesi. Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā, na aññesaṃ parinibbutattā. ‘‘Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu upapannā upapattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ sāsane upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā nacirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu, na tattha tattha yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsū’’ti vadanti. Tathā yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato nicchaye na ajjāpi dharati, na antarahitaṃ, te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi veneyyajjhāsayavasena. Apubbācarimaniyamo pana aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattavāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā icchitoti na tenetaṃ virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nirantaraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā^eb^ti abhijātito paṭṭhāya yāva pātimokkhuddeso yāva tā buddhakiccasiddhi, tāva matthakaṃ sikhaṃ pāpetvā. Na tāva kathitoti yojanā.
[03]^b^Tanti^eb^nti dhammatantiṃ, pariyattinti attho. Puttaputtamātuyānavihāradhanavihāradāyakādīnaṃ sambahulānaṃ atthānaṃ vibhāvanavasena pavattavāro ^b^sambahulavāro.^eb^

[03]Kāmañcāyaṃ ^a^M2.0015^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ anāgato, aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā pana ānetvā ^a^P2.0018^ea^ dīpetabboti taṃ dīpento ^b^‘‘sabbabodhisattānañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kulavaṃso^eb^ kulānukkamo. ^b^Paveṇī^eb^ti paramparā. ^b^‘‘Kasmā’’^eb^ti puttuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā taṃ vissajjento ^b^‘‘sabbaññubodhisattānañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha, tena tesaṃ jātanagarādi paññāyamānaṃ ekaṃsato manussabhāvasañjānanatthaṃ icchitabbaṃ, aññathā yathādhippetabuddhakiccasiddhi eva na siyāti dasseti, yato mahāsattānaṃ carimabhave manussaloke eva pātubhāvo, na aññattha.

[03]Candādīnaṃ sobhāvisesaṃ raheti cajāpetīti ^b^rāhu,^eb^ rāhuggaho, idha pana rāhu viyāti ^b^rāhu. Bandhana^eb^nti ca anatthuppattiṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tathā mahāsattena vuttavacanameva gahetvā kumārassa ^b^‘‘rāhulo’’^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. ^b^Athā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Rocinī^eb^ti rocanasīlā, ujjalarūpāti ^a^V2.0014^ea^ attho. ^b^Rucaggatī^eb^ti rucaṃ pabhātaṃ āgatibhūtā, ga-kārāgamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Itthiratanabhāvato manussaloke sabbāsaṃ itthīnaṃ bimbapaṭicchannabhūtāti ^b^bimbā.^eb^
[03]^b^Jhānā vuṭṭhāyā^eb^ti pādakajjhānato uṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhaṅgulubbedhā^eb^ti aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇabahalabhāvā. ^b^Cūḷaṃsena chādetvā^eb^ti tiriyabhāgena ṭhapanavasena sabbaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ chādetvā. ^b^Suvaṇṇayaṭṭhiphālehī^eb^ti phālappamāṇāhi suvaṇṇayaṭṭhīhi. ^b^Suvaṇṇahatthipādānī^eb^ti pakatihatthipādaparimāṇāni suvaṇṇakhaṇḍāni. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti cūḷaṃseneva. ^b^Suvaṇṇakaṭṭīhī^eb^ti suvaṇṇakhaṇḍehi. ^b^Salakkhaṇāna^eb^nti lakkhaṇasampannānaṃ sahassārānaṃ.

[03]^b^Bodhipallaṅko^eb^ti abhisambujjhanakāle nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Avijahito^eb^ti ^a^P2.0019^ea^ buddhānaṃ tathānisajjāya anaññatthabhāvībhāvato apariccatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamapadagaṇṭhikā^eb^ti pacchime sopānaphalake ṭhatvā ṭhapiyamānassa dakkhiṇapādassa patiṭṭhahanaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā daḷhaṃ thiraṃ kenaci abhejjaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘padagaṇṭhī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ ^a^M2.0016^ea^ bhūmibhāge idāni jetavanamahāvihāro, tattha yasmiṃ ṭhāne purimānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ mañcā paññattā, tasmiṃyeva padese amhākampi bhagavato mañco paññattoti katvā ‘‘cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī’’ti vuttaṃ. Mañcānaṃ pana mahantakhuddakabhāvena mañcapaññāpanapadesassa mahantāmahantatā appamāṇaṃ, buddhānubhāvena pana so padeso sabbadā ekappamāṇoyeva hotīti ‘‘cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva hontī’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vihāropi na vijahito yevā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Purimaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ na pariccajatīti hi attho.
[03]Visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā, vimattāva ^b^vemattaṃ,^eb^ visadisatāti attho. ^b^Pamāṇaṃ^eb^ āroho. ^b^Padhānaṃ^eb^ dukkarakiriyā. ^b^Rasmī^eb^ti sarīrappabhā.

[03]‘‘Sattānaṃ pākatikahatthena chahattho majjhimapuriso, tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti bhagavā aṭṭhārasahattho’’ti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘manussānaṃ pākatikahatthena catuhattho majjhimapuriso, tato tiguṇaṃ bhagavato sarīrappamāṇanti bhagavā dvādasahattho upādinnakarūpadhammavasena, samantato pana byāmamattaṃ byāmappabhā pharatīti upari chahatthaṃ abbhuggato, bahalatarappabhā rūpena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasahattho hotī’’ti.
[03]^b^Addhaniya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0015^ea^ dīghakālaṃ.

[03]^b^Ajjhāsayapaṭibaddha^eb^nti bodhisambhārasambharaṇakāle tathāpavattajjhāsayādhīnaṃ, tathāpavattapatthanānurūpaṃ vipulaṃ, vipulatarañca ^a^P2.0020^ea^ hotīti attho. Svāyamattho ^b^cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ettha ca yasmā sarīrappamāṇaṃ, padhānaṃ, sarīrappabhā ca buddhānaṃ visadisāti idha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā, tasmā tehi saddhiṃ vemattatāsāmaññena āyukulānipi idha āharitvā dīpitāni. ^b^Paṭividdhaguṇesū^eb^ti adhigatasabbaññuguṇesu. Nanu ca bodhisambhāresu, veneyyapuggalaparimāṇe ca vemattaṃ natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, tadubhayaṃ pana buddhaguṇaggahaṇena gahitameva hotīti na uddhaṭaṃ. Yadaggena hi sabbabuddhānaṃ buddhaguṇesu vemattaṃ natthi, tadaggena nesaṃ sambodhisambhāresupi vemattaṃ natthīti. Kasmā? Hetuanurūpatāya phalassa ^a^M2.0017^ea^, ekanteneva veneyyapuggalaparimāṇe vemattabhāvo vibhāvito. Mahābodhisattānañhi hetuavatthāyaṃ sambhatūpanissayindriyaparipākā veneyyapuggalā carimabhave arahattasampattiyā paripositāni kamalavanāni sūriyarasmisamphassena viya tathāgataguṇānubhāvasamphassena vibodhaṃ upagacchantīti dīpesuṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā.
[03]^b^Nidhikumbho^eb^ti cattāro mahānidhayo sandhāya vadati. ^b^Jāto cā^eb^ti. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddena katamahābhinīhāro cāti ayampi attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ ^b^buddhavaṃse^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Tārāgaṇā virocanti, nakkhattā gaganamaṇḍale;
[22]Visākhā candimāyuttā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissatī’’ti. (bu. vaṃ. 65);
[07]‘‘Eteneva ca sabbabuddhānaṃ visākhānakkhatteneva mahābhinīhāro hotī’’ti ca vadanti.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0021^ea^^b^gatī^eb^ti ayaṃ pavatti pavattanākāro, aññe pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantā iminā ākārena anussarantīti attho, yasmā cutito paṭṭhāya yāva paṭisandhi, tāva anussaraṇaṃ ārohanaṃ atītātītatarātītatamādijātisaṅkhāte pubbenivāse ñāṇassa abhimukhabhāvena pavattīti katvā. Tasmā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuti, tāva anussaraṇaṃ orohanaṃ pubbenivāse paṭimukhabhāvena ñāṇassa pavattīti āha ^b^‘‘pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cutigantabba^eb^nti yaṃ panidaṃ cutiyā ñāṇagatiyā gantabbaṃ, taṃ gamanaṃ bujjhananti attho. ^b^Garuka^eb^nti bhāriyaṃ dukkaraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ākāse padaṃ dassento viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aparampi kāraṇa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0016^ea^ chinnavaṭumānussaraṇaṃ pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesanato aparaṃ acchariyabbhutakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Yatrā^eb^ti paccattatthe, ^b^nāmā^eb^ti acchariyatthe nipāto, ^b^hi^eb^-saddo anatthako. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo nāma tathāgato’’^eb^ti. Evañca katvā ‘‘yatrā’’ti nipātavasena visuṃ yatra-saddaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Papañcenti sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre vitthārentīti ^b^papañcaṃ. Kammavaṭṭaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti kilesavaṭṭassa papañcaggahaṇena, vipākavaṭṭassa dukkhaggahaṇena gahitattā. ^b^Pariyādinnavaṭṭe^eb^ti sabbaso khepitavaṭṭe. ‘‘Maggasīlena phalasīlenā’’ti vatvā tayidaṃ maggaphalasīlaṃ lokiyasīlapubbakaṃ, buddhānañca ^a^M2.0018^ea^ lokiyasīlampi lokuttarasīlaṃ viya anaññasādhāraṇaṃ evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘lokiyalokuttarasīlenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Samādhipaññāsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Samādhipakkhā^eb^ti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā, ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggasamādhinā’’^eb^tiādi, ^b^‘‘vihāro gahito vā’’^eb^ti ca. ^b^Samādhipakkhā^eb^ nāma vīriyasatiādayo.

[03]^b^Saya^eb^nti attanā. ^b^Nīvaraṇādīhī^eb^ti nīvaraṇehi ceva tadekaṭṭhehi ca pāpadhammehi, vitakkavicārādīhi ca. ^b^‘‘Vimuttattā^eb^^a^P2.0022^ea^^b^vimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchantī’’^eb^ti iminā vimutti-saddassa kammasādhanataṃ āha aṭṭhasamāpattiādivisayattā tassa. Vimuttattāti ca ‘‘vikkhambhanavasena vimuttattā’’tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Tassa tassā^eb^ti aniccānupassanādikassa. ^b^Paccanīkaṅgavasenā^eb^ti pahātabbapaṭipakkhāṅgavasena. ^b^Paṭippassaddhante uppannattā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanaṃ ^b^paṭippassaddhaṃ,^eb^ so eva ^b^anto^eb^ pariyosānabhāvato, tasmiṃ sādhetabbe nibbattattā, taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena pavattattāti attho. Kilesehi nissaṭatā, apagamo ca nibbānassa tehi vivittattā evāti āha ^b^‘‘dūre ṭhitattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammadhātū^eb^ti dhammānaṃ sabhāvo, atthato cattāri ariyasaccāni. ^b^Suppaṭividdhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu paṭividdhā savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ pajahanato. Evañhi sabbaññutā, dasabalañāṇādayo cāti sabbe buddhaguṇā bhagavatā adhigatā ahesuṃ. Arahattaṃ ^b^dhammadhātū^eb^ti keci. Sabbaññutañāṇanti apare. ^b^Dvīhi padehī^eb^ti dvīhi vākyehi. ^b^Ābaddha^eb^nti paṭibaddhaṃ taṃmūlakattā uparidesanāya. ^b^Devacārikakolāhala^eb^nti attano devaloke cārikāyaṃ suddhāvāsadevānaṃ kutūhalappavattiṃ ^b^dassento suttantapariyosāne^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.91) ^b^vicāressati,^eb^ atthato vibhāvessatīti yojanā. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā^eb^ti ‘‘ito so bhikkhave’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.4) vitthārato pavattitadesanamāha. ^b^Nidānakaṇḍe^eb^tiādito desitaṃ uddesadesanamāha. Sā hi imissā desanāya nidānaṭṭhāniyattā tathā vuttā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Vipassīti ^a^V2.0017^ea^ tassa nāma’’nti vatvā tassa anvatthataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tañca kho’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vividhe atthe^eb^ti tirohitavidūradesagatādike nīlādivasena ^a^M2.0019^ea^ nānāvidhe, tadaññe ca indriyagocarabhūte te ca yathūpagate, vohāravinicchaye cāti nānāvidhe atthe. ^b^Passanakusalatāyā^eb^ti dassane nipuṇabhāvena. Yāthāvato ^a^P2.0023^ea^ ñeyyaṃ bujjhatīti ^b^bodhi,^eb^ so eva sattayogato ^b^bodhisatto^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitasatto bujjhanakasatto’’^eb^ti. Sucintitacintitādinā pana paṇḍitabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Yadā ca panānena mahābhinīhāro kato, tato paṭṭhāya mahābodhiyaṃ ekantaninnattā bodhimhi satto ^b^bodhisatto^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘bodhisaṅkhātesū’’^eb^tiādi. Maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi sabbaññutañāṇaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca maggañāṇaṃ ‘‘bodhī’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Sato sampajāno’’ti iminā catutthāya gabbhāvakkantiyā okkamīti dasseti. Catasso hi gabbhāvakkantiyo idhekacco gabbho mātukucchiyaṃ okkamane, ṭhāne, nikkhamaneti tīsu ṭhānesu asampajāno hoti, ekacco paṭhame ṭhāne sampajāno, na itaresu, ekacco paṭhame, dutiye ca ṭhāne sampajāno, na tatiye, ekacco tīsupi ṭhānesu sampajāno hoti. Tattha paṭhamā gabbhāvakkanti lokiyamahājanassa vasena vuttā, dutiyā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.21 vaṅgīsattheragāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāro) vasena, tatiyā dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ, paccekabuddhānañca vasena. Te kira kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā anekasataporise papāte viya yonimukhe khittā tāḷacchiggaḷena hatthī viya sambādhena yonimukhena nikkhamantā mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti, tena nesaṃ ‘‘mayaṃ nikkhamāmā’’ti sampajaññaṃ na hoti. Catutthā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ vasena. Te hi mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi pajānanti, tattha vasantāpi pajānanti, nikkhamanakālepi pajānanti. Na hi te kammajavātā uddhaṃpāde adhosire katvā khipituṃ sakkonti, dve hatthe pasāritvā akkhīni ummīletvā ṭhitakāva nikkhamantīti. ^b^Ñāṇena paricchinditvā^eb^ti pubbabhāge pañcamahāvilokanañāṇehi ceva ‘‘idāni cavāmī’’ti cutiparicchindanañāṇena ca aparabhāge ‘‘idha mayā paṭisandhi gahitā’’ti paṭisandhiparicchindanañāṇena ca paricchijja jānitvā.

[03]Pañcannaṃ ^a^P2.0024^ea^ mahāpariccāgānaṃ, ñātatthacariyādīnañca satipi pāramiyā pariyāpannabhāve sambhāravisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tattha aṅgapariccāgo, nayanapariccāgo, attapariccāgo, rajjapariccāgo, puttadārapariccāgoti ime ^a^M2.0020^ea^^b^pañca mahāpariccāgā.^eb^ Tatthāpi kāmaṃ aṅgapariccāgādayopi dānapāramīyeva, tathāpi pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca ^a^V2.0018^ea^ mahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tato eva ca aṅgapariccāgatopi visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ, pariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi rajjapariccāgaputtadārapariccāgaggahaṇañca kataṃ. Ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ^b^ñātatthacariyā,^eb^ sā ca kho karuṇāyanavasena. Tathā sattalokassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vasena hitacariyā ^b^lokatthacariyā.^eb^ Kammassakatāñāṇavasena, anavajjakammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭhānavasena, khandhāyatanādivasena, lakkhaṇattayāditīraṇavasena ca attano, paresañca tattha satipaṭṭhānena ñāṇacāro ^b^buddhacariyā,^eb^ sā panatthato paññāpāramīyeva, ñāṇasambhāravisesatādassanatthaṃ pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Buddhacariyāna^eb^nti bahuvacananiddesena pubbayogapubbacariyādhammakkhānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha gatapaccāgatavattasaṅkhātāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya saddhiṃ abhiññāsamāpattinipphādanaṃ ^b^pubbayogo.^eb^ Dānādīsuyeva sātisayapaṭipatti ^b^pubbacariyā.^eb^ ‘‘Yāva cariyāpiṭake saṅgahitā abhinīhāro ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ kāyādivivekavasena ekacariyā ^b^pubbacariyā’’^eb^ti keci. Dānādīnañceva appicchatādīnañca saṃsāranibbānesu ādīnavānisaṃsānañca vibhāvanavasena, sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ^a^P2.0025^ea^ ca pavattakathā ^b^dhammakkhānaṃ. Koṭiṃ patvā^eb^ti paraṃ pariyantaṃ paramukkaṃsaṃ pāpuṇitvā. ^b^Sattamahādānānī^eb^ti aṭṭhavassikakāle ‘‘hadayamaṃsādīnipi yācakānaṃ dadeyya’’nti ajjhāsayaṃ uppādetvā dinnadānaṃ, maṅgalahatthidānaṃ, gamanakāle dinnaṃ sattasattakamahādānaṃ, maggaṃ gacchantena dinnaṃ assadānaṃ, rathadānaṃ, puttadānaṃ, bhariyādānanti imāni satta mahādānāni (cariyā. 79) ^b^datvā.^eb^

[03]‘‘Idāneva me maraṇaṃ hotū’’ti adhimuccitvā kālakaraṇaṃ ^b^adhimuttikālakiriyā,^eb^ taṃ bodhisattānaṃyeva, na aññesaṃ. Bodhisattā kira dīghāyukadevaloke ṭhitā ‘‘idha ṭhitassa me bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ na sambhavatī’’ti katvā tattha vāsato nibbindamānasā honti, tadā vimānaṃ pavisitvā akkhīni nimīletvā ‘‘ito uddhaṃ me jīvitaṃ nappavattatū’’ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdanti, cittādhiṭṭhānasamanantarameva maraṇaṃ hoti. Pāramīdhammānañhi ^a^M2.0021^ea^ ukkaṃsappavattiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve abhiññāsamāpattīhi santānassa visesitattā attasinehassa tanubhāvena, sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya uḷārabhāvena adhiṭṭhānassa tikkhavisadabhāvāpattiyā bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyā samijjhanti. Citte, viya kammesu ca nesaṃ vasībhāvo, tasmā yattha upapannānaṃ pāramiyo sammadeva paribrūhanti. Vuttanayena kālaṃ katvā tattha upapajjanti. Tathā hi amhākaṃ mahāsatto imasmiṃyeva kappe nānājātīsu aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto, appakameva kālaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cavitvā manussaloke nibbatto, pāramīsambharaṇapasuto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘bodhisattānaṃyeva, na ^a^V2.0019^ea^ aññesa’’nti. ^b^‘‘Ekenāttabhāvena antarena pāramīnaṃ sabbaso pūritattā’’^eb^ti iminā payojanābhāvato tattha ṭhatvā adhimuttikālakiriyā ^a^P2.0026^ea^ nāma nāhosīti dasseti. Api ca tattha yāvatāyukaṭṭhānaṃ carimabhave anekamahānidhisamuṭṭhānapubbikāya dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā nibbatti viya, buddhabhūtassa asadisadānādivasena anaññasādhāraṇalābhuppatti viya ca ‘‘ito paraṃ mahāpurisassa dibbasampattianubhavanaṃ nāma natthī’’ti ussāhajātassa puññasambhārassa vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañhettha dhammatā.

[03]^b^Manussagaṇanāvasena,^eb^ na devagaṇanāvasena. ^b^Pubbanimittānī^eb^ti cutiyā pubbanimittāni. ^b^Amilāyitvā^eb^ti ettha amilātaggahaṇeneva tāsaṃ mālānaṃ vaṇṇasampadāyapi gandhasampadāyapi sobhāsampadāyapi avināso dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bāhirabbhantarānaṃ rajojallānaṃ lepassapi abhāvato devānaṃ sarīragatāni vatthāni sabbakālaṃ parisuddhappabhassarāneva hutvā tiṭṭhantīti āha ^b^‘‘vatthesupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Neva sītaṃ na uṇha^eb^nti yassa sītassa paṭikāravasena adhikaṃ seviyamānaṃ uṇhaṃ, sayameva vā kharataraṃ hutvā abhibhavantaṃ sarīre sedaṃ uppādeyya, tādisaṃ neva sītaṃ, na uṇhaṃ ^b^hoti. Tasmiṃ kāle^eb^ti yathāvuttamaraṇāsannakāle. ^b^Bindubinduvasenā^eb^ti chinnasuttāya āmuttamuttāvaliyā nipatantā muttaguḷikā viya bindu bindu hutvā. ^b^Sedā^eb^ti sedadhārā ^b^muccanti.^eb^ Dantānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvo ^b^khaṇḍiccaṃ.^eb^ Kesānaṃ palitabhāvo ^b^pāliccaṃ.^eb^^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena valittacataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Kilantarūpo attabhāvo hoti,^eb^ na pana khaṇḍiccapāliccādīti ^a^M2.0022^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhitā^eb^ti anabhirati. Sā natthi ^a^P2.0027^ea^ uparūpari uḷārauḷārānameva bhogānaṃ visesato duvijānanānaṃ upatiṭṭhahanato. ^b^Nissasantī^eb^ti uṇhaṃ nissasanti. ^b^Vijambhantī^eb^ti anabhirativasena vijambhanaṃ karonti.

[03]^b^Paṇḍitā evā^eb^ti buddhisampannā eva devatā. Yathā devatā sampatijātā ‘‘kīdisena puññakammena idha nibbattā’’ti cintetvā ‘‘iminā nāma puññakammena idha nibbattā’’ti jānanti, evaṃ atītabhave attanā kataṃ, aññadāpi vā ekaccaṃ puññakammaṃ jānantiyeva mahāpuññāti āha ^b^‘‘ye mahāpuññā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Na paññāya^eb^nti ciratarakālattā paramāyuno. ^b^Aniyyānika^eb^nti na niyyānāvahaṃ sattānaṃ abhājanabhāvato. Sattā na paramāyuno honti nāma pāpussannatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘tadā hi sattā ussannakilesā hontī’’^eb^ti. Etthāha – kasmā sammāsambuddhā manussaloke eva uppajjanti, na devabrahmalokesūti? Devaloke tāva nuppajjanti brahmacariyavāsassa anokāsabhāvato, tathā anacchariyabhāvato ^a^V2.0020^ea^. Acchariyadhammā hi buddhā bhagavanto, tesaṃ sā acchariyadhammatā devattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ na pākaṭā hoti yathā manussabhūtānaṃ, devabhūte hi sammāsambuddhe dissamānaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ devānubhāvato loko dahati, na buddhānubhāvato, tathā sati ‘‘sammāsambuddho’’ti nādhimuccati na sampasīdati, issaraguttaggāhaṃ na vissajjeti, devattabhāvassa ca cirakālādhiṭṭhānato ekaccasassatavādato na parimuccati. ^b^Brahmaloke nuppajjantī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sattānaṃ tādisaggāhavinimocanatthañhi buddhā bhagavanto manussasugatiyaṃyeva uppajjanti, na devasugatiyaṃ. Manussasugatiyaṃ uppajjantāpi opapātikā na honti, sati ca opapātikūpapattiyaṃ vuttadosānativattanato, dhammaveneyyānaṃ dhammatantiyā ṭhapanassa ^a^P2.0028^ea^ viya dhātuveneyyānaṃ dhātūnaṃ ṭhapanassa icchitabbattā ca. Na hi opapātikānaṃ parinibbānato uddhaṃ sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhanti. Manussaloke uppajjantāpi mahābodhisattā carimabhave manussabhāvassa pākaṭabhāvakaraṇāya pana dārapariggahampi karontā yāva puttamukhadassanā agāramajjhe tiṭṭhanti, paripākagatasīlanekkhammapaññādipāramikāpi na abhinikkhamantīti. Kiṃ vā etāya ^a^M2.0023^ea^ kāraṇacintāya ‘‘sabbabuddhehi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇā, yadidaṃ manussabhūtānaṃyeva abhisambujjhanā, na devabhūtāna’’nti. Ayamettha dhammatā. Tathā hi tadattho mahābhinīhāropi manussabhūtānaṃyeva ijjhati, na devabhūtānaṃ.

[03]Kasmā pana sammāsambuddhā jambudīpe eva uppajjanti, na sesadīpesu? Keci tāva āhu ‘‘yasmā pathaviyā nābhibhūtā, buddhānubhāvasahitā acalaṭṭhānabhūtā bodhimaṇḍabhūmi jambudīpe eva, tasmā jambudīpe eva uppajjantī’’ti, tathā ‘‘itaresampi avijahitaṭṭhānānaṃ tattheva labbhanato’’ti. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti – yasmā purimabuddhānaṃ, mahābodhisattānaṃ, paccekabuddhānañca nibbattiyā sāvakabodhisattānaṃ sāvakabodhiyā abhinīhāro, sāvakapāramiyā sambharaṇaṃ, paripācanañca buddhakhettabhūte imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpe eva ijjhati, na aññattha. Veneyyānaṃ vinayanattho ca buddhuppādoti aggasāvakamahāsāvakādi veneyyavisesāpekkhāya etasmiṃ jambudīpe eva buddhā nibbattanti, na sesadīpesu. Ayañca nayo sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇoti. Tesaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ tattheva uppatti sampatticakkānaṃ viya aññamaññūpanissayato aparāparaṃ ^a^P2.0029^ea^ vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, eteneva imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā iminā saddhiṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ dasasahassasseva khettabhāvo dīpito ito aññassa buddhānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānassa tepiṭake buddhavacane anupalabbhanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpeyeva nibbattantīti dīpaṃ passī’’^eb^ti. Iminā nayena desaniyāmepi kāraṇaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Idāni^eb^^a^V2.0021^ea^^b^ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇānampi pūjanīyabhāvato. ^b^‘‘Rājā pitā bhavissatī’’ti kulaṃ passi^eb^ pituvasena kulassa niddisitabbato.
[03]^b^‘‘Dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānī’’ti passi,^eb^ tena attano antarāyābhāvaṃ aññāsi, tassā ca tusitabhave dibbasampattipaccanubhavanaṃ.

[03]^b^Tā devatā^eb^ti dasasahassicakkavāḷadevatā. Kathaṃ pana tā devatā tadā bodhisattassa pūritapāramibhāvaṃ, kathaṃ cassa buddhabhāvaṃ jānantīti? Mahesakkhānaṃ ^a^M2.0024^ea^ devatānaṃ vasena, yebhuyyena ca tā devatā abhisamayabhāgino. Tathā hi bhagavato dhammadānasaṃvibhāge anekavāraṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāsannipāto ahosi.

[03]^b^‘‘Cavāmī’’ti jānāti^eb^ cutiāsannajavanehi ñāṇasahitehi cutiyā upaṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭisaṃviditattā. ^b^Cuticittaṃ na jānāti^eb^ cuticittakkhaṇassa ittarabhāvato. Tathā hi taṃ cutūpapātañāṇassapi avisayova. ^b^Paṭisandhicitte^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Āvajjanapariyāyo^eb^ti āvajjanakkamo. Yasmā ekavāraṃ āvajjitamattena ārammaṇaṃ nicchinituṃ na sakkā, tasmā taṃ evārammaṇaṃ dutiyaṃ, tatiyañca āvajjitvā nicchayati. Āvajjanasīsena cettha javanavāro gahito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dutiyatatiyacittavāre eva jānissatī’’^eb^ti. Cutiyā puretaraṃ katipayacittavārato paṭṭhāya ‘‘maraṇaṃ me āsanna’’nti ^a^P2.0030^ea^ jānanato ^b^‘‘cutikkhaṇepi cavāmīti jānātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paṭisandhiyā pana apubbabhāvato ^b^paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti.^eb^ Nikantiyā uppattito parato ^b^‘‘asukasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhi gahitā’’ti jānāti. Tasmiṃ kāle^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle. ^b^Dasasahassilokadhātu kampatī^eb^ti ettha kampanakāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā ^b^brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.149) vuttameva. Atthato panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato ^b^mahāparinibbānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.171) āgamissati. Mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparatāya bahulaṃ somanassikāva hontīti tesaṃ paṭhamamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.17; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 498; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 4.200) vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāsivatthero^eb^pana yadipi mahākāruṇikā buddhā bhagavanto sattānaṃ hitasukhavidhānatapparāva, vivekajjhāsayā pana visaṅkhāraninnā sabbasaṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhanabahulāti pañcamamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiggahaṇamāha.

[03]^b^Pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti puṇṇamāya pure sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya, sukkapakkhe ^a^V2.0022^ea^ navamito paṭṭhāyāti attho. ^b^Sattame divase^eb^ti navamito sattame divase āsaḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ supina^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākāraṃ. ^b^Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘anotattadahaṃ netvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā’’ti ^a^M2.0025^ea^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 4.200) vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^nesaṃ deviyo^eb^ti mahārājūnaṃ deviyo. ^b^Caritvā^eb^ti gocaraṃ caritvā.

[03]^b^Haritūpalittāyā^eb^ti haritena gomayena kataparibhaṇḍāya. ^b^‘‘So ca kho purisagabbho, na itthigabbho, putto te bhavissatī’’^eb^ti ettakameva ^a^P2.0031^ea^ te brāhmaṇā attano supinasatthanayena kathesuṃ. ^b^‘‘Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissatī’’^eb^tiādi pana devatāviggahena tamatthaṃ yāthāvato pavedesuṃ.

[03]^b^Dhammatā^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo ‘‘jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave sattāna’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.131; 3.373; paṭi. ma. 1.33) viya pakatipariyāyo, dhammo eva ^b^dhammatā^eb^ yathā devo ^b^eva^eb^ devatāti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ sabhāvo’’^eb^ti, ayaṃ pakatīti attho. Svāyaṃ sabhāvo atthato tathā niyatabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ niyāmoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Niyāmo pana bahuvidhoti te sabbe atthuddhāranayena uddharitvā idhādhippetaniyāmameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niyāmo ca nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kammānaṃ niyāmo ^b^kammaniyāmo.^eb^ Esa nayo utuniyāmādīsu tīsu. Itaro pana dhammo eva niyāmo ^b^dhammaniyāmo,^eb^ dhammatā.
[03]^b^Kusalassa^eb^ kammassa. ^b^Nisento^eb^ tikhiṇaṃ karonto.

[03]Arūpādibhūmibhāgavisesavasena utuvisesadassanato utuvisesena sijjhamānānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ pupphaphalādiggahaṇaṃ ^b^‘‘tesu tesu janapadesū’’^eb^ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vasantādikāle.
[03]^b^Madhurato^eb^ bījato ^b^tittato^eb^ bījatoti yojanā.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vattamānasamīpe vattamāne viya voharitabbanti ‘‘okkamatī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘okkanto hotīti ayamevattho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ hotī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārenassa sampajānanā hoti. ^b^Na okkamamāne^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇassa duviññeyyatāya. Yathā ca vuttaṃ ‘‘paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānātī’’ti. Dasasahassacakkavāḷapattharaṇena ^a^P2.0032^ea^ vā ^b^appamāṇo.^eb^ Ativiya samujjalanabhāvena ^b^uḷāro^eb^^a^V2.0023^ea^. ^b^Devānubhāva^eb^nti devānaṃ pabhānubhāvaṃ. Devānañhi pabhaṃ so obhāso ^a^M2.0026^ea^ abhibhavati, na tesaṃ ādhipaccaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nivatthavatthassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Lokānaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antaro vivaro ^b^lokantaro,^eb^ so eva itthiliṅgavasena ^b^‘‘lokantarikā’’^eb^ti vutto. Rukkhagacchādinā kenaci na haññantīti ^b^aghā,^eb^ asambādhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niccavivaṭā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asaṃvutā^eb^ti heṭṭhā, upari ca kenaci na pihitā. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^pi^eb^-saddena yathā heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikā, evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā appatiṭṭhāti dasseti. Andhakāro ettha atthīti ^b^andhakārā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati^eb^ ālokassa abhāvato, na cakkhuno. Tathā hi ‘‘tena obhāsena aññamaññaṃ sañjānantī’’ti vuttaṃ. Jambudīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, aparagoyānavāsīnaṃ uggamanavasena, evaṃ sesadīpesu pīti āha ^b^‘‘ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyantī’’^eb^ti. Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahārena paññāyantīti. Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pabhāya nappahontī^eb^ti attano pabhāya obhāsituṃ anabhisambhunanti. Yugandharapabbatappamāṇe ākāse vicaraṇato ^b^‘‘cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena vicarantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vāvaṭā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0033^ea^ khādanatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ upakkamantā. ^b^Viparivattitvā^eb^ti vivattitvā. ^b^Chijjitvā^eb^ti mucchāpattiyā ṭhitaṭṭhānato muccitvā, aṅgapaccaṅgachedanena vā chijjitvā. ^b^Accantakhāre^eb^ti ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvameva sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā. Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhahanaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavisandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaṃ udakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati. Tathā hi sati pathavīpi vilīyeyya, tesaṃ vā pāpakammabalena petānaṃ udakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘accantakhāre udake’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Ekayāgupānamattampī^eb^ti pattādibhājanagataṃ yāguṃ gaḷociādiuddharaṇiyā gahetvā pivanamattampi kālaṃ. ^b^Samantato^eb^ti sabbabhāgato chappakārampi.
[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catunnaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0027^ea^^b^mahārājānaṃ vasenā^eb^ti vessavaṇādicatumahārājabhāvasāmaññena.
[03]^b^Yathāvihāra^eb^nti ^a^V2.0024^ea^ yathāsakaṃ vihāraṃ.

[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pakatiyā^eb^ti attano pakatiyā eva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabhāvenevā’’^eb^ti. Parassa santike gahaṇena vinā attano sabhāveneva sayameva adhiṭṭhahitvā ^b^sīlasampannā. Bodhisattamātāpī^eb^ti amhākaṃ bodhisattamātāpi. ^b^Kāladevilassā^eb^ti yathā kāladevilassa santike aññadā gaṇhāti, bodhisatte pana…pe… sayameva sīlaṃ aggahesi, tathā vipassībodhisattamātāpīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Manussesū’’^eb^ti idaṃ pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ, ‘‘manussitthiyā nāma manussapurisesu purisādhippāyacittaṃ uppajjeyyā’’ti. Bodhisattassa mātuyā pana devesupi tādisaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjateva. Yathā bodhisattassa ānubhāvena bodhisattamātu purisādhippāyacittaṃ nuppajjati, evaṃ tassa ānubhāveneva sā kenaci purisena anabhibhavanīyāti āha ^b^‘‘pādā na vahanti dibbasaṅkhalikā viya bajjhantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pubbe ^a^P2.0034^ea^ ‘‘kāmaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ cittaṃ nuppajjatī’’ti vuttaṃ, puna ‘‘pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricāretī’’ti ca vuttaṃ. Kathamidaṃ aññamaññaṃ na virujjhatīti āha ^b^‘‘pubbe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vatthupaṭikkhepo^eb^ti abrahmacariyavatthupaṭisedho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘purisādhippāyavasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārammaṇapaṭilābho^eb^ti rūpādipañcakāmaguṇārammaṇasseva paṭilābho.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kilamatho^eb^ti khedo, kāyassa garubhāvakathinabhāvādayopi tassā tadā na honti eva. ‘‘Tirokucchigataṃ passatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Kadā paṭṭhāya passatīti āha ^b^‘‘kalalādikālaṃ atikkamitvā’’^eb^tiādi. Dassane payojanaṃ sayameva vadati. Tassa abhāvato kalalādikāle na passati. ^b^Puttena^eb^ daharena mandena uttānaseyyakena ^b^saddhiṃ. ‘‘Yaṃ taṃ mātū’’^eb^tiādi pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ. Cakkavattigabbhatopi hi savisesaṃ bodhisattagabbho parihāraṃ labhati puññasambhārassa sātisayattā, tasmā bodhisattamātā ativiya sappāyāhārācārā ca hutvā sakkaccaṃ pariharati. ^b^Sukhavāsattha^eb^nti bodhisattassa sukhavāsatthaṃ. ^b^Puratthābhimukho^eb^ti mātu ^a^M2.0028^ea^ purimabhāgābhimukho. Idāni tirokucchigatassa dissamānatāya abbhantaraṃ, bāhirañca kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pubbe katakamma’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti deviyā. ^b^Vatthu^eb^nti kucchiṃ. Phalikābbhapaṭalādino viya bodhisattamātukucchitacassa patanubhāvena ālokassa vibandhābhāvato yathā bodhisattamātā kucchigataṃ bodhisattaṃ passati, kiṃ evaṃ bodhisattopi mātaraṃ, aññañca purato ṭhitaṃ rūpagataṃ passati, noti āha ^b^‘‘bodhisatto panā’’^eb^tiādi. Kasmā ^a^V2.0025^ea^ pana sati cakkhumhi, āloke ca na passatīti āha ^b^‘‘na hi antokucchiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. Assāsapassāsā viya hi tattha cakkhuviññāṇampi na uppajjati tajjassa samannāhārassa abhāvato.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā ^a^P2.0035^ea^ aññā itthiyo vijātappaccayā tādisena rogena abhibhūtāpi hutvā maranti, bodhisattamātu pana bodhisatte kucchigate tassa vijāyananimittaṃ, na koci rogo uppajjati, kevalaṃ āyuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karoti, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vutto eva. ^b^‘‘Bodhisattena vasitaṭṭhānañhī’’^eb^tiādi tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Aññesaṃ aparibhoga^eb^nti aññehi na paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na paribhogayogyanti attho. Tathā sati bodhisattapitu aññāya aggamahesiyā bhavitabbaṃ, tathāpi bodhisattamātari dharantiyā ayujjamānakanti āha ^b^‘‘na ca sakkā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Apanetvā^eb^ti aggamahesiṭhānato nīharitvā. Attani chandarāgavaseneva bahiddhā ārammaṇapariyesanāti visayinisārāgo sattānaṃ visayesu sārāgassa balavakāraṇanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anurakkhituṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti sammā gabbhaparihāraṃ nānuyuñjati. Tena ^b^gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Vatthu visadaṃ hotī^eb^ti gabbhāsayo visuddho hoti. Mātu majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse bodhisattagabbhokkamanampi tassā āyuparimāṇavilokaneneva saṅgahitaṃ vayovasena uppajjanakavikārassa parivajjanato. Itthisabhāvena uppajjanakavikāro pana bodhisattassa ānubhāveneva vūpasamati.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sattamāsajāto^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇato sattame māse jāto. So ^b^sītuṇhakkhamo na hoti^eb^ ativiya sukhumālatāya. ^b^Aṭṭhamāsajāto^eb^^a^M2.0029^ea^ kāmaṃ sattamāsajātato buddhivayavā, ekacce pana cammapadesā vuddhiṃ pāpuṇantā ghaṭṭanaṃ na sahanti, tena so ^b^na jīvati.^eb^ ‘‘Sattamāsajātassa pana na tāva te jātā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devā^eb^^a^P2.0036^ea^^b^paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantī^eb^ti ‘‘lokanāthaṃ mahāpurisaṃ sayameva paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā’’ti sañjātagāravabahumānā attano pītiṃ pavedentā ^b^khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno ādito paṭiggaṇhanti. Sūtivesa^eb^nti sūtijagganadhātivesaṃ. ^b^Eke^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. ^b^Macchakkhisadisaṃ^eb^ chavivasena. ^b^Aṭṭhāsi^eb^ na nisīdi, na nipajji vā. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘ṭhitāva bodhisattaṃ bodhisattamātā vijāyatī’’ti. Niddukkhatāya ^b^ṭhitā^eb^ eva hutvā ^b^vijāyati.^eb^ Dukkhassa hi balavabhāvato taṃ dukkhaṃ asahamānā aññā itthiyo nisinnā vā nipannā vā vijāyanti.
[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajinappaveṇiyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0026^ea^ ajinacammehi sibbitvā katapaveṇiyā. ^b^Mahātejo^eb^ti mahānubhāvo. ^b^Mahāyaso^eb^ti mahāparivāro, vipulakittighoso ca.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhaggavibhaggā^eb^ti sambādhaṭṭhānato nikkhamanena vibhāvitattā bhaggā, vibhaggā viya ca hutvā, tena nesaṃ avisadabhāvameva dasseti. ^b^Alaggo hutvā^eb^ti gabbhāsaye, yonipadese ca katthaci alaggo asatto hutvā, yato ‘‘dhamakaraṇato udakanikkhamanasadisa’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Udakenā^eb^ti gabbhāsayagatena udakena. ^b^Amakkhitova nikkhamati^eb^ sammakkhitassa tādisassa udakasemhādikasseva tattha abhāvato. Bodhisattassa hi puññānubhāvato paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ pubbepi visuddhaṃ visesato paramasugandhagandhakuṭi viya candanagandhaṃ vāyantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
[03]^b^Udakavaṭṭiyo^eb^ti udakakkhandhā.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Muhuttajāto^eb^ti muhuttena jāto hutvā muhuttamattova. ^b^Anudhāriyamāne^eb^ti ^a^P2.0037^ea^ anukūlavasena nīyamāne. ^b^Āgatānevā^eb^ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatāni eva. ^b^Anekasākha^eb^nti ratanamayānekasatapatiṭṭhānahīrakaṃ. ^b^Sahassamaṇḍala^eb^nti tesaṃ upariṭṭhitaṃ anekasahassamaṇḍalahīrakaṃ. ^b^Marū^eb^ti devā. ^b^Na kho pana^eb^^b^evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^ padavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa ^a^M2.0030^ea^ katattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāsatto hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekaṅgaṇānī^eb^ti vivaṭabhāvena vihāraṅgaṇapariveṇaṅgaṇāni viya ekaṅgaṇasadisāni ^b^ahesuṃ. Sadisopi natthī^eb^ti tumhākaṃ idaṃ vilokanaṃ visiṭṭhe passituṃ ^b^‘‘idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro’’^eb^ti āhaṃsu. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti padhāno, kena panassa padhānatāti āha ^b^‘‘guṇehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^-saddo cettha padhānapariyāyo. Bodhisattassa pana padhānatā anaññasādhāraṇāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbapaṭhamo’’^eb^ti, sabbapadhānoti attho. ^b^Etassevā^eb^ti aggasaddasseva. Ettha ca mahesakkhā tāva devā tathā ca vadanti, itare pana kathanti? Mahāsattassa ānubhāvadassanādinā. Mahesakkhānañhi devānaṃ mahāsattassa ānubhāvo viya tena sadisānampi ānubhāvo paccakkho ahosīti, itare pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahantā anuminantā tathā āhaṃsu. Paripākagatapubbahetusaṃsiddhāya dhammatāya codiyamāno ^b^imasmiṃ…pe… byākāsi.^eb^

[03]Jātamattasseva bodhisattassa ṭhānādīni yesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhūtānīti te niddhāretvā dassento ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^patiṭṭhānaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ iddhipādavasena lokuttaradhammesu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasamijjhanato. ^b^Uttarābhimukhabhāvo^eb^^a^P2.0038^ea^ lokassa ^a^V2.0027^ea^ uttaraṇavasena gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Tena hi bhagavā sadevakassa lokassa abhibhūto, kenaci anabhibhūto ahosi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahājanaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā gamanassa pubbanimitta’’^eb^nti. Tathā sattapadagamanaṃ sattapadabojjhaṅgasampannāriyamaggagamanassa. Suvisuddhasetacchattadhāraṇaṃ suvisuddhavimuttichattadhāraṇassa. Pañcarājakakudhabhaṇḍasamāyogo pañcavidhavimuttiguṇasamāyogassa. Anāvaṭadisānuvilokanaṃ anāvaṭañāṇatāya. ‘‘Aggohamasmī’’tiādinā achambhitavācābhāsanaṃ kenaci avibandhanīyatāya appavattiyassa saddhammacakkappavattanassa. ‘‘Ayamantimā jātī’’ti āyatiṃ jātiyā abhāvakittanā anupādi…pe… pubbanimittanti veditabbaṃ tassa tassa anāgate laddhabbavisesassa taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ abyabhicārīti katvā. ^b^Na āgato^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte, aññattha ca vakkhamānāya anupubbiyā na āgato. ^b^Āharitvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte, aṭṭhakathāsu ca āgatanayena āharitvā ^b^dīpetabbo.^eb^

[03]^b^‘‘Dasasahassilokadhātu^eb^^a^M2.0031^ea^^b^kampī’’^eb^ti idaṃ satipi idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatatte vakkhamānānaṃ acchariyānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ aññampi evarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Tantibaddhā vīṇā cammabaddhā bheriyo^eb^ti pañcaṅgikatūriyassa nidassanamattaṃ, ca-saddena vā itaresampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ‘‘Andubandhanādīni taṅkhaṇe eva chajjitvā puna pākatikāneva honti, tathā jaccandhādīnaṃ cakkhusotādīni tathārūpakammapaccayā tasmiṃyeva khaṇe uppajjitvā tāvadeva vigacchantī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Chijjiṃsū^eb^ti ca pādesu bandhaṭṭhānesu chijjiṃsu. ^b^Vigacchiṃsū^eb^ti vūpasamiṃsu. ^b^Ākāsaṭṭhakaratanāni^eb^ nāma taṃtaṃvimānagatamaṇiratanādīni. ^b^Sakatejobhāsitānī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0039^ea^ ativiya samujjalāya attano pabhāya obhāsitāni ^b^ahesuṃ. Nappavattī^eb^ti na sannipāto. ^b^Na vāyī^eb^ti kharo vāto na vāyi. Mudusukho pana sattānaṃ sukhāvaho vāyi. ^b^Pathavigatā ahesuṃ^eb^ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhātuṃ avisahantā. ^b^Utusampanno^eb^ti anuṇhāsītatāsaṅkhātena utunā sampanno. ^b^Apphoṭanaṃ^eb^ vuccati bhujahatthasaṅghaṭṭanasaddo, atthato pana vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena puthupāṇinā hatthatāḷanena saddakaraṇaṃ. Mukhena usseḷanaṃ saddassa muñcanaṃ ^b^seḷanaṃ. Ekaddhajamālā ahosi^eb^ nirantaraṃ dhajamālāsamodhānagatāya. Na kevalañca etāni eva, atha kho aññānipi ‘‘vicittapupphasugandhapupphavassadevopavassi sūriye dissamāne eva tārakā obhāsiṃsu, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakaṃ pathavito ubbhijji, bilāsayā ca tiracchānā āsayato nikkhamiṃsu, rāgadosamohāpi tanu bhaviṃsu, pathaviyaṃ rajo vūpasami, aniṭṭhagandho vigacchi, dibbagandho vāyi, rūpino devā sarūpeneva manussānaṃ āpāthaṃ agamaṃsu, sattānaṃ cutūpapātā nāhesu’’nti evamādīni ^a^V2.0028^ea^ yāni mahābhinīhārasamaye uppannāni dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni, tāni anavasesato tadā ahesunti.

[03]^b^Tatrāpī^eb^ti tesupi pathavikampādīsu evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvo veditabbo. Na kevalaṃ sampatijātassa ṭhānādīsu evāti adhippāyo. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ sabbassa ñeyyassa, titthakaramatassa ca cālanato. Kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva imasmiṃyeva ^b^ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto^eb^ kenaci anussāhitānaṃyeva ^b^ekappahāreneva^eb^^a^P2.0040^ea^^b^sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggaṇhanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ^eb^ dibbavihārapaṭilābhassa, ^b^pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ^eb^ tattheva ṭhānassa niccalasabhāvato ^a^M2.0032^ea^ āneñjavihārapaṭilābhassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ. Vīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ^eb^ parūpadesena vinā sayameva ^b^anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa^eb^ pubbanimittaṃ. ^b^Bherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ^eb^ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya pavedanasamatthassa ^b^dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa^eb^ amatadundubhighosanassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ. Andubandhanādīnaṃ chedo^eb^ mānavinibandhabhedanassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ. Mahājanassa rogavigamo^eb^ tasseva sakalavaṭṭadukkharogavigamabhūtassa ^b^saccapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Mahājanassā’’ti padaṃ ‘‘mahājanassa dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa, mahājanassa dibbasotadhātupaṭilābhassā’’tiādinā tattha tattha ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Iddhipādabhāvanāvasena sātisayañāṇajavasampattisiddhīti āha ^b^‘‘pīṭhasappīnaṃ javasampadā caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimitta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Supaṭṭanasampāpuṇanaṃ catupaṭisambhidādhigamassa pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^ Atthādianurūpaṃ atthādīsu sampaṭipattibhāvato. ^b^Ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ yaṃ lokassa dhammobhāsaṃ dassessati,^eb^ tena ^b^tassa^eb^ sakatejobhāsitattassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Catubrahmavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ tassa sabbaso veravūpasamanato. ^b^Ekādasāgginibbāpanassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ dunnibbāpananibbānabhāvato. ^b^Ñāṇālokādassanassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ anāloke ālokadassanabhāvato. ^b^Nibbānarasenā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ nibbāyanarasena. ^b^Ekarasabhāvassā^eb^ti sāsanassa sabbattha ekarasabhāvassa, tañca kho amadhurassa ^a^P2.0041^ea^ lokassa sabbaso madhurabhāvāpādanena. ^b^Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhindanassa pubbanimittaṃ^eb^ sabbaso diṭṭhigatavātāpanayanavasena. Ākāsādiappatiṭṭhavisamacañcalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya ^b^sakuṇānaṃ pathavigamanaṃ^eb^ tādisaṃ micchāgāhaṃ pahāya sattānaṃ ^b^pāṇehi^eb^ ratanattaya^b^saraṇagamanassa pubbanittaṃ. Bahujanakantatāyā^eb^ti candassa viya bahujanassa kantatāya. ^b^Sūriyassa uṇhasītavivajjitautusukhatā^eb^ pariḷāhavivajjita^b^kāyikacetasikasukhappattiyā pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^^b^Devatānaṃ apphoṭanādīhi kīḷanaṃ^eb^ pamoduppatti bhavantagamanena, dhammasabhāvabodhanena ca udānavasena pamodavibhāvanassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ. Dhammavegavassanassā^eb^ti desanāñāṇavegena dhammāmatassa vassanassa ^a^V2.0029^ea^^b^pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^ Kāyagatāsativasena laddhaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppāditamaggaphalasukhānubhavo ^b^kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābho,^eb^ tassa pana kāyassāpi atappakasukhāvahattā khudāpipāsāpīḷanābhāvo pubbanimittaṃ vutto ^a^M2.0033^ea^. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^pana khudaṃ, pipāsañca bhinditvā vuttaṃ. Tattha pubbanimittānaṃ bhedo visesasāmaññavibhāgena, gobalībaddañāyena ca gahetabbo. ‘‘Sayamevā’’ti padaṃ ‘‘aṭṭhaṅgikamaggadvāravivaraṇassā’’ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Bharitabhāvassā^eb^ti paripuṇṇabhāvassa. ^b^‘‘Ariyaddhajamālāmālitāyā^eb^ti kāsāyaddhajamālāvantatāyā’’ti keci, sadevakassa lokassa pana ariyamaggabojjhaṅgaddhajamālāhi mālibhāvassa ^b^pubbanimittaṃ.^eb^ Yaṃ panettha anuddhaṭaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘sampatijāto’’tiādinā āgate imasmiṃ vāre. ^b^Vissajjitova,^eb^ tasmā amhehi idha apubbaṃ vattabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Tadā ^a^P2.0042^ea^ pathaviyaṃ gacchantopi mahāsatto ākāsena gacchanto viya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti ayamettha niyati dhammaniyāmo bodhisattānaṃ dhammatā ti idaṃ niyativādavasena kathanaṃ. Pubbe purimajātīsu tādisassa puññasambhārakammassa katattā upacitattā mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ pubbekatakammavādavasena kathanaṃ. Imesaṃ sattānaṃ upari īsanasīlatāya yathāsakaṃ kammameva issaro nāma, tassa nimmānaṃ attano phalassa nibbattanaṃ mahāpurisopi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthena uḷārena puññakammena nibbattito, tena issarena nimmito nāma, tassa cāyaṃ nimmānaviseso, yadidaṃ mahānubhāvatā, yāya mahājanassa tathā upaṭṭhāsīti idaṃ issaranimmānavasena kathanaṃ. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ bahulaṃ vatvā kiṃ imāya pariyāyakathāyāti avasāne ujukameva byākari. Sampatijāto pathaviyaṃ kathaṃ padasā gacchati, evaṃ mahānubhāvo ākāsena maññe gacchatīti parikappanavasena ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi. Sīghataraṃ pana sattapadavītihārena gatattā dissamānarūpopi mahājanassa adissamāno viya ahosi. Acelakabhāvo, khuddakasarīratā ca tādisassa iriyāpathassa na anucchavikāti kammānubhāvasañjanitapāṭihāriyavasena alaṅkatapaṭiyatto viya, soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca mahājanassa upaṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ. Mahāsattassa puññānubhāvena tadā tathā upaṭṭhānamattamevetanti. ^b^Pacchā bāladārakova ahosi, na tādiso^eb^ti. Buddhabhāvānucchavikassa bodhisattānubhāvassa yāthāvato paveditattā ^b^parisā cassa^eb^ byākaraṇena ^b^buddhena viya…pe… attamanā ahosi.^eb^

[03]^b^Sabbadhammatā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0030^ea^^a^M2.0034^ea^ sabbā soḷasavidhāpi yathāvuttā dhammatā ^a^P2.0043^ea^^b^sabbabodhisattānaṃ hontīti veditabbā^eb^ puññañāṇasambhāradassanena nesaṃ ekasadisattā.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dukūlacumbaṭake^eb^ti daharassa nipajjanayogyatāvasena paṭisaṃhaṭadukūlasukhume. ‘‘Khattiyo brāhmaṇo’’ti evamādi ^b^jāti.^eb^ ‘‘Koṇḍañño gotamo’’ti evamādi ^b^gottaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Poṇikā cikkhallikā sākiyā koḷiyā’’ti evamādi ^b^kulapadeso. Ādi^eb^-saddena rūpissariyaparivārādisabbasampattiyo saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Mahantassā^eb^ti vipulassa, uḷārassāti attho. ^b^Nipphattiyo^eb^ti siddhiyo. ^b^Gantabbagatiyā^eb^ti gati-saddassa kammasādhanatamāha. Upapajjanavasena hi sucaritaduccaritehi gantabbāti ^b^gatiyo,^eb^ upapattibhavaviseso. Gacchati yathāruci pavattatīti ^b^gati,^eb^ ajjhāsayo. ^b^Paṭisaraṇe^eb^ti parāyaṇe avassaye. Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyuttassa hi arahato nibbānameva taṃpaṭisaraṇaṃ. ^b^Tyāha^eb^nti te ahaṃ.

[03]Dasavidhe kusaladhamme, agarahite ca rājadhamme (jā. 2 mahāmaṃsajātake vitthāro) niyuttoti ^b^dhammiko.^eb^ Tena ca dhammena sakalaṃ lokaṃ rañjetīti ^b^dhammarājā.^eb^ Yasmā cakkavattī dhammena ñāyena rajjaṃ adhigacchati, na adhammena, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammena laddharajjattā dhammarājā’’^eb^ti. Catūsu disāsu samuddapariyosānatāya ^b^caturantā^eb^ nāma tattha tattha dīpe mahāpathavīti āha ^b^‘‘puratthima…pe… issaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vijitāvī^eb^ti vijetabbassa vijitavā, kāmakodhādikassa abbhantarassa, paṭirājabhūtassa bāhirassa ca arigaṇassa vijayi, vijetvā ṭhitoti attho. Kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci yuddhaṃ nāma natthi, yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa vijayassa siddhiyā ^b^‘‘vijitasaṅgāmo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Janapadova catubbidhācchariyadhammādisamannāgate asmiṃ rājini thāvariyaṃ kenaci asaṃhāriyaṃ daḷhaṃ bhattabhāvaṃ patto, janapade ^a^P2.0044^ea^ vā attano dhammikāya paṭipattiyā thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti ^b^janapadatthāvariyappatto.^eb^ Manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitadhanaharaṇādinā parasāhasakāritāya ^b^sāhasikā.^eb^

[03]^b^Ratijananaṭṭhenā^eb^ti atappakapītisomanassuppādanena. Saddatthato pana rametīti ^b^ratanaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Aho manohara’’nti citte kattabbatāya ^b^cittīkataṃ^eb^^a^M2.0035^ea^. ‘‘Svāyaṃ cittīkāro tassa pūjanīyatāyā’’ti cittīkatanti pūjanīyanti atthaṃ vadanti. Mahantaṃ vipulaṃ aparimitaṃ mūlaṃ agghatīti ^b^mahagghaṃ.^eb^ Natthi etassa tulā upamāti ^b^atulaṃ,^eb^ asadisaṃ. Kadāci eva uppajjanato dukkhena laddhabbattā ^a^V2.0031^ea^^b^dullabhadassanaṃ.^eb^ Anomehi uḷāraguṇeheva sattehi paribhuñjitabbato ^b^anomasattaparibhogaṃ.^eb^ Idāni nesaṃ cittīkatādiatthānaṃ savisesaṃ cakkaratane labbhamānataṃ dassetvā itaresupi te atidisituṃ ^b^‘‘cakkaratanassa cā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti^eb^ rañño anaññasādhāraṇissariyādisampattipaṭilābhahetuto, sattānañca yathicchitatthapaṭilābhahetuto. ^b^Aggho natthi^eb^ ativiya uḷārasamujjalasattaratanamayattā, acchariyabbhutamahānubhāvatāya ca. Yadaggena mahagghaṃ, tadaggena ^b^atulaṃ.^eb^ Sattānaṃ pāpajigucchanena vigatakāḷako puññapasutatāya maṇḍabhūto yādiso kālo buddhuppādāraho, tādise eva cakkavattīnampi sambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā ca panā’’^eb^tiādi. Upamāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, upamopameyyānañca na accantameva sadisatā. Tasmā yathā buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjanti, na tathā cakkavattino, evaṃ santepi cakkavattivattaparipūraṇassāpi dukkarabhāvatopi dullabhuppādāyevāti ^a^P2.0045^ea^, iminā dullabhuppādatāsāmaññena tesaṃ dullabhadassanatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Kāmaṃ cakkaratanānubhāvena sijjhamāno guṇo cakkavattiparivārasādhāraṇo, tathāpi ‘‘cakkavattī eva naṃ sāmibhāvena visavitāya paribhuñjatī’’ti vattabbataṃ arahati tadatthaṃ uppajjanatoti dassento ^b^‘‘tadeta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Yathāvuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ, channampi vā atthānaṃ itararatanesupi labbhanato ^b^‘‘evaṃ sesānipī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Hatthiassa-pariṇāyakaratanehi ajitavijayato, cakkaratanena ca parivārabhāvena, sesehi paribhogūpakaraṇabhāvena samannāgato. Hatthiassamaṇītthiratanehi paribhogūpakaraṇabhāvena sesehi parivārabhāvenāti yojanā.

[03]^b^Catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhava^eb^nti tattha laddhaṃ sirisampattiñceva bhogasampattiñca. ^b^Tādisamevā^eb^ti ‘‘purebhattamevā’’tiādinā vuttānubhāvameva. Yojanappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ byāpanena ^b^yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ.^eb^ Atidīghatādi^b^chabbidhadosaparivajjitaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Sūrā^eb^ti sattivanto, nibbhayāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘abhīrukā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅga^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ. Yena kāraṇena ‘‘vīrā’’ti vucceyyuṃ, taṃ ^b^vīraṅgaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘vīriyassetaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0036^ea^^b^nāma’’^eb^nti. Yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā cakkassa vattanato ^b^‘‘cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ katvā ṭhitasamuddapariyanta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Adaṇḍenā’’^eb^ti imināva dhanadaṇḍassa, sarīradaṇḍassa ca akaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Asatthenā’’^eb^ti iminā pana senāya yujjhanassāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye katāparādhe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttappakāra^eb^nti sāgarapariyantaṃ.

[03]‘‘Rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ taṇhāyanaṭṭhena ^b^taṇhā’’^eb^ti pavattiākārabhedena ^a^P2.0046^ea^ lobho eva dvidhā vutto ^a^V2.0032^ea^. Tathā hissa dvidhāpi chadanaṭṭho ekantiko. Yathāha ‘‘andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara’’nti, (netti. 11, 27) ‘‘taṇhāchadanachāditā’’ti (udā. 64) ca. Iminā nayena dosādīnampi chadanaṭṭho vattabbo. ^b^Kilesa^eb^ggahaṇena vicikicchādayo sesakilesā vuttā. Yasmā te sabbe pāpadhammā uppajjamānā sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhanti kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti, tasmā te ‘‘chadanā, chadā’’ti ca vuttā. ^b^Vivaṭṭacchadā^eb^ti ca o-kārassa ā-kāraṃ katvā niddeso.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tāsa^eb^nti dvinnampi nipphattīnaṃ. ^b^Nimittabhūtānī^eb^ti ñāpakakāraṇabhūtāni. Tathā hi lakkhīyati mahāpurisabhāvo etehīti ^b^lakkhaṇāni.^eb^ Ṭhānagamanādīsu bhūmiyaṃ suṭṭhu samaṃ patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti ^b^suppatiṭṭhitapādo.^eb^ Taṃ panassa suppatiṭṭhitapādataṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^aggatala^eb^nti aggapādatalaṃ. ^b^Paṇhī^eb^ti paṇhitalaṃ. ^b^Passa^eb^nti pādatalassa dvīsu passesu ekekaṃ, ubhayameva vā pariyantaṃ passaṃ. ^b^‘‘Assa panā’’^eb^tiādi anvayato atthavibhāvanaṃ. ^b^Suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva^eb^ ujukaṃ nikkhipiyamānaṃ. ^b^Ekappahārenevā^eb^ti ekakkhaṇeyeva. ^b^Sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati^eb^ nikkhipane. Ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmito uṭṭhahatīti yojanā. ^b^Tasmā ayaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādo^eb^ti nigamanaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ anupubbaninnādiacchariyabbhutaṃ ^a^P2.0047^ea^ nissandaphalaṃ, taṃ parato ^b^lakkhaṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.201) āvibhavissatīti.

[03]^b^Nābhi dissatī^eb^ti lakkhaṇacakkassa nābhi parimaṇḍalasaṇṭhānā suparibyattā hutvā dissati, labbhatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Nābhiparicchinnā^eb^ti tassaṃ nābhiyaṃ paricchinnā paricchedavasena ṭhitā. ^b^Nābhimukhaparikkhepapaṭṭo^eb^ti pakaticakkassa ^a^M2.0037^ea^ akkhabbhāhatapariharaṇatthaṃ nābhimukhe ṭhapetabbaṃ parikkhepapaṭṭo, tappaṭicchanno idha adhippeto. ^b^Nemimaṇikā^eb^ti nemiyaṃ āvalibhāvena ṭhitamaṇikālekhā. ^b^Sambahulavāro^eb^ti bahuvidhalekhaṅgavibhāvanavāro. ^b^Sattī^eb^ti āvudhasatti. ^b^Sirivaccho^eb^ti siriaṅgā. ^b^Nandī^eb^ti dakkhiṇāvattaṃ. ^b^Sovattiko^eb^ti sovattiaṅgo. ^b^Vaṭaṃsako^eb^ti āveḷaṃ. ^b^Vaḍḍhamānaka^eb^nti purimahādīsu dīpaṅkaṃ. ^b^Morahatthako^eb^ti morapiñchakalāpo, morapiñchapaṭisibbito vā bījanīviseso. ^b^Vāḷabījanī^eb^ti cāmarivālaṃ. Siddhatthādi ^b^puṇṇaghaṭapuṇṇapātiyo.^eb^ ‘‘Cakkavāḷo’’ti vatvā tassa padhānāvayave dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘himavā sineru…pe… sahassānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāyā’’^eb^ti idaṃ hatthiratanādīnampi tattha labbhamānabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^Sabbo^eb^tisattiādiko yathāvutto aṅgaviseso ^b^cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāro^eb^ti veditabbo.

[03]^b^‘‘Āyatapaṇhī’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0033^ea^ idaṃ aññesaṃ paṇhito dīghataṃ sandhāya ^a^P2.0048^ea^ vuttaṃ, na pana atidīghatanti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇapaṇhī’’^eb^ti. Yathā pana paṇhilakkhaṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Āraggenā^eb^ti maṇḍalāya sikhāya. ^b^Vaṭṭetvā^eb^ti yathā suvaṭṭaṃ hoti, evaṃ vaṭṭetvā. ^b^Rattakambalageṇḍukasadisā^eb^ti rattakambalamayageṇḍukasadisā.

[03]^b^‘‘Makkaṭassevā’’^eb^ti dīghabhāvaṃ, samatañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Niyyāsatelenā^eb^ti chattiritaniyyāsādiniyyāsasammissena telena, yaṃ ‘‘surabhiniyyāsa’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Niyyāsatela^eb^ggahaṇañcettha haritālavaṭṭiyā ghanasiniddhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
[03]Yathā satakkhattuṃ vihataṃ kappāsapaṭalaṃ sappimaṇḍe osāritaṃ ativiya mudu hoti, evaṃ mahāpurisassa hatthapādāti dassento ^b^‘‘sappimaṇḍe’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Talunā^eb^ti sukhumālā.

[03]^b^Cammenā^eb^ti aṅgulantaraveṭhitacammena. ^b^Paṭibaddhāṅgulantaro^eb^ti ekato sambaddhāṅgulantaro na hoti. ^b^Ekappamāṇā^eb^ti dīghato samānappamāṇā. ^b^Yavalakkhaṇa^eb^nti abbhantarato aṅgulipabbe ṭhitaṃ yavalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^Paṭivijjhitvā^eb^ti taṃtaṃpabbānaṃ samānadesatāya aṅgulīnaṃ pasāritakālepi aññamaññaṃ vijjhitāni viya phusitvā tiṭṭhanti.

[03]^b^Saṅkhā^eb^^a^M2.0038^ea^ vuccanti gopphakā, uddhaṃ saṅkhā etesanti ^b^ussaṅkhā,^eb^ pādā. ^b^Piṭṭhipāde^eb^ti piṭṭhipādasamīpe. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti piṭṭhipāde ṭhitagopphakabhāvena baddhā hontīti yojanā. Tayidaṃ ‘‘tenā’’ti padaṃ uparipadadvayepi yojetabbaṃ ^a^P2.0049^ea^ ‘‘tena baddhabhāvena na yathāsukhaṃ parivaṭṭanti, tena yathāsukhaṃ naparivaṭṭanena gacchantānaṃ pādatalānipi na dissantī’’ti. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti piṭṭhipādato dvitiaṅgulimattaṃ uddhaṃ, ‘‘caturaṅgulamatta’’nti ca vadanti. Nigūḷhāni ca honti, na aññesaṃ viya paññāyamānāni. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti gopphakānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitabhāvena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti mahāpurisassa. Satipi desantarappavattiyaṃ niccaloti dassanatthaṃ ^b^nābhi^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^‘‘Adhokāyova iñjatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ purimapadassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā adhokāyova iñjati, tasmā nābhito…pe… niccalo hoti. ^b^‘‘Sukhena pādā parivaṭṭantī’’^eb^ti idaṃ pana purimassa, pacchimassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā sukhena pādā parivaṭṭanti, tasmā adhokāyova iñjati, yasmā sukhena pādā parivaṭṭanti, tasmā puratopi…pe… pacchatoyevāti.

[03]Yasmā eṇimigassa samantato ekasadisamaṃsā anukkamena uddhaṃ thūlā jaṅghā honti, tathā ^a^V2.0034^ea^ mahāpurisassāpi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘eṇimigasadisajaṅgho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paripuṇṇajaṅgho^eb^ti samantato maṃsūpacayena paripuṇṇajaṅgho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na ekato’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Etenā^eb^ti ‘‘anonamanto’’tiādivacanena, jāṇuphāsubhāvadīpanenāti attho. ^b^Avasesajanā^eb^ti iminā lakkhaṇena rahitajanā. ^b^Khujjā vā honti^eb^ heṭṭhimakāyato uparimakāyassa rassatāya, ^b^vāmanā vā^eb^ uparimakāyato heṭṭhimakāyassa rassatāya, etena ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ, cakkavattinañca itare sattā khujjapakkhikā, vāmanapakkhikā cāti dasseti.

[03]Kāmaṃ sabbāpi padumakaṇṇikā suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva, kañcanapadumakaṇṇikā pana pabhassarabhāvena tato sātisayāti ^a^P2.0050^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ohita^eb^nti samohitaṃ antogadhaṃ. Tathābhūtaṃ pana taṃ tena channaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘paṭicchanna’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo^eb^ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇavaṇṇoti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘jātihiṅgulakenā’’^eb^tiādi, svāyamattho āvuttiñāyena ca veditabbo. Sarīrapariyāyo idha vaṇṇa-saddoti adhippāyo. Paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā ^a^M2.0039^ea^ tathārūpāya pana ruḷhiyā abhāvaṃ manasi katvā vaṇṇadhātupariyāyameva vaṇṇa-saddaṃ gahetvā dutiyavikappo vutto. Tasmā padadvayenāpi suniddhantasuvaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03]^b^Rajo^eb^ti sukhumarajo. ^b^Jalla^eb^nti malīnabhāvāvaho reṇusañcayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘malaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Yadi vivattati, kathaṃ nhānādīnīti āha ^b^‘‘hatthadhovanādīnī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Āvaṭṭapariyosāne^eb^ti padakkhiṇāvaṭṭanavasena pavattassa āvaṭṭassa ante.

[03]Brahmuno sarīraṃ purato vā pacchato vā anonamitvā ujukameva uggatanti āha ^b^‘‘brahmā viya ujugatto’’^eb^ti. Sā panāyaṃ ujugattatā avayavesu buddhippattesu daṭṭhabbā, na daharakāleti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uggatadīghasarīro bhavissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itaresū^eb^ti ‘‘khandhajāṇūsū’’ti imesu ^b^dvīsu ṭhānesu^eb^ namantā purato namantīti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Passavaṅkā^eb^ti dakkhiṇapassena vā vāmapassena vā vaṅkā. ^b^Sūlasadisā^eb^ti potthakarūpakaraṇe ṭhapitasūlapādasadisā.

[03]Hatthapiṭṭhiādivasena satta sarīrāvayavā ussadā upacitamaṃsā etassāti ^b^sattussado.^eb^ Aṭṭhikoṭiyo ^a^V2.0035^ea^ paññāyantīti yojanā. ^b^Nigūḷhasirājālehī^eb^ti lakkhaṇavacanametanti tena nigūḷhāṭṭhikoṭīhītipi vuttameva hotīti. ^b^Hatthapiṭṭhādīhī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0051^ea^ ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena aṃsakūṭakhandhakūṭānaṃ saṅgahe siddhe taṃ ekadesena dassento ^b^‘‘vaṭṭetvā…pe… khandhenā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^‘‘Silārūpakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādinā vā nigūḷhāṃsakūṭatāpi vibhāvitā yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ sīhapubbaddhaṃ, paripuṇṇāvayavatāya sīhapubbaddhaṃ viya sakalo kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīhassa pubbaddhakāyo viya sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sīhassevā^eb^ti sīhassa viya. ^b^Dussaṇṭhitavisaṇṭhito na hotī^eb^ti duṭṭhu saṇṭhito, virūpasaṇṭhito ca na hoti, tesaṃ tesaṃ avayavānaṃ ayuttabhāvena, virūpabhāvena ca saṇṭhiti upagato na hotīti attho. ^b^Saṇṭhantī^eb^ti saṇṭhahanti. ^b^Dīghehī^eb^ti aṅgulināsādīhi. ^b^Rassehī^eb^ti gīvādīhi. ^b^Thūlehī^eb^ti ūrubāhuādīhi ^a^M2.0040^ea^. ^b^Kisehī^eb^ti kesalomamajjhādīhi. ^b^Puthulehī^eb^ti akkhihatthatalādīhi. ^b^Vaṭṭehī^eb^ti jaṅghahatthādīhi.

[03]Satapuññalakkhaṇatāya ^b^nānācittena puññacittena cittito^eb^ sañjātacittabhāvo ‘‘īdiso eva buddhānaṃ dhammakāyassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhavituṃ yutto’’ti dasapāramīhi ^b^sajjito^eb^ abhisaṅkhato, ‘‘dānacittena puññacittenā’’ti vā pāṭho, dānavasena, sīlādivasena ca pavattapuññacittenāti attho.
