[03]^b^Dvinnaṃ koṭṭānaṃ antara^eb^nti dvinnaṃ piṭṭhibāhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ piṭṭhimajjhassa uparibhāgo. ^b^Citaṃ paripuṇṇa^eb^nti aninnabhāvena citaṃ, dvīhi koṭṭehi samatalatāya paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^Uggammā^eb^ti uggantvā, aninnaṃ samatalaṃ hutvāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Nigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo^eb^ti parimaṇḍalanigrodho viya ^a^P2.0052^ea^ parimaṇḍalo, ‘‘nigrodhaparimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalo’’ti vattabbe ekassa parimaṇḍala-saddassa lopaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo’’^eb^ti vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samakkhandhasākho nigrodho’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi sabbo nigrodho parimaṇḍaloti, parimaṇḍalasaddasannidhānena vā parimaṇḍalova nigrodho gayhatīti ekassa parimaṇḍalasaddassa lopena vināpi ayamattho labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘nigrodho viya parimaṇḍalo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yāvatako assāti yāvatakvassa^eb^ o-kārassa va-kārādesaṃ katvā.

[03]^b^Samavaṭṭitakkhandho^eb^ti samaṃ suvaṭṭitakkhandho. Koñcā viya dīghagalā, bakā viya vaṅkagalā ^a^V2.0036^ea^, varāhā viya puthulagalāti yojanā. ^b^Suvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadiso^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayakhuddakamudiṅgasadiso.

[03]^b^Rasaggasaggī^eb^ti madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ gasanti anto pavesantīti rasaggasā rasaggasānaṃ aggā rasaggasaggā, tā etassa santīti ^b^rasaggasaggī. Tenā^eb^ti ojāya apharaṇena hīnadhātukattā ^b^te bahvābādhā honti.^eb^

[03]^b^Hanū^eb^ti sannissayadantādhārassa samaññā, taṃ bhagavato sīhassa hanu viya, tasmā bhagavā ^b^sīhahanu.^eb^ Tattha yasmā buddhānaṃ rūpakāyassa, dhammakāyassa ca upamā nāma hīnūpamāva, natthi samānūpamā, kuto adhikūpamā, tasmā ayampi hīnūpamāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā mahāpurisassa heṭṭhimānurūpavaseneva uparimampi saṇṭhitaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0041^ea^^b^‘‘dvepi paripuṇṇānī’’^eb^ti, tañca kho na sabbaso parimaṇḍalatāya, atha kho tibhāgāvasesamaṇḍalatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sallakkhetvā^eb^ti attano lakkhaṇasatthānusārena ^a^P2.0053^ea^ upadhāretvā. Dantānaṃ uccanīcatā abbhantarabāhirapassavasenapi veditabbā, na aggavaseneva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayapaṭṭakena chinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayapaṭṭaka^eb^nti kakacaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Samā bhavissanti,^eb^ na visamā, samasaṇṭhānāti attho.
[03]Sātisayaṃ mududīghaputhulatādippakāraguṇā hutvā bhūtā jātāti pabhūtā, bha-kārassa ha-kāraṃ katvā pahūtā jivhā etassāti ^b^pahūtajivho.^eb^

[03]Vicchinditvā vicchinditvā pavattasaratāya ^b^chinnassarāpi.^eb^ Anekākāratāya ^b^bhinnassarāpi.^eb^ Kākassa viya amanuññasaratāya ^b^kākassarāpi. Apalibuddhattā^eb^ti anupaddutavatthukattā, vatthūti ca akkharuppattiṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato^eb^ti ettha aṅgāni parato āgamissanti. ^b^Mañjughoso^eb^ti madhurassaro.

[03]^b^Abhinīlanetto^eb^ti adhikanīlanetto, adhikatā ca sātisayaṃ nīlabhāvena veditabbā, na nettanīlabhāvasseva adhikabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘na sakalanīlanetto’’^eb^tiādi. Pītalohitavaṇṇā setamaṇḍalagatarājivasena. Nīlasetakāḷavaṇṇā pana taṃtaṃmaṇḍalavaseneva veditabbā.

[03]^b^‘‘Cakkhubhaṇḍa^eb^nti akkhidala’’nti keci. ‘‘Akkhidalavaṭuma’’nti aññe. Akkhidalehi pana ^a^V2.0037^ea^ saddhiṃ akkhibimbanti veditabbaṃ. Evañhi viniggatagambhīrajotanāpi yuttā hoti. ^b^‘‘Adhippeta’’^eb^nti iminā ayamettha adhippāyo ekadesena samudāyupalakkhaṇañāyenāti dasseti. Yasmā pakhuma-saddo loke akkhidalalomesu niruḷho, tenevāha ^b^‘‘mudusiniddhanīlasukhumapakhumācitāni akkhīnī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kiñcāpi uṇṇā-saddo loke avisesato lomapariyāyo, idha pana lomavisesavācakoti āha ^b^‘‘uṇṇā loma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nalāṭavemajjhe^eb^^a^P2.0054^ea^^b^jātā^eb^ti nalāṭamajjhagatā jātā. ^b^Odātatāya upamā,^eb^ na mudutāya ^a^M2.0042^ea^. Uṇṇā hi tatopi sātisayaṃ mudutarā. Tenāha^b^‘‘sappi maṇḍe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Rajatapubbuḷaka^eb^nti rajatamayatārakamāha.

[03]^b^Dve atthavase paṭicca vutta^eb^nti yasmā buddhā, cakkavattino ca paripuṇṇanalāṭatāya, paripuṇṇasīsabimbatāya ca ‘‘uṇhīsasīsā’’ti vuccanti, tasmā te dve atthavase paṭicca ^b^‘‘uṇhīsasīso’’ti idaṃ vuttaṃ.^eb^ Idāni taṃ atthadvayaṃ mahāpurise suppatiṭṭhitanti ^b^‘‘mahāpurisassa hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Saṇhatamatāya, suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya, pabhassaratāya, paripuṇṇatāya ca ^b^rañño bandhauṇhīsapaṭṭo viya virocati. Kapisīsā^eb^ti dvidhābhūtasīsā. ^b^Phalasīsā^eb^ti phalitasīsā. ^b^Aṭṭhisīsā^eb^ti maṃsassa abhāvato ativiya aṭṭhitāya, patanubhāvato vā taconaddhāṭṭhimattasīsā. ^b^Tumbasīsā^eb^ti lābusadisasīsā. ^b^Pabbhārasīsā^eb^ti piṭṭhibhāgena olambamānasīsā. ^b^Purimanayenā^eb^ti paripuṇṇanalāṭatāpakkhena. ^b^Uṇhīsaveṭhitasīso viyā^eb^ti uṇhīsapaṭṭena veṭhitasīsapadeso viya. ^b^Uṇhīsaṃ viyā^eb^ti chekena sippinā viracitauṇhīsamaṇḍalaṃ viya.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassa vitthāro^eb^ti tassa lakkhaṇapariggaṇhane nemittakānaṃ santappanassa vitthāro vitthārakathā. ^b^Gabbhokkantiyaṃ^eb^ nimittabhūta supinapaṭiggāhakasantappane ^b^vuttoyeva. ^eb^^b^Niddosenā^eb^ti khārikaloṇikādidosarahitena. ^b^Dhātiyo^eb^ti thaññapāyikā dhātiyo. Tā hi dhāpenti thaññaṃ pāyentīti ^b^dhātiyo.^eb^^b^‘‘Tathā’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘saṭṭhi’’nti padaṃ upasaṃharati ^a^P2.0055^ea^, ^b^sesāpī^eb^ti nhāpikā, dhārikā, parihārikāti imā tividhā. Tāpi dahanti vidahanti nhānaṃ dahanti dhārentīti ‘‘dhātiyo’’ tveva vuccanti. Tattha ^b^dhāraṇaṃ^eb^ urasā, ūrunā, hatthehi vā suciraṃ velaṃ sandhāraṇaṃ. ^b^Pariharaṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0038^ea^ aññassa aṅkato attano aṅkaṃ, aññassa bāhuto attano bāhuṃ upasaṃharantehi ^b^haraṇaṃ^eb^ sampāpanaṃ.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mañjussaro^eb^ti saṇhassaro. Yo hi saṇho, so kharo na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘akharassaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vaggussaro^eb^ti manorammassaro, manorammatā cassa cāturiyane puññayogatoti āha ^b^‘‘chekanipuṇassaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Madhurassaro^eb^ti sotasukhassaro, sotasukhatā cassa ativiya iṭṭhabhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘sātassaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pemanīyassaro^eb^ti ^a^M2.0043^ea^ piyāyitabbassaro, piyāyitabbatā cassa suṇantānaṃ attani bhattisamuppādanenāti āha ^b^‘‘pemajanakassaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Karavīkassaro^eb^ti. Karavīkasaddo yesaṃ sattānaṃ sotapathaṃ upagacchati, te attano sarasampattiyā pakatiṃ jahāpetvā avase karonto attano vase vatteti, evaṃ madhuroti dassento ^b^‘‘tatrida’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^‘‘karavīkasakuṇe’’^eb^tiādi tassa sabhāvakathanaṃ. ^b^Laḷita^eb^nti pītivegasamuṭṭhitaṃ līḷaṃ. ^b^Chaḍḍetvā^eb^ti ‘‘saṅkharaṇampi madhurasaddasavanantarāyakara’’nti ^b^tiṇāni^eb^ apanetvā. ^b^Anikkhipitvā^eb^ti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvā ākāsagatameva katvā. ^b^Anubaddhamigā^eb^ vāḷamigehi. Tato ^b^maraṇabhayaṃ^eb^ hitvā. ^b^Pakkhe pasāretvā^eb^ti pakkhe yathāpasārite katvā apatantā ^b^tiṭṭhanti^eb^.

[03]^b^Suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi^eb^ yojanappamāṇe ākāse attano āṇāya pavattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so rājāṇāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Laḷiṃsū^eb^ti laḷitaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. ^b^Taṃ pīti^eb^nti ^a^P2.0056^ea^ taṃ buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ teneva nīhārena punappunaṃ pavattaṃ pītiṃ ^b^avijahitvā^eb^ vikkhambhitakilesā therānaṃ santike laddhadhammassavanasappāyā upanissayasampattiyā paripakkañāṇatāya ^b^sattahi…pe… patiṭṭhāsi.^eb^ Sattasatamattena orodhajanena saddhiṃ padasāva therānaṃ santikaṃ upagatattā ^b^‘‘sattahi jaṅghasatehi saddhi’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ti karavīkasaddato. ^b^Satabhāgena…pe… veditabbo^eb^ anekakappakoṭisatasambhūtapuññasambhārasamudāgatavatthusampattibhāvato.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammavipākaja^eb^nti sātisayasucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ kammavipākena sahajātaṃ, kammassa vā vipākabhāvena jātaṃ pasādacakkhu. Duvidhañhi dibbacakkhuṃ kammamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti. Tatridaṃ kammamayanti āha ^b^‘‘na bhāvanāmaya’’^eb^nti. Bhāvanāmayaṃ pana bodhimūle uppajjissati. Ayaṃ ‘‘so’’ti sallakkhaṇaṃ kāmaṃ manoviññāṇena hoti, cakkhuviññāṇena pana tassa tathā vibhāvitattā manoviññāṇassa tattha tathāpavattīti āha ^b^‘‘yena nimittaṃ…pe… sakkotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vacanattho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0044^ea^^a^V2.0039^ea^ saddattho. ^b^Nimīlana^eb^nti nimīlanadassanaṃ navisuddhaṃ, tathā ca akkhīni avivaṭāni nimīladassanassa na visuddhibhāvato. Tabbipariyāyato pana dassanaṃ visuddhaṃ, vivaṭañcāti āha ^b^‘‘antarantarā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nī-iti – jānanatthaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā āha ^b^‘‘panayati jānātī’’^eb^ti. Yato vuttaṃ ‘‘animittā na nāyare’’ti (visuddhi. 1.174; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.20), ‘‘vidūbhi ^a^P2.0057^ea^ neyyaṃ naravarassā’’ti (netti. saṅgahavāra) ca. Nī-iti pana pavattanatthaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘nayati^eb^ pavattetī’’ti. ^b^Appamatto ahosi^eb^ tesu tesu kiccakaraṇīyesu.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vassāvāso ^b^vassaṃ^eb^ uttarapadalopena, tasmā vassaṃ, vasse vā, sannivāsaphāsutāya arahatīti ^b^vassiko,^eb^ pāsādo. Māsā pana vasse utumhi bhavāti vassikā. ^b^Itaresū^eb^ti hemantikaṃ gimhikanti imesu. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti uttarapadalopena niddesaṃ atidisati.

[03]^b^Nātiucco hoti nātinīco^eb^ti gimhiko viya ucco, hemantiko viya nīco na hoti, atha kho tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti, nātinīco. ^b^Assā^eb^ti pāsādassa. ^b^Nātibahūnī^eb^ti gimhikassa viya na atibahūni. ^b^Nātitanūnī^eb^ti hemantikassa viya na khuddakāni, tanutarajālāni ca. ^b^Missakānevā^eb^ti hemantike viya na uṇhaniyāneva, gimhike viya ca na sītaniyāneva, atha kho ubhayamissakāneva. ^b^Tanukānī^eb^ti na puthulāni. ^b^Uṇhappavesanatthāyā^eb^ti sūriyasantāpānuppavesāya. ^b^Bhittiniyūhānī^eb^ti dakkhiṇapasse bhittīsu niyūhāni. ^b^Siniddha^eb^nti sinehavantaṃ, siniddhaggahaṇeneva cassa garukatāpi vuttā eva. ^b^Kaṭukasannissita^eb^nti tikaṭukādikaṭukadrabbūpasañhitaṃ. ^b^Udakayantānī^eb^ti udakadhārāvissandayantāni. Yathā jalayantāni, evaṃ himayantānipi tattha karonti eva. Tasmā hemante viya himāni patantāniyeva hontīti ca veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbaṭṭhānānipī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0058^ea^ sabbāni paṭikiriyānhānabhojanakīḷāsañcaraṇādiṭṭhānānipi, na nivāsaṭṭhānāniyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dovārikāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘rājā kirā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gopānasivaṅka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0040^ea^^a^M2.0045^ea^ vaṅkagopānasī viya. Vaṅkānañhi vaṅkabhāvassa nidassanatthaṃ avaṅkagopānasīpi gayhati. ^b^Ābhoggavaṅka^eb^nti ādito paṭṭhāya abbhuggatāya kuṭilasarīratāya vaṅkaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhe’’^eb^tiādi. Daṇḍaparaṃ daṇḍaggahaṇaparaṃ ayanaṃ gamanaṃ etassāti ^b^daṇḍaparāyanaṃ,^eb^ daṇḍo vā paraṃ āyanaṃ gamanakāraṇaṃ etassāti ^b^daṇḍaparāyanaṃ.^eb^ Ṭhānādīsu daṇḍo gati avassayo etassa tena vinā appavattanatoti ^b^daṇḍagatikaṃ,^eb^ gacchati etenāti vā ^b^gati,^eb^ daṇḍo gati gamanakāraṇaṃ etassāti ^b^daṇḍagatikaṃ. Daṇḍapaṭisaraṇa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Jarātura^eb^nti jarāya kilantaṃ assavasaṃ. ^b^Yadā ratho purato hotī^eb^ti dvedhāpathe sampatte purato gacchante balakāye tattha ekaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ āruḷho majjhe gacchanto bodhisattena āruḷho ratho itaraṃ saṇṭhānaṃ gacchanto yadā purato hoti. ^b^Pacchā balakāyo^eb^ti tadā pacchā hoti sabbo balakāyo. ^b^Tādise okāse^eb^ti tādise vuttappakāre maggappadese. ^b^Taṃ purisa^eb^nti taṃ jiṇṇapurisaṃ. ^b^Suddhāvāsā^eb^ti siddhatthādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ sāsane brahmacariyaṃ caritvā suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbattabrahmāno. Te hi tadā tattha tiṭṭhanti. ‘‘Kiṃ ^a^P2.0059^ea^ paneso jiṇṇo nāmā’’ti eso tayā vuccamāno kiṃ atthato, taṃ me niddhāretvā kathehīti dasseti. Aniddhāritasarūpattā hi tassa attano bodhisatto liṅgasabbanāmena taṃ vadanto ‘‘ki’’nti āha. ‘‘Yathā kiṃ te jāta’’nti dvayameva hi loke yebhuyyato jāyati itthī vā puriso vā, tathāpi taṃ liṅgasabbanāmena vuccati, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādi tassa aniddhāritasarūpataṃyeva vibhāveti.

[03]^b^‘‘Tena hī’’^eb^tiādi ‘‘ayañca jiṇṇabhāvo sabbasādhāraṇattā mayhampi upari āpattito evā’’ti mahāsattassa saṃvijjanākāravibhāvanaṃ. Rathaṃ sāretīti ^b^sārathi.^eb^ Kīḷāvihāratthaṃ uyyuttā yanti upagacchanti etanti ^b^uyyānaṃ. Ala^eb^nti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ^b^Nāmā^eb^ti garahaṇe nipāto ‘‘kathañhināmā’’tiādīsu (pārā. 39, 42, 87, 88, 90, 166, 170; pāci. 1, 13, 36) viya. Jātiyā ādīnavadassanatthaṃ taṃmūlassa ummūlanaṃ viya hotīti, tassa ca avassitabhāvato ^b^‘‘jātiyā mūlaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0046^ea^^b^khaṇanto nisīdī’’^eb^ti āha. Siddhe hi kāraṇe phalaṃ siddhameva hotīti. Pīḷaṃ janetvā antotudanavasena sabbapaṭhamaṃ hadayaṃ anupavissa ṭhitattā ^b^paṭhamena sallena hadaye^eb^^b^viddho viya nisīdī^eb^ti yojanā.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbe^eb^^a^V2.0041^ea^^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘suddhāvāsā kirā’’tiādinā pubbe vutteneva nayena. ^b^Ābādhika^eb^nti ābādhavantaṃ. ^b^Dukkhita^eb^nti sañjātadukkhaṃ. ^b^Ajāta^eb^nti ajātabhāvo, nibbānaṃ vā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhantanettakuppalādi vividhaṃ katvā lātabbato ^b^vilāto,^eb^ vayhaṃ, sivikā cāti āha ^b^‘‘vilātanti sivika’’^eb^nti. Sivikāya diṭṭhapubbattā mahāsatto citakapañjaraṃ ‘‘sivika’’nti āha. ^b^Ito paṭigata^eb^nti ito bhavato apagataṃ ^a^P2.0060^ea^. ^b^Katakāla^eb^nti pariyosāpitajīvanakālaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yattaka’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammaṃ caratīti ^b^dhammacaraṇo,^eb^ tassa bhāvo ^b^dhammacaraṇabhāvo^eb^ti dhammacariyameva vadati. ^b^Evaṃ ekekassa padassā^eb^ti yathā ‘‘sādhudhammacariyāti pabbajito’’ti yojanā, evaṃ ‘‘sādhusamacariyāti pabbajito’’tiādinā ekekassa padassa ^b^yojanā veditabbā. Sabbānī^eb^ti ‘‘sādhudhammacariyā’’tiādīsu āgatāni sabbāni dhammasamakusalapuññapadāni. ^b^Dasakusalakammapathavevacanānī^eb^ti dānādīni dasakusaladhammapariyāyapadāni.

[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pabbajitassa dhammiṃ kathaṃ sutvāti sambandho. ^b^Aññañca^eb^ saṅgītianāruḷhaṃ tena tadā vuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathanti yojanā. ^b^‘‘Vaṃsovā’’^eb^ti padattayena dhammatā esāti dasseti. ^b^Cirassaṃ cirassaṃ passanti^eb^ dīghāyukabhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ…pe… accayenā’’ti. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti na cirassaṃ diṭṭhabhāveneva. Acirakālantarikameva pubbakālakiriyaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘jiṇṇañca disvā…pe… pabbajitañca disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rājā’’^eb^ti āha ^a^M2.0047^ea^ yathā ‘‘nhatvā vatthaṃ paridahitvā gandhaṃ vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā bhutto’’ti.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Kasmā^eb^^a^V2.0042^ea^^b^panetthā’’^eb^tiādinā tesaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ mahāsatte saṃbhattataṃ, saṃvegabahulatañca dasseti, yato sutaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhatvā ñātimittādīsu kiñci anāmantetvā mattavaravāraṇo viya ayomayabandhanaṃ ghanabandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajjaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
[03]^b^Cattāro māse cārikaṃ cari^eb^ na tāva ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā.

[03]Yadā pana ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gataṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sabbeva ime^eb^ pabbajitā mama gamanaṃ ^a^P2.0061^ea^^b^jānissanti,^eb^ jānantā ca maṃ anubandhissantīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sannisīvesū^eb^ti sannisinnesu. ^b^Saṇatevā^eb^ti saṇati viya saddaṃ karoti viya.

[03]^b^Avivekārāmāna^eb^nti anabhirativivekānaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ kālo^eb^ti ayaṃ tesaṃ pabbajitānaṃ mama gamanassa ajānanakālo. ^b^Nikkhamitvā^eb^ti paṇṇasālāya niggantvā, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ pana pageva nikkhanto. Pāramitānubhāvena uṭṭhitaṃ upari devatāhi dibbapaccattharaṇehi supaññattampi mahāsattassa puññānubhāvena siddhattā tena paññattaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatū’’tiādi (ma. ni. 2.184; saṃ. ni. 2.22, 237; a. ni. 2.5; 8.13; mahāni. 17, 196) nayappavattaṃ ^b^caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā. Vūpakāsa^eb^nti vivekavāsaṃ.

[03]^b^Aññenevā^eb^ti yattha mahāpuriso tadā viharati, tato aññeneva disābhāgena. Kāmaṃ bodhimaṇḍo jambudīpassa majjhe nābhiṭṭhāniyo, tadā pana brahāraññe vivitte yogīnaṃ paṭisallānasāruppo hutvā tiṭṭhati, tadañño pana jambudīpappadeso yebhuyyena bahujano ākiṇṇamanusso iddho phīto ahosi. Tena te taṃ taṃ janapadadesaṃ uddissa gatā ^b^‘‘anto jambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkantā’’^eb^ti vuttā ^b^anto jambudīpābhimukhā,^eb^ na himavantādipabbatābhimukhāti attho.

[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmaṃ ^a^M2.0048^ea^ bhagavā buddho hutvā sattasattāhāni tattheva vasi, sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana visākhapuṇṇamaṃ ^a^V2.0043^ea^ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ekarattivāsaṃ upagatassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Rahogatassā^eb^ti raho janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatassa, tena gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvena mahāsattassa kāyavivekamāha. ^b^Paṭisallīnassā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0062^ea^ nānārammaṇacārato cittassa nivattiyā pati sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa, tena cittasaṅgaṇikābhāvenassa pubbabhāgiyaṃ cittavivekamāha. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti jātiādimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kāmaṃ cutūpapātāpi jātimaraṇāni eva, maraṇajātiyova ‘‘jāyati mīyatī’’ti pana vatvā ‘‘cavati upapajjatī’’ti vacanaṃ na ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ nesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha kho nānābhavapariyāpannānaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ dvayaṃ…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. Kasmā pana lokassa kicchāpattiparivitakkane ‘‘jarāmaraṇassā’’ti jarāmaraṇavasena niyamanaṃ katanti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jarāmaraṇameva upaṭṭhāti^eb^ āditoti adhippāyo. ^b^Abhiniviṭṭhassā^eb^ti āraddhassa. Paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanārambhe tassa jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya abhiniveso aggato yāva mūlaṃ otaraṇaṃ viyāti āha ^b^‘‘bhavaggato otarantassa viyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Upāyamanasikārā^eb^ti upāyena manasikaraṇato manasikārassa pavattanato. Idāni taṃ upāyamanasikārapariyāyaṃ yonisomanasikāraṃ sarūpato, pavattiākārato ca dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aniccādīni hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yonisomanasikāro nāma hotī^eb^ti yāthāvato manasikārabhāvato. ^b^Aniccādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena dukkhānattāsubhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Aya^eb^nti ‘‘etadahosī’’ti evaṃ vutto ‘‘kimhi nu kho satī’’tiādinayappavatto manasikāro. ^b^Tesaṃ aññataro^eb^ti tesu aniccādimanasikāresu aññataro eko. Ko pana soti? Aniccamanasikārova, tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘udayabbayānupassanāvasena pavattattā’’^eb^ti. Yañhi uppajjati ceva cavati ca, taṃ aniccaṃ udayavayaparicchinnattā addhuvanti katvā. Tassa pana tabbhāvadassanaṃ yāthāvamanasikāratāya yonisomanasikāro ^a^P2.0063^ea^. ^b^Ito yonisomanasikārā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkavacananti tassa iminā ^b^‘‘upāyamanasikārenā’’^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanena atthamāha. ^b^Samāgamo ahosī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0049^ea^ yāthāvato paṭivijjhanavasena saṅgamo ahosi. ^b^Kiṃ pana ta^eb^nti kiṃ pana taṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘jātī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Jātiyā kho’’tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti jarāmaraṇakāraṇaṃ pariggaṇhantassa bodhisattassa ‘‘yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, asati ca na hoti, taṃ tassa kāraṇa’’nti evaṃ abyabhicārikāraṇapariggaṇhane ‘‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti yā jarāmaraṇassa kāraṇapariggāhikā paññā uppajjati, tāya uppajjantiyā samāgamo ahosīti. ^b^Sabbapadānī^eb^ti ‘‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hotī’’tiādinā āgatāni jātiādīni viññāṇapariyosānāni nava padāni.

[03]Dvādasapadike ^a^V2.0044^ea^ paṭiccasamuppāde idha yāni dve padāni aggahitāni, tesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo tesaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ tāva dassento ^b^‘‘ettha panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannabhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgataṃ ‘‘dutiya’’nti gahaṇe atīto tatiyo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘avijjā saṅkhārā hi atīto bhavo’’^eb^ti. Nanu cettha anāgatassāpi bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati paccuppannavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti? Saccametaṃ, kāraṇe pana gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Api cettha anāgatopi addhā atthato saṅgahito eva, yato parato ‘‘nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana’’ntiādinā anāgataddhasaṅgahikā desanā pavattā. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārehi ārammaṇabhūtehi. ^b^Na ghaṭiyati^eb^ na sambajjhati. ^b^Mahāpuriso hi paccuppannavasena abhiniviṭṭho^eb^ti aghaṭane kāraṇamāha. ^b^Adiṭṭhehī^eb^ti anavabuddhehi, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Sati anubodhe paṭivedhena bhavitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘na^eb^^a^P2.0064^ea^^b^sakkā buddhena bhavitu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti mahāsattena. ^b^Te^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārā. ^b^Bhavaupādānataṇhāvasenevā^eb^ti bhavaupādānataṇhādassanavaseneva. ^b^Diṭṭhā^eb^ taṃsabhāvataṃsahagatehi tehi samānayogakkhamattā. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.570) ^b^kathitāva,^eb^ tasmā na idha kathetabbāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccayato^eb^ti hetuto, saṅkhāratoti attho. ‘‘Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī’’tiādinā hi hetuparamparāvasena phalaparamparāya vuccamānāya ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ‘‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī’’ti vicāraṇāya ‘‘saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī’’ti viññāṇassa visesakāraṇabhūte saṅkhāre aggahite tato viññāṇaṃ paṭinivattati nāma, na sabbapaccayato. Tenevāha ‘‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.58), nāmampi cettha sahajātādivaseneva paccayabhūtaṃ adhippetaṃ, na kammūpanissayavasena paccuppannavasena abhinivisassa jotitattā. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhātāarammaṇato, atītabhavasaṅkhātāarammaṇato vā. Atītaddhapariyāpannā hi avijjāsaṅkhārā. Yato paṭinivattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhavatopi paṭinivattati nāma. ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇampi vipassanāviññāṇampi. ^b^Nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamatī^eb^ti paccayabhūtaṃ, ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ nātikkamati tena vinā avattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte^eb^ti viññāṇe nāmassa, rūpassa, nāmarūpassa ca paccaye honte. ^b^Nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa paccaye honte^eb^ti tathā nāme, rūpe, nāmarūpe ca viññāṇassa ^a^V2.0045^ea^ paccaye honteti catuvokāraekavokārapañcavokārabhavavasena yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā, ^b^dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesū^eb^ti pana pañcavokārabhavavaseneva. ^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti evaṃ viññāṇa nāmarūpānaṃ ^a^P2.0065^ea^ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhanavasena pavattiyā. ^b^Jāyetha vā…pe… upapajjetha vā^eb^ti ‘‘satto jāyati…pe… upapajjati vā’’ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Etadevā^eb^ti viññāṇaṃ, nāmarūpanti etaṃ dvayameva.

[03]^b^Pañca padānī^eb^ti ‘‘jāyetha vā’’tiādīni pañca padāni. Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi catutthapañcamāni atthato abhinnānīti āha ^b^‘‘saddhiṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhīhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamattha^eb^nti yo ‘‘ettāvatā’’ti padena pubbe vutto, tameva yathāvuttamatthaṃ ‘‘yadida’’ntiādinā ^b^niyyātento^eb^ nidassento puna ^b^vatvā. Anulomapaccayākāravasenā^eb^ti paccayadhammadassanapubbakaṃ paccayuppannadhammadassanavasena. Paccayadhammānañhi attano paccayuppannassa ^a^M2.0051^ea^ paccayabhāvo idappaccayatā paccayākāro, so ca ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’’tiādinā vutto. Saṃsārappavattiyā anulomanato ^b^anulomapaccayākāro.^eb^ Jātiādikaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ cittena samihitena kataṃ samūhavasena gahetvā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dukkhakkhandhassā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘jāti…pe… dukkharāsissā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkhakkhandhassa anekavāraṃ samudayadassanavasena viññāṇassa pavattattā ^b^‘‘samudayo samudayo’’^eb^ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ avoca. Atha vā ‘‘evaṃ samudayo hotī’’ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ nibbattinidassanapadaṃ, atha kho paṭiccasamuppāda-saddo viya samuppādamukhena idha samudaya-saddo nibbattimukhena paccayattaṃ vadati. Viññāṇādayo bhavantā idha paccayadhammā niddiṭṭhā, te sāmaññarūpena byāpanicchāvasena gaṇhanto ‘‘samudayo samudayo’’ti āha, evañca katvā yaṃ vakkhati ‘‘imasmiṃ sati ^a^P2.0066^ea^ idaṃ hotīti paccayasañjānanamattaṃ kathita’’nti, (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.59) taṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘udayadassanapaññā vesā’’ti idaṃ kathanti? Nāyaṃ doso paccayato udayadassanamukhena nibbattilakkhaṇadassanassa sambhavato. ^b^Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhū^eb^ti samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvena cakkhu viyāti ^b^cakkhu. Ñātakaraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yathā samudayo sammadeva ñāto hoti avabuddho, evaṃ karaṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Pajānanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘viññāṇāditaṃtaṃpaccayuppattiyā etassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī’’ti pakārato jānanaṭṭhena. ^b^Nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā uppannaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anibbijjhitvā pubbe udayadassanapaññāya paṭipakkhadhamme nibbijjhitvā ‘‘ayaṃ samudayo’’ti paccayato, khaṇato ca, sarūpato paṭivijjhitvā ^a^V2.0046^ea^ uppannabhāvena, nibbijjhanaṭṭhena paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena vijjāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Obhāsaṭṭhenā^eb^ti samudayasabhāvapaṭicchādanakassa mohandhakārassa ca kilesandhakārassa ca vidhamanavasena avabhāsakabhāvena.

[03]Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ paṭipāṭiyā vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^cakkhuṃ udapādī^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ paduddhāro. Kathaṃ udapādīti ceti āha ^b^‘‘dassanaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Samudayassa paccakkhato dassanabhāvenāti vutto vāyamattho. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo. ^b^Cakkhudhammo^eb^ti cakkhūti pāḷidhammo. ^b^Dassanaṭṭho attho^eb^ti dassanasabhāvo tena ^a^M2.0052^ea^ pakāsetabbo attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Ettakehi padehī^eb^ti imehi pañcahi padehi. ^b^‘‘Kiṃ kathita’’^eb^nti piṇḍatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^Paccayasañjānanamatta^eb^nti viññāṇādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ nāmarūpādipaccayuppannassa paccayasabhāvasañjānanamattaṃ kathitaṃ avisesato paccayasabhāvasallakkhaṇassa jotitattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva ^a^P2.0067^ea^ udayadassanassa jotitattā ^b^‘‘vīthipaṭipannā taruṇavipassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti ca vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attanā adhigatattā āsannapaccakkhatāya ^b^‘‘aya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, ariyamaggādīnaṃ magganaṭṭhena ^b^maggo^eb^ti. Pubbabhāgavipassanā hesā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bodhāyā’’^eb^ti. Bodhapadassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘catusaccabujjhanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Pariññāpahānabhāvanābhisamayā yāvadeva sacchikiriyābhisamayatthā nibbānādhigamatthattā brahmacariyavāsassāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nibbānabujjhanatthāya eva vā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha’’nti (ma. ni. 2.215, 217; dha. pa. 204) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Bujjhatī^eb^ti cattāri ariyasaccāni ekapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, tena bodha-saddassa kattusādhanattamāha. ^b^Paccattapadehī^eb^ti paṭhamāvibhattidīpakehi padehi. ^b^Nibbānameva kathitaṃ^eb^ viññāṇādi nirujjhati etthāti katvā. ^b^Anibbattinirodha^eb^nti sabbaso paccayanirodhena anuppādanirodhaṃ accantanirodhaṃ.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbeheva etehi padehī^eb^ti ‘‘cakkhū’’tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. ^b^Nirodhasañjānanamattamevā^eb^ti ‘‘nirodho nirodhoti kho’’tiādinā nirodhassa sañjānanamattameva ^b^kathitaṃ^eb^ pubbārambhabhāvato, na tassa paṭivijjhanavasena paccakkhato dassanaṃ ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva nirodhadassanaṃ nāma sikhāppattāya vipassanāya vasena icchitabbanti ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminī balavavipassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti ca vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Viditvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0047^ea^ pubbabhāgiyena ñāṇena jānitvā. ^b^Tato aparabhāge^eb^ti vuttanayena paccayanirodhajānanato pacchābhāge. ^b^Upādānassa paccayabhūtesū^eb^ti catubbidhassapi upādānassa ārammaṇapaccayādinā paccayabhūtesu, upādāniyesūti attho ^a^P2.0068^ea^. ^b^Vahanto^eb^ti pavattento. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘aparena samayenā’’tiādi vacanaṃ. ^b^Kasmā vutta^eb^nti ‘‘yāya paṭipattiyā sabbepi mahābodhisattā carimabhave bodhāya paṭipajjanti, vipassanāya mahābodhisattena tatheva paṭipanna’’nti kathetukamyatāvasena pucchāvacanaṃ. Tenāha ^a^M2.0053^ea^^b^‘‘sabbeyeva hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ, padhānānuyogo ca dhammatāvasena veditabbo, itaraṃ itikattabbatāvasena. Tatthāpi cirakālaparibhāvanāya laddhāsevanāya mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānasattā ‘‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.57; saṃ. ni. 2.4, 10) saṃsāradukkhato mocetuṃ icchitassa sattalokassa kicchāpattidassanamukhena jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya paccayākārasammasanampi dhammatāva. Tathā attādhīnatāya, kenaci anupakhatattā, asecanakasukhavihāratāya, catutthajjhānikatāya ca ānāpānakammaṭṭhānānuyogo. ^b^Pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā^eb^ti viññāṇanāmarūpādipariyāyena gahitesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu vipassanābhinivesavasena abhinivisitvā paṭipattiṃ ārabhitvā. ^b^Anukkama^eb^nti anu anu gāmitabbato paṭipajjitabbato ‘‘anukkama’’nti laddhanāmaṃ anupubbapaṭipattiṃ. ^b^Katvā^eb^ti paṭipajjitvā.

[03]^b^Iti rūpa^eb^nti ettha dutiyo ^b^iti^eb^-saddo nidassanattho, tena paṭhamo ^b^iti^eb^-saddo sarūpassa, parimāṇassa ca bodhako anekatthattā nipātānaṃ,āvuttiādivasena vāyamattho veditabbo. Antogadhāvadhāraṇañca vākyaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthī’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P2.0069^ea^. Tattha ^b^‘‘ruppanasabhāva’’^eb^nti iminā sāmaññato rūpassa sabhāvo dassito, ^b^‘‘bhūtupādāyabheda’’^eb^ntiādinā visesato, tadubhayenapi ‘‘idaṃ rūpa’’nti padassa attho niddiṭṭho. Tattha ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma tassa tassa rūpavisesassa anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo. ^b^Raso^eb^ tasseva attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo. ^b^Paccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ tassa paramatthato vijjamānattā yāthāvato ñāṇassa gocarabhāvo. ^b^Padaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ āsannakāraṇaṃ, tenassa paccayāyattavuttitā dassitā. ^b^‘‘Anavasesarūpapariggaho’’^eb^ti iminā pana ‘‘ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, ito uddhaṃ’’ rūpaṃ natthīti padadvayassāpi attho niddiṭṭho rūpassa sabbaso pariyādānavasena niyāmanato. ‘‘Iti rūpassa samudayo’’ti ettha pana ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ‘‘iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.124; a. ni. 3.1) viya pakāratthoti āha ^b^‘‘itīti eva’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Avijjāsamudayā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0048^ea^ avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. Nirodhanirodhī hi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi hoti, tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya ^a^M2.0054^ea^ avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo, rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. ^b^‘‘Taṇhāsamudayā’’^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Āhārasamudayā^eb^ti ettha pana pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito. Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittāni gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Nibbattilakkhaṇa’’^eb^ntiādinā kālavasena udayadassanamāha. Tattha ^b^nibbattilakkhaṇa^eb^nti rūpassa uppādasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^Passantopī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ paccayasamudayameva, atha kho khaṇato udayaṃ passantopi. Addhāvasena hi paṭhamaṃ udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. ^b^Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho^eb^ti aggamaggena ^a^P2.0070^ea^ avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. ^b^Taṇhānirodhā kammanirodho^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Āhāranirodhā^eb^ti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvena. ^b^Rūpanirodho^eb^ti taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^‘‘Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti bhaṅgakālavasena hetaṃ vayadassanaṃ, tasmā taṃ addhāvasena paṭhamaṃ passitvā puna santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Ayañca nayo pākatikavipassakavasena vutto, bodhisattānaṃ panetaṃ natthi. Esa nayo udayadassanepi.

[03]^b^‘‘Iti vedanā’’^eb^tiādīsupi heṭṭhā rūpe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^vedayita…pe… sabhāva^eb^nti ettha ‘‘vedayitasabhāvaṃ…pe… vijānanasabhāva’’nti paccekaṃ ^b^sabhāva^eb^- saddo yojetabbo. ^b^Vedayitasabhāva^eb^nti anubhavanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Sañjānanasabhāva^eb^nti ‘‘nīlaṃ pīta’’ntiādinā ārammaṇassa sallakkhaṇasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Abhisaṅkharaṇasabhāva^eb^nti āyūhanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Vijānanasabhāva^eb^nti ārammaṇassa upaladdhisabhāvaṃ. ^b^Sukhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena dukkhasomanassadomanassupekkhāvedanānaṃ saṅgaho ^b^rūpasaññādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saddasaññādīnaṃ, ^b^phassādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena cetanā vitakkādīnaṃ ^b^cakkhuviññāṇādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sabbesaṃ lokiyaviññāṇānaṃ saṅgaho. Yathā ca viññāṇe, esa nayo vedanādīsupi. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0055^ea^ ‘‘samudayo’’ti vuttadhammānaṃ. ^b^Tīsu khandhesū^eb^ti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesu. ‘‘Phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.93) vacanato ^a^P2.0071^ea^^b^‘‘phassasamudayā’’ti vattabbaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇa’’nti (vibha. 246; dī. ni. 2.97) vacanato ^b^viññāṇakkhandhe ‘‘nāmarūpasamudayā’’^eb^ti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Tesaṃ yevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0049^ea^ tīsu khandhesu ‘‘phassassa viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpassā’’ti phassanāmarūpānaṃyeva ^b^vasena atthaṅgamapadampi yojetabbaṃ,^eb^ avijjādayo pana rūpe vuttasadisā evāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā udayalakkhaṇānaṃ, paccayato vīsati khaṇato pañcāti pañcavīsatiyā eva vayalakkhaṇānaṃ cāti samapaññāsāya udayavayalakkhaṇānaṃ vasena. Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayo lakkhīyati etehīti ^b^lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti vuccanti avijjādisamudayoti, tathā tesaṃ anuppādanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti ^b^lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti vuccanti avijjādīnaṃ accantanirodho. Nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇāni pana saṅkhatalakkhaṇamevāti. Evaṃ etāni samapaññāsalakkhaṇāni sarūpato veditabbāni. ^b^Yathānukkamena vaḍḍhite^eb^ti yathāvuttaudayabbayañāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne hutvā vahante tato paraṃ vattabbānaṃ bhaṅgañāṇādīnaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭiyā buddhippatte paramukkaṃsagate ^b^vipassanāñāṇe.^eb^ Pageva hi chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena pavattena sabbaññutaññāṇānucchavikena mahāvajirañāṇasaṅkhātena sammasanañāṇena sambhatānubhāvaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiñāṇaṃ aparimitakāle sambhatāya paññāpāramiyā ānubhāvena ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ anukkamena vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ upagantvā yadā ariyamaggena ghaṭeti, tadā ariyamaggacittaṃ sabbakilesehi maggapaṭipāṭiyā vimuccati ^a^P2.0072^ea^, vimuccantañca tathā vimuccati, yathā sabbañeyyāvaraṇappahānaṃ hoti. Yaṃ kilesānaṃ ‘‘savāsanappahāna’’nti vuccati, tayidaṃ pahānaṃ atthato anuppattinirodhoti āha ^b^‘‘anuppādanirodhenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āsavasaṅkhātehi kilesehī^eb^ti bhavato ābhavaggaṃ, dhammato āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi rāgo, diṭṭhi, mohoti imehi kilesehi. Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ yadidaṃ ‘‘āsavehī’’ti, tadekaṭṭhatāya pana sabbehipi ^a^M2.0056^ea^ kilesehi sabbehipi pāpadhammehi cittaṃ vimuccati. ^b^Aggahetvā^eb^ti tesaṃ kilesānaṃ lesamattampi aggahetvā.

[03]^b^Maggakkhaṇe vimuccati nāma^eb^ taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ^b^phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ nāma. Maggakkhaṇe vā vimuttañceva^eb^^b^vimuccati cā^eb^ti uparimaggakkhaṇe heṭṭhimamaggavajjhehi vimuttañceva yathāsakaṃ pahātabbehi vimuccati ca. ^b^Phalakkhaṇe vimuttamevā^eb^ti sabbasmimpi phalakkhaṇe vimuttameva, na vimuccati nāma.

[03]^b^Sabbabandhanā^eb^ti orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyasaṅgahitā sabbasmāpi bhavasaññojanā, ^b^vippamutto^eb^ visesato pakārehi mutto. ^b^Suvikasitacittasantāno^eb^ti sātisayaṃ ñāṇarasmisamphassena suṭṭhu sammadeva ^a^V2.0050^ea^ samphullacittasantāno. ^b^‘‘Cattāri maggañāṇānī’’^eb^tiādi yehi ñāṇehi suvikasitacittasantāno, tesaṃ ekadesena dassanaṃ. Nippadesato dassanaṃ pana parato āgamissati, tasmā tattheva tāni vibhajissāma. ^b^Sakale ca buddhaguṇe^eb^ti atītaṃse appaṭihatañāṇādike sabbepi buddhaguṇe. Yadā hi lokanātho aggamaggaṃ adhigacchati, tadā sabbe guṇe hatthagate karoti nāma. Tato paraṃ ‘‘hatthagate katvā ṭhito’’ti vuccati.

[03]‘‘Paripuṇṇasaṅkappo’’ti vatvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappatāparidīpanaṃ udānaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘anekajātisaṃsāra’’ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ādito dvinnaṃ gāthānamattho heṭṭhā ^b^brahmajālanidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā) vutto eva. Parato ^a^P2.0073^ea^ pana ^b^ayoghanahatassā^eb^ti ayo haññati etenāti ^b^ayoghanaṃ,^eb^ kammārānaṃ ayokūṭaṃ, ayomuṭṭhi ca, tena ayoghanena hatassa pahatassa. ^b^Eva^eb^-saddo cettha nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Jalato jātavedaso^eb^ti jalayamānassa aggissa, anādare vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Anupubbūpasantassā^eb^ti anukkamena upasantassa vikkhambhantassa niruddhassa. ^b^Yathā na ñāyate gatī^eb^ti yathā tassa gati na ñāyati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayomuṭṭhikūṭādinā pahatattā ayoghanena hatassa pahatassa ayogatassa, kaṃsabhājanādigatassa vā jalamānassa aggissa anukkamena upasantassa dasasu disāsu na katthaci gati paññāyati paccayanirodhena appaṭisandhikaniruddhattāti. ^b^Evaṃ sammāvimuttāna^eb^nti sammā hetunā ñāyena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttipubbaṅgamāya ^a^M2.0057^ea^ samucchedavimuttiyā ariyamaggena catūhipi upādānehi, āsavehi ca muttattā sammā vimuttānaṃ, tato eva kāmabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmoghabhavoghādibhedaṃ avasiṭṭhaoghañca taritvā ṭhitattā ^b^kāmabandhoghatārīnaṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu paṭipassambhitasabbakilesavipphanditattā kilesābhisaṅkhāravātehi akampanīyatāya ^b^acalaṃ^eb^ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ pattānaṃ^eb^ adhigatānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ ^b^gati^eb^ devamanussādibhedāsu gatīsu ‘‘ayaṃ nāmā’’ti paññāpetabbatāya abhāvato ^b^paññāpetuṃ natthi^eb^ na upalabbhati, yathāvuttajātavedo viya apaññattikabhāvameva te gacchantīti attho. ^b^Evaṃ manasi karonto^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ anekajātisaṃsāra’’ntiādinā (dha. pa. 153) attano katakiccattaṃ manasi karonto bodhipallaṅke nisinnova virocitthāti yojanā.
[06]Dutiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yannūnā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0074^ea^^a^V2.0051^ea^ parivitakkanatthe nipāto, ^b^aha^eb^nti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisatīti āha ^b^‘‘yadi panāha’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^tiādi yathā amhākaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanādivasena sattasu sattāhesu paṭipajji, tato parañca dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇādivasena, evameva sabbepi sammāsambuddhā abhisambuddhakāle paṭipajjiṃsu, te ca sattāhādayo tatheva vavatthapīyantīti ayaṃ sabbesampi buddhānaṃ dhammatā. Tasmā vipassī bhagavā abhisambuddhakāle tathā paṭipajjīti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^ti idaṃ sattamasattāhato paraṃ, sattāhato orime ca pavattāya paṭipattiyā vasena vuttaṃ, na pallaṅkasattāhassa viya aṭṭhamassa nāma sattāhassa vavatthitassa labbhamānattā. ^b^Anantaro^eb^ti ‘‘adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo’’tiādiko vitakko (dī. ni. 2.67; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 7, 8).

[03]^b^Paṭividdho^eb^ti sayambhuñāṇena ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena pavatto, yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti catusaccadhammo tabbinimuttassa ^a^M2.0058^ea^ paṭivijjhitabbadhammassa abhāvato. ^b^Gambhīro^eb^ti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanameta’’^eb^nti. Alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭho ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato visesato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrattāva duddaso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti kicchena kenaci kadācideva daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘duddasattāva duranubodho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo^eb^ avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ‘‘taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1115) suttapadaṃ ^a^P2.0075^ea^ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya vā ^b^santo.^eb^ Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya ^b^nibbuto.^eb^ Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā ^b^paṇīto.^eb^ Atittikaraṭṭhena ^b^atappako^eb^ sādurasabhojanaṃ viya. Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti ^b^santārammaṇaṃ,^eb^ maggasaccaṃ santaṃ, santārammaṇañcāti ^b^santārammaṇaṃ^eb^ anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ, saṅkhārānañca abhāvato ^b^santo nibbutasabbapariḷāhattā nibbuto,^eb^ santapaṇītabhāveneva tadatthāya asecanakatāya ^b^atappakatā^eb^ daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta’’^eb^nti. Uttamañāṇassa visayattā na takkena avacaritabbo, tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya, saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā ca ^b^nipuṇo.^eb^ Bālānaṃ avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyo.^eb^ Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena ^a^V2.0052^ea^ sevīyantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti abhiramaṇavasena sevantīti ^b^ālayā,^eb^ taṇhāvicaritāni. ^b^Ālayaratā^eb^ti ālayaniratā. ^b^Suṭṭhu muditā^eb^ ativiya muditā anukkaṇṭhanato. ^b^Ramatī^eb^ti ratiṃ vindati kīḷati laḷati. Ime sattā yathā kāmaguṇe, evaṃ rāgampi assādenti abhinandanti yevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘duvidhampī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana ^b^‘‘ṭhāna’’^eb^nti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ^b^ṭhānaṃ,^eb^ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā avijjādayo. ^b^Imesaṃ^eb^ saṅkhārādīnaṃ ^b^paccayā^eb^ti ^b^idappaccayā,^eb^ avijjādayova. ^b^Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā^eb^ yathā devo eva devatā ^a^P2.0076^ea^, idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ paṭicca paccayabhāvo ^a^M2.0059^ea^ uppādanasamatthatā ^b^idappaccayatā,^eb^ tena paramatthapaccayalakkhaṇo paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti ^b^paṭiccasamuppādo.^eb^ Padadvayenāpi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ avijjādīnametaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.570) vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabba^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādipadābhidheyyaṃ sabbaṃ, atthato ^b^nibbānameva. ^eb^ Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Āgammā^eb^ti paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayahetu. ^b^Sammantī^eb^ti appaṭisandhikūpasamavasena sammanti. Tathā santā ca savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘vūpasammantī’’^eb^ti, etena sabbe saṅkhārā sammanti etthāti ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,^eb^ nibbānanti dasseti. Sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyutte hi nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo ñāyāgato yevāti. Sesepadesupi eseva nayo. Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti ^b^upadhi,^eb^ khandhādayo. ^b^Paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti samucchedavasena pariccattā ^b^honti. Sabbā taṇhā^eb^ti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā. ^b^Sabbe kilesarāgā^eb^ti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā, sabbepi vā kilesā idha kilesarāgāti veditabbā, na lobhavisesā eva cittassa viparītabhāvāpādanato. Yathāha ‘‘rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇata’’nti (pārā. 271) ^b^virajjantī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0077^ea^ attano sabhāvaṃ vijahanti. ^b^Sabbaṃ dukkha^eb^nti jarāmaraṇādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ. ^b^Bhavena bhava^eb^nti tena tena bhavena bhavantaraṃ. Bhavanikantibhāvena ^b^saṃsibbati, phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ^eb^ sataṇhasseva āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato. ^b^Tato vānato nikkhantaṃ^eb^ tattha tassa sabbaso abhāvato. Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena ^b^kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā^eb^^a^V2.0053^ea^^b^ca^eb^ veditabbā. Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ, appaṭipajjantānañca vasena, jānantānaṃ, pana paṭipajjantānañca desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesī’’ti (udā. 10). Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma, so mama kilamatho assā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti cittakilamatho, cittavihesā ^a^M2.0060^ea^ cāti ^b^ubhayaṃ petaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi,^eb^ bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.

[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anubrūhanaṃ^eb^ sampiṇḍanaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti ‘‘apissū’’ti nipāto. ^b^Vipassi^eb^nti paṭi-saddayogena sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha ‘‘vipassissā’’ti. Vuddhippattā acchariyā vā ^b^anacchariyā.^eb^ Vuddhiatthopi hi akāro hoti yathā‘‘asekkhā dhammā’’ti (dha. sa. tikamātikāya 11). Kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo ^a^P2.0078^ea^ pūretvā idāni samadhigatadhammarājassa tattha appossukkatāpattidīpanatā, gāthātthassa acchariyatā, tassa vuddhippatti cāti veditabbā. Atthadvārena hi gāthānaṃ anacchariyatā. ^b^Gocarā ahesu^eb^nti upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Upaṭṭhānañca vitakketabbatāvāti āha ^b^‘‘parivitakkayitabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yadi sukhāpaṭipadāva kathaṃ kicchatāti āha ^b^‘‘pāramīpūraṇakāle’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evamādīni^eb^ duppariccajāni ^b^dentassa. Ha^eb^-iti vā byattanti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto, ‘‘ekaṃsatthe’’ti keci. ^b^Ha^eb^ byattaṃ, ekaṃsena vā ^b^alaṃ^eb^ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa desetunti yojanā. ^b^Hala^eb^nti ‘‘ala’’nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ ‘‘halanti vadāmī’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.172) viya. ^b^Rāgadosaphuṭṭhehī^eb^ti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena, dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi. ^b^Rāgadosānugatehī^eb^ti rāgadosehi anubandhehi.

[03]^b^Niccādīna^eb^nti niccaggāhādīnaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ gata^eb^nti evaṃ pavattaṃ aniccādiākārena pavattaṃ. ^b^‘‘Catusaccadhamma’’^eb^nti idaṃ aniccādīsu, saccesu ca yathālābhavasena gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ gatanti vā evaṃ ‘‘anicca’’ntiādinā abhinivisitvā mayā, aññehi ca sammāsambuddhehi gataṃ, ñātaṃ paṭividdhanti attho. ^b^Kāmarāgena, bhavarāgena ca rattā^eb^ nīvaraṇehi nivutacittatāya, ^b^diṭṭhirāgena rattā^eb^ viparītābhinivesena ^b^na dakkhanti^eb^ yāthāvato imaṃ dhammaṃ nappaṭivijjhissanti. ^b^Evaṃ gāhāpetu^eb^nti ‘‘anicca’’ntiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhamme ^a^P2.0079^ea^ jānāpetuṃ. Rāgadosaparetatāpi nesaṃ sammūḷhabhāvenevāti āha ^b^‘‘tamokhandhena āvuṭā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Dhammadesanāya ^a^V2.0054^ea^ appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tattha yathāyaṃ idāni dhammadesanāya ^a^M2.0061^ea^ appossukkatāpatti sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇadhammatāvasena, sabbabodhisattānaṃ ādito ‘‘kiṃ me aññātavesenā’’tiādinā (bu. vaṃ. 2.99) mahābhinīhāre attano cittassa samussāhanaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇadhammatā vāti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ me’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^aññātavesenā^eb^ti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ unnādento buddho ahutvā kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ sāvakabhāvūpagamanavasena aññātarūpena. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ appossukkatāpattiyā paṭipakkhassa balavabhāvo, dhammassa paramagambhīratā, tattha ca bhagavato sātisayaṃ gāravanti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassa hī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^paṭipakkhā^eb^ nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā. Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalaṃ purisaṃ ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ kaṇṭakaduggampi adhisenti. Dūrappabheda ducchejjatāhi dubbisodhiyataṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘athassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca anto āmaṭṭhatāya ^b^kañjikapuṇṇalābu^eb^ ciraparivāsikatāya ^b^takkabharitacāṭi^eb^ snehatintadubbalabhāvena ^b^vasātelapītapilotikā;^eb^ telamissitatāya ^b^añjanamakkhitahatthā^eb^ dubbisodhanīyā vuttā. Hīnūpamā ^a^P2.0080^ea^ cetā rūpappabandhabhāvato, acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya, kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā, anusayitattā ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atisaṃkiliṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Yathā ca dubbisodhanīyatāya evaṃ gambhīraduddasaduranubodhānampi vuttaupamā hīnūpamāva.

[03]Gambhīropi dhammo paṭipakkhavidhamanena supākaṭo bhaveyya, paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattipaṭibaddhaṃ, sā saddhammasavanādhīnā, taṃ satthari, dhamme ca pasādāyattaṃ. So visesato loke sambhāvanīyassa garukātabbassa abhipatthanāhetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmayācanādinimittanti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Aññataro’’ti appaññāto viya kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atha kho pākaṭo paññātoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jeṭṭhakamahābrahmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Mahābrahmabhavane ^b^jeṭṭhakamahābrahmā.^eb^ So hi sakko viya ^a^M2.0062^ea^ kāmadevaloke, brahmaloke ca pākaṭo paññāto. Upakkilesabhūtaṃ appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ etassāti ^b^apparajaṃ,^eb^ apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paññāmaye’’^eb^tiādimāha. Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvā ^b^apparajakkhajātikā^eb^ti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Assavanatā^eb^ti ‘‘sayaṃ ^a^V2.0055^ea^ abhiññā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.28, 405; ma. ni. 1.154, 444) viya karaṇe paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘assavanatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasenā^eb^ti dānādidasavidhavimuttiparipācanīyapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katādhikārā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘dvādasapuññakiriyavasenā’’ti ^a^P2.0081^ea^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.282) vuttaṃ, taṃ dānādīsu saraṇagamanaparahitapariṇāmanadvaya pakkhipanavasena vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Garuṭṭhāniyesu gāravavasena garukarapatthanā ^b^ajjhesanā,^eb^ sāpi atthato patthanā evāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yācana’’^eb^nti. Padesavisayañāṇadassanaṃ hutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ ‘‘buddhacakkhū’’ti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘imesañhi dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^ Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammacakkhū’’^eb^ti nāmaṃ, catusaccadhammadassananti katvā dassanamattabhāvato. Yato tāni ñāṇāni vijjūpamābhāvena vuttāni, aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā dassanamattaṃ na hotīti ‘‘dhammacakkhū’’ti na vuccatīti. Yato taṃ vajirūpamābhāvena vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘apparajakkhajātikā’’ti ettha vuttanayeneva. Yasmā mandakilesā ^b^‘‘apparajakkhā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tasmā bahalakilesā ^b^‘‘mahārajakkhā’’^eb^ti veditabbā. Paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya ^b^tikkhāni^eb^ sūrāni visadāni, vuttavipariyāyena ^b^mudūni. Saddhādayo ākārā^eb^ti saddahanādippakāre vadati. ^b^Sundarā^eb^ti kalyāṇā. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘yesaṃ āsayādayo koṭṭhāsā sundarā, te svākārā’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 814) vuttaṃ, taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati ^a^P2.0082^ea^ sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato saddhāsampadādivasena ajjhāsayassa sundaratāti, tabbipariyāyato asundaratāti. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma paccayākāro, saccāni vā. ^b^Paraloka^eb^nti samparāyaṃ. Taṃ dukkhāvahaṃ vajjaṃ viya bhayato passitabbanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passantī’’^eb^ti. Sampattibhavato vā aññattā vipattibhavo ‘‘paraloko’’ti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘para…pe… passantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0063^ea^^b^panettha pāḷī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘apparajakkhā’’dipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassa tathābhāvasādhakapāḷi. Saddhādīnañhi vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāveneva hoti, tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ savisesaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena ‘‘apparajakkhā mahārajakkhā’’ti ādayo pāḷiyaṃ (paṭi. ma. 1.111) vibhajitvā dassitā. Iti saddhādīnaṃ vasena pañca apparajakkhā, asaddhiyādīnaṃ vasena pañca mahārajakkhā. Evaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyādayoti vibhāvitā paññāsa puggalā. Saddhādīnaṃ pana antarabhedena anekabhedā veditabbā. Khandhādayo eva ^a^V2.0056^ea^ lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ^b^loko,^eb^ sampattibhavabhūto loko ^b^sampattibhavaloko,^eb^ sugatisaṅkhāto upapattibhavo, sampatti sambhavati etenāti ^b^sampattisambhavaloko^eb^ sugatisaṃvattaniyo kammabhavo. Duggatisaṅkhātaupapattibhavaduggatisaṃvattaniyakammabhavā ^b^vipattibhavalokavipattisambhavalokā.^eb^

[03]Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘eko loko’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhārādayo hi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena ^b^loko^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^‘‘eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’^eb^ti (dī. ni. 3.303; a. ni. 10.27, 28; paṭi. ma. 1.2, 112, 208) yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassābhāvato. ^b^‘‘Dve lokā’’^eb^tiādīsupi iminā ^a^P2.0083^ea^ nayena attho veditabbo. Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā. Nanu ca ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ ‘‘idha loko’’ti adhippetattā. Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito, tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā.^eb^ Anurodhādivatthubhūtā lābhādayo ^b^aṭṭha lokadhammā. Dasāyatanānī^eb^ti dasa rūpāyatanāni vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā. Tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ, vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajja’’^eb^nti. Yesaṃ ^a^M2.0064^ea^ puggalānaṃ saddhādayo mandā, te idha ‘‘assaddhā’’tiādinā vuttā. Na pana sabbena sabbaṃ saddhādīnaṃ abhāvatoti apparajakkhadukādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā ^b^‘‘paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā anvayato, byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. Ettha ca apparajakkhādivasena āvajjantassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.

[03]Uppalāni ettha santīti ^b^uppalinī,^eb^ gacchopi jalāsayopi, idha pana jalāsayo adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘uppalavane’’^eb^ti. Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti, tāni ^b^antonimuggaposīnī.^eb^^b^Dīpitānī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitāni, idheva vā ‘‘aññānipī’’tiādinā dīpitāni. ^b^Ugghaṭitaññū^eb^ti ugghaṭanaṃ nāma ñāṇugghaṭanaṃ, ñāṇe ugghaṭitamatte eva jānātīti attho. Vipañcitaṃ ^a^P2.0084^ea^ vitthāramevamatthaṃ jānātīti ^b^vipañcitaññū.^eb^ Uddesādīhi netabboti ^b^neyyo. Saha udāhaṭavelāyā^eb^ti udāhāre dhammassa uddese udāhaṭamatte eva. ^b^Dhammābhisamayo^eb^ti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā ^a^V2.0057^ea^ nayena saṅkhittena mātikāya dīpiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho ^b^‘‘puggalo ugghaṭitaññū’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho ^b^‘‘puggalo vipañcitaññū’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Uddesato^eb^ti uddesahetu, uddisantassa, uddisāpentassa vāti attho. ^b^Paripucchato^eb^ti atthaṃ paripucchantassa. ^b^Anupubbena^eb^^b^dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti anukkamena arahattappatto hoti. ^b^Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamo^eb^ti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti ‘‘padaparamo’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Ye^eb^ti ye duvidhe puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ vibhaṅge ^b^kammāvaraṇenā^eb^ti pañcavidhena ānantariyakammena. ^b^Vipākāvaraṇenā^eb^ti ahetukapaṭisandhiyā. Yasmā duhetukānampi ariyamaggapaṭivedho natthi, tasmā duhetukapaṭisandhipi ^a^M2.0065^ea^ ‘‘vipākāvaraṇamevā’’ti veditabbā. ^b^Kilesāvaraṇenā^eb^ti niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^Assaddhā^eb^ti buddhādīsu saddhā rahitā. ^b^Acchandikā^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā, uttarakurukā manussā acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. ^b^Duppaññā^eb^ti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā, bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti, sopi duppañño eva nāma. ^b^Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu^eb^^b^sammatta^eb^nti ^a^P2.0085^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā. ^b^‘‘Na kammāvaraṇenā’’^eb^tiādīni vuttavipariyāyena veditabbāni.
[03]^b^‘‘Rāgacaritā’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ [paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyanti bhavitabbaṃ –
[21]‘‘Sā esā paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
[22]Nidhānato paramattha-mañjūsā nāma nāmato’’ti. (visuddhimaggamahāṭīkāya nigamane sayameva vuttattā)] visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ;

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ārabbhā^eb^ti attano adhippetassa atthassa bhagavato jānāpanaṃ uddissāti attho. Selo pabbato ucco hoti thiro ca, na paṃsupabbato, missakapabbato vāti āha ^b^‘‘sele yathā pabbatamuddhanī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammamayaṃ pāsāda^eb^nti lokuttaradhammamāha. So hi pabbatasadiso ca hoti sabbadhamme atikkamma abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādasadiso ca, paññāpariyāyo vā idha dhamma-saddo ^a^V2.0058^ea^. Sā hi abbhuggataṭṭhena pāsādoti abhidhamme (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 16) niddiṭṭhā. Tathā cāha –
[21]‘‘Paññāpāsādamāruyha, asoko sokiniṃ pajaṃ;
[22]Pabbataṭṭhova bhūmaṭṭhe, dhīro bāle avekkhatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 28);

[03]^b^‘‘Yathā hī’’^eb^tiādīsu yathā pabbate ṭhatvā rattandhakāre heṭṭhā olokentassa purisassa khette kedārapāḷikuṭiyo, tattha sayitamanussā ca na paññāyanti anujjalabhāvato. Kuṭikāsu pana aggijālā paññāyati ujjalabhāvato evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattalokaṃ olokayato bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti akatakalyāṇā sattā ñāṇagginā anujjalabhāvato, anuḷārabhāvato ca rattiṃ khittā sarā ^a^M2.0066^ea^ viya honti. Katakalyāṇā pana bhabbapuggalā dūre ṭhitāpi bhagavato ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchanti paripakkañāṇaggitāya ^a^P2.0086^ea^ samujjalabhāvato, uḷārasantānatāya himavantapabbato viya cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Uṭṭhehī^eb^ti tvaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha. ^b^Vīriyavantatāyā^eb^ti sātisaya catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyavantatāya. Vīrassa hi bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^vīriyaṃ.^eb^ Kilesamārassa viya maccumārassapi āyatiṃ asambhavato ^b^‘‘maccukilesamārāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāramāravijayassa aggahaṇaṃ kilesamāravijayeneva tabbijayassa jotitabhāvato. ^b^Vāhanasamatthatāyā^eb^ti saṃsāramahākantārato nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ khemappadesaṃ sampāpanasamatthatāya.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Apārutaṃ tesaṃ amatassa dvāra’’nti keci paṭhanti. Nibbānassa dvāraṃ pavisanamaggo vivaritvā ṭhapito mahākaruṇūpanissayena sayambhuñāṇena adhigatattā. ^b^Saddhaṃ pamuñcantū^eb^ti saddhaṃ pavedentu, attano saddahanākāraṃ upaṭṭhāpentūti attho. Sukhena akicchena pavattanīyatāya ^b^suppavattitaṃ. Na bhāsiṃ^eb^ na bhāsissāmīti cintesi.
[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sallapitvā^eb^ti ‘‘vippasannāni kho te āvuso indriyānī’’tiādinā (mahāva. 60) ālāpasallāpaṃ katvā. Tañhissa aparabhāge satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamanassa paccayo ahosi.

[03]^b^75-6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupubbiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0059^ea^^b^katha^eb^nti anupubbiyā anupubbaṃ kathetabbaṃ kathaṃ. Kā pana sāti? Dānādikathā. Tattha ^b^dānakathā^eb^ tāva pacurajanesu pavattiyā sabbasādhāraṇattā, sukarattā, sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu ^a^P2.0087^ea^ nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato, kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ ^a^M2.0067^ea^ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca ^b^dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā^eb^ kathitā, tañce dānasīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phalanti dassanatthaṃ, imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā aparimeyyā dibbabhogabhavasampattiyo hontīti dassanatthaṃ^b^ tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ.^eb^ Vatvā ayaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho, sabbadā anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^saggānantaraṃ maggakathā^eb^ kathetabbā. Maggañca kathentena tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi, pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā, aniccā adhuvā, vipariṇāmadhammāti ^b^kāmānaṃ ādīnavo,^eb^ hīnā, gammā, pothujjanikā, anariyā, anatthasañhitāti tesaṃ ^b^okāro^eb^ lāmakabhāvo, sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti ^b^tattha saṃkileso,^eb^ sabbaso kilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃso^eb^ ca kathetabboti ayamattho ^b^maggantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena ādiatthajotakena bodhitoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sukhānaṃ nidāna^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ, samparāyikānaṃ, nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttānañcāti sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yañhi kiñci loke bhogasukhaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ dānanidānanti pākaṭo yamattho. Yaṃ pana taṃ ^a^P2.0088^ea^ jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tassāpi dānaṃ upanissayapaccayo hotiyeva. ^b^Sampattīnaṃ mūla^eb^nti yā imā loke padesarajjaṃ sirissariyaṃ sattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo, yā ca cātumahārājikacātumahārājādibhedā dibbasampattiyo, yā vā panaññāpi sampattiyo, tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ dānaṃ nāma mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Bhogāna^eb^nti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena ^b^‘‘bhogo’’^eb^ti laddhanāmānaṃ manāpiyarūpādīnaṃ, tannissayānañca upabhogasukhānaṃ. Avassayaṭṭhena ^b^patiṭṭhā. Visamagatassā^eb^ti byasanappattassa. ^b^Tāṇa^eb^nti rakkhā tato paripālanato. ^b^Leṇa^eb^nti byasanehi paripāciyamānassa olīyanapadeso. ^b^Gatī^eb^ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Parāyaṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ. ^b^Avassayo^eb^ti vinipatituṃ adento nissayo. ^b^Ārammaṇa^eb^nti olubbhārammaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Ratanamayasīhāsanasadisa^eb^nti sabbaratanamayasattaṅgamahāsīhāsanasadisaṃ mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ ^a^V2.0060^ea^ appadānato. ^b^Mahāpathavisadisaṃ^eb^ gatagataṭṭhāne ^a^M2.0068^ea^ patiṭṭhāya labhāpanato. ^b^Ālambanarajjusadisa^eb^nti yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato, tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho, evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā ca paccayabhāvato. ^b^Dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti duggatidukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Samassāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0089^ea^ lobhamacchariyādipaṭisattupaddavato sammadeva assāsanaṭṭhena. ^b^Bhayaparittāṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti dāliddiyabhayato paripālanaṭṭhena. ^b^Maccheramalādīhī^eb^ti maccheralobhadosaissāvicikicchādiṭṭhi ādicittamalehi. ^b^Anupalittaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anupakkiliṭṭhatāya. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti maccheramalādikacavarānaṃ. Etehi eva ^b^durāsadaṭṭhena. Asantāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anabhibhavanīyatāya santāsābhāvena. Yo hi dāyako dānapati, so sampatipi kutoci na bhāyati, pageva āyatiṃ. Dhammasīsena puggalo vutto. ^b^Balavantaṭṭhenā^eb^ti mahābalavatāya. Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti, āyatiṃ pana kāyabalādīhipi. ^b^Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘vaḍḍhikāraṇa’’nti abhisammatabhāvena. Vipattibhavato sampattibhavūpanayanaṃ ^b^khemantabhūmisampāpanaṃ,^eb^ bhavasaṅgāmato yogakkhemasampāpanañca ^b^khemantabhūmisampāpanaṭṭho.^eb^

[03]Idāni dānaṃ vaṭṭagatā ukkaṃsappattā sampattiyo viya vivaṭṭagatāpi tā sampādetīti bodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇe dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dānañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sakkamārabrahmasampattiyo attahitāya eva, cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya, parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato vuttā, etā lokiyā, imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ tato paraṃ ^b^‘‘sāvakapāramīñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamāti dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto eva. Etenevassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.

[03]Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena vā pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako sattesu ekantahitajjhāsayo purisapuggalo, so ‘‘paresaṃ hiṃsati, paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratī’’ti aṭṭhānametanti āha ^b^‘‘dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sīlasadiso alaṅkāro natthī^eb^ti akittimaṃ hutvā sabbakālaṃ sobhāvisesāvahattā. ^b^Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthī^eb^ti etthāpi ^a^M2.0069^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘candanaṃ ^a^P2.0090^ea^ tagaraṃ vāpī’’tiādikā (dha. pa. 55) gāthā, ‘‘gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’tiādikā (jā. 2.17.55) ca vattabbā ^a^V2.0061^ea^. Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlālaṅkārena hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^‘‘Ayaṃ saggo labbhatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ majjhimehi chandādīhi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenāha sakko devarājā –
[21]‘‘Hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati;
[22]Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī’’ti. (jā. 2.22.429);

[03]^b^Iṭṭho^eb^ti sukho, ^b^kanto^eb^ti kamanīyo, ^b^manāpo^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanako, taṃ panassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niccamettha kīḷā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Nicca^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ ^b^kīḷā^eb^ti kāmūpasaṃhitā sukhavihārā. ^b^Sampattiyo^eb^ti bhogasampattiyo. ^b^Dibba^eb^nti dibbabhavaṃ devalokapariyāpannaṃ. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca sukhaṃ. ^b^Dibbasampatti^eb^nti dibbabhavaṃ āyusampattiṃ, vaṇṇayasaissariyasampattiṃ, rūpādisampattiñca. ^b^Evamādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yāmādīhi anubhavitabbaṃ dibbasampattiṃ vadati.

[03]^b^Appassādā^eb^ti nirassādā paṇḍitehi yathābhūtaṃ passantehi tattha assādetabbatābhāvato. ^b^Bahudukkhā^eb^ti mahādukkhā sampati, āyatiñca vipuladukkhānubandhattā. ^b^Bahupāyāsā^eb^ti anekavidhaparissayā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti kāmesu. ^b^Bhiyyo^eb^ti bahuṃ. ^b^Doso^eb^ti aniccatādinā, appassādatādinā ca dūsitabhāvo, yato te viññūnaṃ cittaṃ nārādhenti. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ^b^ādīnavo,^eb^ paramakapaṇatā, tathā ^a^P2.0091^ea^ ca kāmā yathābhūtaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. ^b^Lāmakabhāvo^eb^ti nihīnabhāvo aseṭṭhehi sevitabbattā, seṭṭhehi na sevitabbattā ca. ^b^Saṃkilissana^eb^nti vibādhetabbatā upatāpetabbatā. ^b^Nekkhamme ānisaṃsa^eb^nti ettha yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato tattakā nekkhamme ānisaṃsā. Api ca ‘‘nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ, nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi, nikkhantaṃ byāpādato’’tiādinā ^a^M2.0070^ea^ (sārattha. ṭī. 3.26 mahāvagge) nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi, pabbajjāya, jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi.

[03]^b^Vuttanaya^eb^nti ettha yaṃ avuttanayaṃ ‘‘kallacitte’’tiādi, tattha ^b^kallacitte^eb^ti kammaniyacitte, heṭṭhā ^a^V2.0062^ea^ pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammakkhamacitteti attho. Assaddhiyādayo hi yasmā cittassa rogabhūtā tadā te vigatā, tasmā arogacitteti attho. Diṭṭhimānādikilesavigamanena ^b^muducitte.^eb^ Kāmacchandādivigamena ^b^vinīvaraṇacitte.^eb^ Sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uḷārapītipāmojjayogena ^b^udaggacitte.^eb^ Tattha saddhāsampattiyā ^b^pasannacitte.^eb^ Yadā ca bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā ^b^kallacitte^eb^ti kāmacchandavigamena arogacitte. ^b^Muducitte^eb^ti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akathinacitte. ^b^Vinīvaraṇacitte^eb^ti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena vikkhepassa vigatattā tena apihitacitte. ^b^Udaggacitte^eb^ti thinamiddhavigamena ^a^P2.0092^ea^ sampaggahitavasena alīnacitte. ^b^Pasannacitte^eb^ti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacitte, evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^‘‘Seyyathāpī’’^eb^tiādinā upamāvasena nesaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ, ariyamagguppādañca dasseti. ^b^Apagatakāḷaka^eb^nti vigatakāḷakaṃ. ^b^Sammadevā^eb^ti suṭṭhu eva. ^b^Rajana^eb^nti nīlapītādiraṅgajātaṃ. ^b^Paṭiggaṇheyyā^eb^ti gaṇheyya pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Tasmiṃyeva āsane^eb^ti tissameva nisajjāyaṃ, etena nesaṃ lahuvipassakatā, tikkhapaññatā, sukhapaṭipadākhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti. ^b^Viraja^eb^nti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena virajaṃ. Anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamanena ^b^vītamalaṃ.^eb^ Paṭhamamaggavajjhakilesarajābhāvena vā ^b^virajaṃ.^eb^ Pañcavidhadussīlyamalāpagamanena ^b^vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhu^eb^nti brahmāyusutte (ma. ni. 2.383) heṭṭhimā tayo maggā vuttā, cūḷarāhulovāde (ma. ni. 3.416) āsavakkhayo, idha pana sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. ^b^‘‘Yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’’^eb^nti tassa uppattiākāradassananti. Nanu ca maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ, na saṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti? Saccametaṃ. Yasmā taṃ nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati, tasmā tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]‘‘Suddhaṃ vattha’’nti nidassitaupamāyaṃ idaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo ^a^M2.0071^ea^, dhovanasilā viya anupubbikathā, udakaṃ viya saddhā, udake temetvā ūsagomayachārikābharehi kāḷakapadese samucchinditvā vatthassa dhovanapayogo ^a^P2.0093^ea^ viya saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithilī katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho, tena payogena vatthe nānākāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo, tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti. ‘‘Diṭṭhadhammā’’ti ^a^V2.0063^ea^ vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pattadhammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññampi vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘viditadhammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pariyogāḷhadhammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tena nesaṃ saccābhisambodhiṃyeva vibhāveti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesatova catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāhantaṃ paṭivijjhatīti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^77^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cīvaradānādīnī^eb^ti cīvarādiparikkhāradānaṃ sandhāyāha. Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre, pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa, puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa datvā ‘‘idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū’’ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa ca sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Vassasatikattherā viya^eb^ ākappasampannāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sandassesī^eb^ti suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ katvā dassesi. ^b^Idhalokattha^eb^nti idhalokabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhātamatthaṃ. ^b^Paralokattha^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Dassesī^eb^ti sāmaññalakkhaṇato, salakkhaṇato ca dassesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anicca’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha hutvā abhāvato ^b^aniccanti dassesi.^eb^ Udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato ^b^dukkhanti dassesi.^eb^ Avasavattanato ^b^anattāti dassesi.^eb^ Ime ruppanādilakkhaṇā pañcakkhandhāti rāsaṭṭhena ^b^khandhe dassesi.^eb^ Ime cakkhādisabhāvā ^a^P2.0094^ea^ nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti ^b^dassesi.^eb^ Imāni cakkhādisabhāvāneva dvārārammaṇabhūtāni dvādasa āyatanānīti ^b^dassesi.^eb^ Ime ^a^M2.0072^ea^ avijjādayo jarāmaraṇapariyosānā dvādasa paccayadhammā paṭiccasamuppādoti ^b^dassesi.^eb^ Rūpakkhandhassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena paccayato cattāri, khaṇato ekanti imāni ^b^pañca lakkhaṇāni dassesi. Tathā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘pañca lakkhaṇānī’’ti padaṃ ākaḍḍhati. ^b^Dassento^eb^ti ^b^iti^eb^-saddo nidassanattho, evanti attho. ^b^Niraya^eb^nti aṭṭhamahānirayasoḷasaussadanirayappabhedaṃ sabbaso nirayaṃ ^b^dassesi. Tiracchānayoni^eb^nti apadadvipadacatuppadabahuppadādibhedaṃ migapasupakkhisarīsapādivibhāgaṃ nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānalokaṃ. ^b^Pettivisaya^eb^nti khuppipāsikavantāsikaparadattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādibhedabhinnaṃ nānāvidhaṃ petasattalokaṃ. ^b^Asurakāya^eb^nti kālakañcikāsuranikāyaṃ. Evaṃ tāva duggatibhūtaṃ paralokatthaṃ vatvā idāni sugatibhūtaṃ vattuṃ ^b^‘‘tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipāka’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Vehapphale subhakiṇṇeyeva saṅgahetvā asaññīsu, arūpīsu ca sampattiyā dassetabbāya abhāvato duviññeyyatāya ^b^‘‘navannaṃ brahmalokāna’’^eb^ntveva vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Gaṇhāpesī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0064^ea^ te dhamme samādinne kārāpesi.

[03]^b^Samuttejanaṃ^eb^ nāma samādinnadhammānaṃ yathā anupakārakā dhammā parihāyanti, pahīyanti ca, upakārakā dhammā parivaḍḍhanti, visujjhanti ca, tathā nesaṃ ussāhuppādananti āha ^b^‘‘abbhussāhesī’’^eb^ti. Yathā pana taṃ ussāhuppādanaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘idhalokatthañcevā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tāsetvā tāsetvā^eb^ti paribyattabhāvāpādanena tejetvā tejetvā. ^b^Adhigataṃ viya katvā^eb^ti yesaṃ katheti, tehi tamatthaṃ paccakkhato anubhuyyamānaṃ viya katvā. Veneyyānañhi buddhehi pakāsiyamāno ^a^P2.0095^ea^ attho paccakkhatopi pākaṭataro hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tathā hi bhagavā evaṃ thomīyati –
[21]‘‘Ādittopi ayaṃ loko, ekādasahi aggibhi;
[22]Na tathā yāti saṃvegaṃ, sammohapaliguṇṭhito.
[21]Sutvādīnavasaññuttaṃ, yathā vācaṃ mahesino;
[22]Paccakkhatopi buddhānaṃ, vacanaṃ suṭṭhu pākaṭa’’nti.

[03]Tenāha ^b^‘‘dvattiṃsakammakāraṇapañcavīsatimahābhayappabhedañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇāni ‘‘hatthampi chindantī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.178) ^b^dukkhakkhandhasutte^eb^ āgatanayena ^a^M2.0073^ea^ veditabbāni. ^b^Pañcavīsatimahābhayāni^eb^ ‘‘jātibhayaṃ jarābhayaṃ byādhibhayaṃ maraṇabhaya’’ntiādinā (cūḷani. 123) tattha tattha sutte āgatanayena veditabbāni. ^b^Āghātanabhaṇḍikā^eb^ adhikuṭṭanakaḷiṅgaraṃ, yaṃ ‘‘accādhāna’’ntipi vuccati.

[03]^b^Paṭiladdhaguṇena codesī^eb^ti ‘‘taṃtaṃguṇādhigamena ayampi tumhehi paṭiladdho, ānisaṃso ayampī’’ti paccakkhato dassento ‘‘kiṃ ito pubbe evarūpaṃ atthī’’ti codento viya ahosi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahānisaṃsaṃ katvā kathesī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tappaccayañca kilamatha^eb^nti saṅkhārapavattihetukaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattasantāne uppajjanakaparissamaṃ saṃvighātaṃ vihesaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti heṭṭhā paṭhamamaggādhigamatthāya kathāya. Sabbasaṅkhārūpasamabhāvato ^b^santaṃ. ^eb^ Atittikaraparamasukhatāya ^b^paṇītaṃ.^eb^ Sakalasaṃsārabyasanato tāyanatthena ^a^V2.0065^ea^^b^tāṇaṃ.^eb^ Tato nibbindahadayānaṃ nilīyanaṭṭhānatāya ^b^leṇaṃ. Ādi^eb^-saddena gatipaṭisaraṇaṃ paramassāsoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
[03]^b^80^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saṅghappahonakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvā ^b^‘‘saṅghassa aparipuṇṇattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Dve aggasāvakā eva hi tadā ahesuṃ.

[03]^b^86^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Kadā ^a^P2.0096^ea^ udapādī’’ti pucchaṃ ‘‘sambodhito’’tiādinā saṅkhepato vissajjetvā puna taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pitu saṅgahaṃ karonto vihāsi sambodhito ‘‘satta saṃvaccharāni satta māse satta divase’’ti ānetvā sambandho, tañca kho veneyyānaṃ tadā abhāvato. ^b^Kilañjehi^eb^ bahi ^b^chādāpetvā, vatthehi^eb^ anto ^b^paṭicchādāpetvā, upari ca^eb^ vatthehi ^b^chādāpetvā,^eb^ tassa heṭṭhā ^b^suvaṇṇa…pe… vitānaṃ kārāpetvā. Mālāvacchake^eb^ti pupphamālāhi vacchākārena veṭhite. ^b^Gandhantare^eb^ti cāṭibharitagandhassa antare. ^b^Pupphānī^eb^ti cāṭiādibharitāni jalajapupphāni ceva caṅkotakādibharitāni thalajapupphāni ca.

[03]Kāmañcāyaṃ ^a^M2.0074^ea^ rājā buddhapitā, tathāpi buddhā nāma lokagaruno, na te kenaci vase vattetabbā, atha kho te eva pare attano vase vattenti, tasmā rājā ^b^‘‘nāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ demī’’^eb^ti āha.
[03]^b^Dānamukha^eb^nti dānakaraṇūpāyaṃ, dānavattanti attho. ^b^Na dāni me anuññātā^eb^ti idāni me dānaṃ na anuññātā, no na anujānantīti attho.
[03]^b^Paritassanajīvita^eb^nti dukkhajīvikā dāliddiyanti attho.

[03]^b^Sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahosī^eb^ti bhagavato aṭṭhasaṭṭhi ca bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ bhāgato dātuṃ pahosi, na sabbesaṃ pariyattabhāvena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘senāpatipi attano deyyadhammaṃ adāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jeṭṭhikaṭṭhāne^eb^ti jeṭṭhikadeviṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^Tatheva^eb^^a^V2.0066^ea^^b^katvā^eb^ti carapurise ṭhapetvā. ^b^Suci^eb^nti suddhaṃ. ^b^Paṇīta^eb^nti uḷāraṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ ‘‘ekamanta’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 2) viya. ^b^Bhañjitvā^eb^ti madditvā, pīḷetvāti ^a^P2.0097^ea^ attho. ^b^Jātisappikhīrādīhiyevā^eb^ti antojātasappikhīrādīhiyeva, amhākameva gāviādito gahitasappiādīhiyevāti attho.

[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^ Parāpavādaṃ, parāpakāraṃ, sītuṇhādibhedañca guṇāparādhaṃ khamati sahati adhivāsetīti ^b^khanti.^eb^ Sā pana yasmā sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme savisesaṃ tapati santapati vidhamatīti ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ ^b^tapo.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Adhivāsanakhantī’’ti iminā dhammanijjhānakkhantito viseseti. Titikkhanaṃ khamanaṃ ^b^titikkhā.^eb^Akkharacintakā hi khamāyaṃ titikkhā-saddaṃ vaṇṇenti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘khantiyā eva vevacana’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti santapaṇītanipuṇasivakhemādinā sabbappakārena. ^b^So pabbajito nāma na hoti^eb^ pabbājitabbadhammassa apabbājanato. ^b^Tasseva^eb^ tatiyapadassa ^b^vevacanaṃ^eb^ anatthantarattā.

[03]^b^‘‘Na hī’’^eb^tiādinā taṃ evatthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Uttamatthena paramanti vuccati^eb^ para-saddassa seṭṭhavācakattā, ‘‘puggalaparoparaññū’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 7.68; netti. 118) viya. ^b^Para^eb^nti aññaṃ. Idāni para-saddaṃ aññapariyāyameva gahetvā atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Malassā^eb^ti pāpamalassa. ^b^Apabbājitattā^eb^ti anīhaṭattā anirākatattā ^a^M2.0075^ea^. ^b^Samitattā^eb^ti nirodhitattā tesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. ^b^‘‘Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ samaṇoti pavuccatī’’^eb^ti hi vuttaṃ.

[03]Apica bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanto pātimokkhakathāya ca sīlapadhānattā sīlassa ca visesato doso paṭipakkhoti ^a^P2.0098^ea^ tassa niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ādito ^b^‘‘khantī paramaṃ tapo’’^eb^ti āha, tena aniṭṭhassa paṭihananūpāyo vutto, titikkhāgahaṇena pana iṭṭhassa, tadubhayenapi uppannaṃ ratiṃ abhibhuyya viharatīti ayamattho dassitoti. Taṇhāvānassa vūpasamanato ^b^nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā.^eb^ Tattha khantiggahaṇena payogavipattiyā abhāvo dassito, titikkhāgahaṇena āsayavipattiyā abhāvo. Tathā khantiggahaṇena parāparādhasahatā, titikkhāgahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā. Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ, pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi vibādhanañca ‘‘parūpaghāto, paraviheṭhana’’nti vuccati, evaṃ tesaṃ mūlasāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ, dāraparāmasanaṃ, visaṃvādanaṃ, aññamaññabhedanaṃ, pharusavacanena mammaghaṭṭanaṃ, niratthakavippalāpo ^a^V2.0067^ea^, parasantakagijjhanaṃ, ucchedavindanaṃ, micchābhinivesanañcaupaghāto, viheṭhanañca hotīti yassa kassaci akusalassa kammapathassa, kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito, samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.

[03]^b^Sabbākusalassā^eb^ti sabbassāpi dvādasākusalacittuppādasaṅgahitassa sāvajjadhammassa. Karaṇaṃ nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti tappaṭikkhepato akaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘anuppādana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kusalassā’’^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘etaṃ buddhāna sāsana’’nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme, tesañca sambhārabhūte tebhūmakakusaladhamme sambodhetīti āha ^b^‘‘catubhūmakakusalassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upasampadā^eb^ti upasampādanaṃ, taṃ pana tassa samadhigamoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭilābho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cittajotana^eb^nti cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ. Yasmā ^a^P2.0099^ea^ aggamaggasamaṅgino cittaṃ sabbaso pariyodapīyati nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇe pana pariyodapitaṃ hoti puna pariyodapetabbatāya abhāvato, iti pariniṭṭhitapariyodapanataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘taṃ pana arahattena hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbapāpaṃ pahāya^eb^ tadaṅgādivasenevāti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Sīlasaṃvarenā’’^eb^ti hi iminā tebhūmakassāpi saṅgahe itarappahānānampi saṅgaho hotīti, evañca katvā sabbaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0076^ea^. ^b^Samathavipassanāhī^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi. ^b^Sampādetvā^eb^ti nipphādetvā. Sampādanañcettha hetubhūtāhi phalabhūtassa sahajātāhipi, pageva purimasiddhāhīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kassacī^eb^ti hīnādīsu kassaci sattassa kassaci upavādassa, tena davakamyatāyapi upavadanaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Upaghātassa akaraṇa^eb^nti etthāpi ‘‘kassacī’’ti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Kāyenā^eb^ti ca nidassanamattametaṃ manasāpi paresaṃ anatthacintanādivasena upaghātakaraṇassa vajjetabbattā. ^b^Kāyenā^eb^ti vā ettha arūpakāyassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na copanakāyakarajakāyānameva. ^b^Pa atimokkha^eb^nti pakārato ativiya sīlesu mukhyabhūtaṃ. ^b^‘‘Atipamokkha’’^eb^nti tameva padaṃ upasaggabyattayena vadati. Evaṃ bhedato padavaṇṇanaṃ katvā tatvato vadati ^b^‘‘uttamasīla’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Pāti vā’’^eb^tiādinā pālanato rakkhaṇato ativiya mokkhanato ativiya mocanato ^b^pātimokkha^eb^nti dasseti. ‘‘Pāpā ati mokkhetīti atimokkho’’ti nimittassa kattubhāvena upacaritabbato. ^b^Yo vā na^eb^nti yo vā puggalo naṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ ^b^pāti^eb^^a^P2.0100^ea^ samādiyitvā avikopento ^b^rakkhati, taṃ^eb^ ‘‘pātī’’ti laddhanāmaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitaṃ ^b^mokkhetīti pātimokkha^eb^nti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana pātimokkhapadassa attho ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.14) vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Mattaññutā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0068^ea^ bhojane mattaññutā, sā pana visesato paccayasannissitasīlavasena gahetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena pamāṇaññutā’’^eb^ti. Ājīvapārisuddhisīlavasenāpi gayhamāne ‘‘pariyesanavissajjanavasenā’’tipi vattabbaṃ. ^b^Saṅghaṭṭanavirahita^eb^nti janasaṅghaṭṭanavirahitaṃ, nirajanasambādhaṃ vivittanti attho. ^b^Catupaccayasantoso dīpito^eb^ paccayasantosatāsāmaññena itaradvayassāpi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitabhāvato. ^b^‘‘Aṭṭhasamāpattivasibhāvāyā’’^eb^ti iminā payojanadassanavasena yadatthaṃ vivittasenāsanasevanaṃ icchitaṃ, so adhicittānuyogo vutto. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtā adhippetā, na yā kācīti sakalassāpi adhicittānuyogassa jotitabhāvo veditabbo.

[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ettakena suttapadesena. Tatthāpi ca iminā…pe… kathanena suppaṭividdhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvāti yojanā. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo byatirekattho, tena idāni vuccamānatthaṃ ullaṅgeti. ^b^Ekamidāha^eb^nti ekaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^-saddo nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘bhikkhave samaya’’nti evamādi pāṭho saṅgahito. Ahaṃ bhikkhave ekaṃ samayanti evaṃ pettha padayojanā.

[03]^b^Subhagavane^eb^ti subhagattā ^b^subhagaṃ,^eb^ sundarasirikattā ^a^P2.0101^ea^, sundarakāmattā vāti attho. Subhagañhi taṃ sirisampattiyā, sundare cettha kāme manussā patthenti. Bahujanakantatāyapi taṃ ^b^subhagaṃ.^eb^ Vanayatīti ^b^vanaṃ,^eb^ attasampattiyā attani sinehaṃ uppādetīti attho. Vanute iti vā ^b^vanaṃ,^eb^ attasampattiyā eva ‘‘maṃ paribhuñjathā’’ti satte yācati viyāti attho. Subhagañca taṃ vanañcāti subhagavanaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^subhagavane.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^pana kiṃ iminā papañcenāti ^b^‘‘evaṃ nāmake vane’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ sālarukkhopi ‘‘sālo’’ti vuccati, yo koci rukkhopi vanappati jeṭṭhakarukkhopi. Idha pana pacchimo eva adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘vanappatijeṭṭhakassa mūle’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mūlasamugghātavasenā^eb^ti anusayasamucchindanavasena.

[03]^b^Na vihāyantī^eb^ti akuppadhammatāya na vijahanti. ^b^‘‘Na kañci sattaṃ tapantīti atappā’’^eb^ti idaṃ tesu tassā samaññāya niruḷhatāya vuttaṃ, aññathā sabbepi suddhāvāsā na kañci sattaṃ tapantīti atappā nāma siyuṃ. ^b^‘‘Na vihāyantī’’^eb^tiādinibbacanesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Sundaradassanā^eb^ti dassanīyāti ayamatthoti āha ^b^‘‘abhirūpā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sundarametesaṃ dassana^eb^nti ^a^V2.0069^ea^ sobhanametesaṃ cakkhunā dassanaṃ, viññāṇena dassanaṃ pīti attho. ^b^Sabbe heva…pe… jeṭṭhā^eb^ pañcavokārabhave tato visiṭṭhānaṃ abhāvato.

[03]^b^Sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vasenā^eb^ti sattannaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ apadānavasena. Avihehi ajjhiṭṭhena ekena avihābrahmunā kathitā tehi sabbehi kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tathā avihehī’’^eb^ti. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘devatā maṃ etadavocu’’nti. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘anekāni devatāsatānī’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ ^a^P2.0102^ea^ pacchā attano sāsane ^a^M2.0078^ea^ visesaṃ adhigantvā tattha uppannānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Anusandhidvayampī^eb^ti dhammadhātupadānusandhi, devatārocanapadānusandhīti duvidhaṃ anusandhiṃ. ^b^Niyyātento^eb^ti nigamento. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Mahāpadānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Janapadino^eb^ti ^a^P2.0103^ea^^a^V2.0070^ea^^a^M2.0079^ea^ janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarasāmino ^b^rājakumārā^eb^ gottavasena ^b^kurū nāma.^eb^ Tesaṃ nivāso yadi eko janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘ruḷhisaddenā’’^eb^ti. Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti. Ayamettha ruḷhi yathā aññatthāpi ‘‘aṅgesu viharati, mallesu viharatī’’ti ca. Tabbisesanepi janapadasadde jātisadde ekavacanameva. ^b^Aṭṭhakathācariyā panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotano, tena ‘‘puthuatthavisayatāya evetaṃ puthuvacana’’nti ‘‘bahuke panā’’tiādinā vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. ^b^Sutvā^eb^ti mandhātumahārājassa ānubhāvadassanānusārena paramparānugataṃ kathaṃ sutvā. ^b^Anusaṃyāyantenā^eb^ti anuvicarantena. ^b^Etesaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti candimasūriyamukhena cātumahārājikabhavanamāha.
