[03]^b^Yato kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^to^eb^-saddo dā-saddo viya kālavacano ‘‘yato kho, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṅgho’’tiādīsu (pārā. 21) viyāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yadā kho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aggahetvā^eb^ti kañcipi saṅkhāraṃ ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā aggahetvā. ^b^Paññāvimutto^eb^ti aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ anadhigatattā sātisayassa samādhibalassa abhāvato paññābaleneva vimutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭha vimokkhe asacchikatvā paññābalenevā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Appavatti^eb^nti āyatiṃ appavattiṃ ^b^katvā.^eb^ Pajānanto vimuttoti vā paññāvimutto, paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri saccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti ^b^vimutto. So^eb^ paññāvimutto. ^b^Sukkhavipassako^eb^ti samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā, asiniddhā vā vipassanā etassāti ^b^sukkhavipassako. Ṭhatvā^eb^ti pādakakaraṇavasena ṭhatvā. ^b^Aññatarasmi^eb^nti ca aññatarāññatarasmiṃ, ekekasminti attho. Evañhissa pañcavidhatā siyā. ‘‘Na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatī’’ti iminā sātisayassa samādhibalassa abhāvo dīpito. ‘‘Paññāya cassa disvā’’tiādinā sātisayassa paññābalassa bhāvo. ^b^Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī^eb^ti na āsavā paññāya passanti, dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā ‘‘disvā parikkhīṇā’’ti vuttā. Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyā hoti.

[03]^b^129^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekassa^eb^^a^M2.0118^ea^^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti sattasu ariyapuggalesu ekassa bhikkhuno. Viññāṇaṭṭhitiādinā parijānanādivasappa vatta^b^niggamanañca^eb^^a^P2.0153^ea^ paññāvimutta^b^nāmañca. Itarassā^eb^ti ubhatobhāgavimuttassa. Ime sandhāya hi pubbe ‘‘dvinnaṃ bhikkhūna’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kenaṭṭhenā^eb^ti kena sabhāvena. Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato ‘‘attho’’ti vuccati, so eva ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘aṭṭho’’ti vutto. ^b^Adhimuccanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhikaṃ savisesaṃ muccanaṭṭhena, etena satipi sabbassāpi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati, so bhāvanāviseso dīpito. Bhavati hi samānajātiyuttopi bhāvanāvisesena pavattiākāraviseso, yathā taṃ saddhāvimuttatā diṭṭhippattassa. Tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya ^a^V2.0105^ea^, evaṃ aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇe cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ayaṃ panattho^eb^ti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho ^b^pacchime vimokkhe^eb^ nirodhe ^b^natthi,^eb^ kevalo vimuttaṭṭho eva tattha labbhati, taṃ sayameva parato vakkhati.

[03]^b^Rūpī^eb^ti yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti, yena visiṭṭhena rūpena ‘‘rūpī’’ti vucceyya ^b^rūpī^eb^-saddassa atisayatthadīpanato, tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpavasena paṭiladdhaṃ jhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpībhāvasādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ajjhatta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ^eb^ uttarapadalopena. ^b^Rūpānī^eb^ti panettha purimapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nīlakasiṇādirūpānī’’^eb^ti. Rūpe kasiṇarūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā etassa atthīti rūpasaññī, saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Tappaṭikkhepena ^a^P2.0154^ea^ arūpasaññī. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^‘‘Anto appanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthī’’^eb^ti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti siyāti dasseti. Evañhettha tathāvattabbatāpatticodanā samatthitā hoti. Yasmā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho sambhavati ^a^M2.0119^ea^, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito, yasmā pana mettāvasena pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahanti tesu tato adhimuccitvāva pavattati, tasmā ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 212) ‘‘brahmavihārabhāvanā subhavimokkho’’ti vuttā, tayidaṃ ubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbaso^eb^ti anavasesato. Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avassissati. ^b^Visuddhattā^eb^ti yathāparicchinnakāle nirodhitattā. ^b^Uttamo vimokkho nāma^eb^ ariyeheva samāpajjitabbato, ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti paṭhamasamāpattito paṭṭhāya. ^b^Yāva pariyosānā samāpatti,^eb^ tāva. ^b^Aṭṭhatvā^eb^ti katthaci samāpattiyaṃ aṭṭhito eva, nirantarameva paṭipāṭiyā, uppaṭipāṭiyā ca samāpajjatevāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito cito ca sañcaraṇavasena vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Icchati^eb^ samāpajjituṃ. Tattha ^b^‘‘samāpajjati pavisatī’’^eb^ti samāpattisamaṅgīpuggalo taṃ taṃ paviṭṭho viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Dvīhi^eb^^a^V2.0106^ea^^b^bhāgehi vimutto^eb^ti arūpajjhānena vikkhambhanavimokkhena, maggena samucchedavimokkhenāti dvīhi vimuccanabhāgehi, arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato, maggena nāmakāyatoti dvīhi vimuccitabbabhāgehi ca vimutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘arūpasamāpattiyā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^P2.0155^ea^. ^b^Vimutto^eb^ti hi kilesehi vimutto, vimuccanto ca kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchindanehi kāyadvayato vimuttoti ayamettha attho. Gāthāya ca ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino upasivabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā ‘‘nāmakāyā vimutto’’ti ubhatobhāgavimutto muni akkhāto. Tattha ^b^atthaṃ paletī^eb^ti atthaṃ gacchati. ^b^Na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti ‘‘asukaṃ nāma disaṃ gato’’ti vohāraṃ na gacchati. ^b^Evaṃ muni nāmakāyā vimutto^eb^ti evaṃ arūpaṃ upapanno sekkhamuni pakatiyā pubbeva rūpakāyā vimutto, tattha ca catutthamaggaṃ nibbattetvā nāmakāyassa pariññātattā puna nāmakāyāpi vimutto. Ubhatobhāgavimutto khīṇāsavo hutvā anupādāya parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ^a^M2.0120^ea^^b^atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘khattiyo brāhmaṇo’’ti evaṃ ādikaṃ samaññaṃ na gacchatīti attho.

[03]‘‘Aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā’’ti idaṃ kiṃ ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu aññataralābhīvasena vuttaṃ, udāhu sabbāruppalābhīvasenāti yathicchasi, tathā hotu, yadi sabbāruppalābhīvasena vuttaṃ, na koci virodho. Atha tattha aññataralābhīvasena vuttaṃ, ‘‘yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe anulomampi samāpajjatī’’tiādivacanena virujjheyyāti? Yasmā arūpāvacarajjhānesu ekassāpi lābhī ‘‘aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī’’ tveva vuccati aṭṭhavimokkhe ekadesassāpi taṃnāmadānasamatthatāsambhavato. Ayañhi aṭṭhavimokkhasamaññā samudāye viya tadekadesepi niruḷhāpattisamaññā viyāti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā’’ti. ‘‘Pañcavidho hotī’’ti vatvā chabbidhataṃpissa keci parikappenti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, nicchitovāyaṃ pañho pubbācariyehīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘keci panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino, sārasamāsācariyā ca. Te hi ‘‘ubhatobhāgavimuttoti ^a^P2.0156^ea^ ubhayabhāgavimutto samādhivipassanāto’’ti vatvā rūpāvacarasamādhināpi samādhiparipanthato vimuttiṃ maññanti. Evaṃ rūpajjhānabhāgena, arūpajjhānabhāgena ca ubhato vimuttoti pāyasamāno. ^b^‘‘Tādisamevā’’^eb^ti iminā yādisaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ kilesavikkhambhane, tādisaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ pīti imamatthaṃ ullaṅgeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ubhatobhāgavimuttapañho^eb^ti ubhatobhāgavimuttassa chabbidhataṃ nissāya uppannapañho. ^b^Vaṇṇanaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti tassa padassa atthavacanaṃ nissāya. ^b^Cirenā^eb^ti therassa aparabhāge cirena kālena. ^b^Vinicchaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0107^ea^ saṃsayachedakaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ ^b^patto.^eb^^b^Taṃ pañha^eb^nti tamatthaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchito hi attho pañho. ^b^Na kenaci sutapubba^eb^nti kenaci kiñci na sutapubbaṃ, idaṃ atthajātanti adhippāyo. Kiñcāpi upekkhāsahagataṃ, kiñcāpi kilese vikkhambhetīti paccekaṃ kiñcāpi-saddo yojetabbo. ^b^Samudācaratī^eb^ti pavattati. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘ime hī’’^eb^tiādinā, tena rūpāvacarabhāvanato āruppabhāvanā savisesaṃ kilese vikkhambheti rūpavirāgabhāvanābhāvato ^a^M2.0121^ea^, uparibhāvanābhāvato cāti dassetīti. Evañca katvā ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ āruppabhāvanāniddese yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘tassevaṃ tasmiṃ nimitte punappunaṃ ^b^cittaṃ^eb^ cārentassa nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti sati santiṭṭhatī’’tiādi, (visuddhi. 1.281) taṃ samatthataṃ hotīti. ^b^Idaṃ sutta^eb^nti puggalapaññattipāṭhamāha (pu. pa. niddesa 27). Sabbañhi buddhavacanaṃ atthasūcanādiatthena suttanti vutto vāyamattho. Yaṃ pana tattha ^a^P2.0157^ea^ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ anulomādito samāpajjanena sātisayaṃ santānassa abhisaṅkhatattā, aṭṭhamañca uttamaṃ vimokkhaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggamaggādhigamena ubhatobhāgavimuccanato ca imāya ubhatobhāgavimuttiyā sabbaseṭṭhatā veditāti daṭṭhabbā.
[06]Mahānidānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pūjanīyabhāvato ^a^V2.0108^ea^^a^M2.0122^ea^, ^a^P2.0158^ea^ buddhasampadañca pahāya pavattatā mahantañca taṃ parinibbānañcāti ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ;^eb^ savāsanappahānato mahantaṃ kilesakkhayaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ;^eb^ mahatā kālena mahatā vā guṇarāsinā sādhitaṃ parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ;^eb^ mahantabhāvāya, dhātūnaṃ bahubhāvāya parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ;^eb^ mahato lokato nissaṭaṃ parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ;^eb^ sabbalokāsādhāraṇattā buddhānaṃ sīlādiguṇehi mahato buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbānaṃ; ^eb^mahati sāsane patiṭṭhite parinibbānantipi ^b^mahāparinibbāna^eb^nti buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānaṃ vuccati, tappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suttaṃ ^b^mahāparinibbānasuttaṃ.^eb^ Gijjhā ettha vasantīti ^b^gijjhaṃ,^eb^ gijjhaṃ kūṭaṃ etassāti ^b^gijjhakūṭo,^eb^ gijjhaṃ viya vā ^b^gijjhaṃ,^eb^ kūṭaṃ, taṃ etassāti ^b^gijjhakūṭo,^eb^ pabbato, tasmiṃ ^b^gijjhakūṭe.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘gijjhā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Abhiyātukāmo^eb^ti ettha abhi-saddo abhibhavanattho, ‘‘abhivijānātū’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.244; 3.85; ma. ni. 3.256) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘abhibhavanatthāya yātukāmo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vajjirājāno^eb^ti ‘‘vajjetabbā ime’’tiādito pavattaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya ‘‘vajjī’’ti laddhanāmā rājāno, vajjīraṭṭhassa vā rājāno ^b^vajjirājāno.^eb^ Vajjiraṭṭhassa pana vajjisamaññā tannivāsirājakumāravasena veditabbā. ^b^Rājiddhiyā^eb^ti rājabhāvānugatena sabhāvena. So pana sabhāvo nesaṃ ^a^P2.0159^ea^ gaṇarājūnaṃ mitho sāmaggiyā loke pākaṭo, ciraṭṭhāyī ca ahosīti ^b^‘‘samaggabhāvaṃ kathesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Anu anu taṃsamaṅgino bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo, anubhāvo eva ^b^ānubhāvo,^eb^ patāpo, so pana nesaṃ patāpo hatthiassādivāhanasampattiyā, tattha ca susikkhitabhāvena loke pākaṭo jātoti ^b^‘‘etena…pe… kathesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tāḷacchiggalenā^eb^ti kuñcikāchiddena. ^b^Asana^eb^nti saraṃ. ^b^Atipātayissantī^eb^ti atikkāmenti. ^b^Poṅkhānupoṅkha^eb^nti poṅkhassa anupoṅkhaṃ, purimasarassa poṅkhapadānugatapoṅkhaṃ itaraṃ saraṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Avirādhita^eb^nti avirajjhitaṃ. ^b^Ucchindissāmī^eb^ti ummūlanavasena kulasantatiṃ chindissāmi. Ayanaṃ ^a^V2.0109^ea^ vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^ayo,^eb^ tappaṭikkhepena ^b^anayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘avaḍḍhiyā etaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vikkhipatī^eb^ti vidūrato khipati, apanetīti attho.

[03]^b^Gaṅgāya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0123^ea^ gaṅgāsamīpe. ^b^Paṭṭanagāma^eb^nti sakaṭapaṭṭanagāmaṃ. ^b^Āṇā^eb^ti āṇā vattati. ^b^Aḍḍhayojana^eb^nti ca tasmiṃ paṭṭane aḍḍhayojanaṭṭhānavāsino sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭṭane. ^b^Balavāghātajāto^eb^ti uppannabalavakodho.
[03]^b^Me^eb^ti mayhaṃ. ^b^Gatenā^eb^ti gamanena.

[03]^b^134^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā natthi,^eb^ tāyaṃ velāyaṃ puññānubhāvena buddhānaṃ sabbakālaṃ samasītuṇhāva utu hoti, taṃ sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā^eb^ti niccasannipātā, taṃ pana niccasannipātataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘divasassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sannipātabahulā^eb^ti pacurasannipātā. ^b^Vosāna^eb^nti saṅkocaṃ. ^b^‘‘Yāvakīva’’^eb^nti ekamevetaṃ padaṃ aniyamato parimāṇavācī, kālo cettha adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘yattakaṃ kāla’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Vuddhiyevā’’tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena ^a^P2.0160^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhiṇhaṃ asannipatantā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ākulā^eb^ti khubhitā, na pasannā. ^b^Bhijjitvā^eb^ti vaggabandhato vibhajja visuṃ visuṃ hutvā.
[03]^b^Sannipātabheriyā^eb^ti sannipātārocanabheriyā. ^b^Aḍḍhabhuttā vā^eb^ti sāmibhuttā ca. ^b^Osīdamāne^eb^ti hāyamāne.

[03]^b^Pubbe akata^eb^nti pubbe anibbattaṃ. ^b^Suṅka^eb^nti bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā gacchantehi pabbatakhaṇḍa nadītitthagāmadvārādīsu rājapurisānaṃ dātabbabhāgaṃ. ^b^Bali^eb^nti nipphannasassādito chabhāgaṃ, sattabhāgantiādinā laddhakaraṃ. ^b^Daṇḍa^eb^nti dasavīsatikahāpaṇādikaṃ aparādhānurūpaṃ gahetabbadhanadaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Vajjidhamma^eb^nti vajjirājadhammaṃ. Idāni apaññattapaññāpanādīsu tappaṭikkhepa ādīnavānisaṃse vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ apaññatta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pāricariyakkhamā^eb^ti upaṭṭhānakkhamā.

[03]Kulabhogaissariyādivasena mahatī mattā pamāṇaṃ etesanti ^b^mahāmattā,^eb^ nītisatthavihite vinicchaye ^a^V2.0110^ea^ ṭhapitā mahāmattā ^b^vinicchayamahāmattā,^eb^ tesaṃ. ^b^Dentī^eb^ti niyyātenti. ^b^Sace coro^eb^ti evaṃsaññino sace honti. Pāpabhīrutāya ^b^attanā kiñci avatvā.^eb^ Daṇḍanītisaññite vohāre niyuttāti ^b^vohārikā,^eb^ ye ‘‘dhammaṭṭhā’’ti vuccanti. ^b^Suttadharā^eb^ nītisuttadharā ^a^M2.0124^ea^, īdise vohāravinicchaye niyametvā ṭhapitā. Paramparābhatesu aṭṭhasu kulesu jātā agatigamanaviratā aṭṭhamahallakapurisā ^b^aṭṭhakulikā.^eb^

[03]^b^Sakkāra^eb^nti upakāraṃ. ^b^Garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti ‘‘ime amhākaṃ garuno’’ti tattha garubhāvaṃ pati pati upaṭṭhapetvā. ^b^Mānentī^eb^ti sammānenti, taṃ pana sammānanaṃ tesu nesaṃ attamanatāpubbakanti āha ^b^‘‘manena piyāyantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nipaccakāra^eb^nti paṇipātaṃ. ^b^Dassentī^eb^ti ‘‘ime amhākaṃ pitāmahā ^a^P2.0161^ea^, mātāmahā’’tiādinā nīcacittā hutvā garucittākāraṃ dassenti. ^b^Sandhāretu^eb^nti sambandhaṃ avicchinnaṃ katvā ghaṭetuṃ.

[03]^b^Pasayhākārassā^eb^ti balakkārassa. Kāmaṃ vuddhiyā pūjanīyatāya ‘‘vuddhihāniyo’’ti vuttaṃ, attho pana vuttānukkameneva yojetabbo, pāḷiyaṃ vā yasmā ‘‘vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī’’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tadanukkamena ^b^‘‘vuddhihāniyo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Vipaccituṃ aladdhokāse pāpakamme, tassa kammassa vipāke vā anavasarova devatopasaggo, tasmiṃ pana laddhokāse siyā devatopasaggassa avasaroti āha ^b^‘‘anuppannaṃ…pe… vaḍḍhentī’’^eb^ti. Eteneva ^b^anuppannaṃ sukha^eb^nti etthāpi attho veditabbo. ‘‘Balakāyassa diguṇatiguṇatādassanaṃ, paṭibhayabhāvadassana’’nti evaṃ ādinā devatānaṃ saṅgāmasīse sahāyatā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Anicchita^eb^nti aniṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Āvaraṇato^eb^ti nisedhanato. Yassa dhammato anapetā dhammiyāti idha ^b^‘‘dhammikā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Migasūkarādighātāya sunakhādīnaṃ kaḍḍhitvā vanacaraṇaṃ ^b^vājo,^eb^ migavā, tattha niyuttā, te vā vājenti nentīti ^b^vājikā,^eb^ migavadhacārino. ^b^Cittappavattiṃ pucchati.^eb^ Kāyikavācasikapayogena hi sā loke pākaṭā pakāsabhūtāti.
[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^ Devāyatanabhāvena citattā, lokassa cittīkāraṭṭhānattā ca ^b^cetiyaṃ ahosi.^eb^

[03]Kāmaṃkāravasena kiñcipi na karaṇīyāti ^b^akaraṇīyā.^eb^ Kāmaṃkāro pana hatthagatakaraṇavasenāti ^a^V2.0111^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘aggahetabbāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhimukhayuddhenā^eb^ti abhimukhaṃ ujukameva saṅgāmakaraṇena. Upalāpanaṃ ^a^M2.0125^ea^ sāmaṃ dānañcāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ala’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Bhedopi idha upāyo evāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aññatra mithubhedāyā’’^eb^ti. Yuddhassa pana anupāyatā ^a^P2.0162^ea^ pageva pakāsitā. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘aññatra upalāpanāya, aññatra mithubhedā’’ti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Kathāya nayaṃ labhitvā^eb^ti ‘‘yāvakīvañca…pe… no parihānī’’ti imāya bhagavato kathāya nayaṃ upāyaṃ labhitvā.
[03]^b^Anukampāyā^eb^ti vajjirājesu anuggahena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato.
[03]^b^Katha^eb^nti vajjīhi saddhiṃ kātabbayuddhakathaṃ. ^b^Ujuṃ karissāmī^eb^ti paṭirājāno ānetvā pākāraparikhānaṃ aññathābhāvāpādanena ujubhāvaṃ karissāmi.

[03]^b^Patiṭṭhitaguṇo^eb^ti patiṭṭhitācariyaguṇo. ^b^Issarā sannipatantu,^eb^ mayaṃ anissarā, tattha gantvā kiṃ karissāmāti ^b^licchavino na sannipatiṃsū^eb^ti yojanā. ^b^Sūrā sannipatantū^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^Balabheri^eb^nti yuddhāya balakāyassa uṭṭhānabheriṃ.

[03]^b^136^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aparihānāya hitāti ^b^aparihāniyā,^eb^ na parihāyanti etehīti vā ^b^aparihāniyā,^eb^ te pana yasmā aparihāniyā kārakā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aparihānikare’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana te parihānikarānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhūtā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘vuddhihetubhūte’’^eb^ti. Yasmā bhagavato desanā uparūpari ñāṇālokaṃ pasādentī sattānaṃ hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamati, pakāsetabbe ca atthe hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭe katvā dasseti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘candasahassaṃ…pe… kathayissāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yasmā bhagavā ‘‘tassa brāhmaṇassa sammukhā vajjīnaṃ abhiṇhasannipātādipaṭipattiṃ kathentoyeva ayaṃ aparihāniyakathā aniyyānikā vaṭṭanissitā, mayhaṃ pana sāsane tathārūpī kathā kathetabbā, sā hoti niyyānikā vivaṭṭanissitā, yāya sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ parinibbānato parampi ^a^V2.0112^ea^ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika’’nti cintesi, tasmā bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā tesaṃ aparihāniye dhamme desento teneva niyāmena desesi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ vajjisattake vuttasadisamevā’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ ^a^M2.0126^ea^ vitthārato dassento ^b^‘‘idhāpi cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^‘‘tato’’^eb^tiādi ^a^P2.0163^ea^ disāsu āgatasāsane vuttaṃ taṃ kathanaṃ. Vihārasīmā ākulā yasmā, tasmā ^b^uposathapavāraṇā ṭhitā.^eb^
[03]^b^Olīyamānako^eb^ti pāḷito, atthato ca vinassamāno. ^b^Ukkhipāpentā^eb^ti paguṇabhāvakaraṇena, atthasaṃvaṇṇanena ca paggaṇhantā.

[03]^b^Sāvatthiyaṃ bhikkhū viya^eb^ pācittiyaṃ desāpetabboti (pārā. 565 vitthāravatthu). ^b^Vajjiputtakā viya^eb^ dasavatthudīpanena (cūḷava. 446 vitthāravatthu). ^b^‘‘Gihigatānī^eb^ti gihipaṭisaṃyuttānī’’ti vadanti. Gihīsu gatāni, tehi ñātāni ^b^gihigatāni.^eb^ Dhūmakālo etassāti ^b^dhūmakālikaṃ^eb^ citakadhūmavūpasamato paraṃ appavattanato.

[03]^b^Thirabhāvappattā^eb^ti sāsane thirabhāvaṃ anivattitabhāvaṃ upagatā. ^b^Therakārakehī^eb^ti therabhāvasādhakehi sīlādiguṇehi asekkhadhammehi. ^b^Bahū rattiyo^eb^ti pabbajitā hutvā bahū rattiyo ^b^jānanti.^eb^ Sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpanameva sāsane pariṇāyakatāti āha ^b^‘‘tīsu sikkhāsu pavattentī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ovādaṃ na denti^eb^ abhājanabhāvato. ^b^Paveṇīkatha^eb^nti ācariyaparamparābhataṃ sammāpaṭipattidīpanaṃ dhammakathaṃ. ^b^Sārabhūtaṃ dhammapariyāya^eb^nti samathavipassanāmaggaphalasampāpanena sārabhūtaṃ bojjhaṅgakosallānuttarasītībhāvādhicittasuttādidhammatantiṃ.
[03]^b^Punabbhavadānaṃ punabbhavo^eb^ uttarapadalopena. ^b^Itare^eb^ti ye na paccayavasikā na āmisacakkhukā, te ^b^na gacchanti^eb^ taṇhāya vasaṃ.

[03]^b^Āraññakesū^eb^ti araññabhāgesu araññapariyāpannesu. Nanu yattha katthacipi taṇhā sāvajjā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘gāmantasenāsanesu hī’’^eb^tiādi, tena ‘‘anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato’’ti ettha vuttasinehādayo viya āraññakesu senāsanesu sālayatā sevitabbapakkhiyā evāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Attanāvā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0164^ea^^a^V2.0113^ea^ sayameva, tena parehi anussāhitānaṃ saraseneva anāgatānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ, āgatānañca phāsuvihāraṃ paccāsisantīti dasseti. ^b^Iminā nīhārenā^eb^ti imāya paṭipattiyā. ^b^Aggahitadhammaggahaṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0127^ea^ aggahitassa pariyattidhammassa uggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Gahitasajjhāyakaraṇa^eb^nti uggahitassa suṭṭhu atthacintanaṃ. Cintanattho hi ^b^sajjhāyasaddo.^eb^
[03]^b^Entī^eb^ti upagacchanti. ^b^Nisīdanti^eb^ āsanapaññāpanādinā.

[03]^b^137^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āramitabbaṭṭhena ^b^kammaṃ ārāmo. Kamme ratā,^eb^ na ganthadhure, vāsadhure vāti ^b^kammaratā, anuyuttā^eb^ti tapparabhāvena punappunaṃ pasutā. ^b^Iti kātabbakamma^eb^nti taṃ taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kātabbaṃ uccāvacakammaṃ cīvaravicāraṇādi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘seyyathida’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Upatthambhana^eb^nti dupaṭṭatipaṭṭādikaraṇaṃ. Tañhi paṭhamapaṭalādīnaṃ upatthambhanakāraṇattā tathā vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ ayaṃ kammarāmatā paṭikkhittāti āha ^b^‘‘ekacco hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Karonto yevā^eb^ti yathāvuttatiracchānakathaṃ kathentoyeva. Atiracchānakathābhāvepi tassa tattha tapparabhāvadassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Pariyantakārī^eb^ti sapariyantaṃ katvā vattā. ‘‘Pariyantavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.9, 194) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Appabhasso vā^eb^ti parimitakathoyeva ekantena kathetabbasseva kathanato. Samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ ^b^ariyo tuṇhībhāvo.^eb^
[03]^b^Niddāyatiyevā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0165^ea^ niddokkamane anādīnavadassī niddāyatiyeva. Iriyāpathaparivattanādinā na naṃ vinodeti.
[03]^b^Evaṃ saṃsaṭṭho vā^eb^ti vuttanayena gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya saṃsaṭṭho eva ^b^viharati.^eb^
[03]^b^Dussīlā pāpicchā nāmā^eb^ti sayaṃ nissīlā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgatattā pāpā lāmakā icchā etesanti pāpicchā.
[03]Pāpapuggalehi mettikaraṇato ^b^pāpamittā.^eb^ Tehi sadā saha pavattanena ^b^pāpasahāyā.^eb^ Tattha ninnatādinā tadadhimuttatāya ^b^pāpasampavaṅkā.^eb^

[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saddhā etesaṃ atthīti ^b^saddhā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘saddhāsampannā’’^eb^ti. Āgamanīyapaṭipadāya āgatasaddhā ^a^V2.0114^ea^^b^āgamanīyasaddhā,^eb^ sā sātisayā mahābodhisattānaṃ paropadesena vinā saddheyyavatthuṃ aviparītato ogāhetvā ^a^M2.0128^ea^ adhimuccanatoti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Saccapaṭivedhato āgatasaddhā ^b^adhigamasaddhā^eb^ surabandhādīnaṃ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.118; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.suppabuddhakuṭṭhivatthu; udā. aṭṭha. 43) viya. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho bhagavā’’tiādinā buddhādīsu uppajjanakapasādo ^b^pasādasaddhā^eb^ mahākappinarājādīnaṃ (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.231; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1ṃahākappinattheravatthu; theragā. aṭṭha. 2ṃahākappinattheragāthāvaṇṇanā, vitthāro) viya. ‘‘Evameta’’nti okkantitvā pakkhanditvā saddahanavasena kappanaṃ ^b^okappanaṃ. Duvidhāpī^eb^ti pasādasaddhāpi okappanasaddhāpi. Tattha pasādasaddhā aparaneyyarūpā hoti savanamattena pasīdanato. Okappanasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā ‘‘evameta’’nti paccakkhaṃ karontī viya pavattati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saddhādhimutto vakkalittherasadiso hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassa hī^eb^ti okappanasaddhāya samannāgatassa. Hirī etassa atthīti ^b^hiri,^eb^ hiri mano etesanti ^b^hirimanā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pāpa…pe… cittā’’^eb^ti. Pāpato ottappenti ubbijjanti bhāyantīti ^b^ottappī.^eb^

[03]Bahu sutaṃ suttageyyādi etenāti ^b^bahussuto,^eb^ sutaggahaṇaṃ cettha nidassanamattaṃ dhāraṇaparicayaparipucchānupekkhanadiṭṭhinijjhānānaṃ ^a^P2.0166^ea^ pettha icchitabbattā. Savanamūlakattā vā tesampi taggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atthakāmena pariyāpuṇitabbato, diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthasiddhiyā pariyattabhāvato ca ^b^pariyatti,^eb^ tīṇi piṭakāni. ^b^Saccappaṭivedho^eb^ saccānaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ. Tadapi bāhusaccaṃ yathāvuttabāhusaccakiccanipphattito. ^b^Pariyatti adhippetā^eb^ saccapaṭivedhāvahena bāhusaccena bahussutabhāvassa idha icchitattā. ^b^So^eb^ti pariyattibahussuto. ^b^Catubbidho hoti^eb^ pañcamassa pakārassa abhāvato. ^b^Sabbatthakabahussuto^eb^ti nissayamuccanakabahussutādayo viya padesiko ahutvā piṭakattaye sabbatthakameva bāhusaccasabbhāvato sabbassa atthassa kāyanato kathanato sabbatthakabahussuto. ^b^Te idha adhippetā^eb^ paṭipattipaṭivedhasaddhammānaṃ mūlabhūte pariyattisaddhamme suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
[03]^b^Āraddha^eb^nti paggahitaṃ. Taṃ pana duvidhampi vīriyārambhavibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ekakā^eb^ti ekākino, vūpakaṭṭhavihārinoti attho.

[03]^b^Pucchitvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0129^ea^ parato pucchitvā. ^b^Sampaṭicchāpetu^eb^nti ‘‘tvaṃ asukanāmo’’ti vatvā tehi ‘‘āmā’’ti paṭijānāpetunti attho. Evaṃ cirakatādianussaraṇasamatthasatinepakkānaṃ appakasireneva ^a^V2.0115^ea^ satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘evarūpe bhikkhū sandhāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ‘‘apicā’’tiādi.

[03]^b^139^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bujjhati etāyāti ‘‘bodhī’’ti laddhanāmāya sammādiṭṭhiādidhammasāmaggiyā aṅgoti ^b^bojjhaṅgo,^eb^ pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo ^b^sambojjhaṅgo. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo^eb^ti kāyavedanācittadhammānaṃ asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvasallakkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo. Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pīḷanādippakārato vicayo upaparikkhā lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^pavicayalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Anuppannā kusalānuppādanādivasena cittassa ^a^P2.0167^ea^ paggaho paggaṇhanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^paggahalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Pharaṇaṃ vipphārikatā lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^pharaṇalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Upasamo kāyacittapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^upasamalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Avikkhepo vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^avikkhepalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte pavattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭattā ajjhupekkhanaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo.^eb^

[03]^b^Catūhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti satisampajaññaṃ, muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanā, upaṭṭhitassatipuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Chahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti paripucchakatā, vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā, duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā, paññavantapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi chahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘sattahi kāraṇehī’’ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.385; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.118) vakkhati, taṃ gambhīrañāṇacariyāpaccavekkhaṇāti imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā veditabbaṃ. ^b^Navahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇā, gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇā, piṇḍapātassa apacāyanatā, dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇā, satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā, sabrahmacārīmahattapaccavekkhaṇā, kusītapuggalaparivajjanā, āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi navahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.385; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.118) pana ^a^M2.0130^ea^ ānisaṃsadassāvitā, jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti imehi saddhiṃ ‘‘ekādasā’’ti vakkhati. ^b^Dasahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghasīlacāgadevatāupasamānussati, lūkhapuggalaparivajjanā, siniddhapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi dasahi. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.385; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.118) pana pasādaniyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya saddhiṃ ‘‘ekādasā’’ti vakkhati. ^b^Sattahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti paṇītabhojanasevanatā ^a^P2.0168^ea^, utusukhasevanatā, iriyāpathasukhasevanatā, majjhattapayogatā, sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanatā ^a^V2.0116^ea^, passaddhakāyapuggalasevanatā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi sattahi. ^b^Dasahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā, nimittakusalatā, samaye cittassa paggahaṇaṃ, samaye cittassa niggahaṇaṃ, samaye cittassa sampahaṃsanaṃ, samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ, asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanaṃ, samāhitapuggalasevanaṃ, tadadhimuttatāti imehi dasahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.385; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.118) pana ‘‘jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇā’’ti iminā saddhiṃ ‘‘ekādasahī’’ti vakkhati. ^b^Pañcahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā, sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanā, sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imehi pañcahi kāraṇehi. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^mahāsatipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.385; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.118) āgamissati. Kāmaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā nāma nippariyāyato ariyamaggasampayuttā eva niyyānikabhāvato. Suttantadesanā nāma pariyāyakathāti ^b^‘‘iminā vipassanā…pe… kathesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tebhūmake saṅkhāre ‘‘aniccā’’ti anupassati etāyāti ^b^aniccānupassanā,^eb^ tathā pavattā vipassanā, sā pana yasmā attanā sahagatasaññāya bhāvitāya vibhāvitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aniccānupassanāya saddhiṃ uppannasaññā’’^eb^ti. Saññāsīsena vāyaṃ vipassanāya eva niddeso. ^b^Anattasaññādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Lokiyavipassanāpi honti,^eb^ yasmā ‘‘anicca’’ntiādinā tā pavattantīti. ^b^Lokiyavipassanāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena missakāpettha santīti atthato āpannanti atthāpattisiddhamatthaṃ niddhāretvā sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘virāgo’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^āgatavasenā^eb^ti tathā āgatapāḷivasena ‘‘virāgo nirodho’’ti hi tattha ^a^M2.0131^ea^ nibbānaṃ vuttanti idha ^a^P2.0169^ea^ ‘‘virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññā’’ti vuttasaññā nibbānārammaṇāpi siyuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve lokuttarāpi hontī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^141^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mettā etassa atthīti ^b^mettaṃ,^eb^ cittaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammaṃ ^b^mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ.^eb^ Esa nayo sesadvayepi. Imānipi mettākāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni tesaṃ seṭṭhaparisabhāvato. Yathā pana bhikkhūsupi labbhanti, evaṃ gihīsupi labbhanti catuparisasādhāraṇattāti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhikkhūnañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāmaṃ ādibrahmacariyakadhammassavanenapi mettākāyakammāni labbhanti, nippariyāyato pana cārittadhammassavanena ayamattho icchitoti dassento ^b^‘‘ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇa’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ^eb^ paripucchanātthakathanavasena pavattiyamānaṃ hitajjhāsayena pavattitabbato.

[03]^b^Āvī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0117^ea^ pakāsaṃ, pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa sammukhabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘sammukhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Raho^eb^ti appakāsaṃ, appakāsatā ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa paccakkhābhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘parammukhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ purato. ^b^Ubhayehī^eb^ti navakehi, therehi ca.
[03]^b^Paggayhā^eb^ti paggaṇhitvā uccaṃ katvā.

[03]Kāmaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanā, pasannena mukhena olokanañca mettaṃ kāyakammameva, yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā, mukhassa ca pasannatā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Lābhasaddo kammasādhano ‘‘lābhāvata, lābho laddho’’tiādīsu viya, so cettha ‘‘dhammaladdhā’’ti vacanato atītakālikoti āha ^b^‘‘cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā’’^eb^ti. Dhammato ^a^P2.0170^ea^ āgatāti ^b^dhammikā.^eb^ Tenāha ‘‘dhammaladdhā’’ti. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kuhanādī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Cittena vibhajanapubbakaṃ kāyena vibhajananti mūlameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ cittena vibhajana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, tena cittuppādamattenapi paṭivibhāgo na kātabboti dasseti. ^b^Appaṭivibhatta^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, appaṭivibhattaṃ vā lābhaṃ bhuñjatīti kammaniddeso eva.

[03]^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^M2.0132^ea^^b^taṃ neva gihīnaṃ deti^eb^ attano ājīvasodhanatthaṃ. ^b^Na attanā bhuñjatī^eb^ti attanāva na paribhuñjati ‘‘mayhaṃ asādhāraṇabhogitā mā hotū’’ti. ^b^‘‘Paṭiggaṇhanto ca…pe… passatī’’^eb^ti iminā tassa lābhassa tīsupi kālesu sādhāraṇato ṭhapanaṃ dassitaṃ. ^b^‘‘Paṭiggaṇhanto ca saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotū’’^eb^ti iminā paṭiggahaṇakālo dassito, ^b^‘‘gahetvā…pe… passatī’’^eb^ti iminā paṭiggahitakālo, tadubhayaṃ pana tādisena pubbābhogena vinā na hotīti atthasiddho purimakālo. Tayidaṃ paṭiggahaṇato pubbe vassa hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggahessāmī’’ti. Paṭiggaṇhantassa hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhāmī’’ti. Paṭiggahetvā hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggahitaṃ mayā’’ti evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ katvā laddhalābhaṃ osānalakkhaṇaṃ avikopetvā paribhuñjanto sādhāraṇabhogī, appaṭivibhattabhogī ca hoti.

[03]^b^Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhamma^eb^nti imaṃ catutthaṃ saritabbayuttadhammaṃ. ^b^Na hi…pe… gaṇhanti,^eb^ tasmā ^a^V2.0118^ea^ sādhāraṇabhogitā eva dussīlassa natthīti ārambhopi tāva na sambhavati, kuto pūraṇanti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Parisuddhasīlo’’^eb^ti iminā lābhassa dhammikabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^‘‘Vattaṃ akhaṇḍento’’^eb^ti iminā appaṭivibhattabhogitaṃ, sādhāraṇabhogitañca dasseti. Sati pana tadubhaye sāraṇīyadhammo pūrito eva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pūretī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Odissakaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0171^ea^^b^katvā’’^eb^ti etena anodissakaṃ katvā pituno, ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā therāsanato paṭṭhāya dentassa sāraṇīyadhammoyeva hotīti. ^b^Sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hotī^eb^ti paṭijagganaṭṭhāne odissakaṃ katvā dinnattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hotī’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi evaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassa odissakadānaṃ na vaṭṭatīti? No na vaṭṭati yuttaṭṭhāneti dassento ^b^‘‘tena panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Gilānādīnaṃ odissakaṃ katvā dānaṃ appaṭivibhāgapakkhikaṃ ‘‘asukassa na dassāmī’’ti paṭikkhepassa abhāvato. Byatirekappadhāno hi paṭivibhāgo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avasesa’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Adātumpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena dātumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti, tañca kho karuṇāyanavasena, na vattapūraṇavasena.

[03]^b^Susikkhitāyā^eb^ti sāraṇīyadhammapūraṇavidhimhi suṭṭhu sikkhitāya, sukusalāyāti attho. Idāni tassā kosallaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘susikkhitāya hī’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0133^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Dvādasahi vassehi pūrati, na tato ora’’^eb^nti iminā tassa duppūraṇaṃ dasseti. Tathā hi so mahapphalo mahānisaṃso, diṭṭhadhammikehipi tāva garutarehi phalānisaṃsehi ca anugato. Taṃsamaṅgī ca puggalo visesalābhī ariyapuggalo viya loke acchariyabbhutadhammasamannāgato hoti. Tathā hi so duppajahaṃ dānamayassa, sīlamayassa ca puññassa paṭipakkhadhammaṃ sudūre vikkhambhitaṃ katvā suvisuddhena cetasā loke pākaṭo paññāto hutvā viharati, tassimamatthaṃ byatirekato, anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]Idāni ye samparāyike, diṭṭhadhammike ca ānisaṃse dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Neva issā, na macchariyaṃ hoti^eb^ cirakālabhāvanāya vidhutabhāvato. ^b^Manussānaṃ piyo hoti^eb^ pariccāgasīlatāya visuddhattā. Tenāha ‘‘dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū’’tiādi ^a^P2.0172^ea^ (a. ni. 5.34). ^b^Sulabhapaccayo hoti^eb^ dānavasena uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ paccayalābhassa idhānisaṃsabhāvato dānassa. ^b^Pattagataṃ assa diyyamānaṃ^eb^^b^na khīyati^eb^ pattagatavasena dvādasavassikassa mahāpattassa avicchedena pūritattā. ^b^Aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati^eb^ devasikaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggato paṭṭhāya dānassa dinnattā. ^b^Bhayevā…pe… āpajjanti^eb^ deyyapaṭiggāhakavikappaṃ ^a^V2.0119^ea^ akatvā attani nirapekkhacittena cirakālaṃ dānapūratāya pasāditacittattā.

[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tesu ānisaṃsesu vibhāvetabbesu. ^b^Imāni^eb^ taṃ dīpanāni ^b^vatthūni^eb^ kāraṇāni. ^b^Alabhantāpī^eb^ti amahāpuññatāya na lābhino samānāpi. ^b^Bhikkhācāramaggasabhāga^eb^nti sabhāgaṃ tabbhāgiyaṃ bhikkhācāramaggaṃ ^b^jānanti.^eb^

[03]Anuttarimanussadhammattā, therānaṃ saṃsayavinodanatthañca ^b^‘‘sāraṇīyadhammo me bhante pūrito’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā hi dutiyavatthusmimpi therena attā pakāsito. Manussānaṃ piyatāya, sulabhapaccayatāyapi idaṃ vatthumeva. Pattagatākhīyanassa pana visesaṃ vibhāvanato ^b^‘‘idaṃ tāva…pe… ettha vatthu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0134^ea^ cetiyagirimhi sakalalaṅkādīpe, yojanappamāṇe samudde ca nāvāsaṅghāṭādike ṭhapetvā dīpapupphagandhādīhi kariyamānamahāpūjāyaṃ. ^b^Pariyāyenapī^eb^ti lesenapi. ^b^Anucchavika^eb^nti sāraṇīyadhammapūraṇatopi ^b^idaṃ^eb^ yathābhūtappavedanaṃ ^b^tumhākaṃ anucchavika^eb^nti attho.
[03]^b^Anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu^eb^ corabhayena. ‘‘Attano dujjīvikāyā’’ti ca vadanti.
[03]^b^Vaṭṭissatī^eb^ti kappissati. ^b^Therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi,^eb^ therassa pana sīlatejeneva devatā ussukkaṃ āpajji.

[03]Natthi ^a^P2.0173^ea^ etesaṃ khaṇḍanti ^b^akhaṇḍāni.^eb^ Taṃ pana nesaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha upasampannasīlānaṃ uddesakkamena ādi antā veditabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattasū’’^eb^tiādi. Anupasampannasīlānaṃ pana samādānakkamenapi ādi antā labbhanti. ^b^Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyā^eb^ti vatthante, dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya, visadisūdāharaṇaṃ cetaṃ ‘‘akhaṇḍānī’’ti imassa adhigatattā. Evaṃ sesānipi udāharaṇāni. Khaṇḍitabhinnatā khaṇḍaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti ^b^khaṇḍaṃ,^eb^ sīlaṃ. ^b^‘‘Chidda’’^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Vemajjhe bhinnaṃ^eb^ vinivijjhanavasena visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. Sabalarahitāni ^b^asabalāni.^eb^ Tathā ^b^akammāsāni.^eb^ Sīlassa ^b^taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṃ^eb^ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ. Yasmā ca taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti, tasmāpi bhujissāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘bhujissabhāvakāraṇato^eb^^a^V2.0120^ea^^b^bhujissānī’’^eb^ti. Suparisuddhabhāvena pāsaṃsattā ^b^viññupasatthāni.^eb^ Imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṃ, devaññataro vā, tattha ‘‘nicco dhuvo sassato’’ti, ‘‘sīlena suddhī’’ti ca evaṃ ādinā ^b^taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā.^eb^ ‘‘Ayaṃ te sīlesu doso’’ti catūsupi vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena ^b^parāmaṭṭhuṃ^eb^ anuddhaṃsetuṃ. Samādhisaṃvattanappayojanāni ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikāni.^eb^

[03]^b^Samānabhāvūpagatasīlā^eb^ti sīlasampattiyā samānabhāvaṃ upagatasīlā sabhāgavuttikā. Kāmaṃ puthujjanānañca catupārisuddhisīle nānattaṃ na siyā, taṃ ^a^M2.0135^ea^ pana na ekantikaṃ, idaṃ ekantikaṃ niyatabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘natthi maggasīle nānatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vutta^eb^nti maggasīlaṃ sandhāya etaṃ ‘‘yāni tāni sīlānī’’tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Yāya^eb^nti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā ^a^P2.0174^ea^. ^b^Diṭṭhī^eb^ti maggasammādiṭṭhi. ^b^Niddosā^eb^ti nidhutadosā, samucchinnarāgādipāpadhammāti attho. ^b^Niyyātī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato nissarati nigacchati. Sayaṃ niyyantasseva hi ‘‘taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetī’’ti vuccati. Yā satthu anusiṭṭhi, taṃ karotīti ^b^takkaro,^eb^ tassa, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanakassāti attho. ^b^Samānadiṭṭhibhāva^eb^nti sadisadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ saccasampaṭivedhena abhinnadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ. ^b^Vuddhiyevā^eb^ti ariyavinaye guṇehi vuḍḍhiyeva, no parihānīti ayaṃ aparihāniyadhammadesanā attanopi sāsanassa addhaniyataṃ ākaṅkhantena bhagavatā idha desitā.

[03]^b^142^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āsannaparinibbānattā^eb^ti katipayamāsādhikena saṃvaccharamattena parinibbānaṃ bhavissatīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Etaṃyevā^eb^ti ‘‘iti sīla’’ntiādikaṃyeva ^b^iti sīla^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho, parimāṇattho ca ekajjhaṃ katvā gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ sīlaṃ ettakaṃ sīla’’^eb^nti. ^b^Evaṃ sīla^eb^nti evaṃ pabhedaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^Ettaka^eb^nti etaṃ paramaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. ^b^Catupārisuddhisīla^eb^nti maggassa sambhārabhūtaṃ lokiyacatupārisuddhisīlaṃ. ^b^Cittekaggatā samādhī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Yasmiṃ sīle ṭhatvā^eb^ti yasmiṃ lokuttarakusalassa padaṭṭhānabhūte ‘‘pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.431; kathā. 874) evaṃ vuttasīle patiṭṭhāya. ^b^Eso^eb^ti maggaphalasamādhi. ^b^Paribhāvito^eb^ti tena sīlena sabbaso bhāvito sambhāvito. ^b^Mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso^eb^ti maggasamādhi tāva sāmaññaphalehi mahapphalo, vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamena mahānisaṃso. Itaro paṭippassaddhippahānena mahapphalo, nibbutisukhuppattiyā mahānisaṃso. ^b^Yamhi samādhimhi^eb^^a^P2.0175^ea^^b^ṭhatvā^eb^ti yasmiṃ lokuttarakusalassa ^a^V2.0121^ea^ padaṭṭhānabhūte pādakajjhānasamādhimhi ceva vuṭṭhānagāminisamādhimhi ca ṭhatvā. ^b^Sā^eb^ti maggaphalapaññā. ^b^Tena paribhāvitā^eb^ti tena yathāvuttasamādhinā sabbaso bhāvitā paribhāvitā. Mahapphalamahānisaṃsatā samādhimhi vuttanayena veditabbā. Api ca te bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgappabhedahetutāya ^b^mahapphalā^eb^ sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggalavibhāgahetutāya ^a^M2.0136^ea^^b^mahānisaṃsā^eb^ti veditabbā. ^b^Yāya paññāya ṭhatvā^eb^ti yāyaṃ vipassanāpaññāyaṃ, samādhivipassanāpaññāyaṃ vā ṭhatvā. Samathayānikassa hi samādhisahagatāpi paññā maggādhigamāya visesapaccayo hotiyeva. ^b^Sammadevā^eb^ti suṭṭhuyeva yathā āsavānaṃ lesopi nāvasissati, evaṃ sabbaso ^b^āsavehi vimuccati^eb^. Aggamaggakkhaṇañhi sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^143^eb^^b^.^eb^ Lokiyatthasaddānaṃ viya abhiranta-saddassa siddhi daṭṭhabbā. Abhirantaṃ abhirataṃ abhiratīti hi atthato ekaṃ. Abhiranta-saddo cāyaṃ abhirucipariyāyo, na assādapariyāyo. Assādavasena hi katthaci vasantassa assādavatthuvigamena siyā tassa tattha anabhirati, yadidaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ natthi, pageva buddhānanti āha ^b^‘‘buddhānaṃ…pe… natthī’’^eb^ti. Abhirativasena katthaci vasitvā tadabhāvato aññattha gamanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ natthi. Veneyyavinayanatthaṃ pana katthaci vasitvā tasmiṃ siddhe veneyyavinayanatthameva tato aññattha gacchanti, ayamettha yathāruci. ^b^Āyāmā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ā^eb^-saddo ‘‘āgacchā’’ti iminā samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘ehi yāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayāmā^eb^ti pana pāṭhe ^b^a^eb^-kāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Santikāvacarattā theraṃ ālapati,^eb^ na pana tadā satthu santike vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvato. Aparicchinnagaṇano hi tadā bhagavato santike bhikkhusaṅgho ^a^P2.0176^ea^. Tenāha ‘‘mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhi’’nti. ^b^Ambalaṭṭhikāgamana^eb^nti ambalaṭṭhikāgamanapaṭisaṃyuttapāṭhamāha. ^b^Pāṭaligamane^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Uttānameva^eb^ anantaraṃ, heṭṭhā ca saṃvaṇṇitarūpattā.

[03]^b^145^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Āyasmā sāriputto’’tiādi^eb^ pāṭhajātaṃ. ^b^Sampasādanīye^eb^ti sampasādanīyasutte (dī. ni. 3.141) ^b^vitthāritaṃ^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā mayampi tattheva naṃ atthato vitthārayissāmāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āgantvā ^a^V2.0122^ea^ vasanti ettha āgantukāti ^b^āvasatho,^eb^ tadeva agāranti āha ^b^‘‘āvasathāgāranti āgantukānaṃ āvasathageha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dvinnaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0137^ea^^b^rājūna^eb^nti licchavirājamagadharājūnaṃ. ^b^Sahāyakā^eb^ti sevakā. ^b^Kulānī^eb^ti kuṭumbike. Santhatanti ^b^santhari,^eb^ sabbaṃ santhari sabbasanthari, taṃ ^b^sabbasanthariṃ.^eb^ Bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso cāyaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā sabbaṃ santhataṃ hoti, eva’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dussīlo^eb^ti ettha ^b^du^eb^-saddo abhāvattho ‘‘duppañño’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.449; a. ni. 5.10) viya, na garahatthoti āha ^b^‘‘asīlo nissīlo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhinnasaṃvaro^eb^ti ettha yo samādinnasīlo kenaci kāraṇena sīlabhedaṃ patto, so tāva bhinnasaṃvaro hoti. Yo pana sabbena sabbaṃ asamādinnasīlo ācārahīno, so kathaṃ bhinnasaṃvaro nāma hotīti? Sopi sādhusamācārassa parihāniyassa bheditattā bhinnasaṃvaro eva nāma. Vissaṭṭhasaṃvaro saṃvararahitoti hi vuttaṃ hoti.
[03]^b^Taṃ taṃ^eb^ sippaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Māghātakāle^eb^ti ‘‘mā ghātetha pāṇino’’ti evaṃ māghātāti ghosanaṃ ghositadivase.
[03]^b^Abbhuggacchati^eb^ pāpako kittisaddo.
[03]^b^Ajjhāsayena maṅku hotiyeva^eb^ vippaṭisāribhāvato.

[03]^b^Tassā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0177^ea^ dussīlassa. ^b^Samādāya pavattiṭṭhāna^eb^nti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya katakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Āpāthaṃ āgacchatī^eb^ti taṃ manaso upaṭṭhāti. ^b^Ummīletvā idhaloka^eb^nti ummīlanakāle attano puttadārādidassanavasena idha lokaṃ ^b^passati. Nimīletvā paraloka^eb^nti nimīlanakāle gatinimittupaṭṭhānavasena paralokaṃ ^b^passati.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘cattāro apāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pañcamapada^eb^nti ‘‘kāyassa bhedā’’tiādinā vutto pañcamo ādīnavakoṭṭhāso.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttavipariyāyenā^eb^ti vuttāya ādīnavakathāya vipariyāyena. ‘‘Appamatto taṃ taṃ kasivāṇijjādiṃ ^a^V2.0123^ea^ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ sakkotī’’tiādinā ‘‘pāsaṃsaṃ sīlamassa atthīti ^b^sīlavā. Sīlasampanno^eb^ti sīlena samannāgato. Sampannasīlo’’ti evamādikaṃ pana atthavacanaṃ sukaranti anāmaṭṭhaṃ.
[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāḷimuttakāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0138^ea^ saṅgītianāruḷhāya ^b^dhammikathāya. Tatthevā^eb^ti āvasathāgāre eva.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Issariyamattāyā^eb^ti issariyappamāṇena, issariyena ceva vittūpakaraṇena cāti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Upabhogūpakaraṇānipi hi loke ‘‘mattā’’ti vuccanti. ^b^Pāṭaligāmaṃ nagaraṃ katvā^eb^ti pubbe ‘‘pāṭaligāmo’’ti laddhanāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ idāni nagaraṃ katvā. ^b^Māpentī^eb^ti patiṭṭhāpenti. ^b^Āyamukhapacchindanattha^eb^nti āyadvārānaṃ upacchedanāya. ^b^‘‘Sahassasevā’’^eb^ti vā pāṭho, sahassaso eva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekekavaggavasena sahassaṃ sahassaṃ hutvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gharavatthūnī^eb^ti gharapatiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. ^b^Cittāni namantī^eb^ti taṃtaṃdevatānubhāvena tattha tattheva cittāni namanti vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ, yattha yattha tāhi vatthūni pariggahitāni. ^b^Sippānubhāvenā^eb^ti sippānugatavijjānubhāvena. ^b^Nāgaggāho^eb^ti nāgānaṃ nivāsappariggaho. Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Pāsāṇo^eb^ti appalakkhaṇapāsāṇo. ^b^Khāṇuko^eb^ti yo koci khāṇuko ^a^P2.0178^ea^. ^b^Sippaṃ jappitvā^eb^ tādisaṃ sārambhaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā anārambhe ṭhāne tāhi vatthupariggāhikāhi ^b^devatāhi saddhiṃ mantayamānā^eb^^b^viya^eb^ taṃtaṃgehāni ^b^māpenti^eb^ upadesadānavasena. ^b^Nesa^eb^nti vatthuvijjāpāṭhakānaṃ, sabbāsaṃ devatānaṃ. ^b^Maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhāpessantī^eb^ti maṅgalaṃ brūhessanti. Paṇḍitadassanādīni hi uttamamaṅgalāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atha maya’’^eb^ntiādi.
[03]^b^Saddo abbhuggacchati^eb^ avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato yathā ‘‘alaṅkato devadatto’’ti.

[03]^b^Ariyakamanussāna^eb^nti ariyadesavāsimanussānaṃ. ^b^Rāsivasenevā^eb^ti ‘‘sahassaṃ satasahassa’’ntiādinā rāsivaseneva, appakassa pana bhaṇḍassa kayavikkayo aññatthāpi labbhatevāti ‘‘rāsivasenevā’’ti vuttaṃ. Vāṇijāya patho pavattiṭṭhānanti ^b^vaṇippatho^eb^ti purimavikappe attho dutiyavikappe pana vāṇijānaṃ patho pavattiṭṭhānanti, ^b^vaṇippatho^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassento ^a^V2.0124^ea^^b^‘‘vāṇijānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti āha. Bhaṇḍapuṭe bhindanti mocenti etthāti ^b^puṭabhedana^eb^nti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘bhaṇḍapuṭe…pe… vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Ca-kārattho^eb^^a^M2.0139^ea^ samuccayattho ^b^vā-saddo.^eb^

[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāḷakaṇṇī sattā^eb^ti attanā kaṇhadhammabahulatāya paresañca kaṇhavipākānatthanibbattinimittatāya ‘‘kāḷakaṇṇī’’ti laddhanāmā parūpaddavakarā appesakkhasattā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ. ^b^Pubbaṇhasamaya^eb^nti pubbaṇhe ekaṃ samayaṃ. ^b^Gāmappavisananīhārenā^eb^ti gāmappavesana nivasanākārena. ^b^Kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā^eb^ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā, pattaṃ hatthena gahetvāti attho.
[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0179^ea^ etasmiṃ vā sakappitappadese. ^b^Saññate^eb^ti sammadeva saññate susaṃvutakāyavācācitte.

[03]^b^Pattiṃ dadeyyā^eb^ti attanā pasutaṃ puññaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ anuppadajjeyya. ^b^‘‘Pūjitā’’^eb^tiādīsu tadeva pattidānaṃ ^b^pūjā,^eb^ anāgate eva upaddave ārakkhasaṃvidhānaṃ ^b^paṭipūjā.^eb^ ‘‘Yebhuyyena ñātimanussā ñātipetānaṃ pattidānādinā pūjanamānanādīni karonti ime pana aññātakāpi samānā tathā karonti, tasmā nesaṃ sakkaccaṃ ārakkhā saṃvidhātabbā’’ti aññamaññaṃ sampavāretvā devatā tattha ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti dassento ^b^‘‘ime’’^eb^tiādimāha. Balikammakaraṇaṃ ^b^mānanaṃ,^eb^ sampati uppannaparissayaharaṇaṃ ^b^paṭimāna^eb^nti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ete’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Sundarāni passatī^eb^ti sundarāni iṭṭhāni eva passati, na aniṭṭhāni.

[03]^b^154^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āṇiyo koṭṭetvā^eb^ti lahuke dārudaṇḍe gahetvā kavāṭaphalake viya aññamaññaṃ sambandhe kātuṃ āṇiyo koṭṭetvā. Nāvāsaṅkhepena kataṃ ^b^uḷumpaṃ,^eb^ veḷunaḷādike saṅgharitvā valliādīhi kalāpavasena bandhitvā kattabbaṃ ^b^kullaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Udakaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacana^eb^nti yathāvuttassa yassa kassaci udakaṭṭhānassa etaṃ ‘‘aṇṇava’’nti adhivacanaṃ, samuddassevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Saranti idha nadī adhippetā^eb^ sarati sandatīti ^a^V2.0125^ea^ katvā. ^b^Gambhīravitthata^eb^nti agādhaṭṭhena gambhīraṃ, sakalalokattayabyāpitāya vitthataṃ. ^b^Visajjā^eb^ti anāsajja appatvā. ^b^Pallalāni^eb^ tesaṃ ataraṇato. ^b^Vināyeva kullenā^eb^ti īdisaṃ udakaṃ kullena īdisena vinā eva^b^ tiṇṇā medhāvino janā,^eb^ taṇhāsaraṃ pana ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ setuṃ katvā nittiṇṇāti yojanā.
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^155^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāpanādassa^eb^^a^P2.0180^ea^^a^M2.0140^ea^ rañño. ^b^Pāsādakoṭiyaṃ^eb^^b^katagāmo^eb^ti pāsādassa patitathupikāya patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhagāmo. ^b^Ariyabhāvakarāna^eb^nti ye paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ nimittassa kattubhāvūpacāravaseneva vuttaṃ. Tacchāvipallāsabhūtabhāvena ^b^saccānaṃ.^eb^ Anubodho pubbabhāgiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭivedho maggañāṇena abhisamayo, tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti, anubodhopi ekacco paṭivedhena sambandho, tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭeva saṃsaraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘ananubodhā…pe… tumhākañcā’’ti. Paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavato bhavantarūpagamanaṃ ^b^sandhāvanaṃ,^eb^ aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanavasena sañcaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃsaraṇa^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘bhavato’’^eb^tiādi. Sandhāvitasaṃsaritapadānaṃ kammasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘mayā ca tumhehi cā’’^eb^ti paṭhamavikappe. Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṃ hadaye katvā ^b^‘‘mamañceva tumhākañcā’’^eb^ti yathārutavaseneva vuttaṃ. ^b^Nayanasamatthā^eb^ti pāpanasamatthā, dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṃ taṇhārajjunā baddhaṃ sattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti etāyāti ^b^bhavanetti,^eb^ taṇhā, sā ariyamaggasatthena suṭṭhu hatā chinnāti ^b^bhavanettisamūhatā.^eb^

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve gāmā^eb^ ‘‘nātikā’’ti evaṃ laddhanāmo, ña-kārassa cāyaṃ na-kārādesena niddeso ‘‘animittā na nāyare’’tiādīsu (visuddhi. 1.174; jā. aṭṭha. 2.2.34) viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ñātigāmake’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0126^ea^. ^b^Giñjakā^eb^ vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasathoti ^b^giñjakāvasatho^eb^^a^P2.0181^ea^. So kira āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena sampayojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe’’^eb^ti. Tulādaṇḍakavāṭaphalakāni pana dārumayāneva.

[03]^b^157^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Oraṃ^eb^ vuccati kāmadhātu, paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti ^b^orambhāgiyāni,^eb^ orambhāgassa vā hitāni ^b^orambhāgiyāni.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhābhāgiyāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tīhi maggehī^eb^ti heṭṭhimehi tīhi maggehi. Tehi ^a^M2.0141^ea^ pahātabbatāya hi nesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ orambhāgiyatā. Orambhañjiyāni vā ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^ vuttāni niruttinayena. Idāni byatirekamukhena nesaṃ orambhāgiyabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Vikkhambhitāni samatthatāvighātena puthujjanānaṃ, samucchinnāni sabbaso abhāvena ariyānaṃ rūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā vibandhāya na hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avikkhambhitāni asamucchinnānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nibbattavasenā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena. ^b^Gantuṃ na denti^eb^ mahaggatagāmikammāyūhanassa vinibandhanato. ^b^Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi^eb^ saṃyojanāni kāmacchandabyāpādā viya mahaggatūpapattiyā avinibandhabhūtānipi kāmabhavūpapattiyā visesapaccayattā ^b^tattha^eb^ mahaggatabhave ^b^nibbattampi^eb^ tannibbattihetukammaparikkhaye kāmabhavūpapattipaccayatāya mahaggatabhavato ^b^ānetvā puna idheva^eb^ kāmabhave eva ^b^nibbattāpenti,^eb^ tasmā ^b^sabbā^eb^nipi pañcapi saṃyojanāni ^b^orambhāgiyāni eva. Paṭisandhivasena anāgamanasabhāvā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha na āgamanasabhāvā. Buddhadassanatheradassanadhammassavanānaṃ panatthāyassa āgamanaṃ anivāritaṃ.

[03]^b^Kadāci karahaci uppattiyā^eb^ saviraḷākāratā ^a^P2.0182^ea^^b^pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya^eb^ abahalatāti ^b^dvedhāpi tanubhāvo. Abhiṇha^eb^nti bahuso. ^b^Bahalabahalā^eb^ti tibbatibbā. Yattha uppajjanti, taṃ santānaṃ maddantā, pharantā, sādhentā, andhakāraṃ karontā uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā ^b^tanukatanukā^eb^ mandamandā ^b^uppajjanti. ‘‘Puttadhītaro hontī’’^eb^ti idaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi te honti. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Bhavatanukavasenā^eb^ti appakabhavavasena. ^b^Ta^eb^nti mahāsivattherassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhittanti sambandho. Ye bhavā ariyānaṃ labbhanti, te paripuṇṇalakkhaṇabhavā eva. Ye na labbhanti, tattha kīdisaṃ taṃ bhavatanukaṃ, tasmā ubhayathāpi bhavatanukassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sotāpannassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi^eb^ aṭṭhamasseva bhavassa sabbasseva abhāvato. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Kāmāvacaralokaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0127^ea^^b^sandhāya vuttaṃ^eb^ itarassa lokassa vasena tathā vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Yo hi sakadāgāmī devamanussalokesu vomissakavasena nibbattati, sopi kāmabhavavaseneva paricchinditabbo. Bhagavatā ca kāmaloke ṭhatvā ‘‘sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā’’ti ^a^M2.0142^ea^ vuttaṃ, ‘‘imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā’’ti ca iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati, ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ime cattāro idha na labbhanti. Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ idha adhippeto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imaṃ lokanti kāmabhavo adhippetoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādinā aññaṃyeva catukkaṃ dassitaṃ.

[03]^b^Catūsu^eb^^a^P2.0183^ea^^b^…pe… sabhāvoti attho^eb^ apāyagamanīyānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā. ^b^Dhammaniyāmenā^eb^ti maggadhammaniyāmena. ^b^Niyato^eb^ uparimaggādhigamassa avassaṃbhāvibhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sambodhiparāyaṇo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagati^eb^nti tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ ‘‘asuko sotāpanno, asuko sakadāgāmī’’tiādinā taṃtaṃñāṇādhigamanaṃ. ^b^Ñāṇūpapattiṃ ñāṇābhisamparāya^eb^nti tato parampi ‘‘niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī’’tiādinā ca ñāṇasahitaṃ uppattipaccayabhāvaṃ. ^b^Olokentassa^eb^ ñāṇacakkhunā pekkhantassa ^b^kāyakilamathova,^eb^ na tena kāci veneyyānaṃ atthasiddhīti adhippāyo. ^b^Cittavihesā^eb^ti cittakhedo, sā kilesūpasaṃhitattā ^b^buddhānaṃ natthi.^eb^ Ādīyati ālokīyati attā etenāti ^b^ādāsaṃ,^eb^ dhammabhūtaṃ ādāsaṃ ^b^dhammādāsaṃ,^eb^ ariyamaggañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tena ariyasāvakā catūsu ariyasaccesu viddhastasammohattā attānampi yāthāvato ñatvā yāthāvato byākareyya, tappakāsanato pana dhammapariyāyassa suttassa dhammādāsatā veditabbā. ^b^Yena dhammādāsenā^eb^ti idha pana maggadhammameva vadati.

[03]Avecca yāthāvato jānitvā tannimittauppannapasādo ^b^aveccapasādo,^eb^ maggādhigamena uppannapasādo ^a^V2.0128^ea^, so pana yasmā pāsāṇapabbato viya niccalo, na ca kenaci kāraṇena vigacchati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘acalena accutenā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^‘‘Pañcasīlānī’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0143^ea^ gahaṭṭhavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ tehi ekantapariharaṇīyato. Ariyānaṃ pana sabbāni sīlāni kantāneva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbopi panettha saṃvaro labbhatiyevā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti ^a^P2.0184^ea^ sabbesaṃ ariyānaṃ. ^b^Sikkhāpadāvirodhenā^eb^ti yathā bhūtarocanāpatti na hoti, evaṃ. ^b^Yuttaṭṭhāne^eb^ti kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tadā kira vesālī iddhā phītā sabbaṅgasampannā ahosi vepullappattā, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘khandhake vuttanayena vesāliyā sampannabhāvo veditabbo’’^eb^ti. Tasmiṃ kira bhikkhusaṅghe pañcasatamattā bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā ahesuṃ osannavīriyā ca. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘tattha kira ekacce bhikkhū osannavīriyā’’tiādi (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.165). ^b^Satipaccupaṭṭhānattha^eb^nti tesaṃ satipaccupaṭṭhāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Saratī^eb^ti kāyādike yathāsabhāvato ñāṇasampayuttāya satiyā anussarati upadhāreti. ^b^Sampajānātī^eb^ti samaṃ pakārehi jānāti avabujjhati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana parato ^b^satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.373; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.106) āgamissati.

[03]^b^Sabbasaṅgāhaka^eb^nti sarīragatassa ceva vatthālaṅkāragatassa cāti sabbassa nīlabhāvassa saṅgāhakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti nīlāti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttātthasseva. ^b^Vibhāgadassana^eb^nti pabhedadassanaṃ. Yathā te licchavirājāno apītādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena pītādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsu, evaṃ anīlādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena nīlādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsūti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na tesaṃ pakativaṇṇo nīlo’’^eb^tiādi. Nīlo maṇi etesūti ^b^nīlamaṇi,^eb^ indanīlamahānīlādinīlaratanavinaddhā alaṅkārā. Te kira suvaṇṇaviracite hi maṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya khāyanti. ^b^Nīlamaṇikhacitā^eb^ti nīlaratanaparikkhittā. ^b^Nīlavatthaparikkhittā^eb^ti nīlavatthanīlakampalaparikkhepā. ^b^Nīlavammikehī^eb^ti nīlakaghaṭaparikkhittehi. ^b^Sabbapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘pītā hontī’’tiādisabbapadesu. ^b^Parivaṭṭesī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0185^ea^ paṭighaṭṭesi. Āharanti imasmā rājapurisā balinti ^b^āhāro,^eb^ tappattajanapadoti āha ^b^‘‘sāhāranti sajanapada’’^eb^nti. Aṅguliphoṭopi aṅguliyā cālanavaseneva ^a^M2.0144^ea^^a^V2.0129^ea^ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṅguliṃ cālesu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ambakāyā^eb^ti mātugāmena. Upacāravacanaṃ hetaṃ itthīsu, yadidaṃ ‘‘ambakā mātugāmo jananikā’’ti.

[03]^b^Avalokethā^eb^ti apavattitvā olokanaṃ oloketha. Taṃ pana apavattitvā olokanaṃ anu anu dassanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ passathā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upanethā^eb^ti ‘‘yathāyaṃ licchavirājaparisā sobhātisayena yuttā, evaṃ tāvatiṃsaparisā’’ti upanayaṃ karotha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tāvatiṃsehi samake katvā passathā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Upasaṃharatha bhikkhave licchaviparisaṃ tāvatiṃsasadisa’’nti nayidaṃ nimittaggāhe niyojanaṃ, kevalaṃ pana dibbasampattisadisā etesaṃ rājūnaṃ issariyasampattīti anupubbikathāya saggasampattikathanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ tattha nimittaggāhopi siyā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nimittaggāhe uyyojetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hitakāmatāya^eb^ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathā āyasmato nandassa hitakāmatāya saggasampattidassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatra kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Osannavīriyā^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ avasannavīriyā, ossaṭṭhavīriyā vāti attho. ^b^Aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanattha^eb^nti tesaṃ rājūnaṃ vasena bhikkhūnaṃ aniccalakkhaṇavibhūtabhāvatthaṃ.
[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samīpe veḷuvagāmo^eb^ti pubbaṇhaṃ vā sāyanhaṃ vā gantvā nivattanayogye āsannaṭṭhāne niviṭṭhā parivāragāmo. ^b^Saṅgammā^eb^ti sammā gantvā. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato.

[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pharuso^eb^ti kakkhaḷo, garutaroti attho. ^b^Visabhāgarogo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0186^ea^ dhātuvisabhāgatāya samuṭṭhito bahalatararogo, na ābādhamattaṃ. ^b^Ñāṇena paricchinditvā^eb^ti vedanānaṃ khaṇikataṃ, dukkhataṃ, attasuññatañca yāthāvato ñāṇena paricchijja parituletvā. ^b^Adhivāsesī^eb^ti tā abhibhavanto yathāparimadditākārasallakkhaṇena attani āropetvā vāsesi, na tāhi abhibhuyyamāno. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avihaññamāno’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Adukkhiyamāno^eb^ti cetodukkhavasena adukkhiyamāno ^a^M2.0145^ea^, kāyadukkhaṃ pana ‘‘natthī’’ti na sakkā vattuṃ. Asati hi tasmiṃ adhivāsanāya eva asambhavoti. ^b^Anāmantetvā^eb^ti anālapitvā. ^b^Anapaloketvā^eb^ti avissajjitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbabhāgavīriyenā^eb^ti phalasamāpattiyā parikammavīriyena. ^b^Phalasamāpattivīriyenā^eb^ti phalasamāpattisampayuttavīriyena. ^b^Vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0130^ea^ vinodetvā. Yathā nāma pupphanasamaye campakādirukkhe vekhe dinne yāva so vekho nāpanīyati, tāvassa pupphanasamatthatā vikkhambhitā vinoditā hoti, evameva yathāvuttavīriyavekhadānena tā vedanā satthu sarīre yathāparicchinnaṃ kālaṃ vikkhambhitā vinoditā ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘vikkhambhetvāti vinodetvā’’ti. ^b^Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro^eb^ kammunā saṅkharīyatīti katvā. ^b^Chijjamānaṃ^eb^ virodhipaccayasamāyogena payogasampattiyā ^b^ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati. Adhiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. Tenāha ‘‘dasamāse mā uppajjitthāti samāpattiṃ samāpajjī’’ti. Taṃ pana ‘‘adhiṭṭhānaṃ, pavattana’’nti ca vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Khaṇikasamāpattī^eb^ti tādisaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāraṃ akatvā ṭhānaso samāpajjitabbasamāpatti. ^b^Puna sarīraṃ vedanā ajjhottharati^eb^ savisesapubbābhisaṅkhārassa akatattā. Rūpasattakārūpasattakāni ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu^eb^^a^P2.0187^ea^ (visuddhi. ṭī. 2.706, 717) vitthāritanayena veditabbāni. ^b^Suṭṭhu vikkhambheti^eb^ pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Apabyūḷho^eb^ti apanīto. ^b^Cuddasahākārehi sannetvā^eb^ti tesaṃyeva rūpasattakārūpasattakānaṃ vasena cuddasahi pakārehi vipassanācittaṃ, sakalameva vā attabhāvaṃ visabhāgarogasañjanitalūkhabhāvanirogakaraṇāya sinehetvā ^b^na uppajjiyeva^eb^ sammāsambuddhena sātisayasamāpattivegena suvikkhambhitattā.

[03]^b^Gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito^eb^ti pubbe gilāno hutvā puna tato gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhito. Madhurakabhāvo nāma sarīrassa thambhitattaṃ, taṃ pana garubhāvapubbakanti āha ^b^‘‘sañjātagarubhāvo sañjātathaddhabhāvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Nānākārato na upaṭṭhahantī’’^eb^ti iminā disāsammohopi me ahosi ^a^M2.0146^ea^ sokabalenāti dasseti. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānādidhammā^eb^ti kāyānupassanādayo anupassanādhammā pubbe vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantāpi idāni ^b^mayhaṃ pākaṭā na honti.^eb^

[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma^eb^ attaniyeva ṭhapanato. ^b^Puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma^eb^ samānattatāvasena dhammena pubbe tassa saṅgaṇhato. ^b^Daharakāle^eb^ti attano daharakāle. ^b^Kassaci akathetvā^eb^ti kassaci attano antevāsikassa upanigūhabhūtaṃ ganthaṃ akathetvā. ^b^Muṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti muṭṭhigataṃ viya rahasibhūtaṃ katvā. Yasmiṃ vā naṭṭhe sabbo taṃmūlako dhammo vinassati, so ādito mūlabhūto dhammo, mussati vinassati dhammo etena naṭṭhenāti ^b^muṭṭhi,^eb^ taṃ tathārūpaṃ muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ^b^ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.^eb^

[03]^b^Ahamevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0131^ea^ avadhāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapariharaṇassa aññasādhāraṇicchādassanatthaṃ, avadhāraṇena pana vinā ^b^‘‘ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅgha’’^eb^ntiādi bhikkhusaṅghapariharaṇe ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Uddisitabbaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘satthā’’ti uddisitabbaṭṭhena. ^b^Mā vā^eb^^a^P2.0188^ea^^b^ahesuṃ^eb^ bhikkhūti adhippāyo. ‘‘Mā vā ahosī’’ti vā pāṭho. ^b^Evaṃ na hotī^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī’’tiādi ākārena cittappavatti na hoti. ^b^‘‘Pacchimavayānuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti iminā vayo viya buddhakiccampi pariyositakammanti dīpeti. Sakaṭassa bāhappadese daḷhībhāvāya veṭhadānaṃ ^b^bāhabandho. ^eb^ Cakkanemisandhīnaṃ daḷhībhāvāya veṭhadānaṃ ^b^cakkabandho.^eb^

[03]^b^Tamattha^eb^nti veṭhamissakena maññeti vuttamatthaṃ. Rūpādayo eva dhammā saviggaho viya upaṭṭhānato rūpanimittādayo, tesaṃ ^b^rūpanimittādīnaṃ. Lokiyānaṃ vedanāna^eb^nti yāsaṃ nirodhanena phalasamāpatti samāpajjitabbā, tāsaṃ nirodhā phāsu hoti, tathā bāḷhavedanābhitunnasarīrassāpi. ^b^Tadatthāyā^eb^ti phalasamāpattivihāratthāya. Dvīhi bhāgehi āpo gato etthāti ^b^dīpo,^eb^ oghena parigato hutvā anajjhotthaṭo bhūmibhāgo, idha pana catūhipi oghehi, saṃsāramahogheneva vā anajjhotthaṭo attā ‘‘dīpo’’ti adhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāsamuddagatā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attassaraṇā^eb^ti attappaṭisaraṇā. ^b^Attagatikā vā^eb^ti attaparāyaṇāva ^a^M2.0147^ea^. ^b^Mā aññagatikā^eb^ti aññaṃ kiñci gatiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mā cintayittha. Kasmā? Attā nāmettha paramatthato dhammo abbhantaraṭṭhena, so evaṃ sampādito tumhākaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ gati parāyaṇanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammadīpā’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā cāha ‘‘attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā’’ti (dha. pa. 160, 380) upadesamattameva ^a^P2.0189^ea^ hi parasmiṃ paṭibaddhaṃ, aññā sabbā sampatti purisassa attādhīnā eva. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘tumhehi kiccaṃ ātappaṃ, akkhātāro tathāgatā’’ti (dha. pa. 276). ^b^Tamagge^eb^ti tamayogassa agge tassa atikkantābhāvato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ime aggatamā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mamā^eb^ti mama sāsane. ^b^Sabbepi te catusatipaṭṭhānagocarā vā^eb^ti catubbidhaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā tadeva gocaraṃ attano pavattiṭṭhānaṃ katvā ṭhitā eva ^b^bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.^eb^
[06]Dutiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anekavāraṃ ^a^V2.0132^ea^ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati, tasmā imaṃ vesālippavesanaṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ ‘‘kadā pāvisī’’ti pucchitvā āgamanato paṭṭhāya taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhagavā kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Āgatamaggenevā^eb^ti pubbe yāva veḷuvagāmakā āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattento. ^b^Yathāparicchedenā^eb^ti yathāparicchinnakālena. ^b^Tato^eb^ti phalasamāpattito. ^b^Aya^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākāro. ^b^Divāṭṭhānolokanā^eb^di parinibbānassa ekantikabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^Ossaṭṭho^eb^ti vissaṭṭho ^b^āyusaṅkhāro^eb^ ‘‘sattāhameva mayā jīvitabba’’nti.
[03]^b^Jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikāna^eb^nti sabbeva sabrahmacārino sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^Paṭipādessāmī^eb^ti maggapaṭipattiyā niyojessāmi. ^b^Maṇiphalake^eb^ti maṇikhacite pamukhe atthataphalake. ^b^Taṃ paṭhamaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0190^ea^^b^dassana^eb^nti yaṃ veḷuvane paribbājakarūpena āgatassa siddhaṃ dassanaṃ, taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ. Yaṃ vā anomadassissa bhagavato vacanaṃ saddahantena tadā abhinīhārakāle paccakkhato ^a^M2.0148^ea^ viya tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ siddhaṃ, taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ. ^b^Paccāgamanacārika^eb^nti paccāgamanatthaṃ cārikaṃ.

[03]^b^Sattāha^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Therassa jātovarakagehaṃ kira itaragehato vivekaṭṭhaṃ, vivaṭaṅgaṇañca, tasmā devabrahmānaṃ upasaṅkamanayogyanti ^b^‘‘jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggathā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti uparevato. ^b^Taṃ pavatti^eb^nti tattha vasitukāmatāya vuttaṃ taṃ.

[03]‘‘Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī’’ti (pārā. 16, 165) iminā nīhārena ^b^thero ‘‘ke tumhe’’^eb^ti pucchi. ‘‘Tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi mahantataro’’ti puṭṭho attano mahattaṃ satthu upari pakkhipanto ^b^‘‘ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike amhākaṃ satthuno’’^eb^ti āha. Sāvakasampattikittanampi hi atthato satthu sampattiṃyeva vibhāveti.
[03]^b^Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti therassa desanānubhāvena, attano ca upanissayasampattiyā ñāṇassa paripakkattā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā.
[03]^b^Aya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0133^ea^ yathāvuttā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisī’’ti etasmiṃ vesālīpavese. ^b^Anupubbīkathā^eb^ti anupubbadīpanī kathā.

[03]^b^167^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne^eb^ti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi cite mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne. ^b^Katavihāro^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ uddissa katavihāro. ^b^Vuccatī^eb^ti purimavohārena ‘‘udenacetiya’’nti vuccati. ^b^Gotamakādīsupī^eb^ti ‘‘gotamakacetiya’’nti evaṃ ādīsupi. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihārabhāvaṃ atidisati. ^b^Vaḍḍhitā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0191^ea^ bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitā. ^b^Punappunaṃ katā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā. ^b^Yuttayānaṃ viya katā^eb^ti yathā yuttaṃ ājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathārucipavattirahataṃ gamitā. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^Vatthu viya katā^eb^ti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā. ^b^Adhiṭṭhitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya ṭhapitā ^a^M2.0149^ea^. ^b^Samantato citā^eb^ti sabbabhāgena bhāvanupacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suvaḍḍhitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhā^eb^ti iddhibhāvanāya sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.

[03]^b^Aniyamenā^eb^ti ‘‘yassa kassacī’’ti aniyamavacanena. ^b^Niyametvā^eb^ti ‘‘tathāgatassā’’ti sarūpadassanena niyametvā. ^b^Āyuppamāṇa^eb^nti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati, tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ ^b^brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.40; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.40) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Mahāsivatthero pana ‘‘mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā’’ti avoca. ^b^‘‘Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatī’’^eb^ti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto, evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti. ‘‘Kva saro khitto, kva ca nipatito’’ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenāpi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^P2.0192^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so na ruccati…pe… niyamita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Pariyuṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ abhibhūtacitto. So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhotthaṭacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññopī^eb^ti therato, ariyehi vā aññopi yo koci ^b^puthujjano.^eb^ Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci ^a^V2.0134^ea^ atthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘māro hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cattāro vipallāsā^eb^ti asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāso, dukkhe ‘‘sukha’’nti saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāsoti ime cattāro vipallāsā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, tathāpi yathāvuttānaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti therassa. ^b^Maddatī^eb^ti phusanamattena maddanto viya hoti, aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā. ^b^Kiṃ sakkhissati,^eb^ na sakkhissatīti adhippāyo. Kasmā ^a^M2.0150^ea^ na sakkhissati, nanu esa aggasāvakassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti? Saccaṃ paviṭṭho, tañca kho attano ānubhāvadassanatthaṃ, na vibādhanādhippāyena. Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha ‘‘kiṃ sakkhissatī’’ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhigatattā. ^b^Nimittobhāsa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa’’nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya ‘‘yassa kassaci ānanda cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā’’tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ ^b^nimittaṃ,^eb^ tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ ^b^obhāso. Jānantoyeva^eb^ vāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānanto eva. Attano aparādhahetuto ^a^P2.0193^ea^ sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti, na balavāti āha ^b^‘‘dosāropanena sokatanukaraṇattha’’^eb^nti. Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti? Na jānāti sabhāvena, buddhānubhāvena pana anujānāti.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anatthe niyojento^eb^ guṇamāraṇena māreti, virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti ^b^‘‘māretīti māro’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ativiya pāpatāya ^b^pāpimā.^eb^ Kaṇhadhammehi samannāgato ^b^kaṇho.^eb^ Virāgādiguṇānaṃ antakaraṇato ^b^antako.^eb^ Sattānaṃ anatthāvahapaṭipattiṃ na muccatīti ^b^namuci.^eb^ Attano mārapāsena pamatte bandhati, pamattā vā bandhū etassāti ^b^pamattabandhu.^eb^ Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato. Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno, sakkassa ca devarañño paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ ñatvā ‘‘idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ atikkamāpessatī’’ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi ‘‘handa dānāhaṃ naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi, evamassa manoratho aññathattaṃ gamissati, mama ca manoratho ijjhissatī’’ti ^a^V2.0135^ea^. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃ antaṃ ṭhito ‘‘parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā’’tiādinā parinibbānaṃ yāci, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^ajjā^eb^ti āyusaṅkhārossajjanadivasaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhagavā cassa abhisandhiṃ jānantopi ^a^M2.0151^ea^ taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na tāvāha’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Maggavasena viyattā^eb^ti saccasampaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. ^b^Tatheva vinītā^eb^ti maggavasena kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayanena vinītā. ^b^Tathā visāradā^eb^ti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā ^a^P2.0194^ea^, sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati, taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ‘‘suta’’nti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘tepiṭakavasenā’’^eb^ti. Tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samūho ^b^tepiṭakaṃ,^eb^ tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva ^b^tepiṭakaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena. ^b^Tamevā^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena ‘‘suta’’nti vuttaṃ, tameva. ^b^Dhamma^eb^nti pariyattidhammaṃ. ^b^Dhārentī^eb^ti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ariyadhammassā^eb^ti maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassāpi vā lokuttaradhammassa. ^b^Anudhammabhūta^eb^nti adhigamāya anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ. ^b^Anucchavikapaṭipada^eb^nti ca tameva vipassanādhammamāha, chabbidhā visuddhiyo vā. ^b^Anudhamma^eb^nti tassā yathāvuttapaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ. ^b^Caraṇasīlā^eb^ti samādāya pavattanasīlā. Anu maggaphaladhammo etissāti vā ^b^anudhammā,^eb^ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, tassā caraṇasīlā. ^b^Attano ācariyavāda^eb^nti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo, bhagavā. Tassa vādo, catusaccadesanā.

[03]^b^Ācikkhissantī^eb^ti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti attho. ^b^Desessantī^eb^ti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. ^b^Paññāpessantī^eb^ti pajānāpessanti, saṅkāpessantīti attho. ^b^Paṭṭhapessantī^eb^ti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti attho. ^b^Vivarissantī^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. ^b^Vibhajissantī^eb^ti vibhattaṃ karissanti. ^b^Uttāniṃ karissantī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0195^ea^ anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. ^b^Saha dhammenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo kāraṇapariyāyo ‘‘hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu ^a^M2.0152^ea^ (vibha. 270) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti sanissaraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0136^ea^, yathā paravādaṃ bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati, evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessantī’’^eb^ti, navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ pabodhessantīti attho. Ettha ca ‘‘paññāpessantī’’tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni, ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni. Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^nettiyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘dvādasapadāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho cā’’ti (netti. saṅkhāre).

[03]^b^Sikkhattayasaṅgahita^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhādisikkhattayasaṅgahaṇaṃ. ^b^Sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariya^eb^nti anavasesaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. ^b^Samiddha^eb^nti sammadeva vaḍḍhitaṃ. ^b^Jhānassādavasenā^eb^ti tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajhānasukhavasena. ^b^Vuddhippatta^eb^nti uḷārapaṇītabhāvagamanena sabbaso parivuddhiṃ upagataṃ. ^b^Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena^eb^ abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuddhiyā matthakappattito. ^b^Patiṭṭhitavasenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānavasena, patiṭṭhappattiyāti attho. Paṭivedhavasena bahuno janassa hitanti ^b^bāhujaññaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘bahujanābhisamayavasenā’’^eb^ti. Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthu vā puthuttaṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti ^a^P2.0196^ea^^b^puthubhūtaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbākāra…pe… patta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Suṭṭhu pakāsita^eb^nti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.

[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā^eb^ti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato, svāyaṃ ariyamaggo paṭividdho, yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sammadeva pariññātā, catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā. ^b^Ñāṇena paricchinditvā^eb^ti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ tāva mahābodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ, parahitaṃ pana buddhaveneyyavinayanaṃ parisamāpitabbaṃ, taṃ ^a^M2.0153^ea^ idāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, tasmā abhāsi ‘‘visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmī’’ti, evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā sabbabhāgena nicchayaṃ katvā. ^b^Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjī^eb^ti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ ‘‘na samāpajjissāmī’’ti vissajji taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ ‘‘nappavattessāmī’’ti vissajji. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. Ṭhānamahantatāyapi pavattiākāramahantatāyapi ^b^mahanto pathavīkampo. ^eb^ Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahattaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^V2.0137^ea^^b^‘‘tadā kira…pe… kampitthā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana jātikkhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva, na yā kāci, yā mahābhinīhāramahājātiādīsupi kampittha. Tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ^a^P2.0197^ea^? Jātikkhettabhāvena tasseva ādito pariggahassa katattā. Pariggahakaraṇaṃ cassa dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tāvatakameva jātikkhettaṃ ahosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘dasasahassī lokadhātū, nissaddā honti nirākulā…pe… mahāsamuddo ābhujati, dasasahassī pakampatī’’ti ca ādi (bu. vaṃ. 84-91). Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārapavedhanena avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano, so eva ^b^bhiṃsanako^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘bhayajanako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devabheriyo^eb^ti devadundubhisaddassa pariyāyavacanamattaṃ. Na cettha kāci bherī ‘‘devadundubhī’’ti adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘devo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Devo^eb^ti megho. Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pītivegavissaṭṭha^eb^nti ‘‘evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro, idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissatī’’ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ ^b^udānaṃ udānesi.^eb^ Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Tulīyatīti ^b^tula^eb^nti ^b^tula^eb^-saddo kammasādhanoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tulita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Appānubhāvatāya ^b^paricchinnaṃ. ^eb^ Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena ‘‘paritta’’nti vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya, vipulaphalatāya ^a^M2.0154^ea^ ca ^b^na tulaṃ^eb^ na paricchinnaṃ. Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato mahaggataṃ ‘‘atula’’nti vuttaṃ, tāni kāraṇāni ^a^P2.0198^ea^ rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayāni vijjantīti ^b^‘‘arūpāvacaraṃ atula’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ, itarañca ^b^‘‘tula’’^eb^nti, ^b^appavipākaṃ^eb^ tīsupi kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ, taṃ ^b^tulaṃ. Bahuvipāka^eb^nti yaṃ mahāvipākaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ ^b^atulaṃ.^eb^ Yaṃ panettha majjhimaṃ, taṃ hīnaṃ, ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ. ^b^Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo. Sambhavati etasmāti ^b^sambhavo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sambhavassa hetubhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Niyakajjhattarato^eb^ti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena, gocarāsevanāya ca nirato. Savipākaṃ samānaṃ pavattivipākamattadāyikammaṃ savipākaṭṭhena ^b^sambhavaṃ.^eb^ Na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ ‘‘sambhava’’nti vatvā ^b^‘‘bhavasaṅkhāra’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ossajjī^eb^ti ariyamaggena avassajji ^a^V2.0138^ea^. ^b^Kavacaṃ viya^eb^ attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā ^b^attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindī^eb^ti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ dassento tadubhayassa kāraṇaṃ avoca ^b^‘‘ajjhattarato samāhito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tīrento^eb^ti ‘‘uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema’’ntiādinā vīmaṃsanto. ‘‘Tulento tīrento’’tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañcakkhandhā’’^eb^ti ādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avassajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dassesi. ^b^‘‘Eva’’^eb^ntiādinā pana ^b^udānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dassesi.

[03]^b^171^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yanti karaṇe vā adhikaraṇe vā paccattavacananti adhippāyena āha ^b^‘‘yena samayena, yasmiṃ vā samaye’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ukkhepakavātā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0199^ea^ udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchinditvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato khepakavātā. ^b^‘‘Saṭṭhi…pe… bahala’’^eb^nti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā vuttaṃ, āyāmavitthārato pana dasasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇampi udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchindatiyeva. ^b^Ākāse^eb^ti pubbe vātena patiṭṭhitokāse. ^b^Puna vāto^eb^ti ukkhepakavāte tathākatvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ^b^ābandhitvā^eb^^a^M2.0155^ea^^b^gaṇhāti^eb^ yathā taṃ udakaṃ na bhassati, evaṃ utthambhentaṃ ābandhanavitānavasena bandhitvā gaṇhāti. ^b^Tato udakaṃ uggacchatī^eb^ti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena utthambhitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati upari gacchati. ^b^Hotiyevā^eb^ti antarantarā hotiyeva. ^b^Bahalabhāvenā^eb^ti mahāpathaviyā mahantabhāvena. Sakalā hi mahāpathavī tadā oggacchati, uggacchati ca, tasmā kampanaṃ ^b^na paññāyati.^eb^

[03]^b^Ijjhanassā^eb^ti icchitatthasijjhanassa. ^b^Anubhavitabbassa^eb^issariyasampattiādikassa. ^b^Parittā^eb^ti paṭiladdhamattā nātisubhāvitā. Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dubbalā’’^eb^ti. Saññāsīsena hi bhāvanā vuttā. ^b^Appamāṇā^eb^ti paguṇā subhāvitā. Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘balavā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Parittā pathavīsaññā, appamāṇā āposaññā’’ti desanāmattameva, āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo veditabbo. ^b^Saṃvejento^eb^ dibbasampattiyā pamattaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ. ^b^Vīmaṃsanto vā^eb^ tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ. Mahāmoggallānattherassa pāsādakampanaṃ pākaṭanti taṃ anāmasitvā saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa pāsādakampanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so kirāyasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pūtimisso ^a^V2.0139^ea^ gandho etassāti ^b^pūtigandho,^eb^ tena ^b^pūtigandheneva^eb^^a^P2.0200^ea^ adhigatamātukucchisambhavaṃ viya gandheneva ^b^sīsena,^eb^ ativiya dārako evāti attho.

[03]^b^Ācariya^eb^nti ācariyūpadesaṃ. Iddhābhisaṅkhāro nāma iddhividhappaṭipakkhādībhāvena icchitabbo, so ca upāye kosallassa attanā na sammā uggahitattā na tāva sikkhitoti āha ^b^‘‘asikkhitvāva yuddhaṃ paviṭṭhosī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Pilavanta’’^eb^nti iminā sakalameva pāsādavatthuṃ udakaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbapāsādova tattha pilavatīti dasseti. Adhiṭṭhānakkamaṃ pana upamāya dassento ^b^‘‘tāta…pe… jānāhī’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ^b^kapallakapūva^eb^nti āsittakapūvaṃ, taṃ ^b^pacantā^eb^ kapāle paṭhamaṃ kiñci piṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā anukkamena vaḍḍhetvā antantena ^b^paricchindanti^eb^ pūvaṃ samantato paricchinnaṃ katvā ṭhapenti, evaṃ ‘‘āpokasiṇavasena ‘pāsādena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ hotū’ti adhiṭṭhahanto samantato pāsādassa yāva pariyantā yathā udakaṃ hoti, tathā adhiṭṭhātabba’’nti upamāya upadisati.

[03]^b^Mahāpadāne^eb^^a^M2.0156^ea^^b^vuttamevā^eb^ti ‘‘dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.18) vatvā ‘‘ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.18), tathā ‘‘dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.30) vatvā ‘‘ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.32) ca ^a^P2.0201^ea^ mahābodhisattassa gabbhokkantiyaṃ, abhijātiyañca dhammatāvasena ^b^mahāpadāne^eb^pathavīkampassa vuttattā itaresupi catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo dhammatāvasenevāti ^b^mahāpadāne^eb^atthato vuttaṃ evāti adhippāyo.

[03]Idāni nesaṃ pathavīkampanaṃ kāraṇato, pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘iti imesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhātukopenā^eb^ti ukkhepakadhātusaṅkhātāya vāyodhātuyā pakopena. ^b^Iddhānubhāvenā^eb^ti ñāṇiddhiyā vā kammavipākajiddhiyā vā pabhāvena, tejenāti attho. ^b^Puññatejenā^eb^ti puññānubhāvena, mahābodhisattassa puññabalenāti attho. ^b^Ñāṇatejenā^eb^ti paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena. ^b^Sādhukāradānavasenā^eb^ti yathā anaññasādhāraṇena paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī abhisambodhiyaṃ akampittha, evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha, taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti ‘‘sādhukāradānavasenā’’ti vuttaṃ.
