[03]Yena ^a^V2.0140^ea^ pana bhagavā asītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇa- (dī. ni. 2.33; 3.198; ma. ni. 2.385) vicitrarūpakāyo sabbākāraparisuddhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaratanasamiddhidhammakāyo puññamahattathāmamahattayasamahāaiddhimahattapaññāmahattānaṃ paramukkaṃsagato asamo asamasamo appaṭipuggalo arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi saṅkhatadhammaṃ paṭijigucchanākārappavattena ñāṇavisesena tiṇāyapi amaññamāno āyusaṅkhārossajjanavidhinā nirapekkho ossajji. Tadanubhāvābhihatā mahāpathavī āyusaṅkhārossajjane akampittha, taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāruññasabhāvenā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0157^ea^. Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo ^a^P2.0202^ea^ samāpajji antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena, tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi, ‘‘yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo paramukkaṃsagato ñāṇasambhāro sambhato, anuttaro ca vimokkho samadhigato, tassa vata me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesanibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī’’ti bhiyyo ativiya somanassappattassa bhagavato pītivipphārādiguṇavipulatarānubhāvo parehi asādhāraṇañāṇātisayo udapādi, yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā’’tiādi (udā. 75), tasmā tassa ānubhāvena samabhihatā mahāpathavī akampittha. Taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti viya hotīti ^b^‘‘aṭṭhamo ārodanenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘mātukucchiṃ okkamante’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ayaṃ panattho^eb^ti ‘‘sādhukāradānavasenā’’tiādinā vutto attho. ^b^Pathavīdevatāya vasenā^eb^ti ettha samuddadevatā viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi. Tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati, yathā vātavalāhakadevatānaṃ cittavasena vātā vāyanti, sītuṇhābbhavassavalāhakadevatānaṃ cittavasena sītādayo bhavanti. Tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa lokanāthassa antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamituṃ –
[21]‘‘Acetanāyaṃ ^a^P2.0203^ea^ pathavī, aviññāya sukhaṃ dukhaṃ;
[22]Sāpi dānabalā mayhaṃ, sattakkhattuṃ pakampathā’’ti. (cariyā. 1.124) –

[07]Vacanasamanantaraṃ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi. ^b^Eta^eb^nti sādhukāradānādi. Yadipi natthi acetanattā, dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ. Dhammatā pana atthato dhammasabhāvo, so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ vicāritameva, evañca katvā –
[21]‘‘Ime ^a^M2.0158^ea^ dhamme sammasato, sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇe;
[22]Dhammatejena vasudhā, dasasahassī pakampathā’’ti. (bu. vaṃ. 1.166);
[07]Ādi vacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Niddiṭṭhanidassana^eb^nti niddiṭṭhassa atthassa niyyātanaṃ, nigamananti attho. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti pathavīkampādiuppādajananena ceva pathavīkampassa bhagavato hetunidassanena ca. ^b^‘‘Addhā ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho’’ti sallakkhesi^eb^ pārisesañāyena. Evañhi tadā thero tamatthaṃ vīmaṃseyya nāyaṃ bhūmikampo dhātuppakopahetuko tassa apaññāyamānarūpattā, bāhirakopi isi evaṃ mahānubhāvo buddhakāle natthi, sāsanikopi satthu anārocetvā evaṃ karonto nāma natthi, sesānaṃ pañcannaṃ idāni asambhavo, evaṃ bhūmikampo cāyaṃ mahābhiṃsanako salomahaṃso ahosi, tasmā pārisesato āha ‘‘ajja bhagavatā āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭhoti sallakkhesī’’ti.

[03]^b^172^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Okāsaṃ adatvā^eb^ti ‘‘tiṭṭhatu bhante bhagavā kappa’’ntiādi (dī. ni. 2.178) nayappavattāya therassa āyācanāya avasaraṃ adatvā. ^b^Aññānipi aṭṭhakāni sampiṇḍento^eb^ hetuaṭṭhakato aññāni parisābhibhāyatanavimokkhavasena ^a^P2.0204^ea^ tīṇi aṭṭhakāni saṅgahetvā dassento ^b^‘‘aṭṭha kho imā’’tiādimāha.^eb^ ‘‘Āyasmato ānandassa sokuppattiṃ pariharanto vikkhepaṃ karonto’’ti keci sahasā bhaṇite balavasoko uppajjeyyāti.

[03]Samāgantabbato, samāgacchatīti vā ^b^samāgamo,^eb^ parisā. Bimbisārapamukho samāgamo ^b^bimbisārasamāgamo.^eb^ Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Bimbisāra…pe… samāgamādisadisaṃ khattiyaparisanti yojanā. ^b^Aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateyeva^eb^ satthu khattiyaparisādiupasaṅkamanaṃ. Ādito tehi saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ^b^ālāpo.^eb^ Kathanapaṭikathanaṃ ^b^sallāpo.^eb^ Dhammupasañhitā pucchā paṭipucchā ^a^V2.0142^ea^^b^dhammasākacchā. Saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca kathanaṃ^eb^ saṇṭhānapariyāyattā ^a^M2.0159^ea^ vaṇṇa-saddassa ‘‘mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.138) viya. ^b^‘‘Tesa’’^eb^nti padaṃ ubhayapadāpekkhaṃ ‘‘tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ kevalaṃ paññāyati evā’’ti. Nāpi āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalo bhagavā hotīti yojanā. ^b^Chinnassarā^eb^ti dvidhābhūtassarā. ^b^Gaggarassarā^eb^ti jajjaritassarā. ^b^Bhāsantara^eb^nti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsato aññaṃ bhāsaṃ. ^b^Vīmaṃsā^eb^ti cintanā. ‘‘Kimatthaṃ…pe… desetī’’ti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ? Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite pasādo hoti, na jānāpetvā, tādise sandhāya satthā tathā karoti. Tattha payojanamāha ^b^‘‘vāsanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ sutopī^eb^ti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto ^b^dhammo^eb^ attano dhammasudhammatāyeva ^b^anāgate paccayo hoti^eb^ suṇantassa.
[03]^b^‘‘Ānandā’’^eb^tiādiko saṅgītianāruḷho pāḷidhammo eva tathā dassito. Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.

[03]^b^173^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhibhavatīti ^a^P2.0205^ea^^b^abhibhu,^eb^ parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ,^eb^ jhānaṃ. Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ.^eb^ Ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato vātipi sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhibhavanakāraṇānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tāni hī^eb^ti abhibhāyatanasaññitāni jhānāni. ^b^‘‘Puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāyā’’^eb^ti idaṃ ubhayatthāpi yojetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti. Ñāṇabaleneva hi ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ viya paṭipakkhābhibhavo pīti.

[03]^b^Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī,^eb^ na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati, taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ ^a^M2.0160^ea^ kasiṇanimittaṃ ^b^avisuddhameva hoti,^eb^ na bahiddhāparikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.

[03]^b^Parittānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0143^ea^ yathāladdhāni suppasarāvamattāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avaḍḍhitānī^eb^’’ti. ^b^Parittavasenevā^eb^ti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva ^b^idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ.^eb^ Parittatā hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati, na itarassāti āha ^b^‘‘ñāṇuttariko puggalo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatī^eb^ti ettha abhibhavanaṃ, samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti āha ^b^‘‘saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saha nimittuppādenā^eb^ti ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ vacanametaṃ. Yo ‘‘khippābhiñño’’ti vuccati, tatopi ñāṇuttarasseva abhibhāyatanabhāvanā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ nimitte. ^b^Appanaṃ pāpetī^eb^ti bhāvanaṃ appanaṃ neti.

[03]Ettha ^a^P2.0206^ea^ ca keci ‘‘uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti, te upacārajjhānapakkhikā eva, tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena, upacārāsevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Na hi parivāsitaparikammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā, tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamanato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto ‘‘saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī’’ti vutto. ^b^Saha nimittuppādenevā^eb^ti ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ, adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo, na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato. Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāyavasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘iminā tassa pubbābhogo kathito’’ti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 204) vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā ‘‘jhānasaññāyapī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘abhibhavana…pe… atthī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vaḍḍhitappamāṇānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0161^ea^ vipulappamāṇānīti attho, na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ pāpitānīti tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahantānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhattavaḍḍhitaka^eb^nti bhuñjanabhājanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dinnabhattaṃ, ekāsane purisena bhuñjitabbabhattato upaḍḍhabhattanti attho.
[03]Rūpe saññā ^b^rūpasaññā,^eb^ sā assa atthīti ^b^rūpasaññī,^eb^ na rūpasaññī ^b^arūpasaññī,^eb^ saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Rūpasaññāya anuppādanaṃ evettha alābhitā.

[03]^b^Bahiddhāva^eb^^a^P2.0207^ea^^a^V2.0144^ea^^b^uppanna^eb^nti bahiddhā vatthusmiṃyeva uppannaṃ. ^b^Abhidhamme^eb^ pana ‘‘ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni…pe… appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī’’ti (dha. sa. 220) evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā ^b^abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 204) ‘‘kasmā pana ‘yathā suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā’ti codanaṃ katvā ‘ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā, tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni, tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni. ‘Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā’’ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca vaṇṇābhogarahitāni, sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni ‘‘parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī’’ti vuttāni, tathā appamāṇāni ‘‘appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī’’ti. Atthi hi so pariyāyo parittāni abhibhuyya tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti, suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyāti. Pariyāyakathā hi suttantadesanāti. ^b^Abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. 222) pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni, tathā sahitāni. Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanavisesoti. Tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti ‘‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’’tiādinā paṭhamadutiyābhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho, tatiyacatutthābhibhāyatanesu dutiyavimokkho, vaṇṇābhibhāyatanesu tatiyavimokkho ca abhibhavanappavattito saṅgahito. ^b^Abhidhamme^eb^ pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni ^a^P2.0208^ea^; sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni. Tadetaṃ ^a^M2.0162^ea^ ‘‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’’ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ abhibhāyatanesu avacanato ‘‘rūpī rūpāni passatī’’tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati. ‘‘Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato’’ti idaṃ katthacipi ‘‘ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī’’ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘bahiddhā rūpāni passatī’’ti, tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, tena yaṃ aññahetukaṃ, taṃ tena hetunā vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme (dha. sa. 223) vacanaṃ, na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti. Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhā rūpānaṃ viya abhūtattā. Desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathābhāvato. ‘‘Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī’’ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādi abhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce? Taṃ na, nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ ^a^V2.0145^ea^ parittatā, appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ, atha kho nīlādibhāvo evāti. Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imesu panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā^eb^ti sakalanīlavaṇṇanīlanidassananīlanibhāsānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena. ^b^Vaṇṇavasenā^eb^ti sabhāvavaṇṇavasena. ^b^Nidassanavasenā^eb^ti passitabbatāvasena cakkhuviññāṇādiviññāṇavīthiyā gahetabbatāvasena. ^b^Obhāsavasenā^eb^ti sappabhāsatāya avabhāsanavasena. ^b^Umāpuppha^eb^nti atasipupphaṃ. ^b^Nīlameva hoti^eb^ vaṇṇasaṅkarābhāvato. ^b^Bārāṇasisambhava^eb^nti bārāṇasiyaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]Ekaccassa ito bāhirakassa appamāṇaṃ ativitthāritaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ^a^P2.0209^ea^ olokentassa bhayaṃ uppajjeyya ‘‘kiṃ nu kho idaṃ sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā gaṇhātī’’ti, tathāgatassa pana tādisaṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthīti ^b^abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni.^eb^

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uttānatthāyeva^eb^^a^M2.0163^ea^ heṭṭhā atthato vibhattattā. Ekaccassa vimokkhoti ghosopi bhayāvaho vaṭṭābhiratabhāvato, tathāgatassa pana vimokkhe upasampajja viharatopi taṃ natthīti ^b^abhītabhāvadassanatthameva ānītāni.^eb^

[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bodhī^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tañhi ^b^‘‘catumaggañāṇapaṭivedha’’^eb^ntveva vuttaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭivedhassa taṃmūlakattā. ^b^Evaṃ vuttabhāva^eb^nti ‘‘ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyyā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.166) evaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ.
[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tampi^eb^ oḷārikanimittaṃ kataṃ tassa mārena pariyuṭṭhitacetaso ^b^na paṭividdhaṃ^eb^ na sallakkhitaṃ.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādikehī^eb^ti evamādīhi mittāmaccasuhajjāhi. Piyāyitabbato ^b^piyehi.^eb^ Manavaḍḍhanato ^a^V2.0146^ea^^b^manāpehi. Jātiyā^eb^ti jātianurūpagamanena. ^b^Nānābhāvo^eb^ visuṃbhāvo asambaddhabhāvo. ^b^Maraṇena vinābhāvo^eb^ti cutiyā tenattabhāvena apunarāvattanato vippayogo. ^b^Bhavena aññathābhāvo^eb^ti bhavantaraggahaṇena purimākārato aññākāratā ‘‘kāmāvacarasatto rūpāvacaro hotī’’tiādinā, tatthāpi ‘‘manusso devo hotī’’tiādināpi yojetabbo. ^b^Kutettha labbhā^eb^ti kuto kuhiṃ kismiṃ nāma ṭhāne ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ khandhappavatte ‘‘yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ…pe… mā palujjī’’ti laddhuṃ sakkā. Na sakkā eva tādisassa kāraṇassa abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammaṃ ^b^tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ,^eb^ kimaṅgaṃ pana aññesanti adhippāyo. ‘‘Paccāvamissatī’’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^a^P2.0210^ea^ vijjati satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhārānaṃ ossaṭṭhattā, buddhakiccassa ca pariyosāpitattā. Na hettha māsattayato paraṃ buddhaveneyyā labbhantīti.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sāsanassa ciraṭṭhiti nāma sasambhārehi ariyamaggadhammehi kevalehīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ lokiyalokuttaravaseneva kathita’’^eb^nti lokiyāhi ^a^M2.0164^ea^ sīlasamādhipaññāhi vinā lokuttaradhammasamadhigamassa asambhavato.
[06]Tatiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāgāpalokita^eb^nti nāgassa viya apalokitaṃ, hatthināgassa apalokanasadisaṃ apalokananti attho. ^b^Āhaccā^eb^ti phusitvā. ^b^Aṅkusakalaggāni viyā^eb^ti aṅkusakāni viya aññamaññasmiṃ laggāni āsattāni hutvā ṭhitāni. ^b^Ekābaddhānī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ ekato ābaddhāni. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti gīvaṭṭhīnaṃ ekagghanānaṃ viya ekābaddhabhāvena, na kevalaṃ gīvaṭṭhīnaṃyeva, atha kho sabbānipi tāni buddhānaṃ ṭhapetvā bāhusandhiādikā dvādasa mahāsandhiyo, aṅgulisandhiyo ca itarasandhīsu ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni, yato nesaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ kāyabalaṃ hoti. ^b^Vesālinagarābhimukhaṃ akāsi^eb^ kaṇṭakaparivattane viya kapilanagarābhimukhaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ taṃ nāgāpalokitaṃ nāma jātaṃ? Tadajjhāsayaṃ upādāya. Bhagavā ^a^V2.0147^ea^ hi nāgāpalokitavaseneva apaloketukāmo jāto, puññānubhāvena panassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ parivatti, tena taṃ ‘‘nāgāpalokitaṃ’’ tveva vuccati.

[03]‘‘Idaṃ pacchimakaṃ ānanda tathāgatassa ^a^P2.0211^ea^ vesāliyā dassana’’nti nayidaṃ vesāliyā apalokanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ anekantikattā, bhūtakathanamattaṃ panetaṃ. Maggasodhanavasena taṃ dassetvā aññadevettha apalokanakāraṇaṃ dassetukāmo ^b^‘‘nanu cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimadassanameva^eb^ anukkamena kusināraṃ gantvā parinibbātukāmatāya tato tato nikkhantattā. ^b^‘‘Anacchariyattā’’^eb^ti iminā yathāvuttaṃ anekantikattaṃ pariharati, tayidaṃ sodhanamattaṃ. Idaṃ panettha aviparītaṃ kāraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Na hi bhagavā sāpekkho vesāliṃ apalokesi, ‘‘idaṃ pana me gamanaṃ apunarāgamana’’nti dassanamukhena bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya apalokesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apica vesālirājāno’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Antakaro^eb^ti ^a^M2.0165^ea^ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne, parasantāne ca vināsakaro abhāvakaro. Buddhacakkhudhammacakkhudibbacakkhumaṃsacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi ^b^pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.^eb^ Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā sātisayaṃ ^b^kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.^eb^

[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāokāse^eb^ti mahante okāse. Mahantāni dhammassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni. Yesu patiṭṭhāpito dhammo nicchīyati asandehato, kāni pana tāni? Āgamanavisiṭṭhāni suttotaraṇādīni. Dutiyavikappe apadisantīti ^b^apadesā,^eb^ ‘‘sammukhā metaṃ āvuso bhagavato suta’’ntiādinā kenaci ābhatassa ‘‘dhammo’’ti vinicchinane kāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Tassa yathābhatassa suttotaraṇādi eva. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cattāroti? Yasmā dhammassa dve samparāyā satthā, sāvakā ca, tesu ca sāvakā saṅghagaṇapuggalavasena tividhā ^a^P2.0212^ea^, evaṃ ‘‘tumhākaṃ mayā yaṃ dhammo paṭiggahito’’ti apadisitabbānaṃ bhedena cattāro. Tenāha ‘‘sammukhā me taṃ āvuso bhagavato suta’’ntiādi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ ^b^nettiyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘cattāro mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso saṅghāpadeso sambahulattherāpadeso ekattherāpadeso. Ime cattāro mahāpadesā’’ti (netti. 18) buddho apadeso etassāti ^b^buddhāpadeso.^eb^ Esa nayo sesesupi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhādayo…pe… mahākāraṇānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^188^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Neva^eb^^a^V2.0148^ea^^b^abhinanditabba^eb^nti na sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ganthassa sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma savananti āha ^b^‘‘na sotabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Padabyañjanānī^eb^ti padāni ca byañjanāni ca, atthapadāni, byañjanapadāni cāti attho. Pajjati attho etehīti ^b^padāni,^eb^ akkharādīni byañjanapadāni. Pajjitabbato ^b^padāni,^eb^ saṅkāsanādīni atthapadāni. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^pana ‘‘‘padasaṅkhātāni byañjanānī’ti byañjanapadāneva vuttānī’’ti keci, taṃ na, atthaṃ byañjentīti byañjanāni, byañjanapadāni, tehi byañjitabbato byañjanāni, atthapadānīti ubhayasaṅgahato. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti tenābhatasuttassa imasmiṃ padese. ^b^Pāḷi vuttā^eb^ti kevalo pāḷidhammo pavatto. ^b^Attho vutto^eb^ti pāḷiyā attho pavatto niddiṭṭho. ^b^Anusandhi kathito^eb^ti yathāraddhadesanāya, upari desanāya ca anusandhānaṃ kathitaṃ sambandho kathito ^a^M2.0166^ea^. ^b^Pubbāparaṃ kathita^eb^nti pubbenāparaṃ avirujjhanañceva visesādhānañca kathitaṃ pakāsitaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷidhammādīni sammadeva sallakkhetvā gahaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu gahetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sutte otāretabbānī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0213^ea^ ñāṇena sutte ogāhetvā tāretabbāni, taṃ pana ogāhetvā taraṇaṃ tattha otaraṇaṃ anuppavesanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sutte otāretabbānī’’^eb^ti. Saṃsandetvā dassanaṃ ^b^sandassana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vinaye saṃsandetabbānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kiṃ pana taṃ suttaṃ, ko vā vinayoti vicāraṇāya ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vinayo^eb^ti vibhaṅgapāṭhamāha. So hi mātikāsaññitassa suttassa atthasūcanato ‘‘sutta’’nti vattabbataṃ arahati. Vividhanayattā, visiṭṭhanayattā ca ^b^vinayo,^eb^ khandhakapāṭho. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ suttavinayesu pariggayhamānesu ^b^vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādīyati^eb^ parivārapāḷiyā asaṅgahitattā. ^b^Suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ^eb^ atthasūcanādiatthasambhavato. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti ‘‘suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayo’’ti evaṃ suttavinayavibhāge vuccamānepi. ^b^Na tāva pariyādīyantī^eb^ti na tāva anavasesato pariggayhanti, kasmāti āha ^b^‘‘asuttanāmakañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Yasmā ‘‘sutta’’nti imaṃ nāmaṃ anāropetvā saṅgītampi jātakādibuddhavacanaṃ atthi, tasmā vuttanayena tīṇi piṭakāni na pariyādiṇṇānīti. Suttanipātaudānaitivuttakādīni dīghanikāyādayo viya suttanāmaṃ āropetvā asaṅgītānīti adhippāye panettha jātakādīhi saddhiṃ tānipi gahitāni. Buddhavaṃsacariyāpiṭakānaṃ panettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ maggitabbaṃ, kiṃ vā tena magganena? Sabbopāyaṃ vaṇṇanānayo theravādaṃ dassanamukhena paṭikkhitto evāti.

[03]^b^Atthī^eb^ti kiṃ atthi, asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthi evāti dasseti. Tathā hi nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^a^V2.0149^ea^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā; sārattha. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā) amhehi vuttaṃ ^a^P2.0214^ea^ ‘‘suttanti sāmaññavidhi, visesavidhayo pare’’ti. ^b^Taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvā^eb^ ‘‘suttanti vinayo’’tiādinā vuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ ‘‘nāyamattho idhādhippeto’’ti paṭisodhetvā. Vineti etena kileseti ^b^vinayo,^eb^ kilesavinayanūpāyo, so eva ca naṃ karotīti ^b^kāraṇa^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vinayo pana kāraṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Dhamme^eb^ti ^a^M2.0167^ea^ pariyattidhamme. ^b^Sarāgāyā^eb^ti sarāgabhāvāya kāmarāgabhavarāgaparibrūhanāya. ^b^Saññogāyā^eb^ti bhavasaṃyojanāya. ^b^Ācayāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanatthāya. ^b^Mahicchatāyā^eb^ti mahicchabhāvāya. ^b^Asantuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti asantuṭṭhibhāvāya. ^b^Saṅgaṇikāyā^eb^ti kilesasaṅgaṇagaṇasaṅgaṇavihārāya. ^b^Kosajjāyā^eb^ti kusītabhāvāya. ^b^Dubbharatāyā^eb^ti dupposatāya. ^b^Virāgāyā^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭato virajjanatthāya. ^b^Visaññogāyā^eb^ti kāmabhavādīhi visaṃyujjanatthāya. ^b^Apacayāyā^eb^ti sabbassāpi vaṭṭassa apacayanāya, nibbānāyāti attho. ^b^Appicchatāyā^eb^ti paccayappicchatādivasena sabbaso icchāpagamāya. ^b^Santuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhibhāvāya. ^b^Pavivekāyā^eb^ti pavivittabhāvāya, kāyavivekāditadaṅgavivekādivivekasiddhiyā. ^b^Vīriyārambhāyā^eb^ti kāyikassa ceva, cetasikassa ca vīriyassa paggahaṇatthāya. ^b^Subharatāyā^eb^ti sukhaposanatthāya. Evaṃ yo pariyattidhammo uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchāmanasikāravasena yoniso paṭipajjantassa sarāgādibhāvaparivajjanassa kāraṇaṃ hutvā virāgādibhāvāya saṃvattati, ekaṃsato ^b^eso dhammo. Eso vinayo,^eb^ sammadeva ^a^P2.0215^ea^ apāyādīsu apatanavasena dhāraṇato, kilesānaṃ vinayanato, satthu sammāsambuddhassa ovādānusiṭṭhibhāvato ^b^etaṃ satthusāsananti dhāreyyāsi^eb^ jāneyyāsi, avabujjheyyāsīti attho. Catusaccassa sūcanaṃ suttanti āha ^b^‘‘sutteti tepiṭake buddhavacane’’^eb^ti. Tepiṭakañhi buddhavacanaṃ saccavinimuttaṃ natthi. Rāgādivinayanakāraṇaṃ tathāgatena suttapadena pakāsitanti āha ^b^‘‘vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe’’^eb^ti.

[03]Sutte osaraṇañcettha tepiṭake buddhavacane pariyāpannatāvaseneva veditabbaṃ, na aññathāti āha ^b^‘‘suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci anāgantvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Challiṃ uṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti arogassa mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato upakkamena challiyā sakalikāya, papaṭikāya vā uṭṭhapanaṃ viya arogassa sāsanadhammassa tiṭṭhato byañjanamattena tappariyāpannaṃ viya hutvā challisadisaṃ pubbāparaviruddhatādidosaṃ uṭṭhapetvā paridīpetvā, tādisāni pana ekaṃsato guḷhavessantarādipariyāpannāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘guḷhavessantara…pe…paññāyantīti attho’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0150^ea^. ^b^Rāgādivinaye^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ vinayanatthe. Tadākāratāya ^b^na paññāyamānāni^eb^ na dissamānāni ^b^chaḍḍetabbāni^eb^ vajjitabbāni na gahetabbāni. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbavāresu.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ^eb^^a^M2.0168^ea^^b^pana ṭhāne^eb^ti imasmiṃ mahāpadesaniddesaṭṭhāne. ^b^‘‘Sutte cattāro mahāpadesā’’^eb^tiādinā vuttampi avuttena saddhiṃ gahetvā pakiṇṇakakathāya mātikaṃ uddisati. Ñātuṃ ^a^P2.0216^ea^ icchito attho ^b^pañho,^eb^ tassa vissajjanāni ^b^pañhābyākaraṇāni,^eb^ atthasūcanādiatthena ^b^suttaṃ,^eb^ pāḷi, taṃ suttaṃ anulometi anukūletīti ^b^suttānulomaṃ,^eb^ mahāpadeso. Ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti ^b^ācariyavādo^eb^ aṭṭhakathā. Tassa tassa therassa attano eva mati adhippāyoti ^b^attanomati. Dhammavinicchaye patte^eb^ti dhamme vinicchinitabbe upaṭṭhite. ^b^Ime^eb^ti anantaraṃ vuttā cattāro mahāpadesā. Pamīyati dhammo paricchijjati vinicchīyati etenāti ^b^pamāṇaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ ettha sametī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Itara^eb^nti mahāpadesesu asamentaṃ. Puna ^b^itara^eb^nti akappiyaṃ anulomentaṃ kappiyaṃ paṭibāhantaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03]Ekaṃseneva byākātabbo vissajjetabboti ^b^ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo. Vibhajjā^eb^ti pucchitamatthaṃ avadhāraṇādibhedena vibhajitvā. ^b^Paṭipucchā^eb^ti pucchantaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā. ^b^Ṭhapanīyo^eb^ti tidhāpi avissajjanīyattā ṭhapanīyo byākaraṇaṃ akatvā ṭhapetabbo. ‘‘Cakkhuṃ anicca’’nti pañhe uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ekaṃseneva byākātabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ niccatāya lesassāpi tattha abhāvato. Purimapadāvadhāraṇe pana vibhajjabyākaraṇīyatā cakkhusotesu visesatthasāmaññatthānaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvato. Dvinnaṃ tesaṃ sadisatācodanā paṭipucchanamukheneva byākaraṇīyā paṭikkhepavasena, anuññātavasena ca vissajjitabbatoti āha ^b^‘‘yathā cakkhu, tathā sotaṃ…pe… ayaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra^eb^nti jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpañho. Yassa yena anaññatācoditā, so eva paramatthato ^a^P2.0217^ea^ nupalabbhatīti vañjhātanayassa matteyyatākittanasadisoti abyākātabbatāya ṭhapanīyo vuttoti. ^b^Imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni pamāṇaṃ^eb^ teneva nayena tesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākātabbato.

[03]Vinayamahāpadeso kappiyānulomavidhānato nippariyāyato ^b^anulomakappiyaṃ^eb^ nāma, mahāpadesabhāvena pana taṃsadisatāya suttantamahāpadesesupi ^b^‘‘anulomakappiya’’^eb^nti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāvohāro. Yadipi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitapakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā, sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva ^a^M2.0169^ea^ vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā ^b^‘‘ācariyavādo’’^eb^ti vuccati ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti. Tenāha ^a^V2.0151^ea^^b^‘‘ācariyavādo nāma aṭṭhakathā’’^eb^ti. Tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷho eva ca buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo ^b^mahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ^eb^ābhato pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi ^b^sīhaḷabhāsāya^eb^ ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ. ^b^Attanomati nāma^eb^ theravādo. ^b^Nayaggāhenā^eb^ti suttādito labbhamānanayaggahaṇena. ^b^Anubuddhiyā^eb^ti suttādīniyeva anugatabuddhiyā. ^b^Attano paṭibhāna^eb^nti attano eva tassa atthassa vuttanayena upaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāupaṭṭhitā atthā eva tathā vuttā. ^b^Samentameva gahetabba^eb^nti yathā suttena saṃsandati, evaṃ mahāpadesato atthā uddharitabbāti dasseti. Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa kadāci pāḷiyā asaṃsandanāpi siyā, so na gahetabboti dassento āha ^b^‘‘ācariyavādopi suttena samentoyeva^eb^^b^gahetabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbadubbalā^eb^ puggalassa sayaṃ paṭibhānabhāvato. Tathā ca ^b^sāpi gahetabbā,^eb^ kīdisī? ^b^Suttena samentā yevā^eb^ti yojanā. ^b^Tāsū^eb^ti tīsu saṅgītīsu. ^b^‘‘Āgatameva pamāṇa’’^eb^nti iminā mahākassapādīhi saṅgītameva ‘‘sutta’’nti idhādhippetanti tadaññassa ^a^P2.0218^ea^ suttabhāvameva paṭikkhipati. Tadatthā eva hi tisso saṅgītiyo. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti gārayhasutte. ^b^Na ceva sutte osaranti, na ca vinaye sandissantīti veditabbāni^eb^ tassa asuttabhāvato tena ‘‘anulomakappiyaṃ suttena samentameva gahetabba’’nti vuttaṃ evatthaṃ nigamanavasena nidasseti. Sabbattha ‘‘na itara’’nti vacanaṃ tattha tattha gahitāvadhāraṇaphaladassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sūkaramaddava^eb^nti vanavarāhassa mudumaṃsaṃ. Yasmā cundo ariyasāvako sotāpanno, aññe ca bhagavato, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca āhāraṃ paṭiyādentā anavajjameva paṭiyādenti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pavattamaṃsa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṃ kirā^eb^ti ‘‘nātitaruṇassā’’tiādinā vuttavisesaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ ^b^‘‘mudu ceva siniddhañcā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Mudumaṃsabhāvato hi abhisaṅkharaṇavisesena ca ‘‘maddava’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu^eb^ ‘‘ayaṃ bhagavato pacchimako āhāro’’ti puññavisesāpekkhāya, taṃ pana tathāpakkhittadibbojatāya garutaraṃ jātaṃ.
[03]Aññe ^a^M2.0170^ea^ yaṃ dujjīraṃ, taṃ ajānantā ‘‘kassaci adatvā vināsita’’nti upavadeyyunti ^b^parūpavādamocanatthaṃ^eb^ bhagavā ‘‘nāhaṃ ta’’ntiādinā sīhanādaṃ nadati.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kathaṃ panāyaṃ sīhanādo nanu taṃ bhagavatopi sammāpariṇāmaṃ na gatanti? Nayidaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yasmā ‘‘sammadeva taṃ bhagavato pariṇāmaṃ gata’’nti vattuṃ arahati tappaccayā uppannassa ^a^V2.0152^ea^ vikārassa abhāvato, aññapaccayassa ca vikārassa mudubhāvaṃ āpāditattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na pana bhuttappaccayā’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi bhagavā, aññe vā pana khīṇāsavā navavedanuppādanavasena āhāraṃ paribhuñjanti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatameva katvā āhārassa upabhuñjanato. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘bhattaṃ bhuttāvissa kharo ābādho uppajjī’’tiādi vuttaṃ? Taṃ bhojanuttarakālaṃ ^a^P2.0219^ea^ uppannattā vuttaṃ. ‘‘Na pana bhuttapaccayā’’ti vutto vāyamattho ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.^eb^ Katupacitassa laddhokāsassa kammassa vasena balavatipi roge uppanne garusiniddhabhojanappaccayā vedanāniggaho jāto, tenāha ^b^‘‘yadi hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Patthitaṭṭhāne^eb^ti icchitaṭṭhāne, icchā cassa tattha gantvā vinetabbaveneyyāpekkhā daṭṭhabbā. Gāthāyampi ^b^‘‘suta’’^eb^nti iminā sutamattaṃ, paresaṃ vacanamattametaṃ, na pana bhojanappaccayā ābādhaṃ phusi dhīroti dasseti.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pasannabhāvena udakassa acchabhāvo veditabboti āha ^b^‘‘acchodakāti pasannodakā’’^eb^ti. Sādurasattā sātatāti āha ^b^‘‘madhurodakā’’^eb^ti. Tanukameva salilaṃ visesato sītalaṃ, na bahalanti āha ^b^‘‘tanusītalasalilā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nikkaddamā^eb^ti setabhāvassa kāraṇamāha. Paṅkacikkhallādivasena hi udakassa vivaṇṇatā, sabhāvato pana taṃ setavaṇṇaṃ evāti.

[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhuravāte^eb^ti paṭimukhavāte. ^b^Dīghapiṅgalo^eb^ti dīgho hutvā piṅgalacakkhuko. Piṅgalakkhiko hi so ‘‘āḷāro’’ti paññāyittha. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti dakkhati karissati bhavissatīti īdisaṃ. ^b^Īdisesū^eb^ti yatra yaṃcāti evarūpanipātasaddayuttaṭṭhānesu.

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vicarantiyo ^a^M2.0171^ea^ meghagabbhato niccharantiyo viya hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘niccharantīsūti vicarantīsū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Navavidhāyā^eb^ti navappakārāya. Navasu hi pakāresu ekavidhāpi asani tappariyāpannatāya ‘‘navavidhā’’ tveva vuccati. Īdisī hi esā ruḷhi aṭṭhavimokkhapattipi samaññā viya. ^b^Asaññaṃ karoti,^eb^ yo tassā saddena ^a^P2.0220^ea^, tejasā ca ajjhotthaṭo. ^b^Ekaṃ cakka^eb^nti ekaṃ maṇḍalaṃ. Saṅkāraṃ tīrentī paricchijjantī viya dassetīti ^b^saterā. Gaggarāyamānā^eb^ti gaggarātisaddaṃ karontī, anuravadassanañhetaṃ. ^b^Kapisīsā^eb^ti kapisīsākāravatī. ^b^Macchavilolikā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0153^ea^ udake paripphandamānamaccho viya viluḷitākārā. ^b^Kukkuṭasadisā^eb^ti pasāritapakkhakukkuṭākārā. Naṅgalassa kassanakāle kassakānaṃ hatthena gahetabbaṭṭhāne maṇikā hoti, taṃ upādāya naṅgalaṃ ‘‘daṇḍamaṇikā’’ti vuccati, tasmā daṇḍamaṇikākārā ^b^daṇḍamaṇikā.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘naṅgalasadisā’’^eb^ti. Deve vassantepi sajotibhūtatāya udakena atemetabbato mahāsani ^b^‘‘sukkhāsanī’’^eb^ti vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘patitaṭṭhānaṃ samugghāṭetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Bhusāgārake^eb^ti bhusamaye agārake. Tattha kira mahantaṃ palālapuñjaṃ abbhantarato palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā sālāsadisaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vasanayoggaṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ, tadā bhagavā tattha vasi, taṃ pana khalamaṇḍalaṃ sālāsadisanti āha ^b^‘‘khalasālāya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti hetumhi bhummavacananti āha ^b^‘‘etasmiṃ kāraṇe’’^eb^ti, asanipātena channaṃ janānaṃ hatakāraṇeti attho. ^b^So tvaṃ bhante^eb^ti ayameva vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^194^eb^^b^.^eb^ Siṅgī nāma kira uttamaṃ ativiya pabhassaraṃ buddhānaṃ chavivaṇṇobhāsaṃ devalokato āgatasuvaṇṇaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘siṅgīsuvaṇṇavaṇṇa’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Kiṃ pana thero taṃ gaṇhī’’ti sayameva pucchaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Teneva kāraṇenā^eb^ti upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānassa matthakappatti, paresaṃ ^a^P2.0221^ea^ vacanokāsapacchedanaṃ, tena vatthena satthu pūjanaṃ, satthu ajjhāsayānuvattananti iminā teneva yathāvuttena catubbidhena kāraṇena.

[03]^b^195^eb^^b^.^eb^ Thero ca tāvadeva taṃ siṅgīvaṇṇaṃ maṭṭhadussaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi ‘‘paṭiggaṇhatu me bhante bhagavā imaṃ maṭṭhadussaṃ, taṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti. Paṭiggahesi bhagavā, paṭiggahetvāva naṃ paribhuñji ^a^M2.0172^ea^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavāpi tato ekaṃ nivāsesi, ekaṃ pārupī’’^eb^ti. Tāvadeva kira taṃ bhikkhū ovaṭṭikaraṇamattena tunnakammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā therassa upanesuṃ, thero bhagavato upanāmesi. ^b^Hataccikaṃ viyā^eb^ti paṭihatappabhaṃ, ^b^viya^eb^-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Bhagavato hi sarīrappabhāhi abhibhuyyamānā tassa vatthayugassa pabhassaratā nāhosi. ^b^Antantenevā^eb^ti anto anto eva, abbhantarato evāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bahipanassa pabhā natthī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^‘‘Pasannarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti etenetassa āhārassa bhuttappaccayā na so rogoti ayamattho dīpito. ^b^Dvīsu kālesu evaṃ hoti^eb^ dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ samadhigamasamayabhāvato. ^b^Upavattane antarena yamakasālāna^eb^nti ettha vattabbaṃ parato āgamissati.
[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0154^ea^^b^suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva ahosi^eb^ ativiya parisuddhāya pabhassarāya ekagghanāya bhagavato sarīrappabhāya nirantaraṃ abhibhūtattā.
[03]^b^Dhamme^eb^ti pariyattidhamme. ^b^Pavattā^eb^ti pāvacanabhāvena desetā. ^b^Puratova nisīdi^eb^ ovādappaṭikaraṇabhāvato.

[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā^eb^^a^P2.0222^ea^^b^lābhā^eb^ti vaṇṇadānabaladānādibhedā dānassa ānisaṃsasaññitā diṭṭhadhammikā, samparāyikā ca lābhā icchitabbā. ^b^Te alābhā^eb^ti te sabbe tuyhaṃ alābhā, lābhā eva na honti. Diṭṭheva dhamme paccakkhabhūte imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhavā ^b^diṭṭhadhammikā.^eb^ Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato ‘‘samparāyo’’ti laddhanāme paraloke bhavā ^b^samparāyikā. ^eb^ Diṭṭhadhammikā ca samparāyikā ca ^b^diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā. Dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā^eb^ti dānānisaṃsabhūtā lābhā. Sabbathā samameva hutvā samaṃ phalaṃ etesaṃ na ekadesenāti ^b^samasamaphalā. Piṇḍapātā^eb^ti tabbisayaṃ dānamayaṃ puññamāha.

[03]Yadi khettavasena nesaṃ samaphalatā adhippetā, satipi ekasantānabhāve puthujjanārahantabhāvasiddhaṃ nanu tesaṃ khettaṃ visiṭṭhanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nanu cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Parinibbānasamatāyā^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānakhandhaparinibbānabhāvena parinibbānasamatāya. ^b^‘‘Paribhuñjitvā parinibbuto’’^eb^ti etena ^a^M2.0173^ea^ yathā paṇītapiṇḍapātaparibhogūpatthambhitarūpakāyasannissayo dhammakāyo sukheneva kilese pariccaji, bhojanasappāyasaṃsiddhiyā evaṃ sukheneva khandhe pariccajīti evaṃ kilesapariccāgassa, khandhapariccāgassa ca sukhasiddhinimittatāya ubhinnaṃ piṇḍapātānaṃ samaphalatā jotitā. ‘‘Piṇḍapātasīsena ca piṇḍapātadānaṃ jotita’’nti vutto vāyamattho. Yathā hi sujātāya ‘‘imaṃ āhāraṃ nissāya mayhaṃ devatāya vaṇṇasukhabalādiguṇā sammadeva sampajjeyyu’’nti uḷāro ajjhāsayo tadā ahosi, evaṃ cundassapi kammāraputtassa ‘‘imaṃ āhāraṃ nissāya bhagavato vaṇṇasukhabalādiguṇā sammadeva sampajjeyyu’’nti uḷāro ajjhāsayoti evampi nesaṃ ubhinnaṃ samaphalatā veditabbā. Satipi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattīnaṃ devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattibhāve yathā pana abhisambujjhanadivase abhinavavipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento rūpasattakādi (visuddhi. ṭī. 2.707 vitthāro) vasena cuddasahākārehi ^a^P2.0223^ea^ sannetvā mahāvipassanāmukhena tā samāpattiyo samāpajji, evaṃ parinibbānadivasepi sabbā tā samāpajjīti evaṃ samāpattisamatāyapi tesaṃ samaphalatā. Cundassa tāva anussaraṇaṃ uḷārataraṃ hotu bhagavato dinnabhāvena aññathattābhāvato, sujātāya pana ^a^V2.0155^ea^ kathaṃ devatāya dinnanti? Evaṃsaññibhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘sujātā cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aparabhāge^eb^ti abhisambodhito aparabhāge. Puna ^b^aparabhāge^eb^ti parinibbānato parato. ^b^Dhammasīsa^eb^nti dhammānaṃ matthakabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Me gahita^eb^nti mama vasena gahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mayhaṃ kirā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]Adhipatibhāvo ^b^ādhipateyya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘jeṭṭhabhāvasaṃvattaniyaka’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Saṃvare^eb^ti sīlasaṃvare. ^b^Vera^eb^nti pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaṃ veraṃ. Tañhi veridhammabhāvato, verahetutāya ca ‘‘vera’’nti vuccati. Kosallaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena yutto ^b^kusalo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno’’^eb^ti. Ñāṇasampadā nāma ñāṇapāripūrī, sā ca aggamaggavasena veditabbā, aggamaggo ca niravasesato kilese pajahatīti āha ^b^‘‘ariyamaggena…pe… jahātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Imaṃ pāpakaṃ jahitvā^eb^ti dānena tāva lobhamacchariyādipāpakaṃ, sīlena pāṇātipātādipāpakaṃ jahitvā tadaṅgavasena pahāya tato samathavipassanādhammehi vikkhambhanavasena, tato maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ pahāya. Tathā ^a^M2.0174^ea^ pahīnattā eva ^b^rāgādīnaṃ khayā kilesanibbānena^eb^ sabbaso kilesavūpasamena ^b^nibbuto^eb^ parinibbutoti saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘iti cundassa…pe… sampassamāno udānaṃ udānesī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Catutthabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0224^ea^^b^taṃ kusinārāyaṃ hotī^eb^ti yathā anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ, evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ hoti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti ^b^‘‘upavattana’’nti vuccati,^eb^ taṃ sālapantibhāvena ṭhitaṃ sālavanaṃ. ^b^Antarenā^eb^ti vemajjhe. ^b^Tassa kira mañcakassā^eb^ti tattha paññapiyamānassa tassa mañcakassa. ^b^Tatrāpi…pe… eko pādabhāgassa,^eb^ tasmā ‘‘antarena yamakasālāna’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṃsibbitvā^eb^ti aññamaññāasattaviṭapasākhatāya saṃsibbitvā viya. ^b^‘‘Ṭhitasākhā’’tipi vuttaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘uttarasīsakaṃ mañcakaṃ ^a^V2.0156^ea^ paññapehī’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pacchimadassanaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgatānaṃ devatānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ yogyatāvasena vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘uttaradisāvilokanamukhaṃ pubbadisāsīsakaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññapehīti attho’’ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.

[03]^b^Ete nāgānamuttamā^eb^ti ete gottato gocariādināmakā hatthināgesu balena seṭṭhatamā. ^b^Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.148) pana keci hatthino ito aññathā āgatā, so pana nesaṃ nāmamattakato bhedo daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Paribhuttakālato paṭṭhāya…pe… parikkhayaṃ gataṃ,^eb^ ‘‘na pana paribhuttappaccayā’’ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Caṅgavāre^eb^ti ūmiyaṃ. Katokāsassa kammassa vasena yathāsamuṭṭhito rogo ārogyaṃ abhimaddatīti katvā etamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā bhagavā heṭṭhā vuttanayena ^a^P2.0225^ea^ kappaṃ, kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhātuṃ samattho eva, tattakaṃ kālaṃ ^a^M2.0175^ea^ ṭhāne payojanābhāvato āyusaṅkhāre ossajjitvā tādisassa kammassa okāsaṃ adāsi, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento ‘‘viyā’’tipi vattuṃ yujjatiyeva.
[03]^b^Kusalaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissanti^eb^ ‘‘evaṃ mahapphalaṃ, evaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ, mahānubhāvañca taṃ kusala’’nti.

[03]Ekassāpi sattassa vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamo buddhānaṃ garutaro hutvā upaṭṭhāti atidullabhabhāvato, tasmā ^b^‘‘aparampi passatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, svāyamattho ^b^māgaṇḍiyasuttena^eb^ (su. ni. 841) dīpetabbo.
[03]Tatiyaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjanakānatthapariharaṇanti taṃ dassento puna ^b^‘‘aparampi passatī’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]^b^Sīhaseyya^eb^nti. Ettha sayanaṃ ^b^seyyā,^eb^ sīhassa viya seyyā sīhaseyyā, taṃ ^b^sīhaseyyaṃ.^eb^ Atha vā ^b^sīhaseyya^eb^nti seṭṭhaseyyaṃ, yadidaṃ atthadvayaṃ parato āgamissati.
[03]‘‘Vāmena passena sentī’’ti evaṃ vuttā ^b^kāmabhogiseyyā,^eb^^b^dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi^eb^ dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādiyogakkhamato, purisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Ekena^eb^^a^V2.0157^ea^^b^passena sayituṃ na sakkonti^eb^ dukkhuppattito.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ sīhaseyyā^eb^ti ayaṃ evaṃ vuttā sīhaseyyā. ^b^‘‘Tejussadattā’’^eb^ti iminā sīhassa abhīrubhāvaṃ dasseti. Bhīrukā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ pavisitvā santāsapubbakaṃ yathā tathā sayanti, sīho pana abhīrubhāvato satokārī bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvāva sayati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘purimapāde’’^eb^tiādi. Dakkhiṇe purimapāde vāmassa purimapādassa ṭhapanavasena ^b^dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Pacchimapāde^eb^ti dve pacchimapāde. Vuttanayeneva idhāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pādaṭṭhapanaṃ veditabbaṃ, ^b^ṭhitokāsasallakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ abhīrubhāveneva. ^b^‘‘Sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā’’^eb^tiādinā vuttā sīhakiriyā anutrāsapabujjhanaṃ ^a^P2.0226^ea^ viya abhīrubhāvasiddhā dhammatāvasenevāti veditabbā. ^b^Sīhavijambhitavijambhanaṃ^eb^ ativelaṃ ekākārena ṭhapitānaṃ sarīrāvayavānaṃ gamanādikiriyāsu yogyabhāvāpādanatthaṃ. ^b^Tikkhattuṃ sīhanādanadanaṃ^eb^ appesakkhamigajātapariharaṇatthaṃ.

[03]Seti ^a^M2.0176^ea^ abyāvaṭabhāvena pavattati etthāti ^b^seyyā,^eb^ catutthajjhānameva seyyā ^b^catutthajjhānaseyyā.^eb^ Kiṃ pana taṃ catutthajjhānanti? Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ, tato hi vuṭṭhahitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā tathāgato jātoti. ‘‘Tayidaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, na seyyā, tathāpi yasmā ‘catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī’ti (dī. ni. 2.219) vakkhati, tasmā lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti eva tathāgataseyyā’’ti keci, evaṃ sati parinibbānakālikāva tathāgataseyyāti āpajjati, na ca bhagavā lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpajjanabahulo vihāsi. Aggaphalavasena pavattaṃ panettha catutthajjhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamanalakkhaṇā seyyā bhavaṅgacittavasena hoti, sā ca nesaṃ paṭhamajātisamanvayā yebhuyyavuttikā, evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ ‘‘tathāgataseyyā’’ti veditabbaṃ. Sīhaseyyā nāma seṭṭhaseyyāti āha ^b^‘‘uttamaseyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Natthi etissā uṭṭhānanti ^b^anuṭṭhānā,^eb^ seyyā, taṃ ^b^anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Ito uṭṭhahissāmī’’ti manasikārassa abhāvato ^b^‘‘uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā’’ti na vuttaṃ.^eb^^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ anuṭṭhānaseyyupagamane. ^b^Kāyavasena anuṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ na cittavasena, cittavasena ca anuṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddupagamananti ^a^P2.0227^ea^ tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niddāvasenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhavaṅgassā^eb^ti niddupagamanalakkhaṇassa bhavaṅgassa.

[03]^b^Sabbapāliphullā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0158^ea^ sabbatthakameva vikasanavasena phullā, na ekadesavikasanavasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbe samantato pupphitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekacchannā^eb^ti samphullapupphehi ekākārena sabbattheva chāditā. ^b^Ullokapadumānī^eb^ti heṭṭhā olokentāni viya tiṭṭhanapadumāni. ^b^Morapiñchakalāpo viya^eb^ pañcavaṇṇapupphasañchāditattā.
[03]^b^Nandapokkharaṇīsambhavānī^eb^ti nandapokkharaṇītīrasambhavāni. ^b^Mahātumbamatta^eb^nti āḷhakamattaṃ. ^b^Paviṭṭhānī^eb^ti khittāni. ^b^Sarīrameva okirantī^eb^ti sarīrameva ajjhokiranti.

[03]^b^Devatānaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0177^ea^^b^upakappanacandanacuṇṇānī^eb^ti saṭṭhipi paññāsampi yojanāni vāyanakasetavaṇṇacandanacuṇṇāni. ^b^Dibbagandhajālacuṇṇānī^eb^ti dibbagandhadibbacuṇṇāni. ^b^Haritālāñjanacuṇṇādīni^eb^pi dibbāni paramasugandhāni evāti veditabbāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sabbadibbagandhavāsavikatiyo’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā antalikkhe vajjanti^eb^ mahābhinikkhamanakāle viya.

[03]^b^Tā^eb^ti devatā. ^b^Ganthamānā vā^eb^ti mālaṃ racantiyo eva. ^b^Apariniṭṭhitā vā^eb^ti yathādhippāyaṃ pariyositā eva. ^b^Hatthena hattha^eb^nti attano hatthena parassa hatthaṃ. ^b^Gīvāya gīva^eb^nti kaṇṭhagāhavasena attano gīvāya parassa gīvaṃ. ^b^Gahetvā^eb^ti āmasitvā. ^b^Mahāyaso mahāyaso^eb^ti āmeḍitavasena aññamaññaṃ ālāpavacanaṃ.
[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahantaṃ ussāha^eb^nti tathāgatassa pūjāsakkāravasena pavattiyamānaṃ mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ ^b^disvā.^eb^
[03]^b^Sāyeva^eb^^a^P2.0228^ea^^b^pana paṭipadā^eb^ti pubbabhāgapaṭipadā eva. ^b^Anucchavikattā^eb^ti adhigantabbassa navavidhalokuttaradhammassa anurūpattā.

[03]^b^Sīla^eb^nti cārittasīlamāha. ^b^Ācārapaññattī^eb^ti cārittasīlaṃ. ^b^Yāva gotrabhuto^eb^ti yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ, tāva pavattetabbā samathavipassanā ^b^sammāpaṭipadā.^eb^ Idāni taṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ byatirekato, anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Jinakāḷasutta^eb^nti jinamahāvaḍḍhakinā ṭhapitaṃ vajjetabbagahetabbadhammasandassanakāḷasuttaṃ sikkhāpadamariyādaṃ, upāsakopāsikāvāresu ^a^V2.0159^ea^^b^‘‘gandhapūjaṃ mālāpūjaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti vacanaṃ cārittasīlapakkhe ṭhapetvā karaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tena bhikkhubhikkhunīnampi tathākaraṇaṃ anuññātamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Ayañhī^eb^ti dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^200^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Apanesī^eb^ti ṭhitappadesato yathā apagacchati, evamakāsi, na pana nibbhacchi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ānando’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vuttasadisā vā^eb^ti ^b^samacittapariyāyadesanāyaṃ^eb^ (a. ni. 2.37) vuttasadisā eva. ^b^Āvārento^eb^ti chādento.
[03]Yasmā ^a^M2.0178^ea^ kassapassabuddhassa cetiye ārakkhadevatā ahosi, tasmā therova tejussado, na aññe arahantoti ānetvā yojanā.

[03]Idāni āgamanato paṭṭhāya tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vipassimhi kira sammāsambuddhe’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^‘‘Cātumahārājikā devatā’’^eb^ti idaṃ gobalībaddañāyena gahetabbaṃ bhummadevatādīnampi tappariyāpannattā. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ manussānaṃ.
[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti kassapassa bhagavato cetiye.
[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhivāsentī^eb^ti rocenti.

[03]Chinnapāto viya chinnapāto, taṃ ^b^chinnapātaṃ,^eb^^a^P2.0229^ea^ bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso yaṃ. ^b^Āvaṭṭantī^eb^ti abhimukhabhāvena vaṭṭanti. Yattha patitā, tato katipayaratanaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavaseneva gantvā puna yathāpatitameva ṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavasena āgacchanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āvaṭṭantiyo^eb^^b^patitaṭṭhānameva āgacchantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vivaṭṭantī^eb^ti yattha patitā, tato vinivaṭṭanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘patitaṭṭhānato parabhāgaṃ vaṭṭamānā gacchantī’’^eb^ti. Purato vaṭṭanaṃ ^b^āvaṭṭanaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ tividhampi ^b^vivaṭṭana^eb^nti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Devatā dhāretuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ udakaṃ viya osīdanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti pakatipathaviyaṃ. ^b^Devatā osīdanti^eb^ dhātūnaṃ saṇhasukhumālabhāvato. ^b^Pathaviyaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0160^ea^^b^pathaviṃ māpesu^eb^nti pakatipathaviyaṃ attano sarīraṃ dhāretuṃ samatthaṃ iddhānubhāvena pathaviṃ māpesuṃ.

[03]Kāmaṃ domanasse asatipi ekacco rāgo hotiyeva, rāge pana asati domanassassa asambhavo evāti tadekaṭṭhabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘vītarāgāti pahīnadomanassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Silāthambhasadisā^eb^ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikāratāya.

[03]^b^202^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Apāragaṅgāyā^eb^ti gaṅgāya orambhāge. ^b^‘‘Saṅkārachaḍḍakasammajjaniyo gahetvā’’^eb^tiādi attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne vattakaraṇākāradassanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Evaṃ dvīsu kālesū’’^eb^tiādi nidassanatthaṃ paccāmasanaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā adhigataṃ.

[03]Kammasādhano ^a^M2.0179^ea^ sambhāvanattho ^b^bhāvanīya^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘manasā bhāvite sambhāvite’’^eb^ti. Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvanaṃ, vaḍḍhanañca paṭipakkhapahānatoti āha ^b^‘‘ye vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Buddhādīsu^eb^ tīsu vatthūsu ^b^pasannacittassa,^eb^ na kammaphalasaddhāmattena. Sā cassa saddhāsampadā evaṃ ^a^P2.0230^ea^ veditabbāti phalena hetuṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vattasampannassā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Saṃvego^eb^ nāma sahottappañāṇaṃ, abhijātiṭṭhānādīnipi tassa uppattihetūni bhavantīti āha ^b^‘‘saṃvegajanakānī’’^eb^ti.
[03]Cetiyapūjanatthaṃ cārikā ^b^cetiyacārikā. Sagge patiṭṭhahissantiyeva^eb^ buddhaguṇārammaṇāya kusalacetanāya saggasaṃvattaniyabhāvato.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etthā^eb^ti mātugāme. ^b^Ayaṃ uttamā paṭipatti,^eb^^b^yadidaṃ adassanaṃ,^eb^ dassanamūlakattā tappaccayānaṃ sabbānatthānaṃ. ^b^Lobho^eb^ti kāmarāgo. ^b^Cittacalanā^eb^ paṭipattiantarāyakaro cittakkhobho. ^b^Murumurāpetvā^eb^ti sāṭṭhikaṃ katvā khādane anuravadassanaṃ. Aparimitaṃ kālaṃ dukkhānubhavanaṃ ^b^aparicchinnadukkhānubhavanaṃ. Vissāso^eb^ti visaṅgo ghaṭṭanābhāvo. ^b^Otāro^eb^ti tattha cittassa ^a^V2.0161^ea^ anuppaveso. ^b^Asihatthena^eb^ verīpurisena, ^b^pisācenāpi^eb^ khāditukāmena. ^b^Āsīde^eb^ti akkamanādivasena bādheyya. ^b^Assā^eb^ti mātugāmassa. ^b^Pabbajitehi kattabbakamma^eb^nti āmisapaṭiggahaṇādi pabbajitehi kātabbaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Satī^eb^ti vā kāyagatāsati ^b^upaṭṭhāpetabbā.^eb^
[03]^b^204^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atantibaddhā^eb^ti abhāravahā. ^b^Pesitacittā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittā.

[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vihatenā^eb^ti kappāsavihananadhanunā pabbajaṭānaṃ vijaṭanavasena hatena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘supothitenā’’^eb^ti, asaṅkaraṇavasena suṭṭhu pothitenāti attho, dassanīyasaṃvejanīyaṭṭhānakittanena ca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Theraṃ adisvā āmantesī^eb^ti tattha adisvā āvajjanto therassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ, pavattiñca ñatvā āmantesi.

[03]Kāyakammassa ^a^P2.0231^ea^^a^M2.0180^ea^ hitabhāvo hitajjhāsayena pavattitattāti āha ^b^‘‘hitavuddhiyā katenā’’^eb^ti. Sukhabhāvo kāyikadukkhābhāvo, cetasikasukhabhāvo cetasikasukhasamuṭṭhitattā cāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sukhasomanasseneva katenā’’^eb^ti. Āvirahovibhāgato advayabhāvato ^b^advayenā^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Satthu khettabhāvasampattiyā, therassa ajjhāsayasampattiyā ca ‘‘ettakamida’’nti pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pamāṇavirahitattā tassa kammassāti āha ^b^‘‘cakkavāḷampī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Evaṃ pavattitenā^eb^ti evaṃ odissakamettābhāvanāya vasena pavattitena. Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ etenāti ^b^katapuñño,^eb^ arahattādhigamāya katādhikāroti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhinīhārasampannosīti dassetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katthaci saṅkucitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya, paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya, catusaṭṭhādhikayojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ cakkavāḷagiriṃ adho osārento viya, aṭṭhasaṭṭhādhikasahassayojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ ukkhipento viya, satayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viyāti pañca hi upamā hi therassa guṇakathā ^a^V2.0162^ea^ mahantabhāvadassanatthañceva aññesaṃ dukkaṭabhāvadassanatthañca āgatāva. ^b^Eteneva cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena ‘‘ahaṃ etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho’’ (dī. ni. 2.4), ‘‘sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ natthi me paṭipuggalo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341; mahāva. 11; kathā. 405; mi. pa. 5.11) ca evaṃ ādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Byatto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0232^ea^ khandhakosallādisaṅkhātena veyyattiyena samannāgato. ^b^Medhāvī^eb^ti medhāsaṅkhātāya sammābhāvitāya paññāya samannāgato.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭisanthāradhamma^eb^nti pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ, upagatānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca pucchāvissajjanavasena ceva cittarucivasena ca yathākālaṃ dhammaṃ desetiyeva, upāsakopāsikānaṃ pana upanisinnakathāvasena.

[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khuddaka^eb^-saddo ^a^M2.0181^ea^ patirūpavācī, ^b^ka^eb^-saddo appatthoti āha ^b^‘‘khuddakanagaraketi nagarapatirūpake sambādhe khuddakanagarake’’^eb^ti. Dhuparavisālasaṇṭhānatāya taṃ ‘‘ujjaṅgalanagaraka’’nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘visamanagarake’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññesaṃ mahānagarānaṃ^eb^ ekadesappamāṇatāya ^b^sākhāsadise.^eb^ Ettha ca ‘‘khuddakanagarake’’ti iminā tassa nagarassa appakabhāvo vutto, ‘‘ujjaṅgalanagarake’’ti iminā bhūmivipattiyā nihīnabhāvo, ‘‘sākhānagarake’’ti iminā appadhānabhāvo. ^b^Sārappattā^eb^ti vibhavasārādinā sāramahattaṃ pattā.
[03]^b^Kahāpaṇasakaṭa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘dvikumbhaṃ ^b^sakaṭaṃ. Kumbho^eb^ pana dasambaṇo’’ti vadanti. ^b^Dve pavisantī^eb^ti dve kahāpaṇasakaṭāni dve āyavasena pavisanti.

[03]^b^Subhikkhā^eb^ti sulabhāhārā, sundarāhārā ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khajjabhojjasampannā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddaṃ karonte^eb^ti ravasārinā tuṭṭhabhāvena koñcanādaṃ karonte. ^b^Avivittā^eb^ti asuññā, kadāci ratho paṭhamaṃ gacchati, taṃ añño anubandhanto gacchati, kadāci dutiyaṃ vuttaratho paṭhamaṃ gacchati, itaro taṃ anubandhati evaṃ ^b^aññamaññaṃ anubandhamānā. Etthā^eb^ti kusāvatīnagare. Tassa mahantabhāvato ceva iddhādibhāvato ca niccaṃ payojitāneva ^b^bheriādīni tūriyāni,^eb^ samma ^a^P2.0233^ea^ sammāti vā aññamaññaṃ piyālāpasaddo ^b^samma^eb^-saddo. Kaṃsatāḷādisabbatāḷāvacarasaddo ^b^tāḷa^eb^-saddo, ^b^kūṭabheri^eb^-saddo kumbhathūṇasaddo.

[03]^b^Evarūpā^eb^^a^V2.0163^ea^^b^saddā honti^eb^ kacavarākiṇṇavīthitāya, araññe kandamūlapaṇṇādiggahaṇāya, tattha dukkhajīvikatāya cāti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Idha na evaṃ ahosi^eb^ devaloke viya sabbaso paripuṇṇasampattikatāya.

[03]^b^Mahantaṃ kolāhala^eb^nti saddhāsampannānaṃ devatānaṃ, upāsakānañca vasena purato purato mahatī ugghosanā hoti. Tattha bhagavantaṃ uddissa katassa vihārassa abhāvato, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahantabhāvato ^b^te āgantvā…pe… pesesi.^eb^ Pesento ca ‘‘kathañhi nāma bhagavā pacchime kāle attano pavattiṃ amhākaṃ nārocesi, nesaṃ domanassaṃ mā ahosī’’ti ‘‘ajja kho vāseṭṭhā’’tiādinā sāsanaṃ pesesi.

[03]^b^211^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aghaṃ ^a^M2.0182^ea^ dukkhaṃ āventi pakāsentīti ^b^aghāvino,^eb^ pākaṭībhūtadukkhāti āha ^b^‘‘uppannadukkhā’’^eb^ti. Ñātisālohitabhāvena kulaṃ parivattati etthāti ^b^kulaparivattaṃ.^eb^ Taṃ taṃkulīnabhāgena ṭhito sattanikāyo ‘‘kulaparivattaso’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kulaparivatta’’^eb^nti. Te pana taṃtaṃkulaparivattaparicchinnā mallarājāno tasmiṃ nagare vīthiādisabhāgena vasantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vīthisabhāgena ceva racchāsabhāgena cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaṅkhā eva ^b^kaṅkhādhammo. Ekato vā^eb^ti bhūmiṃ avibhajitvā sādhāraṇatova. Bījato ca aggaṃ gahetvā āhāraṃ sampādetvā dānaṃ ^b^bījaggaṃ. Gabbhakāle^eb^ti gabbhadhāraṇato paraṃ khīraggahaṇakāle. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ niharitvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Puthukakāle^eb^ti sassānaṃ nātipakke puthukayogyaphalakāle. ^b^Lāyanagga^eb^nti pakkassa sassassa lavane lavanārambhe dānaṃ adāsi. Lunassa ^a^P2.0234^ea^ sassassa veṇivasena bandhitvā ṭhapanaṃ ^b^veṇikaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Tassa ārambhe dānaṃ ^b^veṇaggaṃ.^eb^ Veṇiyo pana ekato katvā rāsikaraṇaṃ ^b^kalāpo.^eb^ Tattha aggadānaṃ ^b^kalāpaggaṃ.^eb^ Kalāpato nīharitvā maddane aggadānaṃ ^b^khalaggaṃ. ^eb^ Madditaṃ ophuṇitvā dhaññassa rāsikaraṇe aggadānaṃ ^b^khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ.^eb^ Dhaññassa khalato koṭṭhe pakkhipane aggadānaṃ ^b^koṭṭhaggaṃ. Uddharitvā^eb^ti koṭṭhato uddharitvā.

[03]^b^‘‘Nava^eb^^a^V2.0164^ea^^b^aggadānāni adāsī’’^eb^ti iminā ‘‘kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu santike aggatova mucceyya’’nti aggaggadānavasena vivaṭṭūpanissayassa kusalassa katūpacitattā, ñāṇassa ca tathā paripākaṃ gatattā aggadhammadesanāya tassa bhājanabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imaṃ aggadhammaṃ tassa desessāmī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ohīyitvā^eb^ saṅkocaṃ āpajjitvā.

[03]^b^213^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññātukāmova^eb^ na sandiṭṭhiṃ parāmāsī. ^b^Abbhaññiṃsū^eb^ti sandehajātassa pucchāvacananti katvā ^b^jāniṃsū^eb^ti atthamāha. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘sabbeva na abbhaññiṃsū’’ti. ^b^Nesa^eb^nti pūraṇādīnaṃ. ^b^Sā paṭiññā^eb^ti ‘‘karoto kho mahārāja kārayato’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.166) paṭiññātā, sabbaññupaṭiññā ^a^M2.0183^ea^ eva vā. ^b^Niyyānikā^eb^ti sappāṭihāriyā, tesaṃ vā siddhantasaṅkhātā paṭiññā vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^niyyānikā^eb^ti. Sāsanassa sampattiyā tesaṃ sabbaññutaṃ, tabbipariyāyato ca asabbaññutaṃ gacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Atthābhāvato^eb^ti subhaddassa sādhetabbātthābhāvato. ^b^Okāsābhāvato^eb^ti tathā vitthāritaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ avasarābhāvato. Idāni tameva okāsābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭhamayāmasmi’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^214^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yesaṃ ^a^P2.0235^ea^ samaṇabhāvakarānaṃ dhammānaṃ sampādanena samaṇo, te pana ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ariyamaggadhammāti catumaggasaṃsiddhiyā pāḷiyaṃ cattāro samaṇā vuttāti te bāhirasamaye sabbena sabbaṃ natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘paṭhamo sotāpannasamaṇo’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Purimadesanāyā^eb^ti ‘‘yasmiñca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye’’tiādinā vuttāya desanāya. Byatirekato, anvayato ca adhippeto attho vibhāvīyatīti paṭhamanayopettha ‘‘purimadesanāyā’’ti padena saṅgahito vāti daṭṭhabbo. Attano sāsanaṃ niyamento āha ‘‘imasmiṃ kho’’ti yojanā. ^b^Āraddhavipassakehī^eb^ti samādhikammikavipassakehi, sikhāppattavipassake sandhāya vuttaṃ, na paṭṭhapitavipassane. Apare pana ‘‘bāhirakasamaye vipassanārambhassa ganthopi natthevāti avisesavacanameta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Adhigataṭṭhāna^eb^nti adhigatassa kāraṇaṃ, tadatthaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadanti attho, yena sotāpattimaggo adhigato, na uparimaggo, so sotāpattimagge ṭhito akuppadhammatāya tassa, tattha vā siddhito ṭhitapubbo bhūtapubbagatiyāti sotāpattimaggaṭṭho sotāpanno, na sesāriyā bhūmantaruppattito. Sotāpanno hi attanā adhigataṭṭhānaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ aññassa kathetvā sotāpattimaggaṭṭhaṃ kareyya, na aṭṭhamako asambhavato. ^b^Esa nayo sesamaggaṭṭhesū^eb^ti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Paguṇaṃ kammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti attano paguṇaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ, eteneva ‘‘avisesavacana’’nti vādo paṭikkhittoti daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0165^ea^^b^adhippetaṃ.^eb^ Tañhi sabbañeyyadhammāvabodhane ‘‘kusalaṃ chekaṃ nipuṇa’’nti vuccati tattha ^a^P2.0236^ea^ asaṅgāppaṭihataṃ pavattatīti katvā. ^b^Samadhikāni^eb^^a^M2.0184^ea^ ekena vassena. Ñāyanti etena catusaccadhammaṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhantīti ^b^ñāyo,^eb^ lokuttaramaggoti āha ^b^‘‘ariyamaggadhammassā’’^eb^ti. Padissati etena ariyamaggo paccakkhato dissatīti ^b^padeso,^eb^ vipassanāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘padese vipassanāmagge’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samaṇopī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pi^eb^-saddo ‘‘padesavattī’’ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabboti āha ^b^‘‘padesavatti…pe… natthīti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^ti tathāvutto antevāsī. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti ācariyena. ^b^Attano ṭhāne ṭhapito hoti^eb^ parapabbājanādīsu niyuttattā.

[03]^b^Sakkhisāvako^eb^ti paccakkhasāvako, sammukhasāvakoti attho. ^b^Bhagavati dharamāne^eb^ti dharamānassa bhagavato santike. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Sabbopi so^eb^ti sabbo so tividhopi. ^b^Ayaṃ pana arahattaṃ patto,^eb^ tasmā paripuṇṇagatāya matthakappatto ^b^pacchimo sakkhisāvako^eb^ti.
[06]Pañcamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ta^eb^nti bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādakaṅgaṃ ^b^dassetuṃ…pe… vuttaṃ^eb^ dhammasaṅgāhakehīti adhippāyo. Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa dhammassa atisajjanaṃ sambodhanaṃ ^b^desanā,^eb^ tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ veneyyasantāne ṭhapanaṃ ^b^paññāpana^eb^nti ^b^‘‘dhammopi desito ceva^eb^^a^P2.0237^ea^^b^paññatto cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā vinayatantisaṅgahitassa kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato ‘‘vinayo’’ti laddhādhivacanassa atthassa atisajjanaṃ sambodhanaṃ ^b^desanā,^eb^ tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ ^b^paññāpana^eb^nti ^b^‘‘vinayopi desito ceva paññatto cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Adhisīlasikkhāniddesabhāvena sāsanassa mūlabhūtattā vinayo paṭhamaṃ sikkhitabboti taṃ tāva ayamuddesaṃ sarūpato dassento ^b^‘‘mayā hi vo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sattāpattikkhandhavasenā^eb^ti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamanīyatāvasena ^a^V2.0166^ea^. ^b^Satthukiccaṃ sādhessati^eb^ ‘‘idaṃ vo kattabbaṃ, idaṃ vo na kattabba’’nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato.

[03]^b^Tena^eb^^a^M2.0185^ea^^b^tenākārenā^eb^ti tena tena veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena. ^b^Ime dhamme^eb^ti ime sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhamme. Tappadhānattā suttantadesanāya ^b^‘‘suttantapiṭakaṃ desita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Satthukiccaṃ sādhessati^eb^ taṃtaṃcariyānurūpaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā anusāsanato. Kusalākusalābyākatavasena ^b^nava hetū. ‘‘Satta phassā’’^eb^tiādi sattaviññāṇadhātusampayogavasena vuttaṃ. Dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha, tathā dhammapaccanīye, dhammānulomapaccanīye, dhammapaccanīyānulometi catuvīsati samantapaṭṭhānāni etassāti ^b^catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana paccayānulomādivasena vibhajiyamānaṃ aparimāṇanayaṃ evāti āha ^b^‘‘anantanayamahāpaṭṭhānapaṭimaṇḍita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Satthukiccaṃ sādhessatī^eb^ti khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā satthārā sammāsambuddhena kātabbakiccaṃ nipphādessati.
[03]^b^Ovadissanti anusāsissanti^eb^ ovādānusāsanīkiccanipphādanato.

[03]^b^Cāritta^eb^nti samudācārā, navesu piyālāpaṃ vuḍḍhesu ^a^P2.0238^ea^ gāravālāpanti attho. Tenāha ‘‘bhanteti vā āyasmāti vā’’ti. Gāravavacanaṃ hetaṃ yadidaṃ bhanteti vā āyasmāti vā, loke pana ‘‘tatra bhava’’nti, ‘‘devānaṃ piyā’’ti ca gāravavacanameva.

[03]‘‘Ākaṅkhamāno samūhanatū’’ti vutte ‘‘na ākaṅkhamāno na samūhanatū’’tipi vuttameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘vikappavacaneneva ṭhapesī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bala^eb^nti ñāṇabalaṃ. Yadi asamūhananaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, tadeva ca icchitaṃ, atha kasmā bhagavā ‘‘ākaṅkhamāno samūhanatū’’ti avocāti? Tathārūpapuggalajjhāsayavasena. Santi hi keci khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samādāya saṃvattituṃ anicchantā, tesaṃ tathā avuccamāne bhagavati vighāto uppajjeyya, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya, tathā pana vutte tesaṃ vighāto na uppajjeyya ‘‘amhākaṃ evāyaṃ doso, yato amhesu eva keci samūhananaṃ na icchantī’’ti. Keci ‘‘sakalassa pana sāsanassa saṅghāyattabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tathā vutta’’nti vadanti. Yañca kiñci satthārā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sirasā sampaṭicchitvā jīvitaṃ viya rakkhanti. Tathā hi te ‘‘khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho samūhanatū’’ti ^a^M2.0186^ea^ vuttepi na samūhaniṃsu, aññadatthu ‘‘purato viya tassa accayepi rakkhiṃsu evā’’ti satthusāsanassa ^a^V2.0167^ea^, saṅghassa ca mahantabhāvadassanatthampi tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi āyasmā ānando, aññepi vā bhikkhū ‘‘katamaṃ pana bhante khuddakaṃ, katamaṃ anukhuddaka’’nti na pucchiṃsu samūhanajjhāsayasseva abhāvato.

[03]^b^Na taṃ evaṃ gahetabba^eb^nti ‘‘nāgasenatthero khuddānukhuddakaṃ jānātī’’tiādinā vuttaṃ taṃ nesaṃ vacanaṃ iminā vuttākārena na gahetabbaṃ adhippāyassa aviditattā. Idāni taṃ adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘nāgasenatthero^eb^^a^P2.0239^ea^^b^hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā nāgasenatthero (milindapañhe abhejjavagge vitthāro) paresaṃ vādapathopacchedanatthaṃ saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherehi gahitakoṭṭhāsesu ca antimakoṭṭhāsameva gahetvā milindarājānaṃ paññāpesi. Mahākassapatthero pana ekasikkhāpadampi asamūhanitukāmatāya tathā kammavācaṃ sāveti, tasmā taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ tathā na gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dveḷhaka^eb^nti dvidhāgāho, anekaṃsaggāhoti attho. ^b^Vimatī^eb^ti saṃsayāpatti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vinicchituṃ asamatthatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃ vo vadāmī^eb^ti taṃ saṃsayavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vo tumhe vadāmi.

[03]^b^Nikkaṅkhabhāvapaccakkhakaraṇañāṇaṃ yevā^eb^ti buddhādīsu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvassa paccakkhakāriyābhāvato tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇameva. ^b^Ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ atthe.

[03]^b^218^eb^^b^.^eb^ Appamajjanaṃ ^b^appamādo,^eb^ so pana atthato ñāṇūpasañhitā sati. Yasmā tattha satiyā byāpāro sātisayo, tasmā ^b^‘‘satiavippavāsenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā adāsi^eb^ taṃ atthato, tassa sakalassa buddhavacanassa saṅgaṇhanato ca.

[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jhānādīsu, citte ca paramukkaṃsagatavasībhāvatāya ‘‘ettake kāle ettakā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā parinibbāyissāmī’’ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpatti samāpajjanaṃ ^b^‘‘parinibbānaparikamma’’^eb^nti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Thero^eb^ti anuruddhatthero.

[03]^b^Ayampi^eb^^a^M2.0187^ea^^b^cā^eb^ti yathāvuttapañcasaṭṭhiyā jhānānaṃ samāpannabhāvakathāpi ^b^saṅkhepakathā^eb^ eva, kasmā ^a^V2.0168^ea^? Yasmā bhagavā tadāpi devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo sabbāpi aparihāpetvā samāpajji evāti dassento ^b^‘‘nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Imāni dvepi samanantarāneva^eb^ paccavekkhaṇāyapi yebhuyyenānantariyakatāya jhānapakkhikabhāvato, yasmā ^a^P2.0240^ea^ bhavaṅgacittaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ, tato bhavato cavanato ‘‘cutī’’ti vuccati, tasmā na kevalaṃ ayameva bhagavā, atha kho sabbepi sattā bhavaṅgacitteneva cavantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye hi kecī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭibhāgapuggalavirahito^eb^ti sīlādiguṇehi asadisatāya sadisapuggalarahito.
[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saṅkhārā vūpasamanti etthāti ^b^vūpasamo^eb^ti evaṃsaṅkhātaṃ ñātaṃ kathitaṃ ^b^nibbānaṃ.^eb^
[03]^b^222^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ya^eb^nti paccatte upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yo kālaṃ akarī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Suvikasitenevā^eb^ti pītisomanassayogato suṭṭhu vikasitena muditena. ^b^Vedanaṃ adhivāsesi^eb^ abhāvasamudayo kato suṭṭhu pariññātattā. ^b^Anāvaraṇavimokkho^eb^ sabbaso nibbutabhāvato.
[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ākaronti attano phalāni samānākāre karontīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^ kāraṇāni. ^b^Sabbākāravarūpete^eb^ti sabbehi ākāravarehi uttamakāraṇehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgateti attho.
[03]^b^225^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kathaṃbhūtā^eb^ti kīdisābhūtā.
[03]^b^Cullakaddhāna^eb^nti parittaṃ kālaṃ dvattināḍikāmattaṃ velaṃ.
[03]^b^227^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaṃsatāḷādi tāḷaṃ avacarati etthāti ^b^‘‘tāḷāvacara’’^eb^nti vuccati ātatāditūriyabhaṇḍaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍa’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Dakkhiṇadisābhāgenevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0169^ea^^a^M2.0188^ea^ aññena disābhāgena anāharitvā yamakasālānaṃ ṭhānato dakkhiṇadisābhāgeneva, tatopi ^b^dakkhiṇadisābhāgaṃ^eb^ haritvā netvā.
[03]^b^Jetavanasadise^eb^ti sāvatthiyā jetavanasadise ṭhāne, ‘‘jetavanasadise ṭhāne’’tipi pāṭho.
[03]^b^228^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pasādhanamaṅgalasālāyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0241^ea^ abhisekakāle alaṅkaraṇamaṅgalasālāya.
[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devadāniyo^eb^ti tassa corassa nāmaṃ.

[03]^b^231^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāvāyā^eb^ti pāvā nagarato. Āvajjanapaṭibaddhattā jānanassa anāvajjitattā satthu parinibbānaṃ ajānanto ^b^‘‘dasabalaṃ passissāmī’’^eb^ti thero cintesi, satthu sarīre vā satthusaññaṃ uppādento tathā cintesi. Tenevāha ‘‘atha bhagavantaṃ ukkhipitvā’’ti. ^b^‘‘Dhuvaṃ parinibbuto bhavissatī’’ti cintesi^eb^ pārisesañāyena. Jānantopi thero ājīvakaṃ pucchiyeva, pucchane pana kāraṇaṃ sayameva pakāsetuṃ ^b^‘‘kiṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ.
[03]^b^Ajja sattāhaparinibbuto^eb^ti ajja divasato paṭilomato sattame ahani parinibbuto.
[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāḷiyā vāpakenā^eb^ti nāḷiyā ceva thavikāya ca.
[03]^b^Mañjuke^eb^ti mañjubhāṇine madhurassare. ^b^Paṭibhāneyyake^eb^ti paṭibhānavante. ^b^Bhuñjitvā pātabbayāgū^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ bhuñjitvā pivitabbayāgu.
[03]^b^Tassā^eb^ti subhaddassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa.
[03]^b^Ārādhitasāsane^eb^ti samāhitasāsane. ^b^Ala^eb^nti samattho. ^b^Pāpo^eb^ti pāpapuggalo. ^b^Osakkāpetu^eb^nti hāpetuṃ antaradhāpetuṃ.

[03]^b^Pañhavārā^eb^ti pañhā viya vissajjanāni ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ ^a^V2.0170^ea^ hotī’’tiādinā, (dha. sa. 1.1) ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādinā ^a^P2.0242^ea^^a^M2.0189^ea^ (dha. sa. 1.251) ca pavattāni ^b^ekaṃ dve bhūmantarāni.^eb^^b^Mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāmā^eb^ti yathā rukkhe adhivattho pisāco tassa sākhāparivāre naṭṭhe khandhaṃ nissāya vasati, khandhe naṭṭhe mūlaṃ nissāya vasati, mūle pana naṭṭhe anissayova hoti, tathā bhavissāmāti attho. Atha vā ^b^mūle naṭṭhe^eb^ti pisācena kira rukkhagacchādīnaṃ kañcideva mūlaṃ chinditvā attano puttassa dinnaṃ, yāva taṃ tassa hatthato na vigacchati, tāva so taṃ padesaṃ adissamānarūpo vicarati. Yadā pana tasmiṃ kenaci acchinnabhāvena vā sativippavāsavasena vā naṭṭhe manussānampi dissamānarūpo vicarati, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāmā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Maṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā^eb^ti taṃ paṭipadaṃ kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ tasmā tassā desanāya sakkhibhūtaṃ maṃ katvā. ^b^Paṭicchāpesi^eb^ taṃ paṭicchāpanaṃ kassapasuttena dīpetabbaṃ.
[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^ Candanaghaṭikābāhullato ^b^candanacitakā.^eb^
[03]^b^Taṃ sutvā^eb^ti taṃ āyasmatā anuruddhattherena vuttaṃ devatānaṃ adhippāyaṃ sutvā.
[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasikatantaṃ vā^eb^ti paliveṭhitāhatakāsikavatthānaṃ dasaṭhānena tantumattampi vā. ^b^Dārukkhandhaṃ vā^eb^ti candanādicitakadārukkhandhaṃ vā.
[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samudāyesu pavattavohārānaṃ avayavesu dissanato sarīrassa avayavabhūtāni aṭṭhīni ^b^‘‘sarīrānī’’^eb^ti vuttāni.
[03]^b^Na vippakiriṃsū^eb^ti sarūpeneva ṭhitāti attho. ‘‘Sesā vippakiriṃsū’’ti vatvā yathā pana tā vippakiṇṇā ahesuṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Udakadhārā nikkhamitvā nibbāpesu^eb^nti devatānubhāvena. Evaṃ mahatiyo bahū udakadhārā kimatthāyāti āha ^a^P2.0243^ea^^b^‘‘bhagavato citako mahanto’’^eb^ti. Mahā hi so vīsaratanasatiko. ^b^Aṭṭhadantakehī^eb^ti naṅgalehi aṭṭheva hi nesaṃ dantasadisāni potthāni honti, tasmā ‘‘aṭṭhadantakānī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Dhammakathāva^eb^^a^V2.0171^ea^^a^M2.0190^ea^^b^pamāṇa^eb^nti ativiya acchariyabbhutabhāvato passantānaṃ, suṇantānañca sātisayaṃ pasādāvahabhāvato, savisesaṃ buddhānubhāvadīpanato. Parinibbutassa hi buddhassa bhagavato evarūpo ānubhāvoti taṃ pavattiṃ kathentānaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānā dhammakathā evettha pamāṇaṃ vaṇṇetabbassa atthassa mahāvisayattā, tasmā vaṇṇanābhūmi nāmesāti adhippāyo. ^b^Catujjātiyagandhaparibhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā^eb^ti tagarakuṅkumayavanapupphatamālapattāni pisitvā katagandhena paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā. ^b^Khacitvā^eb^ti tattha tattha olambanavasena racetvā, gandhavatthūni gahetvā ganthitamālā ^b^gandhadāmāni^eb^ ratanāvaḷiyo ^b^ratanadāmāni.^eb^ Bahikilañjaparikkhepassa, antosāṇiparikkhepassa karaṇena ^b^sāṇikilañjaparikkhepaṃ kāretvā. ^eb^ Vātaggāhiniyo paṭākā ^b^vātapaṭākā.^eb^ Sarabharūpapādako pallaṅko sarabhamayapallaṅko, tasmiṃ ^b^sarabhamayapallaṅke.^eb^

[03]Sattihatthā purisā ^b^sattiyo^eb^ taṃsahacaraṇato yathā ‘‘kuntā pacarantī’’ti, tehi samantato rakkhāpanaṃ pañcakaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘sattihatthehi purisehi parikkhipāpetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhanūhī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sannāhagavacchikaṃ^eb^^b^viya katvā^eb^ nirantarāvaṭṭhitāarakkhasannāhena gavacchijālaṃ viya katvā.
[03]^b^Sādhukīḷita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0244^ea^ saparahitaṃ sādhanaṭṭhena sādhū, tesaṃ kīḷitaṃ uḷārapuññapasavanato, samparāyikatthāvirodhikaṃ kīḷāvihāranti attho.

[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imināva niyāmenā^eb^ti yena nīhārena mahātale nisinno kañci parihāraṃ akatvā kevalaṃ iminā niyāmeneva. ^b^Supinako^eb^ti dussupinako. ^b^Dukūladupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā^eb^ti dve dukūlavatthāni ekajjhaṃ katvā nivāsetvā. Evañhi tāni sokasamappitassāpi abhassitvā tiṭṭhanti.

[03]^b^Abhisekasiñcako^eb^ti rajjābhiseke abhisekamaṅgalasiñcako uttamamaṅgalabhāvato. ^b^Visaññī jāto^eb^ yathā taṃ bhagavato guṇavisesāmatarasaññutāya avaṭṭhitapemo pothujjanikasaddhāya patiṭṭhitapasādo katūpakāratāya sañjanitacittamaddavo.
[03]^b^Suvaṇṇabimbisakavaṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0172^ea^^a^M2.0191^ea^ suviracita apassenasadisaṃ.
[03]Kasmā panettha pāveyyakā pāḷiyaṃ sabbapacchato gahitā, kiṃ te kusinārāya āsannatarāpi sabbapacchato uṭṭhitā? Āma, sabbapacchato uṭṭhitāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha pāveyyakā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Dhātupāsanattha^eb^nti satthu dhātūnaṃ payirupāsanāya. ^b^Nesaṃ pakkhā ahesuṃ^eb^ ‘‘ñāyena tesaṃ santakā dhātuyo’’ti.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Doṇagajjitaṃ nāma avoca^eb^ satthu avatthattayūpasaṃhitaṃ. Etadatthameva hi bhagavā maggaṃ gacchanto ‘‘pacchato āgacchanto doṇo brāhmaṇo yāva me padavaḷañjaṃ passati, tāva mā vigacchatū’’ti adhiṭṭhāya aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. Doṇopi kho ^a^P2.0245^ea^ brāhmaṇo ‘‘imāni sadevake loke aggapuggalassa padānī’’ti sallakkhento padānusārena satthu santikaṃ upagacchi, satthāpissa dhammaṃ desesi, tenapi so bhagavati niviṭṭhasaddho ahosi. Etadavoca, kiṃ avocāti āha ^b^‘‘suṇantu…pe… avocā’’^eb^ti.
[03]Kāyena ekasannipātā vācāya ekavacanā abhinnavacanā evaṃ samaggā hotha. Tassa panidaṃ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘sammodamānā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittenāpi aññamaññaṃ sammodamānā hothā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^238^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tato tato samāgatasaṅghāna^eb^nti tato tato attano vasanaṭṭhānato samāgantvā sannipatitabhāvena samāgatasaṅghānaṃ. Tathā samāpatitasamūhabhāvena ^b^samāgatagaṇānaṃ.^eb^ Vacanasampaṭicchanena ^b^paṭissuṇitvā.^eb^
[03]^b^239^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yakkhaggāho^eb^ devatāveso. ^b^Khipitakaṃ^eb^ dhātukkhobhaṃ uppādetvā khipitakarogo. ^b^Arocako^eb^ āhārassa aruccanarogo.
[03]^b^Sattamadivase^eb^ti ^a^V2.0173^ea^ sattavassasattamāsato parato sattame divase. ^b^Balānurūpenā^eb^ti vibhavabalānurūpena.

[03]^b^Pacchā saṅgītikārakā^eb^ti dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ saṅgītikārakā. ^b^Dhātūnaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā^eb^ti tattha tattha cetiye yathāpatiṭṭhāpitabhāveneva ṭhitānaṃ ^a^M2.0192^ea^ dhātūnaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vasena antarāyaṃ disvā, mahādhātunidhānena sammadeva rakkhitānaṃ anāgate asokena dhammaraññā tato uddharitvā vitthāritabhāve kate sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhāvahabhāvañca disvāti adhippāyo. ^b^Paricaraṇamattamevā^eb^ti gahetvā paricaritabbadhātumattameva. Rājūnaṃ hatthe ^b^ṭhapetvā,^eb^ na cetiyesu. Tathā hi pacchā asokamahārājā cetiyesu dhātūnaṃ na labhati.

[03]Purimaṃ ^a^P2.0246^ea^ purimaṃ katassa gaṇhanayogyaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ kārento ^b^aṭṭha aṭṭha haricandanādimaye karaṇḍe ca thūpe ca kāresi.^eb^ Lohitacandanamayādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Maṇikaraṇḍesū^eb^ti lohitaṅkamasāragallaphalikamaye ṭhapetvā avasesamaṇivicittakesu karaṇḍesu.
[03]^b^Thūpārāmacetiyappamāṇa^eb^nti devānaṃpiyatissamahārājena kāritacetiyappamāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Mālā mā milāyantū^eb^ti ‘‘yāva asoko dhammarājā bahi cetiyāni kāretuṃ ito dhātuyo uddharissati, tāva mālā mā milāyantū’’ti ^b^adhiṭṭhahitvā. Āviñchanarajjuya^eb^nti aggaḷāviñchanarajjuyaṃ. ^b^Kuñcikamuddika^eb^nti dvāravivaraṇatthaṃ kuñcikañceva muddikañca.

[03]^b^Vāḷasaṅghātayanta^eb^nti kukkulaṃ paṭibhayadassanaṃ aññamaññapaṭibaddhagamanāditāya saṅghāṭitarūpakayantaṃ yojesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kaṭṭharūpakānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Āṇiyā bandhitvā^eb^ti anekakaṭṭharūpavicittayantaṃ attano devānubhāvena ekāya eva āṇiyā bandhitvā vissakammo devalokameva gato. ^b^‘‘Samantato’’^eb^tiādi pana tasmiṃ dhātunidāne ajātasattuno kiccavisesānuṭṭhānadassanaṃ.

[03]‘‘Asukaṭṭhāne nāma dhātunidhāna’’nti raññā pucchite ‘‘tasmiṃ sannipāte visesalābhino nāhesu’’nti keci. ‘‘Attānaṃ nigūhitvā tassa vuḍḍhatarassa vacanaṃ nissāya vīmaṃsanto jānissatīti na kathesu’’nti apare. ^b^Yakkhadāsake^eb^ti upahārādividhinā devatāvesanake bhūtāviggāhake.

[03]^b^Imaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0247^ea^^a^V2.0174^ea^^b^pada^eb^nti ‘‘evametaṃ bhūtapubba’’nti dutiyasaṅgītikārehi ṭhapitaṃ imaṃ padaṃ. Mahādhātunidhānampi tassa atthaṃ katvā ^b^tatiyasaṅgītikārāpi ṭhapayiṃsu.^eb^
[06]Mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^242^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sovaṇṇamayā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0248^ea^^a^V2.0175^ea^^a^M2.0193^ea^ suvaṇṇamayā. ^b^Ayaṃ pākāro^eb^ti sabbaratanamayo pākāro. ^b^Tayo tayo^eb^ti anto ca tayo, bahi ca tayoti tayo tayo.

[03]^b^Esikatthambho^eb^ indakhīlo nagarasobhano alaṅkāratthambho. Aṅgīyati ñāyati puthulabhāvo etenāti ^b^aṅgaṃ,^eb^ parikkhepo. Tiporisaṃ aṅgaṃ etissāti ^b^tiporisaṅgā.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘tenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tena^eb^ pañcahatthappamāṇena tiporisena. ^b^Paṇṇaphalesupī^eb^ti sabbaratanamayānaṃ tālānaṃ paṇṇaphalesupi. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti ‘‘paṇṇesu ekaṃ pattakaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ, ekaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ. Phalesupi eko lekhābhāvo sovaṇṇamayo, eko rūpiyamayo’’tiādiko ayamattho atidiṭṭho. ^b^Pākārantare^eb^ti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ pākārānaṃ antare. ^b^Ekekā hutvā ṭhitā^eb^ tālapanti.

[03]^b^Cheko^eb^ti paṭu suvisado, so cassa paṭubhāvo manosāroti āha ^b^‘‘sundaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rañjetu^eb^nti rāgaṃ uppādetuṃ. ^b^Khamatevā^eb^ti rocateva. ^b^Na bībhacchetī^eb^ti na tajjeti, sotasukhabhāvato piyāyitabbo ca hoti. Kumbhathuṇadaddarikādi ^b^ekatalaṃ tūriyaṃ. Ubhayatalaṃ^eb^ pākaṭameva. ^b^Sabbato pariyonaddhaṃ^eb^ caturassāmbaṇakaṃ, paṇavādi ca. ^b^Vaṃsādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṅkhādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sumucchitassā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pariyattassa. ^b^Pamāṇe^eb^ti nātidaḷhanātisithilatāsaṅkhāte majjhime mucchanappamāṇe ^a^P2.0249^ea^. ^b^Hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā cāletvā^eb^ti hatthalayapādalaye sajjetvā. ^b^Naccantā^eb^ti sākhānaccaṃ naccantā.

[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uposathaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0176^ea^ vuccati aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ sabbadivasesu gahaṭṭhehi rakkhitabbasīlaṃ, samādānavasena taṃ tassa atthīti uposathiko, tassa ^b^uposathikassa.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘samādinnauposathaṅgassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ^a^M2.0194^ea^ kāle. Kasmiṃ pana kāleti? Yasmiṃ kāle cakkavattibhāvasaṃvattaniyadānasīlādipuññasambhārasamudāgamasampanno pūritacakkavattivatto kāladīpadesavisesapaccājātiyā ceva kularūpabhogādhipateyyādiguṇavisesasampattiyā ca tadanurūpe attabhāve ṭhito hoti, tasmiṃ kāle. Tādise hi kāle cakkavattibhāvī purisaviseso yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto visuddhasīlo anuposathaṃ satasahassavissajjanādinā sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjati, na yadā cakkaratanaṃ uppajjati, tadā eva. Ime ca visesā sabbacakkavattīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pātova…pe… dhammatā’’^eb^ti. Bodhisattānaṃ pana cakkavattibhāvāvahaguṇāpi cakkavattiguṇāpi sātisayāva honti.

[03]^b^Vuttappakārapuññakammapaccaya^eb^nti cakkavattibhāvāvahadānadamasaṃyamādipuññakammahetukaṃ. ^b^Nīlamaṇisaṅghātasadisa^eb^nti indanīlamaṇisañcayasamānaṃ. ^b^Dibbānubhāvayuttattā^eb^ti dassaneyyatā, manuññaghosatā, ākāsagāmitā, obhāsavissajjanā, appaṭighātatā, rañño icchitatthanipphattikāraṇatāti evamādīhi dibbasadisehi ānubhāvehi samannāgatattā, etena dibbaṃ viyāti dibbanti dasseti. Na hi taṃ devalokapariyāpannaṃ. Sahassaṃ arā etassāti vā ^b^sahassāraṃ. Sabbehi ākārehī^eb^ti sabbehi sundarehi paripuṇṇāvayave lakkhaṇasampanne cakke icchitabbehi ākārehi. ^b^Paripūra^eb^nti paripuṇṇaṃ, sā cassā pāripūriṃ idāneva vitthāressati.

[03]^b^Panāḷī^eb^ti chiddaṃ. ^b^Suddhasiniddhadantapantiyā^eb^ nibbivarāyāti ^a^P2.0250^ea^ adhippāyo. Tassā pana panāḷiyā samantato passassa rajatamayattā ^b^sārarajatamayā^eb^ vuttā. Yasmā cassa cakkassa rathacakkassa viya antobhāvo nāma natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ubhosupi bāhirantesū’’^eb^ti. Kataparikkhepā hoti panāḷīti yojanā. ^b^Nābhipanāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭesū^eb^ti nābhiparikkhepapaṭṭe ceva nābhiyā panāḷiparikkhepapaṭṭe ca.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti arānaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭakā^eb^ nāma alaṅkārabhūtā khuddakapuṇṇaghaṭā. Tathā ^b^maṇikā^eb^ nāma muttāvaḷikā. ^b^Paricchedalekhā^eb^ tassa tassa paricchedadassanavasena ṭhitā paricchinnalekhā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ^a^V2.0177^ea^ mālākammādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Suvibhattānevā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇattā suṭṭhu vibhattāni.

[03]^b^‘‘Surattā’’^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M2.0195^ea^^b^suratta^eb^ggahaṇena mahānāmavaṇṇataṃ paṭikkhipati, ^b^suddha^eb^ggahaṇena saṃṅkiliṭṭhataṃ, ^b^siniddha^eb^ggahaṇena lūkhataṃ. Kāmaṃ tassa cakkaratanassa nemimaṇḍalaṃ asandhikameva nibbattaṃ, sabbatthakameva pana kevalaṃ pavāḷavaṇṇena ca sobhatīti pakaticakkassa sandhiyuttaṭṭhāne surattasuvaṇṇapaṭṭādimayāhi vaṭṭaparicchedalekhāhi paññāyamānāhi sasandhikā viya dissantīti āha ^b^‘‘sandhīsu panassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Nemimaṇḍalapiṭṭhiya^eb^nti nemimaṇḍalassa piṭṭhipadese. Ākāsacāribhāvato hissa tattha vātaggāhī pavāḷadaṇḍo hoti. ^b^Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antare^eb^ti dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānaṃ antare samīpe padese. ^b^Chiddamaṇḍalakhacito^eb^ti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānachiddavicitto. ^b^Sukusalasamannāhatassā^eb^ti suṭṭhu kusalena sippinā pahatassa, vāditassāti attho. ^b^Vaggū^eb^ti manoramo. ^b^Rajanīyo^eb^ti suṇantānaṃ rāguppādako. ^b^Kamanīyo^eb^ti kanto. ^b^Samosaritakusumadāmā^eb^ti olambitasugandhakusumadāmā. ^b^Nemiparikkhepassā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0251^ea^ nemipariyantaparikkhepassa. Nābhipanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ passānaṃ vasena ^b^‘‘dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ekā eva hi sā panāḷi. ^b^Yehī^eb^ti yehi dvīhi mukhehi. Puna ^b^yehī^eb^ti yehi muttakalāpehi.
[03]^b^Odhāpayamāna^eb^nti sotuṃ avahitāni kurumānaṃ.
[03]Cando purato cakkaratanaṃ pacchāti evaṃ ^b^pubbāpariyena^eb^ pubbāparabhāvena.

[03]^b^Antepurassā^eb^ti anurādhapure rañño antepurassa. ^b^Uttarasīhapañjarasadise^eb^ti tadā rañño pāsāde tādisassa uttaradisāya sīhapañjarassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sukhena sakkā^eb^ti kiñci anāruhitvā, sarīrañca anullaṅghitvā yathāṭhiteneva hatthena pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipitvā ^b^sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetuṃ.^eb^
[03]^b^Nānāvirāgaratanappabhāsamujjala^eb^nti nānāvidhavicittavaṇṇaratanobhāsapabhassaraṃ. ^b^Ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte^eb^ti āgantvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato upari ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
[03]^b^244^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rājāyuttā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0178^ea^ rañño kicce āyuttakapurisā.
[03]Sineruṃ ^a^M2.0196^ea^ vāmapassena katvā tassa dhurataraṃ gacchanto ^b^‘‘vāmapassena sineruṃ pahāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Vinibbedhenā^eb^ti tiriyaṃ vinivijjhanavasena. ^b^Sannivesakkhamo^eb^ti khandhāvārasannivesayogyo. ^b^Sulabhāhārupakaraṇo^eb^ti sukheneva laddhabbadhaññagorasadārutiṇādibhojanasādhano.
[03]^b^Paracakka^eb^nti parassa rañño senā, āṇā vā.

[03]^b^Āgamananandano^eb^ti āgamanena nandijanano. Gamanena socetīti ^b^gamanasocano. Upakappethā^eb^ti uparūpari kappetha, saṃvidahatha upanethāti attho. ^b^Upaparikkhitvā^eb^ti hetutopi sabhāvatopi phalatopi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādiādīnavatopi ^a^P2.0252^ea^ vīmaṃsitvā. Vibhāventi paññāya atthaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontīti ^b^vibhāvino,^eb^ paññavanto. ^b^Anuyantā^eb^ti anuvattakā, anuvattakabhāveneva, pana rañño ca mahānubhāvena te jigucchanavasena pāpato anoramantāpi ekacce ottappavasena oramantīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ogacchamāna^eb^nti osīdantaṃ. ^b^Yojanamatta^eb^nti vitthārato yojanamattaṃ padesaṃ. Gambhīrabhāvena pana yathā bhūmi dissati, evaṃ ogacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāsamuddatala’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ante cakkaratanaṃ^eb^ udakena senāya anajjhottharaṇatthaṃ. Puratthimo mahāsamuddo pariyanto etassāti puratthimamahāsamuddapariyanto, taṃ ^b^puratthimamahāsamuddapariyantaṃ,^eb^ puratthimamahāsamuddaṃ pariyantaṃ katvāti attho.

[03]^b^Cāturantāyā^eb^ti catusamuddantāya, puratthimadisādicatukoṭṭhāsantāya vā. ^b^Sobhayamānaṃ viyā^eb^ti ^b^viya^eb^-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Attano acchariyaguṇehi sobhantameva hi taṃ tiṭṭhati. Pāḷiyampi hi ‘‘upasobhayamānaṃ’’ tveva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^246^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Haricandanādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena catujjātiyagandhādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Āgamanaṃ cintethāti^eb^^a^V2.0179^ea^^b^vadanti^eb^ cakkavattivattassa pūritatāya paricitattā. Kāḷatilakādīnaṃ abhāvena ^b^visuddhasetasarīro. Sattapatiṭṭho^eb^ti bhūmiphusanakehi vāladhi, varaṅgaṃ, hatthoti imehi ca tīhi, catūhi pādehi cāti ^a^M2.0197^ea^ sattahi avayavehi patiṭṭhitattā sattapatiṭṭho. ^b^Sabbakaniṭṭho^eb^ti sabbehi chaddantakulahatthīhi hīno. ^b^Uposathakulā sabbajeṭṭho^eb^ti uposathakulato āgacchanto tattha sabbappadhāno āgacchatīti yojanā. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘mahādānaṃ datvā’’tiādinā vuttena nayena. Cakkavattīnaṃ, cakkavattiputtānañca cakkavattiṃ uddissa ^b^cintayantānaṃ āgacchati. Apanetvā^eb^ti attano ānubhāvena apanetvā. Gandhameva hi tassa itare hatthī na sahanti.
[03]^b^Gharadhenuvacchako viyā^eb^ti ghare paricitadhenuyā tattheva ^a^P2.0253^ea^ jātasaṃvaddhavacchako viya. ^b^Sakalapathavi^eb^nti sakalaṃ jambudīpasaññitaṃ pathaviṃ.
[03]^b^247^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sindhavakulato^eb^ti sindhavassājānīyakulato.

[03]^b^248^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sakaṭanābhisamapariṇāha^eb^nti pariṇāhato mahāsakaṭassa nābhiyā samappamāṇaṃ. ^b^Ubhosu antesū^eb^ti heṭṭhā, upari cāti dvīsu antesu. ^b^Kaṇṇikapariyantato^eb^ti dvinnaṃ kañcanapadumānaṃ kaṇṇikāya pariyantato. ^b^Muttājālake ṭhapetvā^eb^ti suvisuddhe muttamaye jālake patiṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Aruṇuggamanavelā viyā^eb^ti aruṇuggamanasīsena sūriyaudayakkhaṇaṃ upalakkheti.

[03]^b^249^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Itthiratanaṃ pātubhavatī’’ti vatvā kutassā pātubhāvoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maddarājakulato’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Maddaraṭṭhaṃ kira jambudīpe abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ.
