Tathā hi ‘‘siñcayamahārājassa devī, vessantaramahārājassa devī, bhaddakāpilānī’’ti evamādi itthiratanaṃ maddaraṭṭhe eva uppannaṃ. ^b^Puññānubhāvenā^eb^ti cakkavattirañño puññatejena.

[03]^b^Saṇṭhānapāripūriyā^eb^ti hatthapādādisarīrāvayavānaṃ susaṇṭhitāya. Avayavapāripūriyā hi samudāyapāripūrisiddhi ^a^V2.0180^ea^. ^b^Rūpa^eb^nti sarīraṃ ‘‘rūpaṃ tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.306) viya. ^b^Dassanīyā^eb^ti surūpabhāvena passitabbayuttā. Tenāha ^a^M2.0198^ea^^b^‘‘dissamānāvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Somanassavasena cittaṃ pasādeti^eb^ yoniso cintentānaṃ kammaphalasaddhāya vasena. ^b^Pasādāvahattā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanena yathā pāsādikatāya vaṇṇapokkharatāsiddhi vuttā, evaṃ dassanīyatāya pāsādikatāsiddhi, abhirūpatāya ca dassanīyatāsiddhi vattabbāti nayaṃ dasseti. Paṭilomato vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya ^a^P2.0254^ea^ pāsādikatāsiddhi, pāsādikatāya dassanīyatāsiddhi, dassanīyatāya abhirūpatāsiddhi yojetabbā. Evaṃ sarīrasampattivasena abhirūpatādike dassetvā idāni sarīre dosābhāvavasenapi te dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhirūpā vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā pamāṇayuttā, evaṃ ārohapariṇāhayogato ca pāsādikā nātidīghatādayo, evaṃ manussānaṃ dibbarūpatāsampattipīti ^b^‘‘appattā dibbavaṇṇa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ārohasampatti^eb^ vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato. ^b^Pariṇāhasampatti^eb^ vuttā kisathūladosābhāvato. ^b^Vaṇṇasampatti vuttā^eb^ vivaṇṇatābhāvato. ^b^Kāyavipattiyā^eb^ti sarīradosassa. ^b^Satavāravihatassā^eb^ti sattakkhattuṃ vihatassa, ‘‘satavāravihatassā’’ti ca idaṃ kappāsapicuvasena vuttaṃ, tūlapicuno pana vihananameva natthi. Kuṅkumatagaraturukkhayavanapupphāni ^b^catujjāti.^eb^ ‘‘Tamālatagaraturukkhayavanapupphānī’’ti apare.

[03]^b^Aggidaḍḍhā viyā^eb^ti āsanagatena agginā daḍḍhā viya. ^b^Paṭhamamevā^eb^ti rājānaṃ disvāpi kiccantarappasutā ahutvā kiccantarato paṭhamameva, dassanasamakālaṃ evāti attho. Rañño nisajjāya pacchā nipātanaṃ nisīdanaṃ sīlaṃ etissāti ^b^pacchānipātinī.^eb^ Taṃ taṃ attanā rañño kātabbakiccaṃ ‘‘kiṃ karomī’’ti pucchitabbatāya kiṃ karaṇaṃ paṭisāvetīti ^b^kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī.^eb^
[03]Mātugāmo nāma yebhuyyena saṭhajātiko, itthiratanassa pana taṃ natthīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘svāssā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Guṇā^eb^ti rūpaguṇā ceva ācāraguṇā ca. ^b^Purimakammānubhāvenā^eb^ti katassa purimakammassānubhāvena itthiratanassa ^a^P2.0255^ea^ tabbhāvasaṃvattaniyassa purimakammassa ānubhāvena. Cakkavattinopi parivārasampattisaṃvattaniyaṃ puññakammaṃ tādisassa phalavisesassa upanissayo hotiyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cakkavattino^eb^^a^M2.0199^ea^^b^puññaṃ upanissāyā’’^eb^ti, etena sesesupi saviññāṇakaratanesu attano ^a^V2.0181^ea^ kammavasena nibbattesupi tesaṃ tesaṃ visesānaṃ tadupanissayatā vibhāvitā evāti daṭṭhabbā. Pubbe ekadesavasena labbhamānā pāripūrī rañño cakkavattibhāvūpagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbākāraparipūrā jātā.

[03]^b^250^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pakatiyā vā^eb^ti sabhāveneva cakkaratanapātubhāvato pubbepi. Yādisaṃ rañño cakkavattissa puññabalaṃ nissāya yathāvuttā cakkaratanānubhāvanibbatti, tādisaṃ etassa puññabalaṃ nissāya gahapatiratanassa kammavipākajaṃ dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetīti āha ^b^‘‘cakkaratanānubhāvasahita’’^eb^nti. Kāraṇassa hi ekasantatipatitatāya, phalassa ca samānakālikatāya tathāvacanaṃ.

[03]^b^251^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ adhammo’’tiādinā kammassakatāvabodhanasaṅkhātassa paṇḍitabhāvassa atthitāya ^b^paṇḍito. ^eb^ Bāhusaccabyattiyā ^b^byatto.^eb^ Sabhāvasiddhāya medhāsaṅkhātāya pakatipaññāya atthitāya ^b^medhāvī.^eb^ Attano yāthāvabuddhamatthaṃ paresaṃ vibhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ samatthatāya ^b^vibhāvī. Vavatthapetu^eb^nti nicchituṃ.

[03]^b^252^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vipaccanaṃ vipāko, vipāko eva ^b^vepāko^eb^ yathā ‘‘vikatameva vekata’’nti. Samaṃ nātisītanāccuṇhatāya avisamaṃ bhuttassa vepāko etissā atthīti samavepākinī, tāya ^b^samavepākiniyā.^eb^

[03]^b^253^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Janarāsiṃ kāretvā^eb^ tena janarāsinā khaṇitvā ^b^na māpesi.^eb^ Kiñcarahīti āha ^b^‘‘rañño panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha kāraṇaṃ parato āgamissati. ^b^Ekāya^eb^ vedikāya ^b^parikkhittā^eb^ pokkharaṇiyo ^a^P2.0256^ea^. ^b^Pariveṇaparicchedapariyante^eb^ti ettha ^b^pariveṇaṃ^eb^ nāma samantato vivaṭaṅgaṇabhūtaṃ pokkharaṇiyā ^a^V2.0182^ea^ tīraṃ, tassa paricchedabhūte pariyante ^b^ekāya^eb^ vedikāya ^a^M2.0200^ea^ parikkhittā pokkharaṇiyo. ^b^Etadahosī^eb^ti etaṃ ‘‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ imāsu pokkharaṇīsū’’tiādikaṃ ahosīti. ^b^Sabbotuka^eb^nti sabbesu utūsu pupphanakaṃ. ^b^Nānāvaṇṇauppalabījādīnī^eb^ti rattanīlādinānāvaṇṇapupphena pupphanakauppalabījādīni. ^b^Jalajathalajamāla^eb^nti jalajathalajapupphamālaṃ.

[03]^b^254^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paricāravasenā^eb^ti taṅkhaṇikaparicāravasena, idañca paṭhamaṃ paṭṭhapitaniyāmeneva vuttaṃ, pacchā pana yānasayanādīni viya itthiyopi atthikānaṃ pariccattā eva. Tenāha ‘‘itthīhipī’’tiādi. ^b^Pariccāgavasenā^eb^ti nirapekkhapariccāgavasena. Dīyatīti ^b^dānaṃ,^eb^ deyyavatthu. Taṃ aggīyati nissajjīyati etthāti ^b^dānaggaṃ,^eb^ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Tādisāni atthī^eb^ti yādisāni rañño dānagge khomasukhumādīni vatthāni, tādisāni ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ attano santakāni santi. ^b^Ohāyā^eb^ti pahāya tattheva ṭhapetvā. Attho atthi yesaṃ teti ^b^atthikā.^eb^ Evaṃ ^b^anatthikā^eb^pi daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^255^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kalahasaddopī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena dānādhippāyena gehato nīhataṃ puna gehaṃ pavesetuṃ na yuttanti imamatthaṃ samucceti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na kho etaṃ amhākaṃ patirūpa’’^eb^ntiādi (dī. ni. 2.255).
[03]^b^257^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uṇhīsamatthake^eb^ti sikhāpariyantamatthake. ^b^Paricchedamatthake^eb^ti pāsādaṅgaṇaparicchedassa matthake.

[03]^b^258^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Haratī^eb^ti ativiya pabhassarabhāvena cakkhūni paṭiharantaṃ duddikkhatāya diṭṭhiyo harati apanentaṃ ^a^P2.0257^ea^ viya hoti. Taṃ pana haraṇaṃ nesaṃ paripphandanenāti āha ^b^‘‘phandāpetī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^260^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahatiyā iddhiyā^eb^ti mahantena icchitatthasamijjhanena. ^b^Tesaṃyeva^eb^ icchiticchitatthānaṃ. ^b^‘‘Anubhavitabbāna’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0183^ea^ iminā ānubhāva-saddassa kammasādhanataṃ dasseti. Pubbe sampannaṃ katvā deyyadhammapariccāgassa katabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sampattipariccāgassā’’^eb^ti āha. Attānaṃ dameti etenāti ^b^damo.^eb^

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0201^ea^ mahāsudassanarañño. ^b^Eko thero^eb^ti appaññāto nāmagottato aññataro puthujjano thero. ^b^Theraṃ disvā^eb^ti aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā. ^b^Kaṭṭhattharaṇa^eb^nti kaṭṭhamayaṃ attharaṇaṃ, dāruphalakanti attho.
[03]^b^Paribhogabhājana^eb^nti pānīyaparibhojanīyādiparibhogayogyaṃ bhājanaṃ. ^b^Ārakaṇṭaka^eb^nti sūcivijjhanakakaṇṭakaṃ. ^b^Pipphalika^eb^nti khuddakasatthakaṃ. ^b^Udakatumbaka^eb^nti kuṇḍikaṃ.
[03]^b^Kūṭāgāradvāreyeva nivattesī^eb^ti kūṭāgāraṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ pavattiyā okāsaṃ nādāsi.
[03]^b^261^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasiṇameva paññāyati^eb^ mahāpurisassa tattha tattha katādhikārattā, tesañca padesānaṃ suparikammakatakasiṇasadisattā.

[03]^b^262^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cattāri jhānānī^eb^ti cattāri kasiṇajjhānāni. Kasiṇajjhānappamaññānaṃyeva vacanaṃ tāsaṃ tadā ādaragāravavasena nibbattitattā. Mahābodhisattānañhi arūpajjhānesu ^a^P2.0258^ea^ ādaro natthi, abhiññāpadaṭṭhānataṃ pana sandhāya tānipi nibbattenti, tasmā mahāsatto tāpasaparibbājakakāle yattake lokiyaguṇe nibbatteti, te sabbepi tadā nibbattesiyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāpuriso panā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^263^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiharitabbabhatta^eb^nti upanetabbabhattaṃ.
[03]^b^264^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nibaddhavatta^eb^nti pubbe upanibaddhaṃ pākavattaṃ.
[03]^b^265^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āvaṭṭetvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0184^ea^ ativisitvā. Yaṃ yaṃ rañño icchitaṃ dānūpakaraṇañceva bhogūpakaraṇañca, tassa tassa tatheva samiddhabhāvaṃ vitthavati.

[03]^b^266^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sace pana rājā jīvite chandaṃ janeyya, ito parampi ciraṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya mahiddhiko mahānubhāvoti evaṃ mahajjhāsayā devī bhogesu, jīvite ca rājānaṃ sāpekkhaṃ kātuṃ vāyami. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘mā ^a^M2.0202^ea^ heva kho rājā’’tiādi. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tassa kālaṅkiriyaṃ anicchamānā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Chandaṃ janehī^eb^ti ettha ^b^chanda^eb^-saddo taṇhāpariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘pemaṃ uppādehī’’^eb^ti. Apekkhati ārammaṇaṃ etāya na vissajjetīti ^b^apekkhā,^eb^ taṇhā.

[03]^b^267^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Garahitā^eb^ti ettha kehi garahitā, kasmā ca garahitāti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ vissajjento ^b^‘‘buddhehī’’^eb^tiādimāha, tena viññugarahitattā, duggatisaṃvattaniyato ca sāpekkhakālakiriyā parivajjetabbāti dasseti.
[03]^b^268^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekamantaṃ gantvā^eb^ti rañño cakkhupathaṃ vijahitvā.

[03]^b^269^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Soṇassā^eb^ti koḷivīsassa soṇassa. ^b^Ekā bhattapātī^eb^ti ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ. ^b^Tādisaṃ bhatta^eb^nti tathārūpaṃ garuṃ madhuraṃ siniddhaṃ bhattaṃ. ^b^Bhuttāna^eb^nti bhuttavantānaṃ.
[03]^b^271^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dāsamanussā^eb^ti dāsā ceva āyuttakamanussā ca.
[03]Idāni yathāvuttāya rañño mahāsudassanassa bhogasampattiyā kammasarikkhataṃ uddharanto ^b^‘‘etāni panā’’^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^272^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādito^eb^^a^P2.0259^ea^^b^paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya. Yattha taṃ puññaṃ āyūhitaṃ, yato sā sampatti nibbattā, tato tatiyattabhāvato pabhuti. Mahāsudassanassa jātakadesanā hi tadā samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya bhagavatā desitāti. ^b^Paṃsvāgārakīḷaṃ viyā^eb^ti yathā nāma dārakā paṃsūhi vāpigehabhojanādīni ^a^V2.0185^ea^ dassentā yathāruci kīḷitvā gamanakāle sabbaṃ taṃ vidhaṃsentā gacchanti, evameva bhagavā mahāsudassanakāle attanā anubhūtaṃ dibbasampattisadisaṃ acinteyyānubhāvasampattiṃ vitthārato dassetvā puna attano desanaṃ ādīnavanissaraṇadassanavasena vivaṭṭābhimukhaṃ viparivattento ‘‘sabbā sā sampatti aniccatāya vipariṇatā vidhaṃsitā’’ti ^b^dassento ‘‘passānandā’’tiādimāha. Vipariṇatā^eb^ti vipariṇāmaṃ sabhāvavigamaṃ gatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pakativijahanenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pakatī^eb^ti sabhāvadhammānaṃ udayavayaparicchinno ^a^M2.0203^ea^ kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvo, so bhaṅgakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya jahito, pariccajanto sabbaso nattheva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbutapadīpo viya apaññattikabhāvaṃ gatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ādito paṭṭhāya pavattena ettakena desanāmaggena. Anekāni vassakoṭisatasahassāniyeva ubbedho etissāti ^b^anekavassakoṭisatasahassubbedhā. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāyā^eb^ti taṃ sampattigataṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ desanāya gahetvā vibhāvetvā. Yathā nisseṇimuccane tādisaṃ satahatthubbedhaṃ rukkhaṃ pakatipurisena ārohituṃ na sakkā, evaṃ aniccatāvibhāvanena tassā sampattiyā apekkhānisseṇimuccane ^a^P2.0260^ea^ kenaci ārohituṃ na sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘aniccalakkhaṇaṃ ādāya nisseṇiṃ muñcanto viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti yathāvuttakāraṇeneva, ādito sātisayaṃ kāmesu assādaṃ dassetvāpi upari nesaṃ ‘‘passānandā’’tiādinā ādīnavaṃ, okāraṃ, saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsañca vibhāvetvā desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ti atītakāle. ^b^Vasabharājā^eb^ti vasabhanāmako sīhaḷamahārājā.
[03]^b^Udakapupphuḷādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tiṇagge ussāvabinduādike saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Mahāsudassanassa panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotano, tena mahāsudassanamahārājā jhānābhiññāsamāpattiyo nibbattesi, tadaggena parisuddhe ca samaṇabhāve patiṭṭhito, yato vidhuya eva kāmavitakkādisamaṇabhāvasaṃkilesaṃ suññāgāraṃ pāvisi, evaṃbhūtassāpi tassa kālaṃ kiriyato sattame divase sabbā cakkavattisampatti antarahitā, na tato paraṃ, aho acchariyamanusso anaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesoti imaṃ visesaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Anāruḷha^eb^nti ‘‘rājā kira pubbe gahapatikule nibbattī’’tiādinā, (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.260) ‘‘puna theraṃ āmantesī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.272) ca vuttamatthaṃ ^a^V2.0186^ea^ sandhāyāha. So hi imasmiṃ sutte saṅgītiṃ anāruḷho, aññattha pana āgato imissā desanāya piṭṭhivattakabhāvena. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyaṃ evāti.
[06]Mahāsudassanasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^273-275^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Parito’’^eb^ti ^a^P2.0261^ea^^a^V2.0187^ea^^a^M2.0204^ea^ padaṃ yathā samantatthavācako, evaṃ samīpatthavācakopi hotīti ^b^samantā sāmantā^eb^ti attho vutto. Āmeḍitena pana samantattho jotito. Yassa pana sāmantā janapadesu ‘‘nātike viharatī’’ti vuttattā nātikassāti viññāto yamattho. Yassa parito janapadesu byākaroti, tattha paricārakārakānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ, nidassanavasena vā tassa vakkhamānattā ‘‘parito parito janapadesu’’ icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Paricārake^eb^ti upāsake. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhadhammasaṅghānaṃ paricārake’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upapattīsū^eb^ti nibbattīsu. ^b^Ñāṇagatipuññānaṃ upapattīsū^eb^ti ettha ^b^ñāṇagatūpapatti^eb^ nāma tassa tassa maggañāṇagamanassa nibbatti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ parikkhayā’’tiādi. ^b^Puññūpapatti^eb^ nāma taṃtaṃdevanikāyūpapatti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘vajjimallesū’’tiādike sabbattha catūsupi padesu. ^b^Purimesū^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ vutte sandhāyāha. ^b^Dasasuyevā^eb^ti tesu eva dasasu janapadesu. ^b^Paricārake byākaroti^eb^ byakātabbānaṃ bahūnaṃ tattha labbhanato. Nātike bhavā ^b^nātikiyā.^eb^
[03]^b^Niṭṭhaṅgatā^eb^ti niṭṭhaṃ nicchayaṃ upagatā.

[03]^b^276^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā saṅghasuppaṭipatti nāma dhammasudhammatāya, dhammasudhammatā ca buddhasubuddhatāya, tasmā ‘‘aho dhammo, aho saṅgho’’ti dhammasaṅghaguṇakittanāpi atthato buddhaguṇakittanā eva hotīti ‘‘bhagavantaṃ ^a^P2.0262^ea^ kittayamānarūpā’’ti padassa ‘‘aho dhammo’’tiādināpi attho vutto.

[03]^b^278^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ñāṇagatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0188^ea^ ‘‘pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā’’tiādinā āgataṃ pahātabbapahānavasena pavattaṃ maggañāṇagamanaṃ. Yasmā tassā eva ñāṇagatiyā vasena tassa tassa ariyapuggalassa opapātikatādiviseso, tasmā taṃ tādisaṃ tassa abhisamparāyaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ñāṇābhisamparāyamevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^279^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upasantaṃ ^a^M2.0205^ea^ pati sammati ālokīyatīti ^b^upasantapatiso. Upasantadassano^eb^ upasantaussanno. ^b^Bhātirivā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ra^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, ^b^iva^eb^-saddo bhusatthoti āha ^b^‘‘ativiya bhātī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^280^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jeṭṭhakabhāvena jane vasabhasadisoti janavasabhoti assa devaputtassa nāmaṃ ahosi.

[03]^b^Ito devalokā cavitvā^eb^ sattakkhattuṃ manussaloke rājabhūtassa. Manussalokā cavitvā sattakkhattuṃ devabhūtassa. ^b^Etthevā^eb^ti etasmiṃyeva cātumahārājikabhave, etthāpi vessavaṇassa sahabyatāvasena.

[03]^b^281^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āsisanaṃ ^b^āsā,^eb^ patthanā. Āsāsīsena cettha kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ vadati. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sakadāgāmimaggatthāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yadagge^eb^ti ettha ^b^agga^eb^-saddo ādipariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Purimaṃ…pe… avinipāto’’^eb^ti idaṃ yathā tattakaṃ kālaṃ sugatito sugatūpapattiyeva ^a^P2.0263^ea^ ahosi, tathā katūpacitakusalakammattā. Phussassa sammāsambuddhassa kālato pabhuti hi sambhatavivaṭṭūpanissayakusalasambhāro esa devaputto. ^b^Anacchariya^eb^nti anu anu acchariyaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ acchariyamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sayaṃparisāyā^eb^ti sakāya parisāya. ^b^Bhagavato diṭṭhasadisamevā^eb^ti āvajjanasamanantaraṃ yathā te bhagavato catuvīsatisatasahassamattā sattā ñāṇagatito diṭṭhā, evaṃ tumhehi diṭṭhasadisameva. ^b^Vessavaṇassa sammukhā sutaṃ^eb^ mayāti vadati.

[03]^b^282^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vassūpanāyikasaṅgahattha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0189^ea^ vassūpanāyikāya ārakkhāsaṃvidhānavasena bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ ‘‘vassūpagatā bhikkhū evaṃ sukhena samaṇadhammaṃ karontī’’ti, ^b^pavāraṇasaṅgaho^eb^ panassa pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarāmagge parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ. Dhammassavanatthaṃ dūraṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M2.0206^ea^ gacchantesupi eseva nayo. Attanāpi āgantvā dhammassavanatthaṃ sannipatiyeva. ^b^Etthetthā^eb^ti ettha ettha ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^Tadāpī^eb^ti ‘‘purimāni bhante divasānī’’ti vuttakālepi. ^b^Eteneva kāraṇenā^eb^ti vassūpanāyikanimittameva. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘tadahuposathe pannarase vassūpanāyikāyā’’tiādi. Āsanepi nisajjāya sudhammāya devasabhāya paṭhamaṃ devesu tāvatiṃsesu nisinnesu tassā catūsu dvāresu cattāro mahārājāno nisīdanti, idaṃ nesaṃ āsane nisajjāya cārittaṃ hoti.
[03]^b^Yenatthenā^eb^ti yena kiccena yena payojanena. ^b^Ārakkhattha^eb^nti ārakkhabhūtamatthaṃ. Vuttaṃ vacanaṃ etesanti ^b^vuttavacanā,^eb^ mahārājāno.
[03]^b^283^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atikkamitvā^eb^ti abhibhavitvā.

[03]^b^284^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhisambhavituṃ adhigantuṃ asakkuṇeyyo ^b^anabhisambhavanīyo.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘appattabbo’’^eb^tiādi. Cakkhuyeva patho rūpadassanassa maggo upāyoti cakkhupatho, tasmiṃ ^b^cakkhupathasmi^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘cakkhupasāde’’^eb^ti, cakkhussa gocarayoggo vā ^b^cakkhupatho^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘āpāthe vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nābhibhavatī^eb^ti na abhibhavati, gocarabhāvaṃ ^a^P2.0264^ea^ na gacchatīti attho. ^b^Heṭṭhā heṭṭhā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā, na cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya, nāpi brahmapārisajjato paṭṭhāya. ‘‘Cātumahārājikā hi tāvatiṃsānaṃ yathā jātirūpāni passituṃ sakkonti, tathā brahmāno heṭṭhimā uparimāna’’nti keci, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi heṭṭhimā brahmāno uparimānaṃ mūlapaṭisandhirūpaṃ passituṃ sakkonti, māpitameva passituṃ sakkontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Suṇantova^eb^^a^V2.0190^ea^^b^niddaṃ okkamī^eb^ti gatiyo upadhārento bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedena saṅkocaṃ āpannacittatāya. ^b^Mayhaṃ ayyakassā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.
[03]Pañca sikhā etassāti pañcasikho, pañcasikho viya ^b^pañcasikho^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pañcasikhagandhabbasadiso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mamāyantī^eb^ti piyāyanti.

[03]^b^285^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sumutto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0207^ea^ saradosehi suṭṭhu mutto. Yehi pittasemhādīhi palibuddhattā saro avissaṭṭho siyā, tadabhāvato vissaṭṭhoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘apalibuddho’’^eb^ti. Viññāpetīti ^b^viññeyyo,^eb^ antogadhahetuattho kattusādhano esa viññeyyasaddoti āha ^b^‘‘atthaviññāpano’’^eb^ti. Sarassa madhuratā nāma maddavanti āha ^b^‘‘madhuro mudū’’^eb^ti. Savanaṃ arahatīti ^b^savanīyo.^eb^ Savanārahatāya ca āpāthasukhatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘kaṇṇasukho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bindū^eb^ti piṇḍito. Ākoṭitabhinnakaṃsasaddo viya anekāvayavo ahutvā niravayavo, ekabhāvoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekagghano’’^eb^ti, etenevassa avisāritā saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā. Gambhīruppattiṭṭhānatāya cassa gambhīratāti āha ^b^‘‘nābhimūlato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evaṃ samuṭṭhito^eb^ti jīvhādippahāramattasamuṭṭhito. ^b^Amadhuro ca hoti^eb^ uppattiṭṭhānānaṃ parilahubhāvato. ^b^Na ca dūraṃ sāveti^eb^ vīrabhāvābhāvato. ^b^Ninnādī^eb^ suvipulabhāvato savisesaṃ ninnādo, pāsaṃsaninnādo vā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāmegha…pe… yutto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pacchimaṃ pacchima^eb^nti dutiyaṃ, catutthaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ, aṭṭhamañca padaṃ. ^b^Purimassa purimassā^eb^ti yathākkamaṃ paṭhamassa, tatiyassa, pañcamassa, sattamassa ca. ^b^Atthoyevā^eb^ti atthaniddeso eva. Vissaṭṭhatā hissa viññeyyatāya veditabbā, mañjubhāvo savanīyatāya, bindubhāvo avisāritāya, gambhīrabhāvo ninnāditāyāti. ^b^Yathāparisa^eb^nti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^-saddo parimāṇavācī, na pakārādivācīti āha ^b^‘‘yattakā^eb^^a^P2.0265^ea^^b^parisā’’^eb^ti, tena parisappamāṇaṃ evassa saro niccharati, ayamassa dhammatāti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tattakamevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]‘‘Ye hi kecī’’tiādi ‘‘yāvañca so bhagavā’’tiādinā vuttassa atthassa hetukittanavasena samatthanaṃ saraṇesu nesaṃ niccasevanena, sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena chakāmasaggasampattianuppādanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ye hi keci…pe… vadatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nibbematikagahitasaraṇe^eb^ti maggenāgatasaraṇagamane. Te hi sabbaso samugghātitavicikicchatāya ratanattaye aveccappasādena samannāgatāyeva, pothujjanikasaddhāya vasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ogāhetvā ^a^V2.0191^ea^ jānanti, aparaneyyabuddhino te pariyāyato nibbematikagahitasaraṇā veditabbā. ^b^Gandhabbadevagaṇa^eb^nti gandhabbadevasamūhaṃ. Tukā ^a^M2.0208^ea^ vuccati khīriṇī yā tukātipi vuccati. Tassā cuṇṇaṃ ^b^tukāpiṭṭhaṃ.^eb^ Taṃ koṭṭetvā pakkhittaṃ ghanaṃ nirantaracitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.

[03]^b^287^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Supaññattā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pakārehi ñāpitā bodhitā, asaṅkarato vā ṭhapitā, taṃ pana bodhanaṃ, asaṅkarato ṭhapanañca atthato desanā evāti āha ^b^‘‘sukathitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ijjhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti samijjhanaṭṭhena, nippajjanassa kāraṇabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Iddhiyā pādoti ^b^iddhipādo,^eb^ iddhiyā adhigamupāyoti attho. Tena hi yasmā uparūpari visesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā ‘‘pādo’’ti vuccati. Ijjhatīti ^b^iddhi,^eb^ samijjhati nippajjatīti attho. Iddhi eva pādo ^b^iddhipādo,^eb^ iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Evaṃ tāva ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā’’ti ettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Iddhipahonakatāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā nipphādane samatthabhāvāya. ^b^Iddhivisavitāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā nipphādane yogyabhāvāya. Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ yogyattho ^b^vi^eb^-pubbo ^a^P2.0266^ea^^b^su^eb^-saddo, visavanaṃ vā pajjanaṃ ^b^visavitā,^eb^ tattha kāmakāritā visavitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘punappuna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Iddhivikubbanatāyā^eb^ti vikubbaniddhiyā vividharūpakaraṇāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nānappakārato katvā dassanatthāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Chandañca bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ, ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī’’ti (vibha. 432) imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi ^b^chandasamādhī^eb^ti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati, adhipatisaddatthadassanavasena pana ^b^‘‘chandahetuko, chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasasamādhī’’^eb^ti ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Padhānabhūtā^eb^ti vīriyabhūtā’’ti keci vadanti. Saṅkhatasaṅkhārādinivattanatthañhi padhānaggahaṇanti. Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti ^b^saṅkhāro,^eb^ sabbampi vīriyaṃ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato aññassa nivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇanti ^b^padhānabhūtā^eb^ seṭṭhabhūtāti attho. Catubbidhassa pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso kato. Visuṃ samāsayojanavasena yo pubbe iddhipādattho pādassa upāyatthataṃ, koṭṭhāsatthatañca gahetvā yathāyogavasena idha ^a^M2.0209^ea^ vutto, so vakkhamānānaṃ paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ kattukaraṇiddhibhāvaṃ, uttaracūḷabhājanīye vā vuttehi chandādīhi iddhipādehi sādhetabbāya iddhiyā kattiddhibhāvaṃ, chandādīnañca karaṇiddhibhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttoti veditabbo, tasmā ‘‘ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī’’ti ettha kattuattho, karaṇattho ca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ^a^V2.0192^ea^ vuttoti kattuatthaṃ tāva dassetuṃ ‘‘nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena vā’’ti vatvā itaraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ijjhanti^eb^^a^P2.0267^ea^^b^etāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Vutta^eb^nti kattha vuttaṃ? Iddhipādavibhaṅgapāṭhe. (Vibha. 434) ^b^tathābhūtassā^eb^ti tenākārena bhūtassa, te chandādidhamme paṭilabhitvā ṭhitassāti attho. ^b^‘‘Vedanākkhandho’’^eb^tiādīhi chandādayo antokatvā cattāropi khandhā kathitā. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti sesiddhipādesu.

[03]Vīriyiddhipādaniddese ‘‘vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgata’’nti dvikkhattuṃ vīriyaṃ āgataṃ. Tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesanaṃ ‘‘vīriyādhipati samādhi vīriyasamādhī’’ti, dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṃ. Dveyeva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni, samādhi, padhānasaṅkhāro ca. Chandādayo hi samādhivisesanāni, padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti. Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva, samannāgamaṅgavasena pana padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti. Yasmā pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho samādhi, tathāvisiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro, sesadhammā ca, tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā, visesanabhāvo ca chandādīnaṃ taṃtaṃavassayadassanavasena hotīti ‘‘chandasamādhi…pe… iddhipāda’’nti ettha nissayatthepi pāda-sadde upāyatthena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti. Teneva hi abhidhamme ^b^uttaracūḷabhājanīye^eb^ (vibha. 456) ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo’’tiādinā chandādīnameva iddhipādatā vuttā. ^b^Pañhapucchake^eb^ (vibha. 457 ādayo) ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī’’tiādinā ^a^P2.0268^ea^ ca uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva hi nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ, aññathā catubbidhatā na siyāti. Ayamettha pāḷivasena atthavinicchayo veditabbo. Idāni paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ vasena iddhipāde vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0210^ea^ vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva. Idha iddhipādakathā saṅkhepeneva vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘vitthārena pana…pe… vuttā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. Tesu hi ekacce ‘‘iddhi nāma anipphannā’’ti vadanti, ekacce ‘‘iddhipādo pana anipphanno’’ti vadanti, ^b^anipphanno^eb^ti ca paramatthato asiddho, natthīti attho. ^b^Ābhato^eb^ti abhidhammapāṭhato (vibha. 458) ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.287) ānīto purimanayato aññenākārena desanāya pavattattā. Chando eva iddhipādo ^b^chandiddhipādo.^eb^ Eseva nayo sesesupi. ^b^Ime panā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte āgatā iddhipādā ^a^V2.0193^ea^. ^b^Raṭṭhapālatthero^eb^ (ma. ni. 2.293; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.210; apa. aṭṭha. 2.raṭṭhapālattherāpadānavaṇṇanāya vitthāro) ‘‘chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantī’’ti sattāhaṃ bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā chandameva avassāya lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ nibbattesīti āha ^b^‘‘raṭṭhapālatthero…pe… nibbattesī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Soṇatthero^eb^ (mahāva. 243; a. ni. 6.55; theragā. aṭṭha. terasanipāta; apa. aṭṭha. 2.soṇakoṭivīsattherāpadānavaṇṇanāya vitthāro) bhāvanamanuyutto āraddhavīriyo paramasukhumālo pādesu phoṭesu jātesupi vīriyaṃ nappaṭipassambhesīti āha ^b^‘‘soṇatthero vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sambhūtatthero^eb^ (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.sammūtattheragāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāro) ‘‘cittavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī’’ti cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā bhāvanaṃ ārādhesīti āha ^b^‘‘sambhūtatthero cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Moghatthero^eb^ vīmaṃsaṃ avassayi, tasmā tassa bhagavā ‘‘suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū’’ti (su. ni. 1125; bu. vaṃ. 54.353; mahā. ni. 186; cūḷani. mogharājamāṇavapucchā 144; mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddese 88; netti. 5; peṭako. 22, 31) suññatākathaṃ kathesi, paññānissitamānaniggahatthaṃ, paññāya pariggahatthañca dvikkhattuṃ pucchito samāno pañhaṃ ^a^P2.0269^ea^ kathesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āyasmā mogharājā vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ katvā’’^eb^ti.
[03]Punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ pesanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā.
[03]^b^Parakkamenā^eb^ti parakkamasīsena sūrabhāvaṃ vadati. Thāmabhāvato ca vīriyassa sūrabhāvasadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
[03]Cintanappadhānattā cittassa mantasaṃvidhānasadisatā vuttā.

[03]^b^Jātisampatti^eb^^a^M2.0211^ea^ nāma visiṭṭhajātitā. ‘‘Sabbadhammesu ca paññā seṭṭhā’’ti vīmaṃsāya jātisampattisadisatā vuttā. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 433) pana cittiddhipādassa jātisampattisadisatā, vīmaṃsiddhipādassa mantabalasadisatā ca yojitā.

[03]Anekaṃ vihitaṃ vidhaṃ etassāti ^b^anekavihita^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘anekavidha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vidha^eb^-saddo koṭṭhāsapariyāyo ‘‘ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū’’tiādīsu (vibha. 751) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘iddhividhanti iddhikoṭṭhāsa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^288^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Sukhassā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0194^ea^ idaṃ tiṇṇampi sukhānaṃ sādhāraṇavacananti āha ^b^‘‘jhānasukhassa maggasukhassa phalasukhassā’’^eb^ti. Nānappanāpattatāya pana appadhānattā upacārajjhānasukhassa, vipassanāsukhassa cettha aggahaṇaṃ. Purimesu tāva dvīsu okāsādhigamesu tīṇipi sukhāni labbhanti, tatiye pana kathanti? Tattha kāmaṃ tīṇi na labbhanti, dve pana labbhantiyeva. Yathālābhavasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.249; ma. ni. 1.433; 2.259; a. ni. 1.45, 46) viya. ^b^Saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti saṃsaggaṃ upagato samaṅgībhūto, so pana tehi samannāgatacittopi hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sampayuttacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ariyadhamma^eb^nti ariyabhāvakaraṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^Upāyato^eb^ti vidhito. ^b^Pathato^eb^ti maggato. ^b^Kāraṇato^eb^ti hetuto. Yena hi vidhinā dhammānudhammapaṭipatti hoti, so ^a^P2.0270^ea^ upeti etenāti ^b^upāyo,^eb^ so tadadhigamassa maggabhāvato ^b^patho,^eb^ tassa karaṇato ^b^kāraṇa^eb^nti ca vuccati.

[03]‘‘Aniccantiādivasena manasi karotī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘yoniso manasikāro nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^upāyamanasikāro^eb^ti kusaladhammappavattiyā kāraṇabhūto manasikāro. ^b^Pathamanasikāro^eb^ti tassa eva maggabhūto manasikāro. ^b^Anicce^eb^ti ādiantavantatāya, anaccantikatāya ca anicce tebhūmake saṅkhāre ‘‘anicca’’nti manasikāroti yojanā. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso tasmiṃyeva udayabbayapaṭipīḷanatāya dukkhanato, dukkhamato ca ^b^dukkhe,^eb^ avasavattanatthena, anattasabhāvatāya ca ^b^anattani,^eb^ asucisabhāvatāya ^a^M2.0212^ea^^b^asubhe.^eb^ Sabbampi hi tebhūmakaṃ saṅkhataṃ kilesāsucipaggharaṇato ‘‘asubha’’ntveva vattuṃ arahati. ^b^Saccānulomikena vā^eb^ti saccābhisamayassa anulomanavasena. ^b^‘‘Cittassa āvaṭṭanā’’^eb^tiādinā āvajjanāya paccayabhūtā tato purimuppannā manodvārikā kusalajavanappavatti phalavohāreneva tathā vuttā. Tassā hi vasena sā kusaluppattiyā upanissayo hotīti. Āvajjanā hi bhavaṅgacittaṃ āvaṭṭetīti ^b^cittassa āvaṭṭanā,^eb^ anu anu āvaṭṭetīti ^b^anvāvaṭṭanā.^eb^ Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññaṃ ābhujatīti ^b^ābhogo.^eb^ Samannāharatīti ^b^samannāhāro.^eb^ Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā anubandhitvā uppajjamāne manasi karoti ṭhapetīti ^b^manasikāro. Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ upāyamanasikāralakkhaṇo ^b^yonisomanasikāro^eb^ nāma vuccati, yassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni āvajjituṃ sakkoti.

[03]^b^Asaṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0195^ea^ na saṃsaṭṭho kāmādīhi vivitto vinābhūto. Kāmādivisaṃsaggahetu uppajjanakasukhaṃ nāma vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti ^a^P2.0271^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhānasukha’’^eb^nti. Kāmaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhampi somanassameva, suttesu pana taṃ kāyikasukhassāpi paccayabhāvato visesato ‘‘sukha’’ntveva vuccatīti idhāpi jhānabhūtaṃ somanassaṃ sukhanti, itaraṃ somanassaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sukhā’’^eb^ti. Hetumhi nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘jhānasukhapaccayā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aparāparaṃ somanassa^eb^nti jhānādhigamahetu paccavekkhaṇādivasena punappunaṃ uppajjanakasomanassaṃ.

[03]Pamodanaṃ pamudo, taruṇapīti, tato ^b^pamudā.^eb^ ‘‘Pāmojjaṃ pītatthāyā’’tiādīsu taruṇapīti ‘‘pāmojja’’nti vuccati, idha pana pakaṭṭho mudo ^b^pamudo^eb^ pāmojjanti adhippetaṃ, tañca somanassarahitaṃ natthīti avinābhāvitāya ^b^‘‘balavataraṃ pītisomanassa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Jhānassa ujuvipaccanīkataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Jhānaṃ pana tadekaṭṭhe sabbepi kilese, sabbepi akusale dhamme vikkhambhetiyeva, ^b^attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati^eb^ paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhavanīyato. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti okāsaggahaṇato, laddhokāsatāyāti attho. Maggaphalasukhādhigamāya okāsabhāvato vā ^b^okāso,^eb^ assa adhigamo ^b^okāsādhigamo.^eb^ Purimapakkhe pana okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti ^b^okāsādhigamo.^eb^

[03]Rūpasabhāvatāya ^a^M2.0213^ea^, ekantarūpādhīnavuttitāya, savipphārikatāya ca ānāpānavitakkavicārānaṃ thūlabhāvaṃ anujānanto ^b^‘‘kāyavacīsaṅkhārā tāva oḷārikā hontū’’^eb^ti āha. Tabbidhuratāya pana ekaccānaṃ vedanāsaññānaṃ thūlataṃ ananujānanto ^b^‘‘cittasaṅkhārā kathaṃ oḷārikā’’^eb^ti āha. Itaro ‘‘appahīnattā’’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā ^b^‘‘kāyasaṅkhārā hī’’^eb^tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Te^eb^ti cittasaṅkhārā. Appahīnā saṅkhārā labbhamānasaṅkhāranimittatāya ‘‘oḷārikā’’ti vattuṃ arahanti, pahīnā pana tadabhāvato ‘‘sukhumā’’ti āha ^b^‘‘pahīne upādāya^eb^^a^P2.0272^ea^^b^appahīnattā oḷārikā nāma jātā’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘kāyasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘sukhanti catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattisukha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Cittasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā’’ti pana vuttattā ^b^‘‘nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vacīsaṅkhārapaṭippassaddhi kāyasaṅkhārapaṭippassaddhiyāva siddhāti veditabbā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dutiya…pe… visuṃ na vuttānī’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana atthato siddhāpi supākaṭabhāvena vibhāvetuṃ sarūpato gaṇhāti. Na hi ariyavinaye atthāpattivibhāvanā abhidhammadesanāya pakatīti. Yathā nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañca paṭhamassa jhānassa adhigamāya upāyo, evaṃ sukhadukkhavikkhambhanaṃ catutthassa ^a^V2.0196^ea^ jhānassa adhigamāya upāyoti ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03]Avijjārāgādīhi saha vajjehīti ^b^sāvajjaṃ,^eb^ akusalaṃ, tadabhāvato ^b^anavajjaṃ^eb^ kusalaṃ. Attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena sevanīyato ^b^sevitabbaṃ,^eb^ kusalaṃ, tabbipariyāyato ^b^na sevitabbaṃ,^eb^ akusalaṃ. Lāmakabhāvena ^b^hīnaṃ,^eb^ akusalaṃ, seṭṭhabhāvena ^b^paṇītaṃ,^eb^ kusalanti ^b^sāvajjadukādayo^eb^ tayopi dukā yathārahaṃ ^b^etesaṃ^eb^ kusalākusalakammapathānaṃ ^b^vaseneva veditabbā. Sabba^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ catūhi dukehi saṅgahitaṃ dhammajātaṃ. Yathārahaṃ kaṇhañca sukkañca paṭidvandibhāvato, sappaṭibhāgañca appaṭibhāgañca advayabhāvato. ^b^Vaṭṭapaṭicchādikā avijjā pahīyati^eb^ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ sammadeva paṭivijjhanato. Tato eva ^b^arahattamaggavijjā uppajjati. Sukha^eb^nti evaṃ kammapathamukhena tebhūmakadhamme sammasitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahatte patiṭṭhahantassa yaṃ arahattamaggasukhañceva arahattaphalasukhañca, taṃ idha ‘‘sukha’’nti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Antogadhā eva^eb^ nānantariyabhāvato.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0214^ea^^a^P2.0273^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena. ^b^Vitthāretvā kathetabbā^eb^ paṭhamajjhānādivasena āgatattāti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Katha’’^eb^ntiādinā tameva vitthāretvā kathanaṃ nayato dasseti. ^b^‘‘Catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesū’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^mahāparinibbānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.219) vuttameva. ^b^‘‘Nirodhasamāpattiṃ pāpetvā’’^eb^ti iminā arūpajjhānānipi gahitāni honti tehi vinā nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanassa asambhavato, catutthajjhānasabhāvattā ca tesaṃ. ^b^Dasa upacārajjhānānī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiṃ ānāpānañca aṭṭha anussatiyo, saññāvavatthānañcāti dasa upacārajjhānāni. Adhisīlaṃ nāma samādhisaṃvattaniyanti tassa heṭṭhimantena paṭhamajjhānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘adhisīlasikkhā paṭhamaṃ okāsādhigamaṃ bhajatī’’^eb^ti. Adhicittaṃ nāma catutthajjhānaniṭṭhaṃ tadantogadhattā arūpajjhānānaṃ, tappariyosānattā phalajjhānānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘adhicittasikkhā dutiya’’^eb^nti. Matthakappattā adhipaññāsikkhā nāma aggamaggavijjāti āha ^b^‘‘adhipaññāsikkhā tatiya’’^eb^nti. Sikkhattayavasena tayo okāsādhigame nīharantena yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃsuttavasenapi nīharitabbanti dassento ^b^‘‘sāmaññaphalepī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Yadaggena ca tisso sikkhā yathākkamaṃ tayo okāsādhigame bhajanti, tadaggena tappadhānattā yathākkamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni te bhajantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tīsu panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tīṇi^eb^^a^V2.0197^ea^^b^piṭakāni vibhajitvā^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ okāsādhigamānaṃ vasena yathānupubbaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni vitthāretvā ^b^kathetuṃ labhissāmā^eb^ti. ^b^Samodhānetvā^eb^ti samāyojetvā tattha vuttamatthaṃ imassa suttassa atthabhāvena samānetvā. ^b^Dukkathita^eb^nti asambandhakathanena, atipapañcakathanena vā duṭṭhu kathitanti ^b^na sakkā vattuṃ^eb^ tathākathanasseva sukathanabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘tepiṭakaṃ…pe… sukathitaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^289^eb^^b^.^eb^ Na kevalaṃ abhidhammapariyāyeneva kusalaṭṭho gahetabbo, atha kho bāhitikapariyāyena pīti āha ^b^‘‘phalakusalassa cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Khemaṭṭhenā^eb^ti catūhipi yogehi anupaddavabhāvena ^a^P2.0274^ea^. ^b^Sammā samāhito^eb^ti samathavasena ^a^M2.0215^ea^ ceva vipassanāvasena ca suṭṭhu samāhito. ^b^Ekaggacitto^eb^ti vikkhepassa dūrasamussāritattā ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pattacitto. ^b^Attano kāyato^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāvasena sammā samāhitacitto samāno ‘‘samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.5; 5.1071, 1072; netti. 40; mi. pa. 1.14) vacanato. Tattha ñāṇadassanaṃ nibbattento tato bahiddhā parassa kāyepi ñāṇadassanaṃ nibbatteti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parassa kāyābhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sammā vippasīdatī^eb^ti sammā samādhānapaccayena abhippasādena ñāṇūpasañhitena ajjhattaṃ kāyaṃ okappeti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbaṭṭhānesu. Sati kathitāti yojanā. ^b^Lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā^eb^ anupassanāñāṇadassanānaṃ tadubhayasādhāraṇabhāvato.

[03]^b^290^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etthā^eb^ti imissā kathāya. Jhānakkhassa vīriyacakkassa ariyamaggarathassa sīlaṃ vibhūsanabhāvena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘alaṅkāro parikkhāro nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattahi nagaraparikkhārehī^eb^ti nagaraṃ parivāretvā rakkhaṇakehi kataparikkhepo, parikhā, uddāpo, pākāro, esikā, palighā, pākārapakkhaṇḍilanti imehi sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi. Sambharīyati phalaṃ etenāti ^b^sambhāro,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. Bhesajjañhi byādhivūpasamanena jīvitassa kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Parivāraparikkhāravasenā^eb^ti parivārasaṅkhātaparikkhāravasena. Parikkhāro hi sammādiṭṭhiyādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhissa sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parikaraṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato. Upecca nissīyatīti ^b^upanisā,^eb^ saha upanisāyāti ^b^saupaniso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0275^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘saupanissayo’’^eb^ti, sahakārīkāraṇabhūto dhammasamūho idha ‘‘upanissayo’’ti ^a^V2.0198^ea^ adhippeto. Sammā pasatthā sundarā diṭṭhi etassāti sammādiṭṭhi, puggalo, tassa ^b^sammādiṭṭhissa.^eb^ So pana yasmā patiṭṭhitasammādiṭṭhiko, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sammāsaṅkappo pahotī^eb^ti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā dukkhādīsu parijānanādikiccaṃ sādhentiyā kāmavitakkādike samugghāṭento sammāsaṅkappo yathā attano kiccasādhane pahoti, tathā pavattiṃ panassa dassento āha ^b^‘‘sammāsaṅkappo pavattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Esa nayo sabbapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācā pahotī’’tiādīsu sesapadesu yathāvuttamatthaṃ atidisati.

[03]Ettha ^a^M2.0216^ea^ ca yasmā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahūpakārā sammādiṭṭhi. Tathā hi sā ‘‘paññāpajjoto, paññāsattha’’nti ca vuttā. Tāya hi so avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kilesacore ghātento khemena nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā ariyamaggakathāyaṃ sammādiṭṭhi ādito gayhati, idha pana puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāya ‘‘sammādiṭṭhissā’’ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana sammādiṭṭhipuggalo nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena sammadeva saṅkappeti, na micchākāmasaṅkappādivasena, tasmā sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahoti. Yasmā ca sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācāya upakārako. Yathāha ‘‘pubbe kho gahapati vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī’’ti, (saṃ. ni. 2.348) tasmā sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācā pahoti. Yasmā pana ‘‘idañcidañca karissāmā’’ti hi paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā yebhuyyena te te kammantā sammā payojīyanti, tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācassa sammākammanto pahoti. Yasmā pana catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ, tividhañca kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ sucaritaṃ pūrentasseva ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ pūrati, na itarassa ^a^P2.0276^ea^, tasmā sammāvācassa sammākammantassa ca sammāājīvo pahoti. Visuddhidiṭṭhisamudāgatasammāājīvassa yoniso padhānassa sambhavato sammāājīvassa sammāvāyāmo pahoti. Yoniso padahantassa kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti sammāvāyāmassa sammāsati pahoti. Yasmā evaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā sati samādhissa upakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ, tasmā sammāsatissa sammāsamādhi pahotīti. Ayañca nayo pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇikānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ vasena vutto, maggakkhaṇe pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ tassa tassa sahajātādivasena vutto ‘‘sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotī’’tiādīnaṃ padānamattho yutto, ayameva ca idhādhippeto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panattho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Maggañāṇe^eb^ti maggapariyāpannañāṇe ^b^ṭhitassa^eb^ taṃsamaṅgino. Maggapaññā hi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ sammādassanaṭṭhena ‘‘maggasammādiṭṭhī’’ti vuttā, sā eva nesaṃ yāthāvato jānanato paṭivijjhanato idha ^a^V2.0199^ea^ ‘‘maggañāṇa’’ntipi vuttā. ^b^Maggavimuttī^eb^ti maggena kilesānaṃ vimuccanaṃ samucchedappahānameva. Phalasammādiṭṭhi eva ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ‘‘phalasammāñāṇa’’nti pariyāyena vuttaṃ, pariyāyavacanañca vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Phalavimutti^eb^ pana paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Amatassa dvārā^eb^ti ariyamaggamāha. So pana vinā ca ācariyamuṭṭhinā anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsitattā ^b^vivaṭo. Dhammavinītā^eb^ti ariyadhamme vinītā. So panettha kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayavasena veditabboti āha ^b^‘‘sammāniyyānena niyyātā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Atthī^eb^ti puthutthavisayaṃ nipātapadaṃ ‘‘atthi ^a^P2.0277^ea^ imasmiṃ kāye kesā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110; 3.154; saṃ. ni. 4.127; a. ni. 6.29; 10.60; vibha. 356; khu. pā. 2.1ḍvattiṃsāakāra; netti. 47) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘anāgāmino ca atthī’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ‘‘atthi cevettha sakadāgāmino’’ti. Bahiddhā saṃyojanapaccayo nibbattihetubhūto puññabhāgo etissā atthīti puññabhāgā, atisayavisiṭṭho cettha atthiattho veditabbo. ^b^Ottappamāno^eb^ti uttasanto bhāyanto. ^b^Na pana natthi,^eb^ atthi evāti dīpeti.
[03]^b^291^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assā^eb^ti vessavaṇassa. ^b^Laddhi pana na atthi^eb^ paṭividdhasaccattā. ^b^‘‘Abhisamaye viseso natthī’’^eb^ti etena sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā sabbabuddhānaṃ sadisā evāti dasseti.
[03]^b^292^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāraṇassa ekarūpattā ^b^imāni pana padānī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ ‘‘tayidaṃ brahmacariya’’ntiādīni padāni, atha kho ‘‘imamatthaṃ janavasabho yakkho’’tiādīni padāni pīti.
[06]Janavasabhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^293^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcakuṇḍaliko^eb^ti ^a^P2.0278^ea^^a^V2.0200^ea^^a^M2.0218^ea^ vissaṭṭhapañcaveṇiko. ^b^Catumaggaṭṭhānesū^eb^ti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṭṭhānesu. Tattha hi katā sālādayo catūhi disāhi āgatamanussānaṃ upabhogakkhamā honti. ^b^‘‘Evarūpānī’’^eb^ti iminā rukkhamūlasodhanādīni ceva yathāsatti annadānādīni ca puññāni saṅgaṇhāti. ‘‘Suvaṇṇakkhandhasadiso attabhāvo iṭṭho kanto manāpo ahosī’’ti pāṭho. ^b^Sakaṭasahassamatta^eb^nti vāhasahassamattaṃ, ^b^vāho^eb^ pana vīsati khārī, ^b^khārī^eb^ soḷasadoṇamattā, ^b^doṇaṃ^eb^ soḷasa nāḷiyo veditabbā. ^b^Kumbhaṃ^eb^ dasambaṇāni. ‘‘Sahassanāḷiyo’’ti keci. ^b^Rattasuvaṇṇakaṇṇika^eb^nti rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ.

[03]Yasmā majjhimayāme eva devatā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ avasaraṃ labhanti, tasmā ^b^‘‘ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ atītāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Atikkantavaṇṇo^eb^ti ativiya kamanīyarūpo, ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti vā manaṃ ūnaṃ avasesaṃ, īsakaṃ asamattanti attho bhagavato hi samīpaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā sabbo gijjhakūṭavihāro tena obhāsito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘candimā viyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^294^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ratanamattakaṇṇikarukkhanissandenā^eb^ti ratanappamāṇarukkhamayakūṭadānapuññanissandena, tassa vā puññassa nissandaphalabhāvena. ^b^Nibbattasabhāya^eb^nti samuṭṭhitaupaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ. ^b^Maṇimayā^eb^ti padumarāgādimaṇimayā. ^b^Āṇiyo^eb^ti thambhatulāsaṅghāṭakādīsu vāḷarūpādisaṅghāṭanakāaṇiyo.

[03]^b^Gandhabbarājā^eb^ti gandhabbakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ rājā. Ye ^a^P2.0279^ea^ tāvatiṃsānaṃ āsannavāsino cātumahārājikā devā, te purato karonto ^b^‘‘dvīsu devalokesu devatā purato katvā nisinno’’^eb^ti vutto. Sesesupi tīsu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
[03]^b^Nāgarājā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0201^ea^ nāgānaṃ adhipati, na pana sayaṃ nāgajātiko.

[03]Āsati nisīdati etthāti ^b^āsanaṃ,^eb^ nisajjaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘nisīdituṃ okāso’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Etthā’’^eb^ti padaṃ nipātamattaṃ, ^b^etthā^eb^ti vā etasmiṃ pāṭhe. Atthuddhāranayena ^a^M2.0219^ea^ vattabbaṃ ^b^pubbe vuttaṃ catubbidhameva.^eb^ Tāvatiṃsā, ekacce ca cātumahārājikā yathāladdhāya sampattiyā thāvarabhāvāya, āyatiṃ sodhanāya ca pañca sīlāni rakkhanti, te tassa visodhanatthaṃ pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ karonti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahāpavāraṇāyā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Vassasahassa^eb^nti manussagaṇanāya vassasahassaṃ.

[03]^b^Pannapalāso^eb^ti patitapatto. ^b^Khārakajāto^eb^ti jātakhuddakamakuḷo. Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā, te ‘‘khārakā’’ti vuccanti. ^b^Jālakajāto^eb^ti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto. Keci pana ^b^‘‘jālakajāto^eb^ti ekajālo viya jāto’’ti atthaṃ vadanti. Pārichattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti, te cassa pallavā pabhassarapavāḷavaṇṇasamujjalā honti, tena so sabbaso samujjalanto tiṭṭhati. ^b^Kuṭumalakajāto^eb^ti sañjātamahāmakuḷo. ^b^Korakajāto^eb^ti sañjātasūcibhedo sampati vikasamānāvattho. ^b^Sabbapāliphullo^eb^ti sabbaso phullitavikasito.

[03]^b^Kantanakavāto^eb^ti devānaṃ puññakammapaccayā pupphānaṃ chindanakavāto. ^b^Kantatī^eb^ti chindati. ^b^Sampaṭicchanakavāto^eb^ti chinnānaṃ chinnānaṃ pupphānaṃ sampaṭiggaṇhanakavāto ^a^P2.0280^ea^. ^b^Naccanto^eb^ti nānāvidhabhattiṃ sannivesavasena naccanaṃ karonto. ^b^Aññataradevatāna^eb^nti nāmagottavasena appaññātadevatānaṃ.
[03]^b^Reṇuvaṭṭī^eb^ti reṇusaṅghāto. ^b^Kaṇṇikaṃ āhaccā^eb^ti sudhammāya kūṭaṃ āhantvā.

[03]^b^Aṭṭha divase^eb^ti pañcamiyā saddhiṃ pakkhe cattāro divase sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttesu aṭṭhasu divasesu dhammassavanaṃ nibaddhaṃ tadā pavattatīti tato aññadā kāritaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘akāladhammassavanaṃ kārita’’^eb^nti. Cetiye chattassa heṭṭhā kātabbavedikā ^b^chattavedikā. ^eb^ Cetiyaṃ parikkhipitvā padakkhiṇakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ antokatvā kātabbavedikā ^b^puṭavedikā.^eb^ Cetiyassa kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā ^a^V2.0202^ea^ taṃ sambandhameva katvā kātabbavedikā ^b^kucchivedikā.^eb^ Sīharūpapādakaṃ āsanaṃ ^b^sīhāsanaṃ.^eb^ Ubhosu passesu sīharūpayuttaṃ sopānaṃ ^b^sīhasopānaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Attamanā^eb^^a^M2.0220^ea^^b^honti^eb^ aniyāmanakabhāvato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘mahāpuññe purakkhatvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pavāraṇāsaṅgahatthāya sannipatitāti veditabbā^eb^ ‘‘tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.294) vacanato.

[03]^b^295^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Navahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘itipi so bhagavā araha’’ntiādinā (dī. ni. 1.157, 255) vuttehi arahattādīhi navahi buddhānubhāvadīpanehi kāraṇehi. ^b^Dhammassa cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayatthoti tena sampiṇḍitamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ujuppaṭipannatādibhedaṃ saṅghassa ca suppaṭipatti’’^eb^nti āha.

[03]^b^296^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā anantameva ānañcaṃ, bhisakkameva bhesajjaṃ ^a^P2.0281^ea^, evaṃ yathābhūtā eva ^b^yathābhuccā^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yathābhucceti yathābhūte’’^eb^ti. Vaṇṇetabbato kittetabbato ^b^vaṇṇā,^eb^ guṇā. ^b^Kathaṃ paṭipanno^eb^ti hetuavatthāyaṃ, phalāvatthāyaṃ, sattānaṃ upakārā vatthāyanti tīsupi avatthāsu lokanāthassa bahujanahitāya paṭipattiyā kathetukamyatāpucchā. Tathā hi naṃ ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā saṅkhepeneva dassento ^b^‘‘dīpaṅkarapādamūle’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^abhinīharamāno^eb^ti abhinīhāraṃ karonto. Yaṃ panettha mahābhinīhāre, pāramīsu ca vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^brahmajālaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7) vuttaṃ evāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Khantivāditāpasakāle’’^eb^tiādi (jā. 1.khantīvādījātaka) hetuavatthāyameva anaññasādhāraṇāya sudukkarāya bahujanahitāya paṭipattiyā vibhāvanaṃ. Yathādhippetaṃ hitasukhaṃ yāya kiriyāya vinā na ijjhati, sāpi tadatthā evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tusitapure yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhantopī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Dhammacakkappavattanādi^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 13; paṭi. ma. 3.30) pana nibbattitā bahujanahitāya paṭipatti. ^b^Āyusaṅkhārossajjanampi^eb^ ‘‘ettakaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭhāmī’’ti pavattiyā bahujanahitāya paṭipatti. Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānavasena bahujanahitāya ^a^V2.0203^ea^ paṭipatti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yāvassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sesapadānī^eb^ti ‘‘bahujanasukhāyā’’tiādīni padāni. ^b^Pacchima^eb^nti ‘‘atthāya hitāya sukhāyā’’ti ^a^M2.0221^ea^ padattayaṃ. ^b^Purimassā^eb^ti tato purimassa padattayassa. ^b^Attho^eb^ti atthaniddeso.

[03]Yadipi atītenaṅgena samannāgatā satthāro ahesuṃ, tepi pana buddhā evāti atthato amhākaṃ satthā anaññoti āha ^b^‘‘atītepi buddhato aññaṃ na samanupassāmā’’^eb^ti. Yathā ca atīte, evaṃ anāgate cāti ayamattho nayato labbhatīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anāgatepi na samanupassāmā’’^eb^ti. Sakko pana devarājā tamatthaṃ atthāpannameva katvā ^b^‘‘na panetarahi’’^eb^ iccevāha. ^b^Kiṃ sakko kathetīti vicāretvā^eb^ti ‘‘neva atītaṃse samanupassamā’ti ^a^P2.0282^ea^ vadanto sakko kiṃ kathetī’’ti vicāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhapetvā. Yasmā atīte buddhā ahesuṃ, anāgate bhavissantīti nāyamattho sakkena devarājena pariññāto, te pana buddhasāmaññena amhākaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ gahetvā etarahi aññassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato tathā vuttanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘etarahī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Svākkhātādīnī^eb^ti svākkhātapadādīni. ^b^Kusalādīnī^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ kusala’’ntiādīni padāni.

[03]Gaṅgāyamunānaṃ asamāgamaṭṭhāne udakaṃ bhinnavaṇṇaṃ hontampi samāgamaṭṭhāne abhinnavaṇṇaṃ evāti āha ^b^‘‘vaṇṇenapi saṃsandati sametī’’^eb^ti. Tattha kira gaṅgodakasadisameva yamunodakaṃ. Yathā nibbānaṃ kenaci kilesena anupakkiliṭṭhatāya parisuddhaṃ, evaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadāpi kenaci kilesena anupakkiliṭṭhatāya parisuddhāva icchitabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Yena parisuddhatthena nibbānassa, nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ca ākāsūpamatā, so kenaci anupalepo, anupakkileso cāti āha ^b^‘‘ākāsampi alaggaṃ parisuddha’’^eb^nti. Idāni tamatthaṃ nidassanena vibhūtaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘candimasūriyāna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṃsandati^eb^ yujjati paṭipajjitabbatāpaṭipajjanehi aññamaññānucchavikatāya.

[03]^b^Paṭipadāya ṭhitāna^eb^nti paṭipadaṃ maggapaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ. ^b^Vusitavata^eb^nti brahmacariyavāsaṃ vusitavantānaṃ etesaṃ. ^b^Laddhasahāyo^eb^ti etāsaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena laddhasahāyo. ^b^Tattha tattha^eb^ sāvakehi satthu kātabbakicce. ^b^Idaṃ pana^eb^ ‘‘adutiyo’’tiādi suttantare āgatavacanaṃ aññehi ^b^asadisaṭṭhena vuttaṃ,^eb^ na yathāvuttasahāyābhāvato. ^b^Apanujjā^eb^ti apanīya vivajjetvā. ^b^‘‘Apanujjā’’^eb^ti ca antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ ^a^P2.0283^ea^ idaṃ vacanaṃ ekantikattā tassa apanodassāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘apanujjevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Labbhatīti ^a^V2.0204^ea^^a^M2.0222^ea^^b^lābho,^eb^ so pana ukkaṃsagativijānanena sātisayo, vipulo eva ca idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘mahālābho uppanno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ussannapuññanissandasamuppanno^eb^ti yathāvuttakālaṃ sambhatasuvipulauḷāratarapuññābhisandato nibbatto.‘‘Ime nibbattā, ito paraṃ mayhaṃ okāso natthī’’ti ussāhajāto viya uparūpari vaḍḍhamāno udapādi. Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā mahāmeghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo ‘‘ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā’’ti sampiṇḍitā viya bhagavato idaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nibbattayiṃsu, tato annapānavatthayānamālāgandhavilepanādihatthā khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo upagantvā ‘‘kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo, kahaṃ narāsabho, kahaṃ purisasīho’’ti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti, sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya. Sabbaṃ khandhake, tesu tesu ca suttesu āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lābhasakkāro mahogho viyā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Paṭipāṭibhatta^eb^nti bahūsu ‘‘dānaṃ dassāmā’’ti āhaṭapaṭipāṭikāya uṭṭhitesu anupaṭipāṭiyā dātabba bhattaṃ.

[03]^b^Matthakaṃ patto^eb^ anaññasādhāraṇattā tassa dānassa. ^b^Upāyaṃ ācikkhi^eb^ nāgarānaṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena dānaṃ dāpetuṃ. Sālakalyāṇirukkhā rājapariggahā aññehi asādhāraṇā, tasmā tesaṃ padarehi maṇḍapo kārito, hatthino ca rājabhaṇḍabhūtā nāgarehi na sakkā laddhunti tehi chattaṃ dhārāpitaṃ, tathā khattiyadhītāhi veyyāvaccaṃ kāritaṃ. ^b^‘‘Pañca āsanasatānī’’^eb^ti idaṃ sālakalyāṇimaṇḍape paññatte sandhāya vuttaṃ, tato bahi pana bahūni paññattāni ahesuṃ ^a^P2.0284^ea^. ^b^Catujjātiyagandhaṃ pisati^eb^ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa pūjanatthañceva pattassa ubbaṭanatthañca. ^b^Udaka^eb^nti pattadhovanaudakaṃ. ^b^Anagghāni ahesuṃ^eb^ anaggharatanābhisaṅkhatattā.
[03]^b^Sattadhā muddhā phalissati^eb^ anādarakāraṇādinā. ^b^Kāḷaṃ olokessāmī^eb^ti kāḷaṃ evaṃ anupekkhissāmi, tassa uppajjanakaṃ anatthaṃ pariharissāmīti attho.

[03]^b^Kadariyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0223^ea^ thaddhamaccharino puññakammavimukhā. ^b^Devalokaṃ na vajanti^eb^ puññassa akatattā, maccharibhāvena ca pāpassa pasutattā. ^b^Bālā^eb^ti duccintitacintanādinā bālalakkhaṇayuttā. ^b^Nappasaṃsanti dānaṃ^eb^ pasaṃsitumpi na visahanti. ^b^Dhīro^eb^ti dhītisampanno uḷārapañño parehi kataṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0205^ea^^b^anumodamāno^eb^pi, ^b^teneva^eb^ dānānumodaneneva. ^b^Sukhī paratthā^eb^ti paraloke kāyikacetasikasukhasamaṅgī hoti.

[03]Vararojo nāma tasmiṃ kāle eko khattiyo, tassa ^b^vararojassa. Anavajja…pe… phaleyya^eb^ abhūtavādibhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Atirekapadasahassena^eb^ tiṃsādhikena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsatena ^b^vaṇṇameva kathesi^eb^ rūpappasannatāya ca.

[03]^b^Yāva maññe khattiyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yāvā^eb^ti avadhiparicchedavacanaṃ, ^b^aññe^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, yāva khattiyā khattiye avadhiṃ katvā sabbe devamanussāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khattiyā brāhmaṇā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Madapamatto^eb^ti lābhasakkārasilokamadena pamatto ceva tadanvayena pamādena pamatto ca hutvā.
[03]^b^Tadanvayamevā^eb^ti tadanugatameva. ^b^Vācā…pe… sametī^eb^ti vacīkammakāyakammāni aññamaññaṃ aviruddhāni, aññadatthu saṃsandanti. Ajā eva migāti ajāmigā, te ^b^ajāmige.^eb^

[03]^b^Tiṇṇavicikiccho^eb^ sabbaso atikkantavicikicchākantāro ^a^P2.0285^ea^. Nanu ca sabbepi sotāpannā tiṇṇavicikicchā, vigatakathaṃkathā ca? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana na tādisaṃ tiṇṇavicikicchataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho sabbasmiṃ ñeyyadhamme sabbākārāvabodhasaṅkhātasanniṭṭhānavasena sabbaso nirākataṃ sandhāyāti dassento ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^ti ādimāha. ^b^Ussannussannattā^eb^ti paroparabhāvato, ayañca attho bhagavato anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇabalenapi ijjhati. ^b^Sabbattha vigatakathaṃkatho^eb^ sabbadassāvibhāvato. Sabbesaṃ paramatthadhammānaṃ saccābhisamayavasena paṭividdhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vohāravasenā’’^eb^ti vā nāmagottādivasenāti attho.

[03]^b^Pariyositasaṅkappo^eb^ti sabbaso niṭṭhitamanoratho. Nanu ca ariyamaggena pariyositasaṅkappatā nāma soḷasakiccasiddhiyā katakaraṇīyabhāvena, na sabbañeyyadhammāvabodhenāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘pubbe^eb^^a^M2.0224^ea^^b^ananussutesū’’^eb^tiādi. Sāvakānaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ viya, hi paccekabuddhānaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ viya ca sammāsambuddhānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ catusaccābhisambodhapubbakamevāti. ^b^Ananussutesū^eb^ti na anussutesu. ^b^Sāma^eb^nti sayameva. Padadvayenāpi parato ghosena vināti dasseti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, saccābhisambodhanimittanti attho. Saccābhisambodho ca aggamaggavasenāti ^a^V2.0206^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Balesu ca vasībhāva^eb^nti dasannaṃ balañāṇānaṃ yathāruci pavatti. Jātattā jātāti sammāsambuddhe vadati.
[03]^b^297^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha tattha rājadhāniādike ^b^nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanto.^eb^ Tīsu maṇḍalesu yathākālaṃ ^b^cārikaṃ caranto.^eb^

[03]^b^298^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assā^eb^ti phalassa. ^b^Ta^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ. Dvinnampi ekato uppattiyā ^b^kāraṇaṃ natthi,^eb^ pageva tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ vāti. ^b^‘‘Ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi ‘‘ekissā lokadhātuyā’’ti vuttalokadhātuyā ^a^P2.0286^ea^ pamāṇaparicchedadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.

[03]^b^Yāvatā^eb^ti yattakena ṭhānena. ^b^Pariharantī^eb^ti sineruṃ parikkhipantā parivattanti. ^b^Disā^eb^ti disāsu, bhummatthe etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. ^b^Bhanti^eb^ dibbanti. ^b^Virocanā^eb^ti obhāsantā, ^b^virocanā^eb^ vā sobhamānā ^b^candimasūriyā bhanti,^eb^ tato eva ^b^disā^eb^ ca ^b^bhanti.^eb^^b^Tāva sahassadhā^eb^ti tattako sahassaloko.

[03]^b^Ettaka^eb^nti imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ majjhe katvā imināva saddhiṃ cakkavāḷaṃ dasasahassaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^mahāpadānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttameva. ^b^Na paññāyatī^eb^ti tīsu piṭakesu anāgatattā.

[03]^b^300^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti rūpasampattiyā. Suviññeyyattā taṃ anāmasitvā yasasaddasseva atthamāha. ^b^Alaṅkāraparivārenā^eb^ti alaṅkārena ca parivārena ca. ^b^Puññasiriyā^eb^ti puññiddhiyā.
[03]^b^301^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampasādane^eb^ti sampasādajanane. Saṃpubbo khā-saddo jānanattho ‘‘saṅkhāyetaṃ paṭisevatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.168) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘jānitvā modāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^304^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yāva^eb^^a^M2.0225^ea^^b^dīgharatta^eb^nti yāva parimāṇato, aparimitakālaparidīpanametanti āha ^b^‘‘ettakanti…pe… aticiraratta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Mahāpaññova so bhagavā^eb^ti tena brahmunā anumatipucchāvasena ^a^V2.0207^ea^ devānaṃ vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘mahāpaññova so bhagavā. Noti kathaṃ tumhe maññathā’’^eb^ti āha. Sayamevetaṃ pañhaṃ byākātukāmo ‘‘bhūtapubbaṃ bho’’ti ādiṃ āhāti sambandho. Evaṃ pana byākarontena atthato ayampi attho vutto nāma hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘anacchariyameta’’^eb^nti ādimāha. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ mārāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0287^ea^ kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamārānaṃ. ‘‘Anacchariyameta’’nti vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena ^b^‘‘kimettha acchariya’’^eb^nti punapi vuttaṃ.

[03]Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikātthānaṃ puro dhānato pure pure saṃvidhānato ^b^purohito^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sabbakiccāni^eb^^b^anusāsanapurohito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Govindiyābhisekenā^eb^ti govindassa ṭhāne ṭhapanābhisekena. Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ. ^b^Jotitattā^eb^ti āvudhānaṃ jotitattā. ^b^Pālanasamatthatāyā^eb^ti rañño, aparimitassa ca sattakāyassa anatthato paripālanasamatthatāya.
[03]^b^Sammā vossajjitvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu tassevāgāravabhāvena vissajjitvā niyyātetvā. Taṃ tamatthaṃ kiccaṃ passatīti ^b^atthadaso. ^eb^

[03]^b^305^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhavanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^bhavo,^eb^ bhavati etenāti vā ^b^bhavo,^eb^ vaḍḍhikāraṇaṃ sandhivasena ma-kārāgamo, o-kārassa ca a-kārādesaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘bhavamatthū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhavantaṃ jotipāla^eb^nti pana sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘bhoto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mā paccabyāhāsī^eb^ti mā paṭikkhipīti attho. So pana paṭikkhepo paṭivacanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mā paṭibyāhāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhisambhosī^eb^ti kammantānaṃ saṃvidhāne samattho hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saṃvidahitvā’’^eb^ti. Bhavābhavaṃ, paññañca vindi paṭilabhīti ^b^govindo,^eb^ mahanto govindo ^b^mahāgovindo. ‘‘Go’’^eb^ti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ gacchati atthe bujjhatīti.

[03]^b^306^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekapitikā^eb^^a^M2.0226^ea^ vemātukā ^b^kaniṭṭhabhātaro. Ayaṃ abhisitto^eb^ti ayaṃ reṇu rājakumāro pitu accayena rajje abhisitto. ^b^Rājakārakā^eb^ti rājaputtaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetāro.
[03]^b^307^eb^^b^.^eb^ Madentīti ^a^P2.0288^ea^^b^madanīyā^eb^ti kattusādhanataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘madakarā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Madakaraṇaṃ^eb^ pana pamādassa visesakāraṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pamādakarā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^308^eb^^b^.^eb^ Reṇussa ^a^V2.0208^ea^ rajjasamīpe dasagāvutamattavitthatāni hutvā aparabhāge tiyojanasataṃ vitthatattā ^b^sabbāni cha rajjāni sakaṭamukhāni paṭṭhapesi. Vitānasadisaṃ^eb^ caturassabhāvato.

[03]^b^310^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sahā^eb^ti gāthāya padaparipūraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘teneva sahā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Sahā^eb^ti vā avinābhāvatthe nipāto, so saha āsuṃ satta bhāradhāti yojetabbo, tena te desantare vasantā vicittena sahabhāvino avinābhāvinoti dīpeti. Rajjabhāraṃ dhārenti attani āropenti vahantīti ^b^bhāradhā. ^eb^
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^311^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupurohite ṭhapesī^eb^ti anupurohite katvā ṭhapesi, anupurohite vā ṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tisavanaṃ karonte sandhāya ^b^‘‘divasassa tikkhattu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Dvīsu sandhīsu savanaṃ karonte sandhāya ^b^‘‘sāyaṃ, pāto vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti vatacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā nhātakālato pabhuti.

[03]^b^312^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiuggacchī^eb^ti uṭṭhahi udapādi. ^b^Acintetvā^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ kho ahaṃ brahmunā saddhiṃ manteyya’’nti acintetvā evaṃ cittampi anuppādetvā. Tena samāgamanasseva abhāvato ^b^amantetvā. Taṃ disvā^eb^ti taṃ karuṇābrahmavihārabhāvanaṃ brahmadassanūpāyaṃ disvā ñāṇacakkhunā.

[03]^b^313^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Eva^eb^nti ^a^M2.0227^ea^ evaṃ rañño ārocetvā paṭisallānaṃ upagate. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu channaṃ khattiyānaṃ, sattannaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ ^a^P2.0289^ea^, sattannaṃ nāṭakasatānaṃ, cattārīsāya ca bhariyānaṃ āpucchanavāresu.
[03]^b^316^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sādisiyo^eb^ti jātiyā sādisiyoti āha ^b^‘‘samavaṇṇā samajātikā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^317^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Santhāgāra^eb^nti jhānamanasikārena bahi visaṭavitakkavūpasamanena cittassa santhambhanaṃ ^a^V2.0209^ea^ agāraṃ, jhānasālanti attho. ^b^Gahitāvā^eb^ti bhāvanānuyogena mahāsattena attano cittasantāne uppādanavasena gahitā eva. ^b^Natthi^eb^ jhāneneva vikkhambhitattā. Visesato hissa karuṇāya bhāvitattā ^b^anabhirati ukkaṇṭhanā^eb^ natthi, mettāya bhāvitattā ^b^bhayaparitassanā natthi. Ukkaṇṭhanā^eb^ti pana brahmadassane ussukkaṃ, ^b^paritassanā^eb^ti tadabhipatthanāti āha ^b^‘‘brahmuno panā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^318^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittutrāso^eb^ti cittassa utrāsanamattaṃ. ^b^Katha^eb^nti sattanikāyanivāsaṭṭhānanāmagottādīnaṃ vasena kena pakārena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ki’’^eb^ntiādi.
[03]^b^So^eb^ti ye te panakanasanantabandhasatanasanaṅkumārakālanāmakā loke pākaṭā paññātā brahmāno, tesu ^b^sanaṅkumāro nāmāhanti dasseti.^eb^

[03]^b^Aggha^eb^nti garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ dātabbaṃāhāraṃ. ^b^Madhusāka^eb^nti madhurāhāraṃ, yaṃ kiñci atithino dātabbaṃ āhāraṃ upacāravasena evaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘madhusākaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pucchāmā^eb^ti nimantanavasena pucchāma.

[03]^b^319^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahāsatto cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhitopi tesu ‘‘brahmasahabyatāya maggo’’ti anibbematikatāya ^b^‘‘kaṅkhī’’^eb^ti avoca. Keci pana ‘‘tapokammena parikkhīṇasarīratāya, brahmasamāgamena bhayādisamuppattiyā ca paṭiladdhamattehi brahmavihārehi parihīno ahosi, tasmā avikkhambhitavicikicchatāya ‘kaṅkhī’ti avocā’’ti vadanti. Parassa vediyā viditā ^b^paravediyā,^eb^ te pana tassa pākaṭā vibhūtāti āha ^b^‘‘parassa^eb^^a^M2.0228^ea^^b^pākaṭesu paravediyesū’’^eb^ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘parena sayaṃ abhisaṅkhatattā’’^eb^ti. Mamāti ^a^P2.0290^ea^ kammaṃ ^b^mamaṃkāro,^eb^ mamattanti āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ mama…pe… taṇha’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Mama’’nti karoti etenāti hi ^b^mamaṃkāro,^eb^ tathāpavattā taṇhā. ^b^Manujesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, na visayeti āha ^b^‘‘manujesu yo kocī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Ekodibhūto’’^eb^ti padassa bhāvatthaṃ tāva dassento ^b^‘‘ekībhūto’’^eb^ti vatvā puna taṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘eko tiṭṭhanto eko nisīdanto’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tādiso^eb^ti eko hutvā pavattanako. ^b^Bhūto^eb^ti jāto. Jhāne adhimutti nāma tasmiṃ nibbattite, anibbattite kuto adhimuttīti āha ^b^‘‘jhānaṃ nibbattetvāti attho’’^eb^ti. Vissagandho nāma kodhādikilesaparibhāvanāti tesaṃ vikkhambhanena ^a^V2.0210^ea^^b^vissagandhavirahito. Etesu dhammesū^eb^ti pabbajjānaṃ vivekavāsakaruṇābrahmavihārādidhammesu.

[03]^b^320^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avidvā^eb^ti na viditavā. ^b^Āvaritā^eb^ti kusalānaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ uppattinivāraṇena āvaritā. ^b^Pūtikā^eb^ti byāpannacittatādinā pūtibhūtā. Kilesavasena duggandhaṃ vissagandhaṃ ^b^vāyati.^eb^ Nirayādiapāyesu nibbattanasīlatāya ^b^āpāyikā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘apāyūpagā’’^eb^ti. Corādīhi upaddutassa pavisitukāmassa pākārakavāṭaparikhādīhi viya nagaraṃ kodhādīhi ^b^nivuto pihito brahmaloko assāti nivutabrahmaloko. Pucchati^eb^ ‘‘kenāvaṭā’’ti vadanto.

[03]Musāvādova ^b^mosavajjaṃ^eb^ yathā bhisakkameva bhesajjaṃ. ^b^Kujjhanaṃ^eb^ dussanaṃ. Diṭṭhādīsu adiṭṭhādivāditāvasena paresaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ ^b^paravisaṃvādanaṃ.^eb^ Sadisaṃ patirūpaṃ dassetvā ^b^palobhanaṃ sadisaṃ dassetvā vañcanaṃ.^eb^ Mittānaṃ vihiṃsanaṃ mettibhedo ^b^mittadubbhanaṃ.^eb^ Daḷhamaccharitā ^b^thaddhamacchariyaṃ.^eb^ Attani vijjamānaṃ nihīnataṃ, sadisataṃ vā ^b^atikkamitvā maññanaṃ.^eb^ Paresaṃ sampattiyā asahanaṃ ^b^khīyanaṃ.^eb^ Attasampattiyā nigūhanavasena, parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanavasena ca vividhā icchā ruci etassāti ^b^vivicchā.^eb^ Kadariyatāya ^a^P2.0291^ea^ mudukaṃ ^b^macchariyaṃ. Yattha katthacī^eb^ti sakasantake, parasantake, hīnātike cāti yattha katthaci ārammaṇe. ^b^Lubbhanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇassa gahaṇaṃ abhigijjhanaṃ. ^b^Majjanaṃ^eb^ seyyādivasena madanaṃ sampaggaho. ^b^Muyhanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇassa anavabodho. ^b^Etesū^eb^ti etesu yathāvuttesu kodhādīsu sattasantānassa kilissanato vibādhanato, upatāpanato ca kilesasaññitesu pāpadhammesu. ^b^Yuttā^eb^ payuttā sampayuttā avirahitā.

[03]Ettha ^a^M2.0229^ea^ cāyaṃ brahmā mahāsattena āmagandhe supuṭṭho attano yathāupaṭṭhite pāpadhamme cuddasahi padehi vibhajitvā kathesi, te pana tādisaṃ pavattivisesaṃ upādāya vuttāpi keci puna vuttā, āmagandhasutte (su. ni. 242) pana vuttāpi keci idha sabbaso na vuttā, evaṃ santepi lakkhaṇahāranayena, tadekaṭṭhatāya vā tesaṃ pettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ pana sutta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tattha āmagandhasuttena dīpetvā^eb^ti idha sarūpato avutte āmagandhepi vuttehi ekalakkhaṇatādinā āmagandhasuttena pakāsetvā ^b^kathetabbaṃ^eb^ tattha nesaṃ sarūpato kathitattā. ^b^Āmagandhasuttampi iminā dīpetabbaṃ^eb^ idha vuttānampi kesañci āmagandhānaṃ tattha avuttabhāvato. Yasmā āmagandhasutte vuttāpi āmagandhā atthato idha saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti, tasmā idha vutte pariharaṇavasena dassentena yasmā cettha keci abhidhammanayena akilesasabhāvāpi sattasantānassa ^a^V2.0211^ea^ vibādhanaṭṭhena ‘‘kilesā’’ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, tasmā ‘‘cuddasasu kilesesū’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Nimmādaṃ milāpanaṃ khepananti āha ^b^‘‘nimmādetabbā pahātabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Buddhatantī^eb^ti buddhabhāvīnaṃ paveṇī, buddhabhāvinopi ‘‘buddhā’’ti vuccanti yathā ‘‘agamā rājagahaṃ buddho’’ti. ^b^Mahāpurisassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvā^eb^ti mahāpurisassa ‘‘pabbajissāmaha’’nti ^a^P2.0292^ea^ pavattacittuppādassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvā.
[03]^b^321^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mama manaṃ haritvā^eb^ti mama cittaṃ apanetvā tassa vasena avattitvā.

[03]^b^Ekībhāvaṃ upagantvā vutthassā^eb^ti kāyavivekaparibrūhanena ekībhāvaṃ upagantvā tapokammavasena vutthassa. ^b^Kusapattehi paritthato^eb^ti barihisehi vediyā samantato santharito. ^b^Akāco^eb^ti vaṇo vaṇasadisakhaṇḍiccavirahito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akakkaso’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^322^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sikkheyyāmā^eb^ti sikkhāpeyyāma, ^b^sikkhāpanañcettha^eb^ atthibhāvāpādananti āha ^b^‘‘upalāpeyyāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^323^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yassa ^a^M2.0230^ea^ vīriyārambhassa, khantibalassa ca abhāvena pabbajitānaṃ samaṇadhammo paripuṇṇo, parisuddho ca na hoti, tesu vīriyārambhakhantibalesu te te niyojetuṃ ^b^‘‘ārambhavho’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Karuṇājhānamaggo^eb^ti karuṇājhānasaṅkhāto maggo. ^b^Ujumaggo^eb^ti brahmalokagamane ujubhūto maggo. ^b^Anuttaro^eb^ti seṭṭho brahmavihārasabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttamamaggo nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbhi rakkhito^eb^ sādhūhi yathā parihāni na hoti, evaṃ paṭipakkhadūrīkaraṇena rakkhito gopito. ‘‘Saddhammo sabbhi vakkhito’’ti keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ saparahitasādhanena sādhūhi buddhādīhi kathito paveditoti attho.

[03]^b^Taṅkhaṇaviddhaṃsanadhamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0212^ea^ yasmiṃ khaṇe virodhidhammasamāyogo, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe vinassanasabhāvaṃ, yo vā so gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi, pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamanatopi sīghataratāya atīttaro pavattikkhaṇo, teneva vinassanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Tassa^eb^ jīvitassa. ^b^Gati^eb^nti niṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Mantāya^eb^nti manteyyanti ^a^P2.0293^ea^ vuttaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mantetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Karaṇatthe vā bhumma^eb^nti ‘‘mantāya’’nti idaṃ bhummaṃ karaṇatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā ‘‘ñātāya’’nti. ^b^Sabbapalibodhe^eb^ti sabbepi kusalakiriyāya vibandhe uparodhe.
[03]^b^324^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Appesakkhā^eb^ti appānubhāvāti āha ^b^‘‘pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Cakkavatti rājā viya^eb^ sambhāvito.
[03]^b^328^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samāpattīnaṃ ājānanaṃ nāma attapaccakkhatā, sacchikiriyāti āha ^b^‘‘na sakkhiṃsu nibbattetu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^329^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘sarāmaha’’nti iminā ^b^padena.^eb^ ‘‘Sarāmaha’’nti hi vadantena bhagavato mahābrahmunā kathitaṃ ‘‘tatheva ta’’nti bhagavatā paṭiññātameva jātanti. ^b^Na vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya^eb^ catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya abhāvato. Asati pana vaṭṭe nibbidāya virāgānaṃ asambhavo evāti āha ^a^M2.0231^ea^^b^‘‘na virāgāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekantameva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya^eb^ anekākāravokāravaṭṭe ādīnavavibhāvanato.

[03]^b^‘‘Nibbidāyā’’^eb^ti iminā padena ^b^vipassanā^eb^ vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Vavatthānakathā^eb^ti vipassanāmagganibbānānaṃ taṃtaṃpadehi vavatthapetvā kathā. Ayamettha nippariyāyakathāti āha ^b^‘‘pariyāyena panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^330^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paripūretu^eb^nti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paripuṇṇe kātuṃ, nibbattetunti attho. ^b^Brahmacariyaciṇṇakulaputtāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0213^ea^ ciṇṇamaggabrahmacariyānaṃ kulaputtānanti ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ^b^arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.^eb^

[03]^b^Abhinandanaṃ^eb^ nāma sampaṭicchanaṃ ‘‘abhinandanti āgata’’ntiādīsu ^a^P2.0294^ea^ viya, tañcettha atthato cittassa attamanatāti āha ^b^‘‘cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sādhu sādhū’’ti vācāya sampahaṃsanā ^b^anumodanā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vācāya sampahaṃsamāno anumoditvā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^331^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0295^ea^^a^V2.0214^ea^^a^M2.0232^ea^ raññā okkākena jātisambhedaparihāranimittaṃ pavattitaṃ udānaṃ ^b^paṭicca. Ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena ‘‘sakkā’’ti vuccatī^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^mahānidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Aropite^eb^ti kenaci aropite.
[03]^b^Āvaraṇenā^eb^ti setunā. ^b^Bandhāpetvā^eb^ti paṃsupalāsapāsāṇamattikākhaṇḍādīhi āḷiṃ thiraṃ kārāpetvā.
[03]‘‘Jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsū’’ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘koliyakammakarā vadantī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Tīṇi jātakānī^eb^ti phandanajātakapathavīundriyajātakalaṭukikajātakāni ^b^dve jātakānī^eb^ti rukkhadhamma vaṭṭakajātakāni.
[03]^b^Tenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. ^b^Kalahakāraṇabhāvo^eb^ti kalahakāraṇassa atthibhāvo.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti akāraṇe. ^b^Veraṃ katvā^eb^ti virodhaṃ uppādetvā. ‘‘Kuṭhārihattho puriso’’tiādinā ^b^phandanajātakaṃ kathesi. ^eb^ ‘‘Duddubhāyati bhaddante’’tiādinā ^b^pathavīundriyajātakaṃ kathesi. ^eb^ ‘‘Vandāmi taṃ kuñjarā’’tiādinā ^b^laṭukikajātakaṃ kathesi. ^eb^
[21]‘‘Sādhū ^a^V2.0215^ea^ sambahulā ñātī; api rukkhā araññajā;
[22]Vāto vahati ekaṭṭhaṃ, brahantampi vanappati’’nti. –
[07]Ādinā^b^ rukkhadhammajātakaṃ kathesi.^eb^
[21]‘‘Sammodamānā ^a^P2.0296^ea^ gacchanti, jālaṃ ādāya pakkhino;
[22]Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa’’nti. –
[07]Ādinā^b^ vaṭṭakajātakaṃ kathesi.^eb^
[21]‘‘Attadaṇḍā ^a^M2.0233^ea^ bhayaṃ jātaṃ, janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ;
[22]Saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā’’ti. (su. ni. 1.941);
[07]Ādinā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi.^eb^
[03]Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyā kāyavācāhi parakkamantiyo ^b^‘‘ukkaṇṭhantū’’ti sāsanaṃ pesenti.^eb^

[03]^b^Kuṇāladahe^eb^ti kuṇāladahatīre ^b^patiṭṭhāya. Pucchitapucchitaṃ kathesi^eb^ (jā. 2.kuṇālajātaka) ‘‘anukkamena kuṇālasakuṇarājassa pucchanappasaṅgena ^b^kuṇālajātakaṃ^eb^ kathessāmī’’ti. ^b^Anabhiratiṃ vinodesi^eb^ itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ ādīnavokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena.
[03]Kosajjaṃ vidhamitvā purisathāmaparibrūhanena ^b^‘‘uttamapurisasadisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti uppannacittā.
[03]^b^Avissaṭṭhakammantā^eb^ti arativinodanato paṭṭhāya avissaṭṭhasamaṇakammantā, aparicattakammaṭṭhānāti attho. ^b^Nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti bhagavā cintesīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Paduminiya^eb^nti padumassare. ^b^Vikasiṃsu^eb^ guṇagaṇavibodhena. ^b^‘‘Ayaṃ imassa…pe… na kathesī’’^eb^ti iminā sabbepi te bhikkhū tāvadeva paṭipāṭiyā āgatattā aññamaññassa lajjamānā ^a^V2.0216^ea^ attanā paṭividdhavisesaṃ bhagavato nārocesunti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Khīṇāsavāna’’^eb^ntiādinā tattha kāraṇamāha.

[03]^b^Osīdamatte^eb^ti bhagavato santikaṃ upagatamatte. ^b^Ariyamaṇḍale^eb^ti ariyasamūhe. ^b^Pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato^eb^ti yugandharapabbatassa pācīnaparikkhepato, na bāhirakehi uccamānaudayapabbatato. ^b^Rāmaṇeyyakadassanattha^eb^nti buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā visesato ramaṇīyassa lokassa ramaṇīyabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ullaṅghitvā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0297^ea^ uṭṭhahitvā. ^b^Evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutte^eb^ti yathāvutte candamaṇḍalassa uṭṭhitakkhaṇe uṭṭhitavelāyaṃ uṭṭhitamuhutteti uparūpari kālassa vaḍḍhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]Tathā ^a^M2.0234^ea^ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jātiādivasena bhagavato anurūpaparivāritaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^ti ādimāha.

[03]^b^Samāpannadevatā^eb^ti āsannaṭṭhāne jhānasamāpatti samāpannadevatā. ^b^Caliṃsū^eb^ti uṭṭhahiṃsu. Kosamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^saddantaraṃ.^eb^ Jambudīpe kira ādito tesaṭṭhimattāni nagarasahassāni uppannāni, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesū’’^eb^ti. Te pana sampiṇḍetvā satasahassato paraṃ asītisahassāni, navasahassāni ca honti. ^b^Navanavutiyā doṇamukhasatasahassesū^eb^ti navasatasahassādhikesu navutisatasahassesu doṇamukhesu. ^b^Doṇamukha^eb^nti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādanagaraṃ vuccati. ^b^Channavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassesū^eb^ti chakoṭiadhikanavutikoṭisatasahassapaṭṭanesu. Tambapaṇṇidīpādīsu ^b^chapaṇṇāsāya ratanākaresu.^eb^ Evaṃ pana nagaradoṇimukhapaṭṭanaratanākarādivibhāgena kathanaṃ taṃtaṃadhivatthāya vasantīnaṃ devatānaṃ bahubhāvadassanatthaṃ. Yadi dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitā, atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dasahi ca lokadhātūhī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘dasasahassa…pe… adhippetā’’^eb^ti, tena sahassilokadhātu idha ‘‘ekā lokadhātū’’ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Lohapāsāde^eb^ti ādito kate lohapāsāde. ^b^Brahmaloke^eb^ti heṭṭhime brahmaloke. Yadi tā devatā evaṃ nirantarā, pacchā āgatānaṃ okāso eva na bhaveyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yathā kho panā’’^eb^tiādi. Suddhāvāsakāyaṃ upapannā ^b^suddhāvāsakāyikā,^eb^ tāsaṃ pana yasmā suddhāvāsabhūmi nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘suddhāvāsavāsīna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āvāsā^eb^ti āvāsanaṭṭhānabhūtā ^a^P2.0298^ea^^a^V2.0217^ea^, devatā pana orambhāgiyānaṃ, itaresañca saṃyojanānaṃ samucchindanena suddho āvāso etesanti ^b^suddhāvāsā.^eb^

[03]^b^332^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari^eb^ aññattha okāsaṃ alabhamāno. Evaṃ sesāpi. Buddhānaṃ abhimukhamaggo ^b^buddhavīthi.^eb^ Yāva cakkavāḷā ^b^ottharituṃ^eb^ ovarituṃ ^b^na sakkā. Pahaṭabuddhavīthiyāvā^eb^ti buddhānaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamantehi tehi devabrahmehi vaḷañjitavīthiyāva. Samiti saṅgati sannipāto ^b^samayo,^eb^ mahanto samayo ^b^mahāsamayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘mahāsamūho’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0235^ea^. Pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ ^b^pavana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vanasaṇḍo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devaghaṭā^eb^ti devasamūhā.

[03]^b^Samādahaṃsū^eb^ti samādahitaṃ lokuttarasamādhinā suṭṭhu appitaṃ akaṃsu, yathāsamāhitaṃ pana samādhinā yojitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samādhinā yojesu’’^eb^nti. Sabbesaṃ gomuttavaṅkādīnaṃ dūrasamūhanitattā ^b^sabbe…pe… akariṃsu.^eb^ Nayati asse etehīti ^b^nettāni,^eb^ yottāni. Avīthipaṭipannānaṃ assānaṃ vīthipaṭipādanaṃ rasmiggahaṇena pahotīti ‘‘sabbayottāni gahetvā acodento’’ti vatvā taṃ pana acodanaṃ avāraṇaṃ evāti āha ^b^‘‘acodento avārento’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā khīlaṃ bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā ākoṭitaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, yathā ca palighaṃ nagarappavesanivāraṇaṃ, yathā ca indakhīlaṃ gambhīranemi sunikhātaṃ dunnīharaṇaṃ, evaṃ rāgādayo sattasantānato dunnīharaṇā, nibbānanagarappavesanivāraṇā cāti te ‘‘khīlaṃ, palighaṃ, indakhīla’’nti ca vuttā. ^b^Taṇhāejāya abhāvena anejā^eb^ paramasantuṭṭhabhāvena cātuddisattā ^b^appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti.^eb^

[03]^b^Gatāse^eb^ti gatā eva, na pana gamissanti pariniṭṭhitasaraṇagamanattāti ^a^P2.0299^ea^. Lokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘nibbematikasaraṇagamanena gatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Te^eb^ hi niyamena ^b^apāyabhūmiṃ na gamissanti, devakāyañca paripūressanti.^eb^ Ye pana lokiyena saraṇagamanena ^b^buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ,^eb^ sati ca paccayantarasamavāye ^b^pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, devakāyaṃ paripūressantī^eb^ti ayamettha attho.
[03]^b^333^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etesa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0218^ea^ devatāsannipātānaṃ. ^b^Idānī^eb^ti imasmiṃ kāle. ^b^Buddhāna^eb^nti aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ^b^abhāvā. Cittakallatā^eb^ cittamaddavaṃ.

[03]Kiṃ pana bhagavatāva mahante devatāsamāgame tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ kathetuṃ sakkāti? Āma sakkāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘buddhā nāma mahantā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti rūpāyatanamāha, ^b^suta^eb^nti saddāyatanaṃ, ^b^muta^eb^nti sampattaggāhīndriyavisayaṃ gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, ^b^viññāta^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ sabbaṃ ^a^M2.0236^ea^ ñeyyaṃ, ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā, apariyesitvā vā sampattaṃ, ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ, appattaṃ vā pariyiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti kevalaṃ manasā ālocitaṃ. ^b^Katthaci nīlādivasena vibhattarūpārammaṇe^eb^ti abhidhamme (dha. sa. 615) ‘‘nīlaṃ pītaka’’ntiādinā vibhatte yattha katthaci rūpārammaṇe kiñci rūpārammaṇaṃ vā na atthīti yojanā. ^b^Bherisaddādivasenā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti buddhānaṃ.

[03]Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tadā jānanakiriyāya apariyositabhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘‘jānāmī’’ti vatvā yasmā yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā aññātaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tamahaṃ abbhaññāsi’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Na olokenti^eb^ payojanābhāvato. ^b^Viparītā^eb^ ‘‘na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā’’tiādinā nayena vuttā. ‘‘Yassa maṅgalā samūhatā’’ti (su. ni. 362) ārabhitvā ‘‘rāgaṃ ^a^P2.0300^ea^ vinayetha mānusesu dibbesu kāmesu cā’’tiādinā (su. ni. 363) ca rāganiggahakathābāhullato ^b^sammāparibbājanīyasuttaṃ^eb^ rāgacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ, ‘‘piyamappiyabhūtā kalaha vivādā paridevasokā sahamaccharā cā’’tiādinā (su. ni. 869; mahāni. 98) kalahādayo yato dosato samuṭṭhahanti, so ca doso yato piyabhāvato, so ca piyabhāvo yato chandato samuṭṭhahanti, iti phalato, kāraṇaparamparato ca dose ādīnavavibhāvanabāhullato ^b^kalahavivādasuttaṃ^eb^ (su. ni. 869; mahāni. 98) dosacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
[21]‘‘Appañhi etaṃ na alaṃ samāya,
[27]Duve vivādassa phalāni brūmi;
[26]Etampi ^a^V2.0219^ea^ disvā na vivādayetha,
[22]Khemābhipassaṃ avivādabhūmi’’nti. (su. ni. 902; mahāni. 131) –
[07]Ādinā nayena sammohavidhamanato, paññāparibrūhanato ca ^b^mahābyūhasuttaṃ^eb^ mohacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
[21]‘‘Parassa ^a^M2.0237^ea^ ce dhammaṃ anānujānaṃ,
[27]Bālo, mago hoti nihīnapañño;
[26]Sabbeva bālā sunihīnapaññā,
[22]Sabbevime diṭṭhiparibbasānā’’ti. (su. ni. 886; mahāni. 115) –
[07]Ādinā nayena sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitāpanayanamukhena savisayesu diṭṭhiggahaṇesu visaṭavitakkavicchindanavasena pavattattā ^b^cūḷabyūhasuttaṃ^eb^ vitakkacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
[21]‘‘Mūlaṃ ^a^P2.0301^ea^ papañcasaṅkhāya (iti bhagavā),
[27]Mantā asmīti sabbaṃ uparundhe;
[26]Yā kāci taṇhā ajjhattaṃ,
[22]Tāsaṃ vinayā sadā sato sikkhe’’ti. (su. ni. 922; mahāni. 151) –

[07]^b^Papañcasaṅkhāya mūlaṃ^eb^ avijjādikilesajātaṃ ^b^asmīti^eb^ pavattamānañcāti ^b^sabbaṃ mantā^eb^ paññāya uparundheyya. ^b^Yā kāci ajjhattaṃ^eb^ rūpataṇhādibhedā ^b^taṇhā^eb^ uppajjeyya, ^b^tāsaṃ vinayā^eb^ vūpasamāya ^b^sadā sato^eb^ upaṭṭhitassati hutvā sikkheyyāti evamādi upadesassa saddhova bhājanaṃ. Tassa hi so atthāvahoti ^b^tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ^eb^ saddhācaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ –
[21]‘‘Vītataṇho purā bhedā (iti bhagavā),
[27]Pubbamantamanissito;
[26]Vemajjhe ^a^V2.0220^ea^ nupasaṅkheyyo,
[22]Tassa natthi purakkhata’’nti. (su. ni. 855; mahāni. 84) –

[03]Yo sarīrabhedato pubbeva pahīnataṇho, tato eva atītaddhasaññitaṃ purimakoṭṭhāsaṃ taṇhānissayena anissito, vemajjhe paccuppannepi addhani ‘‘ratto’’tiādinā upasaṅkhātabbo, tassa arahato taṇhādiṭṭhipurakkhārānaṃ abhāvā anāgate addhani kiñci purakkhataṃ natthīti ādinā evaṃ gambhīrakathābāhullato ^b^pūrābhedasuttaṃ^eb^ (su. ni. 855; mahāni. 84) buddhicaritānaṃ sappāyanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atha nesaṃ sappāyaṃ …pe… vavatthapetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Manasākāsī^eb^ti evaṃ cariyāya vasena manasi katvā puna taṃ sadisaṃ attano ^a^M2.0238^ea^ desanānikkhepayogyatāvasena manasi akāsi. ^b^Attajjhāsayena nu kho jāneyyā^eb^ti parajjhāsayādiṃ anapekkhitvā mayhaṃyeva ajjhāsayena āraddha desanaṃ ^a^P2.0302^ea^ jāneyya nu kho. ^b^Parajjhāsayenā^eb^ti sannipatitāya parisāya kassaci ajjhāsayena. ^b^Aṭṭhuppattikenā^eb^ti idha samuṭṭhitāṭṭhuppattiyā. ^b^Pucchāvasenā^eb^ti kassaci pucchantassa pucchāvasena. ^b^Āraddhadesanaṃ jāneyyāti. ‘‘Sace paccekabuddho bhaveyyā’’^eb^ti idaṃ imesaṃ suttānaṃ desanāya pucchā paccekabuddhānaṃ bhāriyā, avisayā cāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sopi na sakkuṇeyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ettha ca yasmā na anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchā vā yuttā, atha kho diṭṭhasaṃsandanapucchāsadisī vā vimaticchedanapucchāsadisī vā pucchā yuttā, tāva puggalajjhāsayavasena pavattitā nāma honti, na yathādhammavasena, tattha yadi bhagavā tathā sayameva pucchitvā sayameva vissajjeyya, suṇantīnaṃ devatānaṃ sammoho bhaveyya ‘‘kiṃ nāmetaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ evamāha, punapi evamāhā’’ti, andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ petā devatā na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhitu’’^eb^nti. Yathādhammadesanāyaṃ pana kathetukamyatāvasena pucchanena sammoho hotīti. ^b^Sūriyo uggatoti^eb^ āha devasaṅgho āsannatarabhāvena obhāsassa vipulauḷārabhāvato. ^b^Ekissā lokadhātuyā^eb^ti sutte (dī. ni. 3.161; ma. ni. 3.129; a. ni. 1.277; vibha. 809; netti. 57; mi. pa. 5.1.1) āgatanayena sabbattheva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dve buddhā na honteva. Tenevāha – ‘‘anantāsu…pe… addasā’’ti.

[03]Gāthāyaṃ ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti nimmitabuddho bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ okāsaṃ kārāpesi. ^b^Muni^eb^nti buddhamuniṃ ^a^V2.0221^ea^. ^b^Pahūtapañña^eb^nti mahāpaññaṃ.^b^ Tiṇṇa^eb^nti caturoghatiṇṇaṃ. ^b^Pāraṅgata^eb^nti nibbānappattaṃ, sabbassa vā ñeyyassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gataṃ. ^b^Parinibbutaṃ^eb^ saupādisesanibbānavasena. ^b^Ṭhitatta^eb^nti avaṭṭhitacittaṃ lokadhammehi akampaneyyatāya. ^b^Nikkhamma gharā panujja kāme^eb^ti vatthukāme panūditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma. ^b^Kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyā^eb^ti so bhikkhu kathaṃ sammā paribbajeyya gaccheyya vihareyya, anupalitto hutvā lokaṃ atikkameyyāti attho.

[03]^b^334^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Silokaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0303^ea^^b^anukassāmī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0239^ea^ ettha ^b^siloko^eb^ nāma pādasamudayo, isīhi vuccamānā gāthātipi vuccati. Pādova niyatavaṇṇānupubbikānaṃ padānaṃ samūho, taṃ ^b^silokaṃ anukassāmi^eb^ pavattayissāmīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘akkhara…pe… pavattayissāmī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yatthā^eb^ti adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ. Āmeḍitalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘yesu yesu ṭhānesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhummā^eb^ti bhūmipaṭibaddhanivāsā. ^b^Taṃ taṃ nissitā^eb^ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ nissitavanto nissāya vasamānā, tehi saddhiṃ silokaṃ anukassāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^‘‘Ye sitā girigabbhara’’^eb^nti iminā tesaṃ vivekavāsaṃ dasseti, ^b^‘‘pahitattā samāhitā’’^eb^ti iminā bhāvanābhiyogaṃ.

[03]^b^Bahujanā^eb^ pañcasatasaṅkhyattā. Paṭipakkhābhibhavanato, tejussadatāya ca ^b^sīhā viya^eb^ pavivittatāya ^b^nilīnā. Ekatta^eb^nti ekībhāvaṃ. ^b^Odātacittā hutvā suddhā^eb^ti arahattamaggādhigamena pariyodātacittā hutvā suddhā, na kevalaṃ sarīrasuddhiyāva. ^b^Vippasannā^eb^ti ariyamaggappasādena visesato pasannā. Cittassa āvilabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anāvilā.^eb^

[03]^b^Bhikkhū jānitvā^eb^ti bhinnakilese bhikkhū ‘‘ime dibbacakkhunā ete devakāye passantīti jānitvā. ^b^Savanante jātattā^eb^ti dhammassavanapariyosāne ariyajātiyā jātattā. ^b^Idaṃ sabba^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘bhiyyo pañcasate’’tiādikaṃ sabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tadatthāya vīriyaṃ kariṃsū^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇābhinīhāravasena vīriyaṃ ussāhaṃ akaṃsu. Tenāha ‘‘na taṃ tehī’’tiādi. ^b^Sattari^eb^nti ta-kārassa ra-kārādesaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, sattatinti attho. ‘‘Sahassa’’nti pana anuvattati, sattatiyogena bahuvacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘eke sahassaṃ.
