Āluḷetī^eb^ti viluḷito ākulo hotīti attho. ^b^Ekāyanamaggo vuccati pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamaggo^eb^ti ettāvatā idhādhippetatthe siddhe tasseva alaṅkāratthaṃ so pana yassa pubbabhāgamaggo, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko’’^eb^tiādikā gāthāpi paṭisambhidāmaggatova ānetvā ṭhapitā.

[03]^b^Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati etenāti ^b^nibbānagamanaṃ,^eb^soyeva aviparītasabhāvatāya attho, tena nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānādhigamūpāyatāyāti attho. ^b^Magganīyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti gavesitabbatāya. ‘‘Gamanīyaṭṭhenā’’ti vā pāṭho, upagantabbatāyāti attho. ^b^‘‘Rāgādīhī’’^eb^ti iminā rāgadosamohānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ ‘‘rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho mala’’nti (vibha. 924) vacanato. ^b^‘‘Abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhī’’^eb^ti pana iminā sabbesampi upakkilesānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ te visuṃ uddhaṭā. ‘‘Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā’’ti vuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāmaṃ ‘‘visuddhiyā’’ti sāmaññajotanā, cittasseva pana visuddhi idhādhippetāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpamalavasena panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Na ^a^P2.0356^ea^ kevalaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanameva, atha kho idaṃ ettha āhacca bhāsitanti dassento ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Sā panāyaṃ cittavisuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ ^b^soko.^eb^ Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokāvatiṇṇato ‘‘kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 2.353, 354; saṃ. ni. 2.63) paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridavanaṃ ^a^M2.0282^ea^^b^paridevo.^eb^ Āyatiṃ anuppajjanaṃ idha samatikkamoti āha ^b^‘‘pahānāyā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ panassa samatikkamāvahataṃ nidassanavasena dassento ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha ^b^yaṃ pubbe, taṃ visodhehī^eb^ti atītesu khandhesu taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Pacchā^eb^ti parato ^a^V2.0262^ea^. ^b^Te^eb^ti tuyhaṃ. ^b^Māhū^eb^ti mā ahu. ^b^Kiñcana^eb^nti rāgādikiñcanaṃ, etena anāgatesu khandhesu saṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Majjhe^eb^ti tadubhayavemajjhe. ^b^No ce gahessasī^eb^ti na upādiyissasi ce, etena paccuppanne khandhappabandhe upādānappavatti vuttā. ^b^Upasanto carissasī^eb^ti evaṃ addhattayagatasaṃkilesavisodhane sati nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya upasanto hutvā viharissasīti arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imaṃ gātha’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Puttā^eb^ti orasā, aññepi vā dinnakakittimādayo ye keci. ^b^Pitā^eb^ti janako, aññepi vā pituṭṭhāniyā. ^b^Bandhavā^eb^ti ñātakā. Ayañhettha attho – puttā vā pitā vā bandhavā vā ^b^antakena^eb^ maccunā ^b^adhipannassa^eb^ abhibhūtassa maraṇato tāṇāya na honti. Kasmā? ^b^Natthi ñātīsu tāṇatā^eb^ti. Na hi ñātīnaṃ vasena maraṇato ārakkhā atthi, tasmā paṭācāre ^a^P2.0357^ea^ ‘‘ubho puttā kālaṅkatā’’tiādinā (apa. therī 1.498) mā niratthakaṃ paridevi, dhammaṃyeva pana yāthāvato passāti adhippāyo. ^b^Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti yathānulomaṃ pavattitāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya pariyosāne sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānamaggavasena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsīti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya vinā sāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamo atthi. ^b^‘‘Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā’’^eb^ti panidaṃ sokavinodanavasena pavattitāya gāthāya paṭhamaṃ sutattā vuttaṃ, sāpi hi saccadesanāya parivārabandhā eva aniccatākathāti katvā. Itaragāthāyaṃ pana vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Bhāvanā^eb^ti paññābhāvanā. Sā hi idha adhippetā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā rūpādīnaṃ aniccādito anupassanāpi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāva, tasmā. ^b^Tepī^eb^ti santatimahāmattapaṭācārāpi.

[03]^b^Pañcasate^eb^^a^M2.0283^ea^^b^core^eb^ti satasatacoraparivāre pañcacore paṭipāṭiyā ^b^pesesi,^eb^ te araññaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ pariyesantā anukkamena therassa samīpe samāgacchiṃsu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te gantvā theraṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti ūruṭṭhibhedapaccayaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ amanasikārena vinodetvā. ^b^Pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji^eb^ vippaṭisāralesassapi asambhavato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāyā’’^eb^ti. Therassa hi sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ūruṭṭhibhedajanitaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ vikkhambhesi. ^b^Tiyāmaratti^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, tenassa vipassanāyaṃ appamādaṃ, paṭipattiussukkāpanañca dasseti. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Saṃyamessāmī^eb^ti saññapessāmi, saññattiṃ karissāmīti attho. ^b^Aṭṭiyāmī^eb^ti jigucchāmi. ^b^Harāyāmī^eb^ti lajjāmi. ^b^Vipassisa^eb^nti sampassiṃ.

[03]^b^Pacalāyantāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0358^ea^^a^V2.0263^ea^ pacalāyikānaṃ niddaṃ upagatānaṃ. ^b^Agati^eb^nti agocaraṃ. ^b^Vatasampanno^eb^ti dhutaguṇasampanno. ^b^Pamāda^eb^nti pacalāyanaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Oruddhamānaso^eb^ti uparuddhādhicitto. ^b^Pañjarasmi^eb^nti sarīre. Sarīrañhi nhārusambandhāṭṭhisaṅghāṭatāya idha ‘‘pañjara’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Pītavaṇṇāya pana paṭākāya kāyaṃ pariharaṇato, mallayuddhacittakatāya ca ‘‘pītamallo’’ti paññāto pabbajitvā ^b^pītamallatthero nāma^eb^ jāto. ^b^Tīsu rajjesū^eb^ti paṇḍucoḷagoḷarajjesu. ‘‘Sabbamallā sīhaḷadīpe sakkārasammānaṃ labhantī’’ti ^b^tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma. Taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpādayo ‘mamā’ti na gahetabbā’’ti natumhākavaggena pakāsitamatthaṃ attano cittamattahatthino aṅkusaṃ katvā. ^b^Pādesu avahantesū^eb^ti ativelaṃ caṅkamanena akkamituṃ asamatthesu. ^b^Jaṇṇukehi caṅkamati^eb^ ‘‘nisinne niddāya avasaro hotī’’ti. ^b^Byākaritvā^eb^ti attano vīriyārambhassa saphalatāpavedanamukhena sabrahmacārīnaṃ tattha ussāhaṃ janento aññaṃ byākaritvā. ^b^Bhāsita^eb^nti vacanaṃ, kassa pana tanti āha ^b^‘‘buddhaseṭṭhassa sabbalokaggavādino’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Na tumhāka’’^eb^ntiādi tassa pavattiākāradassanaṃ. Tayidaṃ me saṅkhārānaṃ accantavūpasamakāraṇanti dassento ^b^‘‘aniccā vatā’’^eb^ti gāthamāhari, tena idānāhaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgasaṅkhātassa rogassa abhāvena arogo parinibbutoti dasseti.
[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0284^ea^ sakkassa. ^b^Upapattī^eb^ti devūpapatti. ^b^Puna pākatikāva ahosi^eb^ sakkabhāveneva upapannattā.

[03]^b^Subrahmā^eb^ti evaṃnāmo. Accharānaṃ nirayūpapattiṃ disvā tato pabhuti satataṃ pavattamānaṃ attano cittutrāsaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ citta’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^utrasta^eb^nti santastaṃ bhītaṃ ^a^P2.0359^ea^. ^b^Ubbigga^eb^nti saṃviggaṃ. ^b^Utrasta^eb^nti vā saṃviggaṃ. ^b^Ubbigga^eb^nti bhayavasena saha nissayena sañcalitaṃ. ^b^Anuppannesū^eb^ti anāgatesu. ^b^Kiccesū^eb^ti tesu tesu itikattabbesu. ^b^‘‘Kicchesū’’^eb^ti vā pāṭho, dukkhesūti attho, nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, bhāvidukkhanimittanti attho. ^b^Uppatitesū^eb^ti uppannesu kiccesūti yojanā. Tadā attano parivārassa uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^Bojjhā^eb^ti bodhito, ariyamaggatoti attho. ^b^‘‘Aññatrā’’^eb^ti ca padaṃ apekkhitvā nissakkavacanaṃ, bodhiṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Tapasā^eb^ti tapokammato, tena maggādhigamassa upāyabhūtaṃ sallekhapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. ^b^Indriyasaṃvarā^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvaraṇato ^a^V2.0264^ea^, etena satisaṃvarasīsena sabbampi saṃvarasīlaṃ, lakkhaṇahāranayena vā sabbampi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sabbanissaggā^eb^ti sabbassapi nissajjanato sabbakilesappahānato. Kilesesu hi nissaṭṭhesu kammavaṭṭaṃ, vipākavaṭṭañca nissaṭṭhameva hotīti. ^b^Sotthi^eb^nti khemaṃ anupaddavataṃ.

[03]Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ^b^ñāyo,^eb^ ariyamaggoti āha ^b^‘‘ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṇhāvānavirahitattā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhātavānavivittattā. Taṇhā hi khandhehi khandhaṃ, kammunā phalaṃ, sattehi ca dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti ‘‘vāna’’nti vuccati, tayidaṃ natthi ettha vānaṃ, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa vānanti ^b^nibbānaṃ,^eb^ asaṅkhatā dhātu. Parappaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti āha ^b^‘‘attapaccakkhatāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Nanu ‘‘visuddhiyā’’ti cittavisuddhiyā adhippetattā visuddhiggahaṇenevettha sokasamatikkamādayopi gahitā eva honti, te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘tattha kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāsanayuttikovide^eb^ti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādilakkhaṇāyaṃ dhammanītiyaṃ cheke. ^b^Taṃ tamatthaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0360^ea^^a^M2.0285^ea^^b^ñāpetī^eb^ti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā bodhetabbā, attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpeti. ^b^Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento^eb^ti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento. Na hi sammāsambuddho atthāpattiñāpakādisādhanīyavacanāti. ^b^Saṃvattatī^eb^ti jāyati, hotīti attho. Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi sokaparidevasamatikkamanamukheneva cittavisuddhiyā ijjhanato, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamena hotī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi phuṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ sokādayo abhibhavanti, pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamo dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ñāyassā^eb^ti aggamaggassa, tatiyamaggassa ca. Tadadhigamena hi yathākkamaṃ dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamo. Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi itarābhisamayo tadavinābhāvato sacchikiriyābhisamayahetuko viya vutto. ^b^Ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ^b^‘‘nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā’’^eb^ti sampadānavacanañcetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇabhaṇana^eb^nti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Tayidaṃ na idheva, atha kho aññatthāpi satthu āciṇṇaṃ evāti ^a^V2.0265^ea^ dassento ^b^‘‘yatheva hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ādimhi kalyāṇamādi vā kalyāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^ādikalyāṇaṃ.^eb^ Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Atthasampattiyā ^b^sātthaṃ.^eb^ Byañjanasampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ.^eb^ Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūrito, upanetabbassa abhāvato ca ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ.^eb^ Nirupakkilesato apanetabbassa ca abhāvato ^b^parisuddhaṃ.^eb^ Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato ^a^P2.0361^ea^ sāsana^b^brahmacariyaṃ,^eb^ magga^b^brahmacariya^eb^ñca vo ^b^pakāsessāmī^eb^ti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.147) vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^Ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti ariyānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsā paveṇiyo. ^b^Aggaññā^eb^ti aggāti jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi seṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Rattaññā^eb^ti cirarattāti jānitabbā. ^b^Vaṃsaññā^eb^ti buddhādīnaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. ^b^Porāṇā^eb^ti purātanā anadhunātanattā. ^b^Asaṅkiṇṇā^eb^ti avikiṇṇā anapanītā. ^b^Asaṅkiṇṇapubbā^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ imehī’’ti ariyehi na apanītapubbā ^a^M2.0286^ea^. ^b^Na saṅkīyantī^eb^ti idānipi tehi na apanīyanti. ^b^Na saṅkīyissantī^eb^ti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti. ^b^Appaṭikuṭṭhā…pe… viññūhī^eb^ti ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi appaccakkhatā aninditā, agarahitāti attho. ^b^‘‘Visuddhiyā’’tiādīhī^eb^ti visuddhiādidīpanehi. ^b^Padehī^eb^ti vākyehi, visuddhiatthatādibhedabhinnehi vā dhammakoṭṭhāsehi. ^b^Upaddave^eb^ti anatthe. ^b^Visuddhi^eb^nti visujjhanaṃ saṃkilesappahānaṃ. Vācuggatakaraṇaṃ ^b^uggaho. Pariyāpuṇanaṃ^eb^ paricayo. Atthassa hadaye ṭhapanaṃ ^b^dhāraṇaṃ.^eb^ Parivattanaṃ ^b^vācanaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Gandhārako^eb^ti gandhāradese uppanno. ^b^Pahontī^eb^ti sakkonti. ^b^Aniyyānikamaggā^eb^ti micchāmaggā, micchattaniyatāniyatamaggāpi vā. ^b^Suvaṇṇa^eb^nti kūṭasuvaṇṇampi vuccati. ^b^Maṇī^eb^ti kācamaṇipi, ^b^muttā^eb^ti veḷujāpi, ^b^pavāḷa^eb^nti pallavopi vuccatīti ^b^rattajambunadādipadehi te visesitā.^eb^

[03]^b^Na tato heṭṭhā^eb^ti idhādhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā, kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvā ^b^‘‘na uddha’’^eb^nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. ^b^Tayo satipaṭṭhānā^eb^ti satipaṭṭhāna-saddassa ^a^P2.0362^ea^ atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhāna-saddassa atthadassananti. ^b^Ādīsu hi satigocaro^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.408) ‘‘satipaṭṭhānā’’ti vuttānaṃ sabhigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttappadese saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭisambhidāpāḷiya’’^eb^mpi (paṭi. ma. 2.34) avasesapāḷippadesadassanattho ^a^V2.0266^ea^ ādi-saddo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Satiyā paṭṭhāna^eb^nti satiyā patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Dānādīni karontassa rūpādīni satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha ^b^‘‘padhānaṃ ṭhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pa^eb^-saddo hi idha ‘‘paṇītā dhammā’’tiādīsu (dha. saṃ. mātikā 14) viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Ariyo^eb^ti ariyaṃ sabbasattaseṭṭhaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ^b^saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte.^eb^(Ma. ni. 3.310) suttekadesena hi suttaṃ dasseti. Tattha hi –

[08]‘‘Tayo ^a^M2.0287^ea^ satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… arahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya ‘idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti. Na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Yadariyo sevati…pe… arahati.

[08]Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā…pe...idaṃ vo sukhāyāti ^a^P2.0363^ea^. Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe… na ca vokkamma satthu sāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, anattamanatā ca attamanatā ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ.

[08]Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… sukhāyāti, tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiya’’nti (ma. ni. 3.311).

[03]Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā, niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato, na ^a^V2.0267^ea^ paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. ^b^Pa^eb^-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘pavattayitabbatoti attho’’^eb^ti. Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana^eb^-saddo hi bahulaṃvacanena kammatthopi hotīti. Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti ^b^‘‘paṭṭhātīti paṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭṭhātī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pa^eb^-saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti ^b^‘‘okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti attho’’^eb^ti āha. Puna bhāvatthaṃ sati, saddaṃ, paṭṭhānasaddañca ^a^M2.0288^ea^ vaṇṇento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha, tena purimavikappe sati, saddo, paṭṭhāna-saddo ca kattuatthoti ^a^P2.0364^ea^ viññāyati. ^b^Saraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti cirakatassa, cirabhāsitassa ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Ida^eb^nti yaṃ ‘‘satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ suttapadese ^b^adhippetaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Yadi eva^eb^nti. Yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā ‘‘satipaṭṭhānā’’ti bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘satibahuttā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi bahukā tā satiyo, atha kasmā ‘‘maggo’’ti ekavacananti yojanā. ^b^Maggaṭṭhenā^eb^ti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo, teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattūpagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ maggīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘vuttañheta’’^eb^nti, attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati. Tattha ^b^catassopi cetā^eb^ti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. ^b^Aparabhāge^eb^ti ariyamaggakkhaṇe. ^b^Kiccaṃ sādhayamānā^eb^ti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe satiyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchati. Catukiccasādhaneneva hettha bahuvacananiddeso. ^b^Evañca satī^eb^ti evaṃ maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya ‘‘maggo’’ti ekavacanena, ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya ‘‘cattāro’’ti ca vattabbatāya sati vijjamānattā. ^b^Vacanānusandhinā^eb^ ‘‘ekāyano aya’’ntiādikā ^b^desanā sānusandhikāva,^eb^ na ananusandhikāti adhippāyo. Vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanena paṭipādetuṃ ^b^‘‘mārasenappamaddana’’^eb^nti (saṃ. ni. 5.224) suttapadaṃ ānetvā ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādinā nidassanaṃ saṃsandati. ^b^‘‘Tasmā’’^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ.

[03]Visesato kāyo, vedanā ca assādassa kāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ ‘‘visuddhimaggo’’ti vuttāni. Tathā ‘‘niccaṃ attā’’ti abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu cittadhammesu aniccānattatādassanāni sarāgādivasena, saññāphassādivasena, nīvaraṇādivasena ca nātippabhedātippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ ^a^P2.0365^ea^ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ sukarānīti tesaṃ tāni ‘‘visuddhimaggo’’ti vuttāni. Ettha ca ^a^V2.0268^ea^ yathā cittadhammānampi taṇhāya ^a^M2.0289^ea^ vatthubhāvo sambhavati, tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi taṇhādiṭṭhivatthubhāve yo yassā sātisayapaccayo, taṃ dassanatthaṃ visesaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato’’^eb^ti. Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte, dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti cittadhammānupassanānaṃ mandatikkhapaññavipassanāyānikānaṃ visuddhimaggatā vuttā.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ tatthā^eb^ti ettha ^b^tattha^eb^-saddassa ^b^‘‘pahānattha’’^eb^nti etena yojanā. Parato ^b^tesaṃ tatthā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hotīti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu, santatighanaggahaṇavasena visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu, dhammesu vinibbhogassa dukkarattā, dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā ca sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa dhammā vatthu, tasmā tesu tesaṃ pahānatthaṃ cattārova vuttā.

[03]Evaṃ kāyādīnaṃ kāmoghādivatthubhāvakathaneneva kāmayogakāmāsavādīnampi vatthubhāvo dīpito hoti oghehi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā. Yadaggena ca kāyo kāmoghādīnaṃ vatthu, tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu. ‘‘Dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī’’ti dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā ^a^P2.0366^ea^ visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu. Citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhīti ādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu. Nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu. Kāyassa kāmupādānavatthutā vuttanayāva. Yadaggena hi kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena kāmupādānassapi vatthu atthato abhinnattā. Sukhavedanassādavasena paralokanirapekkho ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādikaṃ (dī. ni. 1.171; ma. ni. 1.445; 2.95, 225; 3.91, 116; saṃ. ni. 3.210; dha. sa. 1221; vibha. 938) parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu ^a^M2.0290^ea^. Cittadhammānaṃ itarupādānavatthutā tatiyacatutthaganthayojanāyaṃ vuttanayā eva. Kāyavedanānaṃ chandadosāgativatthutā kāmoghabyāpādakāyaganthayojanāyaṃ vuttanayā eva. Santatighanaggahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu. Dhammasabhāvānavabodhe bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu.

[03]Āhārasamudayā ^a^V2.0269^ea^ kāyassa samudayā, phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, (saṃ. ni. 5.408) saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti (ma. ni. 3.126; udā. 1; vibha. 225) vacanato kāyādīnaṃ samudayabhūtā kabaḷīkāraphassamanosañcetanāviññāṇāhārā kāyādiparijānanena pariññātā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘catubbidhāhārapariññattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pakaraṇanayo^eb^ti nettipakaraṇavasena suttantasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.

[03]^b^Saraṇavasenā^eb^ti kāyādīnaṃ, kusalādidhammānañca upadhāraṇavasena. Saranti gacchanti nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo ^b^ekattasamosaraṇaṃ.^eb^ Etadeva hi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūto ^a^P2.0367^ea^ vā samānatāya eko satipaṭṭhānasabhāvo ^b^ekattaṃ,^eb^ tattha samosaraṇaṃ ^b^ekattasamosaraṇaṃ,^eb^ taṃsabhāgatāva, ekanibbānapavesahetubhāvaṃ pana dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇattena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni, purimasmiṃ visuṃ. ^b^Saraṇavasenā^eb^ti vā gamanavasenāti atthe sati tadeva gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti, samosaraṇe vā sati-saddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva satīti sati-saddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti.

[03]‘‘Cuddasavidhena, navavidhena, soḷasavidhena, pañcavidhenā’’ti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ (dī. ni. 2.374) āgatānaṃ ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tesaṃ pana anantarabhedavasena, tadanugatabhedavasena ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva, catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍasadisatā kāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanānubhāvassa daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Kathetukamyatāpucchā^eb^^a^M2.0291^ea^ itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato, niddesādivasena desetukamyatāya ca tathā vuttattā. ^b^‘‘Idhā’’^eb^ti vuccamānapaṭipattisampādakassa bhikkhuno sannissayadassanaṃ, so cassa sannissayo sāsanato añño natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhamma…pe… lapanametaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ attano sammukhābhimukhabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ, tañca dhammassa sakkaccasavanatthaṃ. ‘‘Gocare ^a^P2.0368^ea^ bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye’’tiādi (dī. ni. 3.80; saṃ. ni. 5.372) vacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā, yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti, tasmā ‘‘kāyānupassī ^a^V2.0270^ea^ viharatī’’tiādinā bhikkhuṃ dasseti bhikkhumhi taṃniyamatoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato’’^eb^ti. Satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā, sakalasāsanasampaṭiggāhakattā ca ^b^sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājanabhāvo. Tasmiṃ gahite^eb^ti bhikkhumhi gahite. Bhikkhuparisāya jeṭṭhabhāvato rājagamanañāyena itarā parisāpi atthato gahitāva hontīti āha ^b^‘‘sesā’’^eb^tiādi. Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhajitvā itarampi vibhajituṃ ^b^‘‘yo ca ima’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Samaṃ careyyā^eb^ti kāyādi visamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena ^b^santo,^eb^ indriyadamena ^b^danto,^eb^ catumagganiyāmena ^b^niyato,^eb^ seṭṭhacaritāya ^b^brahmacārī,^eb^ sabbattha kāyadaṇḍādioropanena ^b^nidhāya daṇḍaṃ.^eb^ Ariyabhāve ṭhito ^b^so^eb^ evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi ^b^‘‘brāhmaṇo, samaṇo, bhikkhū’’^eb^ti ca veditabbo.

[03]‘‘Ayañceva kāyo, bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa’’ntiādīsu khandhapañcakaṃ, tathā ‘‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.271, 287; pārā. 11), ‘‘yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī’’tiādīsu ca vedanādayo cetasikā khandhā kāyoti vuccantīti ^a^P2.0369^ea^ tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyeti rūpakāye’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Kesādīnañca dhammāna^eb^nti kesādisaññitānaṃ bhūtupādādhammānaṃ. Evaṃ ‘‘cayaṭṭho sarīraṭṭho kāyaṭṭho’’ti saddanayena kāya-saddaṃ dassetvā idāni niruttinayenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Āyantī^eb^ti uppajjanti.

[03]^b^Asammissato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0292^ea^ vedanādayopi ettha sitā, ettha paṭibaddhāti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tato asammissatoti attho. Samūhavisayatāya cassa kāya-saddassa, samudāyupādānatāya ca asubhākārassa ^b^‘‘kāye’’^eb^ti ekavacanaṃ, tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘citte’’^eb^ti ekavacanaṃ, vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena ^b^‘‘vedanāsū’’^eb^ti bahuvacanena vuttā, tatheva ca niddeso pavattito, dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā, anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti tepi bahuvacanavaseneva vuttā.

[03]Avayavīgāhasamaññātidhāvanasārādānābhinivesanisedhanatthaṃ kāyaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgehi, tāni ca kesādīhi, kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhuñjanto ^b^‘‘tathā na kāye’’^eb^tiādimāha. Pāsādādinagarāvayavasamūhe ^a^V2.0271^ea^ avayavīvādinopi avayavīgāhaṃ na karonti, ‘‘nagaraṃ nāma koci attho atthī’’ti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṅgapaccaṅgasamūho, kesalomādisamūho, bhūtupādāyasamūho ca yathāvuttasamūho, tabbinimutto kāyopi nāma koci natthi, pageva itthiādayoti āha ^b^‘‘kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Koci dhammo’’^eb^ti iminā sattajīvādiṃ paṭikkhipati, avayavī pana kāyapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhittoti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ kāyādisamaññātidhāvanānīti āha ^b^‘‘yathāvuttadhamma…pe… karontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tathā tathā^eb^ti kāyādiākārena.

[03]^b^Yaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0370^ea^^b^passatī^eb^ti yaṃ itthiṃ, purisaṃ vā passati. Nanu cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti? Saccametaṃ, ‘‘itthiṃ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī’’ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena ‘‘yaṃ passatī’’ti vuttaṃ micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā ^b^yaṃ passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ^eb^ taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā. Atha vā ^b^taṃ^eb^ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^diṭṭhaṃ na^eb^ hoti, acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā ^b^diṭṭhaṃ vā taṃ na^eb^ hoti. ^b^Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ na passatī^eb^ti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ paññācakkhunā bhūtato na passatīti attho. ^b^Apassaṃ bajjhate^eb^ti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā apassanto ‘‘etaṃ ^a^M2.0293^ea^ mama, eso hamasmi, eso me attā’’ti kilesabandhanena bajjhati.

[03]^b^Na aññadhammānupassī^eb^ti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti attho. ^b^‘‘Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādinā taṃ evatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. ^b^Pathavīkāya^eb^nti kesādikoṭṭhāsaṃ pathaviṃ dhammasamūhattā ‘‘kāyo’’ti vadati, lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ, pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā ‘‘kāyo’’ti vadati. ^b^‘‘Āpokāya’’^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^Evaṃ gahetabbassā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ mama’’nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.

[03]Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^aniccato anupassatī^eb^ti catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ kāyaṃ ‘‘anicca’’nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto evañcassa aniccākārampi ‘‘anupassatī’’ti vuccati. Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa ^a^P2.0371^ea^ lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘no niccato’’^eb^ti. Tathā hesa ‘‘niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’ti ^a^V2.0272^ea^ (paṭi. ma. 3.35) vutto. Ettha ca ‘‘aniccato eva anupassatī’’ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘no niccato’’ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanaṃ āsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, upari desanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. ^b^‘‘Dukkhato anupassatī’’^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva ca kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati, dukkhassa anattattā anattato anupassati. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rañjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nibbindati, no nandati. Virajjati, no rajjatī’’^eb^ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ ^b^nirodheti, no samudeti^eb^ samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca ^b^paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati.^eb^ Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyaṃ tannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ‘‘pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā’’ti vuccati, tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati, tathābhūto ca nibbattanavasena kilese ^a^M2.0294^ea^ na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ, tena vuttaṃ ‘‘paṭinissajjati, no ādiyatī’’ti. Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^niccasañña^eb^nti ‘‘saṅkhārā niccā’’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsappahānamukheneva saññāvipallāsappahānanti saññāggahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi ^a^P2.0372^ea^ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^‘‘Viharatī’’^eb^ti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘iriyatī’’^eb^ti, iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato ^b^‘‘tīsu bhavesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-saddo viya pana ātāpasaddo vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vīriyassetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññe dhammā. ^b^Ātāpī^eb^ti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā, samantato, sāmañca pajānanto ^b^sampajāno,^eb^ asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato, uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho ^a^V2.0273^ea^. Yadi paññāya anupassati, kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbatthika^eb^nti sabbattha bhavaṃ sabbattha līne, uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā. Sabbe vā līne, uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti ^b^sabbatthikā.^eb^ Satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte ^b^kāye^eb^ kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu ^b^kāyānupassī viharati. Anto saṅkhepo^eb^ antoolīyano, kosajjanti attho. ^b^Upāyapariggahe^eb^ti ettha sīlavisodhanādi, gaṇanādi, uggahakosallādi ca upāyo, tabbipariyāyato ^b^anupāyo^eb^ veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘muṭṭhassatī^eb^^a^P2.0373^ea^^b^…pe… asamattho hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu, pariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena. ^b^Assa^eb^ yogino.

[03]Yasmā ^a^M2.0295^ea^ satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmāssa sampayuttadhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti āha ^b^‘‘sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅga^eb^-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. Satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā. Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati, nibbānādhigamo vā, nāpi kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-saddassa avayavapariyāyatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Pahānaṅga^eb^nti ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.226; ma. ni. 1.271, 287, 297; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123; pārā. 11) viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ ^b^dassetuṃ.^eb^ Yasmā ettha lokiyamaggo adhippeto, na lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā ^b^‘‘atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti vibhaṅge. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘loke’’ti etasmiṃ pade.

[03]Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘visesenā’’^eb^ti āha. Atha vā ‘‘vineyya nīvaraṇānī’’ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavinayavacanassa payojanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘visesenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāyānupassanābhāvanāya hi ujuvipaccanīkānaṃ anurodhavirodhādīnaṃ pahānadassanaṃ etassa payojananti. ^b^Kāyasampattimūlakassā^eb^ti rūpabalayobbanārogyādisarīrasampadānimittassa. Vuttavipariyāyato ^b^kāyavipattimūlako virodho^eb^ veditabbo. ^b^Kāyabhāvanāyā^eb^ti kāyānupassanābhāvanāya. Sā hi idha kāyabhāvanāti adhippetā. ^b^Subhasukhabhāvādīna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0374^ea^^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ^a^V2.0274^ea^ manuññaniccatādisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Asubhāsukhabhāvādīna^eb^nti ettha pana ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena amanuññāniccatādīnaṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti anurodhādippahānavacanena. ^b^‘‘Yogānubhāvo hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Yogānubhāvo hi bhāvanānubhāvo. ^b^Yogasamattho^eb^ti yogamanuyuñjituṃ samattho. Purimena hi ‘‘anurodhavirodhavippamutto’’tiādivacanena bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa ānisaṃso vutto, dutiyena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa paṭipatti. Na hi anurodhavirodhādīhi upaddutassa bhāvanā ijjhati.

[03]^b^Anupassīti^eb^^a^M2.0296^ea^^b^etthā^eb^ti ‘‘anupassī’’ti etasmiṃ pade labbhamānāya ^b^anupassanāya^eb^ anupassanājotanāya ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ vutta^eb^nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo, aññathā ‘‘anupassanāyā’’ti karaṇavacanaṃ na yujjeyya. Anupassanā eva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ, na ettha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, yujjati vā. Kāyapariharaṇaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa cettha atthasiddhattā ^b^‘‘kāyapariharaṇa’’^eb^ntveva vuttaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānikassa hi kāyapariharaṇaṃ yāvadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariharaṇatthanti. Kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa vā ‘‘ātāpī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 2.373) vuccamānattā ^b^‘‘kāyapariharaṇa’’^eb^ntveva vuttaṃ. Kāyaggahaṇena vā nāmakāyassāpi gahaṇaṃ, na rūpakāyasseva, teneva kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇampi saṅgahitaṃ hoti, evañca katvā ‘‘viharatīti ettha vuttavihārenā’’ti ^b^ettha^eb^ggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ hoti ‘‘kāyānupassī viharatī’’ti vihārassa visesetvā vuttattā. ^b^‘‘Ātāpī’’^eb^tiādi pana saṅkhepato vuttassa kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇassa saha sādhanena vitthāretvā dassanaṃ. ^b^Ātāpenā^eb^ti ātāpaggahaṇena. ^b^‘‘Satisampajaññenā’’^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti buddhānussati, mettā, maraṇassati ^a^P2.0375^ea^, asubhabhāvanā ca. Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ ‘‘sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāna’’nti vuccati, sabbattha kammaṭṭhānānuyogassārakkhabhūtattā satisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa pariharitabbattā satisampajaññaggahaṇena tassa vuttatā vuttā. ^b^Satiyā vā samatho^eb^ vutto tassā samādhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.

[03]^b^Vibhaṅge^eb^(vibha. kāyānupassanāniddese) pana attho vuttoti yojanā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena ^b^saha. Aṭṭhakathānayo^eb^ti saddatthassāpi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo. ^b^Yathā saṃsandatī^eb^ti yathā atthato, adhippāyato ca avilomento aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti, evaṃ ^b^veditabbo.^eb^

[03]^b^Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane^eb^ti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā, pañcavokārabhave ^a^V2.0275^ea^ arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāppasaṅgepi āpanne tato asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassanatthaṃ, ghanavinibbhogādidassanatthañca dutiyaṃ vedanāggahaṇaṃ, tena na vedanāyaṃ kāyānupassī, cittadhammānupassī vā, atha kho vedanānupassī ^a^M2.0297^ea^ evāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Tathā ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye sukhā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā, na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā’’ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe avatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ vinibbhujjitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti, tena tāsaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena aniccatāya ^a^P2.0376^ea^, tato eva dukkhatāya, anattatāya ca dassanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^Ghanavinibbhogādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ayampi attho veditabbo. Ayañhi vedanāyaṃ vedanānupassī eva, na aññadhammānupassī. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi udakapubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti, na evaṃ ayaṃ ṭhitiramaṇīyepi vedayite, pageva itarasmiṃ manuññākārānupassī, atha kho khaṇapabhaṅguratāya, avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya ca aniccānattāsubhākārānupassī, vipariṇāmadukkhatāya, saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato dukkhānupassī yevāti. Evaṃ citta dhammesupi yathārahaṃ punavacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ. ^b^Lokiyā eva^eb^ sammasanacārassa adhippetattā. ^b^‘‘Kevalaṃ panidhā’’^eb^tiādinā ‘‘idha ettakaṃ veditabba’’nti veditabbaparicchedaṃ dasseti. ^b^‘‘Esa nayo’’^eb^ti iminā yathā cittaṃ, dhammā ca anupassitabbā, tathā tāni anupassanto citte cittānupassī, dhammesu dhammānupassīti veditabboti imamatthaṃ atidisati. ^b^Dukkhato^eb^ti dukkhasabhāvato, dukkhanti anupassitabbāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addā^eb^ti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya ‘‘dukkhā’’ti paññācakkhunā addakkhi. ^b^Dukkhaṃ addakkhi sallato^eb^ti dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ pīḷājananato, antotudanato, dunnīharaṇato ca sallato addakkhi passi. ^b^Adukkhamasukha^eb^nti upekkhāvedanaṃ. ^b^Santa^eb^nti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya, paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca santaṃ. ^b^Aniccato^eb^ti hutvāabhāvato, udayavayavantato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭipakkhato ca ‘‘anicca’’nti yo addakkhi. ^b^Sa ve sammaddaso^eb^^a^P2.0377^ea^^b^bhikkhu^eb^ ekaṃsena, paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammāpassanakoti attho.

[03]^b^Dukkhātipī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^ saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. ^b^Taṃ dukkhasmi^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ ^a^V2.0276^ea^ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato. ^b^Sukhadukkhatopi cā^eb^ti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya, vipariṇāmaṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi ca sukhato, tissopi ca dukkhato ^b^anupassitabbā^eb^ti attho. Satta anupassanā heṭṭhā pakāsitā eva. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ sukhādivibhāgato sesaṃ sāmisanirāmisādibhedaṃ vedanānupassanāyaṃ vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ārammaṇa…pe… bhedāna^eb^nti rūpādiārammaṇanānattassa nīlāditabbhedassa, chandādiadhipatinānattassa hīnāditabbhedassa, ñāṇajhānādisahajātanānattassa sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikasavitakkāditabbhedassa, kāmāvacarādibhūminānattassa ukkaṭṭhamajjhimāditabbhedassa, kusalādikammanānattassa devagatisaṃvattaniyatāditabbhedassa, kaṇhasukkavipākanānattassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatāditabbhedassa, parittabhūmakādikiriyānānattassa tihetukāditabbhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇāna^eb^nti phusanāditaṃtaṃlakkhaṇānañceva aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇānañca vasenāti yojanā. ^b^Suññatadhammassā^eb^ti anattatāsaṅkhātasuññatāsabhāvassa. Yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^abhidhamme^eb^‘‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti, khandhā hontī’’tiādinā ^a^P2.0378^ea^ (dha. sa. 121) suññatāvāradesanā pavattā, taṃ pahīnameva pubbe pahīnattā, tasmā tassa tassa puna pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Na hi kilesā pahīyamānā ārammaṇavibhāgena pahīyanti anāgatānaṃyeva uppajjanārahānaṃ pahātabbattā, tasmā abhijjhādīnaṃ ekattha pahānaṃ vatvā itarattha na vattabbaṃ evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘kāmañcetthā’’^eb^tiādinā. Atha vā maggacittakkhaṇe ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Maggena hi pahīnāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Tattha purimāya codanāya nānāpuggalaparihāro, na hi ekassa pahīnaṃ tato aññassa pahīnaṃ nāma hoti. Pacchimāya nānācittakkhaṇikaparihāro. ^b^Nānācittakkhaṇe^eb^ti hi lokiyamaggacittakkhaṇeti adhippāyo. Pubbabhāgamaggo hi idhādhippeto. Lokiyabhāvanāya ca kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu vikkhambhitaṃ ^a^M2.0299^ea^ hoti. Yadipi nappavatteyya, paṭipakkhabhāvanāya suppahīnattā tattha sā ‘‘abhijjhādomanassassa appavattī’’ti na vattabbā, tasmā punapi tappahānaṃ vattabbameva. ^b^Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotī^eb^ti lokuttarasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ, lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pañcapi khandhā upādānakkhandhā loko’’ti (vibha. 362, 364, 366) hi ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^catūsupi ṭhānesu vuttanti.
[06]Uddesavāravaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0277^ea^ anupassitabbakāyādiārammaṇavasena. ^b^Catudhā bhinditvā^eb^ti uddesavasena catudhā bhinditvā. ^b^Tato^eb^ catubbidhasatipaṭṭhānato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^P2.0379^ea^ gahetvā kāyaṃ vibhajantoti pāṭhaseso.

[03]^b^Kathañcā^eb^ti ettha ^b^katha^eb^nti pakārapucchā, tena niddisiyamāne kāyānupassanāpakāre pucchati. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo byatireko, tena uddesavārena apākaṭaṃ niddesavārena vibhāviyamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. Bāhirakesupi ito ekadesassa sambhavato ^b^sabbappakāra^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ ^b^‘‘sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā’’^eb^ti, tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā, tadantogadhā ca ajjhattādianupassanāppakārā, tathā kāyagatāsatisutte (ma. ni. 3.153) vuttā kesādivaṇṇasaṇṭhānakasiṇārammaṇacatukkajjhānappakārā, lokiyādippakārā ca, te sabbepi anavasesato saṅgaṇhāti. Ime ca pakārā imasmiṃyeva sāsane, na ito bahiddhāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbappakāra…pe… paṭisedhano cā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^tathābhāvapaṭisedhano^eb^ti sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa aññasāsanassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhano, etena ^b^idha bhikkhave^eb^ti ettha ^b^idha^eb^-saddo antogadhaevasaddatthoti dasseti. Santi hi ekapadānipi avadhāraṇāni yathā ‘‘vāyubhakkho’’ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idheva bhikkhave^eb^^a^M2.0300^ea^^b^samaṇo’’^eb^tiādi. Paripuṇṇasamaṇappakaraṇadhammo hi so puggalo, yo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattako. ^b^Parappavādā^eb^ti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.

[03]Araññādikasseva bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imassahī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Duddamo damathaṃ anupagato goṇo ^b^kūṭagoṇo.^eb^ Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na paggharati, evaṃ dohapaṭibandhinī ^b^kūṭadhenu.^eb^ Rūpa-saddādike paṭicca uppajjanakāssādo ^b^rūpārammaṇādiraso. Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇa^eb^nti pabbajjato pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre paricitārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Nibandheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0380^ea^ bandheyya. ^b^Satiyā^eb^ti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena pavattāya satiyā. ^b^Ārammaṇe^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. ^b^Daḷha^eb^nti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.

[03]^b^Visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0278^ea^ sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ, ekaccānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ, buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.

[03]^b^Vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā^eb^ yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadisanato. ^b^Bhikkhu dīpisadiso^eb^ araññe ekako viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanavasena icchitatthasādhanato ^b^phalamuttama^eb^nti sāmaññaphalaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Parakkamajavayoggabhūmi^eb^nti bhāvanussāhajavassa yoggakaraṇabhūmibhūtaṃ.

[03]Addhānavasena pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ vā assasanto, ittaravasena pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena rassaṃ vā assasantoti yojanā. ^b^Evaṃ sikkhato^eb^ti assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassatāpajānanasabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedanaoḷārikoḷārikapaṭippassambhanavasena bhāvanaṃ sikkhato, tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato. ^b^Assāsapassāsanimitte^eb^ti assāsapassāsasannissayena upaṭṭhitapaṭibhāganimitte. ^b^Assāsapassāse pariggaṇhāti^eb^ rūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto, yo ‘‘assāsapassāsakammiko’’ti vutto. ^b^Jhānaṅgāni pariggaṇhāti^eb^ arūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto. ^b^Vatthu nāma karajakāyo^eb^ cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthīti^eb^ visuddhidiṭṭhi ‘‘tayidaṃ ^a^M2.0301^ea^ dhammamattaṃ, na ahetukaṃ, nāpi issarādivisamahetukaṃ, atha kho avijjādihetuka’’nti addhāttayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena ^b^vitiṇṇakaṅkho. ^eb^ ‘‘Yaṃ ^a^P2.0381^ea^ kiñci bhikkhu rūpa’’ntiādinā (ma. ni. 1.361; 2.113; 3.86, 89; paṭi. ma. 1.54) nayena kalāpasammasanavasena ^b^tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.^eb^ Udayavayānupassanādivasena ^b^vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento. Anukkamena^eb^ maggapaṭipāṭiyā.

[03]^b^‘‘Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāye’’^eb^ti idaṃ sammasanavāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā vuttaṃ, samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthi. ^b^Aṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti antarantarā na ṭhapetvā. ^b^Aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo^eb^ti ajjhattabahiddhādhammesupi nirantaraṃ vā bhāvanāya pavattanakālo ^b^kathito. Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhatī^eb^ti ‘‘ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā’’ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaṃ ghaṭitaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle ekato ārammaṇabhāvena na labbhati, ekajjhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkāti attho.

[03]Samudeti etasmāti ^b^samudayo,^eb^ so eva kāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti ^b^samudayadhammo.^eb^ Assāsapassāsānaṃ uppattihetu karajakāyādi, tassa anupassanasīlo ^b^samudayadhammānupassī,^eb^ taṃ pana ^a^V2.0279^ea^ samudayadhammaṃ upamāya dassento ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^bhasta^eb^nti ruttiṃ. ^b^Gaggaranāḷi^eb^nti ukkāpanāḷiṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ti karajakāyādike. Yathā assāsapassāsakāyo karajakāyādisambandhī taṃnimittatāya, evaṃ karajakāyādayopi assāsapassāsakāyasambandhino taṃnimittabhāvenāti ‘‘samudayadhammā kāyasmi’’nti vattabbataṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samudaya…pe… vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Pakativācī vā ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo ‘‘jātidhammāna’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.131; 3.310; paṭi. ma. 1.33) viyāti kāyassa paccayasamavāye uppajjanakapakatikāyānupassī vā ‘‘samudayadhammānupassī’’ti vutto. Tenāha ‘‘karajakāyañcā’’tiādi. Evañca katvā ^b^kāyasmi^eb^nti bhummavacanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.

[03]^b^Vayadhammānupassī^eb^ti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ ^a^P2.0382^ea^ abhāve yaṃ na hoti, tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hetu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā bhastāyā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0302^ea^. Ayaṃ tāvettha paṭhamavikappavasena atthavibhāvanā. Dutiyavikappavasena upacārena vināyeva attho veditabbo.

[03]Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi ekakāle na labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Atthi kāyo’’ti ^b^eva^eb^-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti ^b^‘‘kāyova atthī’’^eb^ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘na satto’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya, paresañca sajjāpanaṭṭhena, satvaguṇayogato vā ^b^‘‘satto’’^eb^ti parehi parikappito, tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca ^b^‘‘puggalo’’^eb^ti, thīyati saṃhaññati ettha gabbhoti ^b^‘‘itthī’’^eb^ti, puri pure bhāge seti pavattatīti ^b^‘‘puriso’’^eb^ti, āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti ^b^‘‘attā’’^eb^ti, attano santakabhāvena ^b^‘‘attaniya’’^eb^nti, paro na hotīti katvā ^b^‘‘aha’’^eb^nti, mama santakanti katvā ^b^‘‘mamā’’^eb^ti, vuttappakāravinimutto aññoti katvā ^b^‘‘kocī’’^eb^ti, tassa santakabhāvena ^b^‘‘kassacī’’^eb^ti, vikappetabbo koci natthi, kevalaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyo eva atthī’’^eb^ti. Dasahipi padehi attattaniyasuññatameva kāyassa vibhāveti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘kāyova atthī’’tiādinā vuttappakārena.

[03]^b^Ñāṇapamāṇatthāyā^eb^ti kāyānupassanāñāṇaṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. ^b^Satipamāṇatthāyā^eb^ti kāyapariggāhikaṃ satiṃ pavattanasatiṃ paraṃ pamāṇaṃ pāpanatthāya. Imassa hi vuttanayena ‘‘atthi kāyo’’ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa, satiyā ca ^a^V2.0280^ea^ paribrūhanāya hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satisampajaññānaṃ vuḍḍhatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Imissā ^a^P2.0383^ea^ bhāvanāya taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṇhā…pe… viharatī’’^eb^ti. Tathābhūto ca loke kiñcipi ‘‘aha’’nti vā ‘‘mama’’nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati, kuto gaṇheyyāti āha ^b^‘‘na ca kiñcī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pi^eb^-saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento ^b^‘‘upari atthaṃ upādāyā’’^eb^ti āha yathā ‘‘antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi, ayampi pārājiko hotī’’ti. (Pārā. 42) ^b^eva^eb^nti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha ^b^‘‘iminā pana…pe… dassetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānassa ^a^M2.0303^ea^ idha adhippetattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sati dukkhasacca’’^eb^nti. Sā pana sati yasmiṃ attabhāve, tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā, tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā’’^eb^ti, yathā ‘‘saṅkhārapaccayā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.126; udā. 1; vibha. 484). Taṃviññāṇabījataṃsantatisambhūto sabbopi lokiyo viññāṇappabandho ‘‘saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ’’ tveva vuccati suttantanayena. ^b^Appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavattiyā nimittabhūtoti attho. Na pavattati etthāti vā ^b^appavatti. ‘‘Dukkhaparijānano’’^eb^tiādi ekantato catukiccasādhanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Avuttasiddho hi tassa bhāvanāpaṭivedho. ^b^Catusaccavasenā^eb^ti catusaccakammaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^Ussakkitvā^eb^ti visuddhiparamparāya āruhitvā, bhāvanaṃ upari netvāti attho. ^b^Niyyānamukha^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇūpāyo.
[06]Ānāpānapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^375^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iriyāpathavasenā^eb^ti iriyanaṃ ^b^iriyā,^eb^ kiriyā, idha pana kāyikapayogo ^a^P2.0384^ea^ veditabbo. Iriyānaṃ patho pavattimaggoti ^b^iriyāpatho,^eb^ gamanādivasena pavattā sarīrāvatthā. Gacchanto vā hi satto kāyena kātabbakiriyaṃ karoti ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti, tesaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vasena, iriyāpathavibhāgenāti attho. ^b^Puna capara^eb^nti puna ca aparaṃ, yathāvuttāanāpānakammaṭṭhānato bhiyyopi aññaṃ kāyānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathemi, suṇāthāti vā adhippāyo ^a^V2.0281^ea^. ^b^‘‘Gacchanto vā’’^eb^tiādi gamanādimattajānanassa, gamanādigatavisesajānanassa ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ, tattha gamanādimattajānanaṃ na idha nādhippetaṃ, gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha kāma’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sattūpaladdhi^eb^nti ‘‘satto atthī’’ti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ. ^b^Na pajahati^eb^ na pariccajati ‘‘ahaṃ gacchāmi, mama gamana’’nti gāhasabbhāvato. Tato eva ^b^attasaññaṃ^eb^ ‘‘atthi attā kārako vedako’’ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ ^a^M2.0304^ea^^b^na ugghāṭeti^eb^ nāpaneti appaṭipakkhabhāvato, ananubrūhanato vā. Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Imassa panā’’^eb^tiādi sukkapakkho, tassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Tameva hi atthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘idañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^b^ko gacchatī^eb^ti sādhanaṃ, kiriyañca avinibbhuttaṃ katvā gamanakiriyāya kattupucchā, sā kattubhāvavisiṭṭhāttapaṭikkhepatthā dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhidassanato. ^b^Kassa gamana^eb^nti tamevatthaṃ pariyāyantarena vadati sādhanaṃ, kiriyañca vinibbhuttaṃ katvā gamanakiriyāya akattusambandhībhāvavibhāvanato. Paṭikkhepatthañhi antonītaṃ katvā ubhayatthaṃ kiṃ-saddo pavatto. ^b^Kiṃ kāraṇā^eb^ti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya ^a^P2.0385^ea^ gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā. Idañhi gamanaṃ nāma attā manasā saṃyujjati, mano indriyehi, indriyāni attehīti evamādi micchākāraṇavinimuttānurūpapaccayahetuko dhammānaṃ pavattiākāraviseso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati^eb^ dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito, tabbinimuttassa ca kassaci abhāvato. Idāni dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphārenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā, vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāro, tena. Ettha ca cittakiriyaggahaṇena anindriyabaddhavāyodhātuvipphāraṃ nivatteti, vāyodhātuvipphāraggahaṇena cetanāvacīviññattibhedaṃ cittakiriyaṃ nivatteti, ubhayena pana kāyaviññattiṃ vibhāveti. ^b^‘‘Gacchatī’’^eb^ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye ‘‘gacchatī’’ti vohāro hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti gantukāmatāvasena pavattacittaṃ. ^b^Vāyaṃ janetī^eb^ti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ uppādeti, adhikatā cettha sāmatthiyato, na pamāṇato. Gamanacittasamuṭṭhitaṃ sahajātarūpakāyassa thambhanasandhāraṇacalanānaṃ paccayabhūtena ākāravisesena pavattamānaṃ vāyodhātuṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘vāyo viññattiṃ janetī’’^eb^ti. Adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti. Yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ca vāyogahaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0282^ea^, na vāyodhātuyā eva janakabhāvato, aññathā viññattiyā ^a^M2.0305^ea^ upādāyarūpabhāvo durupapādo siyā. ^b^Purato abhinīhāro^eb^ puratobhāgena kāyassa pavattanaṃ, yo ‘‘abhikkamo’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^‘‘Eseva nayo’’^eb^ti atidesena saṅkhepato vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tatrāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Koṭito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti heṭṭhimakoṭito ^a^P2.0386^ea^ paṭṭhāya pādatalato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Ussitabhāvo^eb^ti ubbiddhabhāvo.

[03]^b^Evaṃ pajānato^eb^ti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādi hotīti pajānato. ^b^Tassa^eb^ evaṃ pajānanāya nicchayagamanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti vicāraṇā ^b^vuccati^eb^ loke yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena, lokavohāravasena vā. ^b^Atthi panā^eb^ti attano evaṃ vīmaṃsanavasena pucchāvacanaṃ. ^b^Natthī^eb^ti nicchayavasena sattassa paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi tasseva atthassa upamāya vibhāvanaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^Nāvā mālutavegenā^eb^ti ^b^yathā^eb^ acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ ^b^yāti, yathā^eb^ ca acetano ^b^tejanaṃ^eb^ kaṇḍo ^b^jiyāvegena^eb^ desantaraṃ ^b^yāti, tathā^eb^ acetano ^b^kāyo vātāhato^eb^ yathāvuttavāyunā nīto desantaraṃ ^b^yātī^eb^ti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sace pana koci vadeyya ‘‘yathā nāvātejanānaṃ pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ, evaṃ kāyassāpī’’ti, hotu, evaṃ icchito vāyamattho yathā hi nāvātejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena gamanaṃ, na asaṃhatalakkhaṇassa, evaṃ kāyassāpīti. Kā no hāni, bhiyyopi dhammamattatāva patiṭṭhaṃ labhati, na purisavādo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yantasuttavasenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Tattha ^b^payutta^eb^nti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena paccayehi payojitaṃ. ^b^Ṭhātī^eb^ti tiṭṭhati. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^Vinā hetupaccaye^eb^ti gantukāmatācittataṃsamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuādihetupaccayehi vinā. ^b^Tiṭṭhe^eb^ti tiṭṭheyya. ^b^Vaje^eb^ti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho. Paṭikkhepattho cettha ^b^kiṃ^eb^-saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena ^a^M2.0306^ea^ sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena attasuññatā viya aniccadukkhatāpi vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Paṇihito^eb^ti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārehi nihito ^a^P2.0387^ea^ ṭhapito. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikavacana^eb^nti sabbesampi ^a^V2.0283^ea^ catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhanavacanaṃ, pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vuttattā idaṃ nesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho. Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ, apadhānañca iriyāpathaṃ anunipphādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso veditabbo. ^b^Ṭhito^eb^ti pavatto.

[03]Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharatī’’^eb^ti. Tenevettha rūpakkhandhavaseneva samudayādayo uddhaṭā. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. ^b^Ādinā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathā ‘‘taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā’’ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatīti ime cattāro ākārā saṅgayhanti, evaṃ ‘‘avijjānirodhā’’ti ādayopi pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Iriyāpathapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^376^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catusampajaññavasenā^eb^ti samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno, sampajānassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ, tathāpavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ, hatthavikārādibhedabhinnattā cattāri sampajaññāni samāhaṭāni catusampajaññaṃ, tassa vasena. ^b^‘‘Abhikkante’’tiādīni sāmaññaphale^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.214; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.214 vākyakhandhepi) ^b^vaṇṇitāni,^eb^ na puna vaṇṇetabbāni, tasmā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanāpi tattha vihitanayeneva gahetabbā. ‘‘Abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī’’tiādi vacanato abhikkamādigatacatusampajaññapariggaṇhanena rūpakāyassevettha samudayadhammānupassitādi adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca^eb^^a^M2.0307^ea^^b^nīharitabbo’’^eb^ti. Rūpadhammānaṃyeva hi pavattiākāravisesā abhikkamādayoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Catusampajaññapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^377^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭikkūlamanasikāravasenā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0388^ea^^a^V2.0284^ea^ jigucchanīyatāya paṭikūlameva paṭikkūlaṃ, yo paṭikkūlasabhāvo paṭikkūlākāro, tassa manasi karaṇavasena. Antarenāpi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā ‘‘paṭassa sukka’’nti. Yasmā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.182) ^b^vuttaṃ,^eb^ tasmā tattha, taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.182 ādayo) vuttanayena ‘‘imameva kāya’’nti ādīnamattho veditabbo.

[03]Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvāṭanaṃ ^b^putoḷi. ^eb^ Nānākārā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sammissāti ettāvatā nānāvaṇṇānaṃ kesādīnañca upameyyatā. ^b^Vibhūtakālo^eb^ti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā kesādīnaṃ asubhākārassa upaṭṭhitakālo. Iti-saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento ‘‘eva’’nti vatvā taṃ ākāraṃ sarūpato dassento ^b^‘‘kesādipariggaṇhanenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kesādisaññitānañhi asucibhāvānaṃ paramaduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlākārassa samudayato anupassanā idha kāyānupassanāti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^378^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhātumanasikāravasenā^eb^ti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena, catudhātuvavatthānavasenāti attho. Dhātumanasikāro, dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ, catudhātuvavatthānanti hi atthato ekaṃ. ^b^Goghātako^eb^ti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. ^b^Antevāsiko^eb^ti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī taṃ nissāya jīvanako ^a^M2.0308^ea^. ^b^Vinivijjhitvā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aññamaññaṃ vinivijjhitvā. ^b^Mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte^eb^ti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya ^a^P2.0389^ea^ eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānatāya vemajjhasaṅkhāte. Yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā tattha samohitā viya honti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ catumahāpathaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^catumahāpathe.^eb^ Ṭhita-saddo ‘‘ṭhito vā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.263; a. ni. 5.28) ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya, ṭhā-saddassa vā gatinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya ^a^V2.0285^ea^ bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathā ṭhita’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^ākārenā^eb^ti ṭhānādinā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena. Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti ‘‘iriyāpatho’’ti vuccantīti vutto vāyamattho. ^b^Yathāṭhita^eb^nti yathāpavattaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ ṭhānamevettha paṇidhānanti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā ṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihita’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Ṭhita’’^eb^nti vā kāyassa ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ, ^b^‘‘paṇihita’’^eb^nti tadaññairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ṭhita’’^eb^nti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ, ^b^paṇihita^eb^nti paccayavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Paccavekkhatī^eb^ti pati pati avekkhati, ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ passati.

[03]Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā goghātakassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^posentassā^eb^ti maṃsūpacayaparibrūhanāya kuṇḍakabhattakappāsaṭṭhiādīhi saṃvaḍḍhentassa. ^b^Vadhitaṃ mata^eb^nti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ. ^b^Mata^eb^nti ca matamattaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tāvadevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyatī^eb^ti yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni ^a^P2.0390^ea^ yathāsanniviṭṭhāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā tesaṃ taṃsannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā. Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhujjantīti ^b^bīlā,^eb^ bhāgā va-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, ikārassa ca īkāraṃ katvā. ^b^Bīlaso^eb^ti bīlaṃ bīlaṃ katvā. ^b^Vibhajitvā^eb^ti aṭṭhisaṅghātato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā vivecitaṃ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘maṃsasaññā pavattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pabbajitassāpi^eb^ apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa. ^b^Ghanavinibbhoga^eb^nti santatisamūhakiccaghanānaṃ vinibbhujjanaṃ vivecanaṃ. ^b^Dhātuso^eb^^a^M2.0309^ea^^b^paccavekkhato^eb^ti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa. ^b^Sattasaññā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā sattasaññāti vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dakkho^eb^ti cheko taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo ‘‘yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā, na vibhatte. Vibhatte pana aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamaññā’’ti jānanato. ^b^Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpatho^eb^ti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho iriyāpatho yasmā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.305) ^b^vitthāritā,^eb^ tasmā tattha, taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca (visuddhi. ṭī. 1.306) vuttanayena veditabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Dhātumanasikārapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^379^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sivathikāya ^a^V2.0286^ea^ apaviddhauddhumātakādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ odhiso pavattānaṃ kathānaṃ, tadabhidheyyānañca uddhumātakādiasubhabhāgānaṃ sivathikapabbānīti saṅgītikārehi gahitasamaññā ^a^P2.0391^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sivathikapabbehi vibhajitu’’^eb^nti. Maritvā ekāhātikkantaṃ ^b^ekāhamataṃ. Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā^eb^ti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ. ^b^Samuggatenā^eb^ti samuṭṭhitena. ^b^Uddhumātattā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā sūnattā. Setarattehi viparibhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ ^b^vinīlaṃ,^eb^ purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ ^b^vinīlaṃ. Vinīlameva vinīlaka^eb^nti ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanaṃ anatthantarato yathā ‘‘pītakaṃ lohitaka’’nti (dha. sa. 616). ^b^Paṭikkūlattā^eb^ti jigucchanīyattā. ^b^Kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlaka^eb^nti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī’’ti. (Dī. ni. 3.316; a. ni. 5.213; mahāva. 285) ^b^paribhinnaṭṭhānehi^eb^ kākakaṅkādīhi. ^b^Vissandamānapubba^eb^nti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho. ^b^Tathābhāva^eb^nti vissandamānapubbabhāvaṃ.

[03]^b^So^eb^^a^M2.0310^ea^^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti yo ‘‘passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita’’nti vutto, so bhikkhu. ^b^Upasaṃharati^eb^ sadisataṃ. ^b^‘‘Ayampi kho’’^eb^tiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Āyū^eb^ti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, arūpajīvitindriyaṃ panettha viññāṇagatikameva. ^b^Usmā^eb^ti kammajatejo. ^b^Evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyevā^eb^ti evaṃ ativiya duggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlapūbhikasabhāvo eva, na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo. Ediso bhavissatīti ^b^evaṃbhāvī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Luñcitvā luñcitvā^eb^ti uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā. ^b^Sāvasesamaṃsalohitayutta^eb^nti sabbaso akhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ. ‘‘Aññena hatthaṭṭhika’’nti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘catusaṭṭhibhedampī’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P2.0392^ea^.

[03]^b^Terovassikānī^eb^ti tirovassaṃ gatāni, tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘atikkantasaṃvaccharānī’’^eb^ti. Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvoti so yathā hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abbhokāse’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Terovassikānevā^eb^ti saṃvaccharamattātikkantāni ^a^V2.0287^ea^ eva. Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ vavatthāpitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘khajjamānatādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Navasivathikapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Imāneva dve^eb^ti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato. Yato hi eva-kāro, tato aññattha niyameti, tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi appaṭisiddhā daṭṭhabbā aniccatādidassanato. Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti āha ^b^‘‘sivathikānaṃ ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā’’^eb^ti. Iriyāpathapabbādīnaṃ appanāvahatā pākaṭā evāti ^b^‘‘sesāni dvādasapī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kāyānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^380^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0311^ea^^b^vedana^eb^nti ettha sukhayatīti ^b^sukhā.^eb^ Sampayuttadhamme, kāyañca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati vā kāyikaṃ, cetasikañcābādhanti ^b^sukhā. ^eb^ ‘‘Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti ^b^sukhā’’^eb^ti apare. Vedayati ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti ^b^vedanā. Vedayamāno^eb^ti anubhavamāno. ^b^‘‘Kāma’’^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ iriyāpathapabbe vuttanayameva. Sampajānassa vediyanaṃ ^b^sampajānavediyanaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Vatthuārammaṇā^eb^ti rūpādiārammaṇā. Rūpādiārammaṇañhettha vedanāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya ‘‘vatthū’’ti adhippetaṃ ^a^P2.0393^ea^. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhaveyya. Dhammavinimuttassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vedanāva vedayatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^‘‘Vohāramattaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti etena ‘‘sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’’ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti.

[03]^b^Nitthunanto^eb^ti balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto ^a^V2.0288^ea^. Vegasandhāraṇe hi atimahantaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjatīti aññampi vikāraṃ uppādeyya, tena thero ^b^aparāparaṃ parivattati. Vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvā^eb^ti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamathaṃ yojetvā. ^b^Saha paṭisambhidāhī^eb^ti lokuttarapaṭisambhidāhi saha. Ariyamaggakkhaṇe hi paṭisambhidānaṃ asammohavasena adhigamo, atthapaṭisambhidāya pana ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi. Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘saha paṭisambhidāhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samasīsī^eb^ti vārasamasīsī hutvā, paccavekkhaṇavārassa anantaravāre parinibbāyīti attho.

[03]^b^Yathā ca sukhaṃ, evaṃ dukkha^eb^nti yathā ‘‘sukhaṃ ko vedayatī’’tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, evaṃ dukkhampi. Tattha dukkhayatīti ^b^dukkhā,^eb^ sampayuttadhamme, kāyañca pīḷeti vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhuṃ vā khādati, khanati kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca sātanti ^b^dukkhā.^eb^ ‘‘Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etissāti ^b^dukkhā’’^eb^ti apare. ^b^Arūpakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti arūpapariggahaṃ, arūpadhammamukhena vipassanābhinivesananti attho. ^b^Na pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ phassassa, cittassa ca avibhūtākārattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘andhakāraṃ viya khāyatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Na pākaṭaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0394^ea^^b^hotī’’^eb^ti ca ^a^M2.0312^ea^ idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ, tesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Evañhi yaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^sakkapañhavaṇṇanā^eb^ dīsu ‘‘phasso pākaṭo hoti, viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī’’ti, (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.359) taṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. Vedanāvasena kathiyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā. ^b^‘‘Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyā’’^eb^ti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Tāsañhi pavatti oḷārikā, na itarāya. Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti ‘‘vedanāna’’nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Sakkapañhe vuttanayeneva veditabbo,^eb^ tasmā tattha vattabbo atthaviseso tattha līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.

[03]Pubbe ‘‘vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatī’’ti vedanāya ārammaṇādhīnavuttitāya ca anattatāya ca pajānanaṃ vuttaṃ, idāni tassā aniccatādipajānanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo’’^eb^ti āha. Yathā ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittadvayassa asambhavo ekajjhaṃ anekantapaccayābhāvato, evaṃ vedanādvayassa visiṭṭhārammaṇavuttito cāti āha ^b^‘‘sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato’’^eb^ti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ tadā upekkhāvedanāyapi abhāvato, tena sukhavedanākkhaṇe bhūtapubbānaṃ itaravedanānaṃ hutvāabhāvapajānanena sukhavedanāyapi hutvā abhāvo ñāto eva hotīti tassā pākaṭabhāvameva dassento ^b^‘‘imissā ca^eb^^a^V2.0289^ea^^b^sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ^eb^^b^abhāvato’’^eb^ti ^a^P2.0395^ea^ āha, eteneva ca tāsampi vedanānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anicca^eb^ggahaṇena hi vedanānaṃ viddhaṃsanabhāvo dassito viddhaste aniccatāya suviññeyyattā. ^b^Adhuva^eb^ggahaṇena pākaṭabhāvo tassa asadābhāvitādibhāvanato. ^b^Vipariṇāma^eb^ggahaṇena dukkhabhāvo tassa aññathattadīpanato, tena sukhāpi vedanā dukkhā, pageva itarāti tissannampi vedanānaṃ dukkhatā dassitā hoti. Iti ‘‘yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ ekantato anattā’’ti tīsupi vedanāsu lakkhaṇattayapajānanā jotitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itiha tattha sampajāno hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idāni ^a^M2.0313^ea^ tamatthaṃ suttena (ma. ni. 2.205) sādhetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetī^eb^ti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti niruddhattā, anuppannattā ca yathākkamaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ. Paccuppannāya pana asambhavo vutto eva. Sakiccakkhaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato ^b^aniccā.^eb^ Samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katattā ^b^saṅkhatā.^eb^ Vatthārammaṇādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannattā ^b^paṭiccasamuppannā.^eb^ Khayavayapalujjananirujjhanapakatitāya ^b^khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā^eb^ti daṭṭhabbā.
[03]Kilesehi āmasitabbato ^b^āmisaṃ^eb^ nāma, pañca kāmaguṇā, ārammaṇakaraṇavasena saha āmisehīti ^b^sāmisaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Ito para^eb^nti ‘‘atthi vedanā’’ti evamādi pāḷiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Vedanānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^381^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sampayogavasena ^a^P2.0396^ea^ pavattamānena saha rāgenāti ^b^sarāgaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘lobhasahagata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vītarāga^eb^nti ettha kāmaṃ sarāgapadapaṭiyoginā vītarāgapadena bhavitabbaṃ, sammasanacārassa pana adhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti ^b^‘‘lokiyakusalābyākata’’^eb^nti vatvā ^b^‘‘idaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādinā tameva ^a^V2.0290^ea^ adhippāyaṃ vivarati. ^b^Sesāni^eb^ dve dosamūlāni, dve mohamūlānīti ^b^cattāri akusalacittāni.^eb^ Tesañhi rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitakāle soti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukkhavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘neva purimapadaṃ na pacchimapadaṃ bhajantī’’^eb^ti. Yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ pajānanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, dukantarapariyāpannattā tesaṃ. Ye pana ‘‘paṭipakkhabhāve agayhamāne sampayogābhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccābyākatānaṃ viyā’’ti icchanti, tesaṃ matena sesākusalacittānampi dutiyapadasaṅgaho veditabbo ^a^M2.0314^ea^. Dutiyadukepi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva vattatīti samohanti āha ^b^‘‘vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā cettha ‘‘saheva mohenāti samoha’’nti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesamohavantatāya ‘‘momūhacitta’’nti vattabbato vicikicchāuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ visesato ‘‘samoha’’nti vuccati, na tathā sesākusalacittānīti ^b^‘‘vaṭṭantiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Sampayogavasena thinamiddhena anupatitaṃ anugatanti ^b^thinamiddhānupatitaṃ,^eb^ pañcavidhaṃsasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ saṅkucitacittaṃ, ^b^saṅkucitacittaṃ nāma^eb^ ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena pavattanato. Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti ^b^uddhaccasahagataṃ,^eb^ aññathā sabbampi akusalacittaṃ ^a^P2.0397^ea^ uddhaccasahagatamevāti. ^b^Pasaṭacittaṃ^eb^ nāma ārammaṇe savisesaṃ vikkhepavasena visaṭabhāvena pavattanato.

[03]Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya ca dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti ^b^mahaggataṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmigataṃ tato mahantassa loke abhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rūpārūpāvacara’’^eb^nti. Tassa cettha paṭiyogī parittaṃ evāti āha ^b^‘‘amahaggatanti kāmāvacara’’^eb^nti. Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti^b^ sauttaraṃ.^eb^ Tappaṭipakkhena ^b^anuttaraṃ.^eb^ Tadubhayaṃ upādāyupādāya veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘sauttaranti kāmāvacara^eb^ntiādi. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanasamatthena samādhinā sammadeva āhitaṃ ^b^samāhitaṃ. ^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yassā^eb^ti yassa cittassa. Yathāvuttena samādhinā na samāhitanti ^b^asamāhitaṃ.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubhayasamādhirahita’’^eb^nti. Tadaṅgavimuttiyā ^b^vimuttaṃ,^eb^ kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ, vikkhambhanavimuttiyā ^b^vimuttaṃ,^eb^ mahaggatacittanti tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttīhi vimutta’’^eb^nti. Yattha tadubhayavimutti natthi, taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyāsaṅkāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘samuccheda…pe… okāsova natthī’’^eb^ti āha. Okāsabhāvo ca ^a^V2.0291^ea^ sammasanacārassa adhippetattā veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānameva.
[06]Cittānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^382^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pahātabbādidhammavibhāgadassanavasena ^a^M2.0315^ea^ pañcadhā dhammānupassanā niddiṭṭhāti ayamattho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti tamatthaṃ ulliṅgento ^b^‘‘pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetu’’^eb^nti āha. Yadi evaṃ kasmā nīvaraṇādivaseneva niddiṭṭhanti? Vineyyajjhāsayato. Yesañhi ^a^P2.0398^ea^ veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni, tesaṃ vasenettha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā. Tathā hi kāyānupassanāpi samathapubbaṅgamā desitā, tato pariññeyyesu khandhesu, āyatanesu ca bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu, pariññeyyādivibhāgesu saccesu ca uttarā desanā, tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthā icchitā. Vipassanāpadhānā, vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena desitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha khandhāyatanadukkhasaccavasena missakapariggahakathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Saññāsaṅkhārakkhandhapariggahampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena sakalapañcupādānakkhandhapariggahaṃ sampiṇḍeti itaresaṃ tadantogadhattā.

[03]‘‘Kaṇhasukkadhammānaṃ yuganandhatā natthī’’ti pajānanakāle abhāvā ^b^‘‘abhiṇhasamudācāravasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṃvijjamāna^eb^nti attano santāne upalabbhamānaṃ. ^b^Yathā^eb^ti yenākārena, so pana ^b^‘‘kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī’’^eb^ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova, atthato kāraṇamevāti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo vakkhamānatthasamuccayattho.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ‘‘yathā cā’’tiādinā vuttapade. ^b^Subhampī^eb^ti kāmacchandopi. So hi attano gahaṇākārena ^b^‘‘subha’’^eb^nti vutto, tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā ^b^‘‘nimitta’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0292^ea^ ca. Iṭṭhaṃ, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādi ^b^subhārammaṇaṃ.^eb^ Ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa pattiyā anupāyabhūto manasikāro ^b^anupāyamanasikāro. Ta^eb^nti ayonisomanasikāraṃ ^a^P2.0399^ea^. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ sabhāgahetubhūte, ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhe subhanimitte. ^b^Āhāro^eb^ti paccayo attano phalaṃ āharatīti katvā.

[03]^b^Asubha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0316^ea^ asubhajjhānaṃ uttarapadalopena, taṃ pana dasasu aviññāṇakāsubhesu ca kesādīsu saviññāṇakāsubhesu ca pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kesādīsu hi saññā ‘‘asubhasaññā’’ti ^b^girimānandasutte^eb^ (a. ni. 10.60) vuttā. Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa, yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tesu pana asubhesu ‘‘subha’’nti, ‘‘asubha’’nti ca manasikāro idhādhippeto, tadanukūlattā pana itare pīti.

[03]Ekādasasu asubhesu paṭikkūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, tathā paṭipatti ^b^asubhanimittassa uggaho. ^eb^ Upacārappanāvahāya asubhabhāvanāya anuyuñjanā ^b^asubhabhāvanānuyogo.^eb^ ‘‘Bhojane mattaññuno mitāhārassa thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatī’’ti vadanti, ayameva ca attho niddesepi vuccati. Yo pana bhojanassa paṭikkūlataṃ, tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa tassa ca upanissayabhūtassa ativiya jegucchataṃ, kāyassa ca āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ sammadeva jānāti, so sabbaso bhojane pamāṇassa jānanena ^b^bhojanemattaññū^eb^ nāma. Tādisassa hi kāmacchando pahīyateva.

[03]^b^Asubhakammikatissatthero^eb^ dantaṭṭhidassāvī. ^b^Pahīnassā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnassa. Ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo. Abhidhammapariyāyena (dha. sa. 1159, 1503) sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggenā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Paṭighampi^eb^ purimuppannaṃ ^b^paṭighanimittaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0400^ea^ parato uppajjanakassa paṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.

[03]Mejjati siniyhatīti ^b^mitto,^eb^ hitesī puggalo, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esāti mettā, hitesitā, tassā ^b^mettāya. Appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati^eb^ sādhāraṇavacanabhāvato. ^b^‘‘Cetovimuttī’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0293^ea^ vutte ^b^appanāva^eb^ vaṭṭati appanaṃ appattāya paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu muccanassa abhāvato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yonisomanasikāraṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti mettāya. ^b^Bahulaṃ pavattayato^eb^ti bahulīkāravato.

[03]Sattesu ^a^M2.0317^ea^ mettāyanassa hitūpasaṃhārassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^mettānimittassa uggaho,^eb^ paṭhamuppanno mettāmanasikāro parato uppajjanakassa kāraṇabhāvato mettāmanasikārova ^b^mettānimittaṃ.^eb^ Kammameva sakaṃ etesanti ^b^kammassakā,^eb^ sattā, tabbhāvo ^b^kammassakatā,^eb^ kammadāyādatā. Dosamettāsu yāthāvato ādīnavānisaṃsānaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ vīmaṃsā idha ^b^paṭisaṅkhānaṃ.^eb^ Mettāvihārikalyāṇamittavantatā idha ^b^kalyāṇamittatā. Odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇāna^eb^nti (odhisakānodhisakadisāpharaṇānaṃ ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.115) attātipiyasahāyamajjhattaverivasena odissakatā, sīmāsambhede kate anodissakatā. Ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā mettāya uggahaṇe veditabbā. Vihāraracchāgāmādivasena vā odissakadisāpharaṇaṃ. Vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ puratthimādidisāvasena anodissakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Uggaho^eb^ti ca yāva upacārā daṭṭhabbo. Uggahitāya āsevanā ^b^bhāvanā.^eb^ Tattha sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā, attabhāvapariyāpannāti etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā, ekekasmiṃ averā hontu ^a^P2.0401^ea^, abyāpajjhā, anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodissakapharaṇā mettā. Sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā, vinipātikāti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā, aṭṭhavīsati vidhā vā, dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā, ekekāya vā disāya sattādītthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhiso pharaṇā veditabbā.

[03]Yena ayonisomanasikārena aratiādikāni uppajjanti, so aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāro. Tena nipphādetabbe hi idaṃ bhummaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Ukkaṇṭhitā pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā. ^b^Kāyavinamanā^eb^ti karajakāyassa virūpenākārena namanā. ^b^Līnākāro^eb^ti saṅkocāpatti.

[03]Kusaladhammapaṭipattiyā paṭṭhapanasabhāvatāya, tappaṭipakkhānaṃ visosanasabhāvatāya ca ^b^ārambhadhātu^eb^ādito pavattavīriyanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamārambhavīriya’’^eb^nti. Yasmā paṭhamārambhamattassa kosajjavidhamanaṃ, thāmagamanañca ^a^M2.0318^ea^ natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavatara’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0294^ea^. Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantaṃ ativiya thāmagatameva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Atibhojane nimittaggāho^eb^ti atibhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho ^a^P2.0402^ea^, ettake bhutte taṃ bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti, ettake na hotīti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇagāho hotīti attho. Byatirekavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā ‘‘ettake bhutte taṃ bhojanaṃ thinamiddhassa kāraṇaṃ na hotī’’ti bhojane mattaññutā ca atthato dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catupañca…pe… na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Divā sūriyāloka^eb^nti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ ^b^manasi karontassāpī^eb^ti evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī’’^eb^ti.
[03]Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti ^b^‘‘avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro, uddhaccakukkuccamevetaṃ atthato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Bahussutassa ganthato, atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa tabbahulavihārino atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato vikkhepo na hotīti, yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā, yathānurūpapatikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca na hotīti ^b^‘‘bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī’’^eb^ti āha. Yadaggena bāhusaccena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi taṃ pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetovūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccappahānakārī vuttā. Vuddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā kukkuccavinodakā vinayadharā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca pabbajitānaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti ‘‘kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassā’’tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā. ^b^Pahīne uddhaccakukkucce^eb^ti ^a^P2.0403^ea^ niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^Kukkuccassa^eb^ domanassasahagatattā ^b^anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo^eb^ vutto.

[03]Tiṭṭhati ^a^M2.0319^ea^ pavattati etthāti ^b^ṭhānīyā^eb^ vicikicchāya ṭhānīyā ^b^vicikicchāṭhānīyā,^eb^ vicikicchāya kāraṇabhūtā dhammā, tiṭṭhatīti vā ^b^ṭhānīyā,^eb^ vicikicchā ṭhānīyā etissāti ^b^vicikicchāṭhānīyā,^eb^ atthato vicikicchā eva. Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Kusalākusalā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0295^ea^ kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā. Ye akusalā, te ^b^sāvajjā, asevitabbā, hīnā^eb^ ca. Ye kusalā, te ^b^anavajjā, sevitabbā,^eb^^b^paṇītā^eb^ ca. Kusalā vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā ^b^hīnā,^eb^ paṇītehi ^b^paṇītā. Kaṇhā^eb^ti kāḷakā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. ^b^Sukkā^eb^ti odātā cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā ^b^kaṇhā.^eb^ Sukkābhijātihetuto ^b^sukkā. ^eb^ Te eva ^b^sappaṭibhāgā.^eb^ Kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya sukkasappaṭibhāgā, tathā sukkāpi itarehi. Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā.^eb^ Sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.

[03]Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi sabbāpi aṭṭhavatthukā vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha ^b^‘‘tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā’’^eb^ti. Ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe ‘‘satthari kaṅkhatī’’tiādi (dha. sa. 1008, 1123, 1167, 1241, 1263, 1270; vibha. 915) vicikicchāya asambhavoti. Vinaye pakataññutā ‘‘sikkhāya kaṅkhatī’’ti vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassāpī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Okappaniyasaddhāsaṅkhātādhimokkhabahulassā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0404^ea^ saddheyyavatthuno anupavisanasaddhāsaṅkhātādhimokkhena adhimuccanabahulassa, ^b^adhimuccana^eb^ñca adhimokkhuppādanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, saddhāya vā ninnapoṇatāadhimutti ^b^adhimokkho.^eb^

[03]^b^Samudayavayā^eb^ti samudayavayadhammā. ^b^Subhanimittāsubhanimittādīsū^eb^ti ‘‘subhanimittādīsu asubhanimittādīsū’’ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha paṭhamena ādi-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho, dutiyenamettācetovimuttiādīnaṃ. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Nīvaraṇapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
