[03]^b^383^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upādānehi ^a^M2.0320^ea^ ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā.^eb^

[03]^b^Iti^eb^^a^V2.0296^ea^^b^rūpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo idaṃ-saddena samānatthoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ rūpa’’^eb^nti. Tayidaṃ sarūpaggahaṇabhāvato anavasesapariyādānaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itī^eb^ti vā pakāratthe nipāto, tasmā ^b^‘‘iti rūpa’’^eb^nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa pabhedo, tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. ^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti ruppanasabhāvato, cakkhādivaṇṇādisabhāvato ca. ^b^Vedanādīsupī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā, na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī’’tiādinā, ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ti ca ‘‘anubhavanasabhāvato, sātādisabhāvato cā’’ti evamādinā yojetabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Khandhapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^384^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresū^eb^ti ‘‘chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresū’’ti ‘‘chasū’’ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kasmā panetāni ubhayāni chaḷeva vuttāni? Chaviññāṇakāyuppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato. Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ, rūpāyatanameva ca ārammaṇaṃ, tathā itarāni itaresaṃ, chaṭṭhassa pana bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto manāyatanekadeso ^a^P2.0405^ea^ uppattidvāraṃ, asādhāraṇañca dhammāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. Cakkhatīti ^b^cakkhu,^eb^ rūpaṃ assādeti, vibhāveti cāti attho. Suṇātīti ^b^sotaṃ.^eb^ Ghāyatīti ^b^ghānaṃ.^eb^ Jīvitanimittatāya raso ^b^jīvitaṃ,^eb^ taṃ jīvitaṃ avhāyatīti ^b^jivhā.^eb^ Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo uppattidesoti ^b^kāyo.^eb^ Munāti ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti ^b^mano.^eb^ Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^b^rūpaṃ.^eb^ Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti ^b^saddo.^eb^ Gandhayati attano vatthuṃ sūcetīti ^b^gandho^eb^^a^M2.0321^ea^. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti ^b^raso. ^eb^ Phusīyatīti ^b^phoṭṭhabbaṃ.^eb^ Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti ^b^dhammā.^eb^ Sabbāni pana āyānaṃ tananādiatthena ^b^āyatanāni. ^eb^ Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.510, 511, 512; visuddhi. ṭī. 2.510) vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Cakkhuñca^eb^^a^V2.0297^ea^^b^pajānātī^eb^ti (dī. ni. 2.384; ma. ni. 1.117) ettha ^b^cakkhu^eb^ nāma pasādacakkhu, na sasambhāracakkhu, nāpi dibbacakkhuādikanti āha ^b^cakkhupasāda^eb^nti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo’’ti. (Dha. sa. 596) ^b^ca^eb^-saddo vakkhamānatthasamuccayattho. ^b^Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti aviparītassa attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena, rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti attho. Atha vā ^b^yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti yāthāvasarasavasena ceva lakkhaṇavasena ca, ^b^yāthāvasaraso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0406^ea^ ca aviparītasabhāvo veditabbo. So hi rasīyati aviraddhapaṭivedhavasena assādīyati ramīyatīti ‘‘raso’’ti vuccati, tasmā salakkhaṇavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Lakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena.

[03]‘‘Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; ma. ni. 3.421, 425, 426; saṃ. ni. 2.43, 45; 2.4.60) samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu, na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa jotanatthaṃ ‘‘rūpe cā’’ti puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ, tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi ‘‘rūpe ca pajānātī’’ti vuttaṃ, rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ^b^bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcā^eb^ti ekavacanavasena attho. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇa vasenā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa vasena ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa vasena cāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ubhayaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti cakkhuṃ upanissayapaccayavasena paccayabhūtaṃ, rūpe ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayavasena paccayabhūte ca paṭicca. Kāmaṃ ayaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā, nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento ^b^‘‘kāmarāga…pe… avijjāsaṃyojana’’^eb^nti ^a^M2.0322^ea^ āha. Tattha kāmesu rāgo, kāmo ca so rāgo cāti vā ^b^kāmarāgo.^eb^ So eva bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^saṃyojanaṃ.^eb^ Ayañhi yassa saṃvijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojeti bandhati iti dukkhena sattaṃ, bhavādike vā bhavantarādīhi, kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti ^b^saṃyojanaṃ. ^eb^ Evaṃ paṭighasaṃyojaṃādīnampi yathārahamattho vattabbo. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti ettha pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Bhavassādadiṭṭhissādanivattanatthaṃ ^a^P2.0407^ea^^b^kāmassāda^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Assādayato^eb^ti abhiramantassa. ^b^Abhinandato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0298^ea^ sappītikataṇhāvasena nandantassa. Padadvayenāpi balavato kāmarāgassa paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Aniṭṭhārammaṇe^eb^ti ettha ‘‘āpāthagate’’ti vibhattivipariṇāmanavasena ‘‘āpāthagata’’nti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ ārammaṇa^eb^nti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^‘‘Niccaṃ dhuva’’^eb^nti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. ‘‘Ucchijjissati vinassissatīti gaṇhato’’ti evamādīnampi saṅgaho icchitabbo. Paṭhamāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā anurodhavasena ^b^‘‘satto nu kho’’^eb^ti, itarāya anurodhavasena ^b^‘‘sattassa nu kho’’^eb^ti ^b^vicikicchato.^eb^ Attattaniyādigāhānugatā hi vicikicchā diṭṭhiyā asati abhāvato. ^b^Bhavaṃ patthentassā^eb^ti ‘‘īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā āyatimpi ediso, ito vā uttaritaro sampattibhavo bhaveyyā’’ti bhavaṃ nikāmentassa. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ rūpaṃ. Taṃsadise hi tabbohāravasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā ‘‘sā eva tittirī, tāni eva osadhānī’’ti. ^b^Usūyato^eb^ti usūyaṃ issaṃ uppādayato. ^b^Aññassa maccharāyato^eb^ti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto. ^b^Sabbeheva^eb^ yathāvuttehi navahi saṃyojanehi.

[03]^b^Tañca kāraṇa^eb^nti subhanimittapaṭighanimittādivibhāgaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādirūpārammaṇañceva tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti ^a^P2.0408^ea^ tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ. Avikkhambhitāsamūhatabhūmiladdhuppannaṃ taṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘appahīnaṭṭhena uppannassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vattamānuppannatā samudācāraggahaṇeneva gahitā. ^b^Yena kāraṇenā^eb^ti yena vipassanāsamathabhāvanāsaṅkhātena kāraṇena ^a^M2.0323^ea^. Tañhi tassa tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ. Issāmacchariyānaṃ apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggavajjhatā vuttā. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.241) suttapadaṃ kathanti? Taṃ suttantapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Yathānulomasāsanā hi suttantadesanā, ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ dosoti. ^b^Oḷārikassā^eb^ti thūlassa, yato abhiṇhasamuppattipariyuṭṭhānatibbatāva hoti. ^b^Aṇusahagatassā^eb^ti vuttappakārābhāvena aṇubhāvaṃ sukhumabhāvaṃ gatassa. Uddhaccasaṃyojanassapettha anuppādo vuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbo yathāvuttasaṃyojanehi avinābhāvato. Ekatthatāya sotādīnaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānanā, tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘eseva nayo’’^eb^ti atidisati.

[03]^b^Attano vā dhammesū^eb^ti attano ajjhattikāyatanadhammesu, attano ubhayadhammesu vā. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^ajjhattikāyatanapariggaṇhanenā^eb^ti ajjhattikāyatanapariggaṇhanamukhenāti attho. Evañca ^a^V2.0299^ea^ anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti. ^b^Parassa^eb^^a^P2.0409^ea^^b^vā dhammesū^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Rūpāyatanassā^eb^ti aḍḍhekādasappabhedassa rūpasabhāvassa āyatanassa rūpakkhandhe ‘‘vuttanayena nīharitabbo’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Sesakkhandhesū^eb^ti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhesu. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti iminā atidesena rūpakkhandhe ‘‘āhārasamudayā’’ti viññāṇakkhandhe ‘‘nāmarūpasamudayā’’ti sesakhandhesu ‘‘phassasamudayā’’ti imaṃ visesaṃ vibhāveti, itaraṃ pana sabbattha samānanti khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Āyatanapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^385^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bujjhanakasattassā^eb^ti kilesaniddāya paṭibujjhanakasattassa, ariyasaccānaṃ vā paṭivijjhanakasattassa. ^b^Aṅgesū^eb^ti kāraṇesu, avayavesu vā ^a^M2.0324^ea^. Udayavayañāṇuppattito paṭṭhāya sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī’’^eb^ti. Suttantadesanā nāma pariyāyakathā, ayañca satipaṭṭhānadesanā lokiyamaggavasena pavattāti vuttaṃ ‘‘yogāvacaroti sambodhī’’ti, aññathā ‘‘ariyasāvako’’ti vadeyya.
[03]^b^‘‘Satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā’’^eb^ti padassa attho ‘‘vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā’’ti ettha vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yonisomanasikāraṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti satiyaṃ, nipphādetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ.

[03]Sati ca sampajaññañca ^b^satisampajaññaṃ.^eb^ Atha vā satippadhānaṃ abhikkantādisātthakabhāvapariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ ^b^satisampajaññaṃ. ^eb^ Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti. Yathā paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ, anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavivajjanā, satokārīpuggalasevanā, tattha ca yuttappayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘satisampajañña’’^eb^ntiādinā. ^b^Tissadattatthero^eb^ nāma, yo bodhimaṇḍe ^a^P2.0410^ea^ suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā ^a^V2.0300^ea^ ‘‘aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya dhammaṃ kathemī’’ti parisaṃ pavāresi. ^b^Abhayatthero^eb^ti dattābhayattheramāha.

[03]Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo ^b^dhammavicayo,^eb^ so eva sambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa. ‘‘Kusalākusalā dhammā’’^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Tattha ^b^yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro^eb^ti kusalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsabhāvasarasalakkhaṇāadikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo. So hi aviparītamanasikāratāya ‘‘yonisomanasikāro’’ti vutto, tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi taggatikā eva, tassa abhiṇhaṃ pavattanaṃ bahulīkāro. ^b^Bhiyyobhāvāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ bhāvāya. ^b^Vepullāyā^eb^ti vipulabhāvāya. ^b^Pāripūriyā^eb^ti paribrūhanāya.

[03]^b^Paripucchakatā^eb^ti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ taṃ ‘‘idaṃ bhante kathaṃ, imassa ko attho’’ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ ^a^M2.0325^ea^ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhadhātu…pe… bahulatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇa^eb^nti ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarāni ca ‘‘vatthūnī’’ti adhippetāni, tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhattikabāhirāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ussannadosa^eb^nti vātādiussannadosaṃ. ^b^Sedamalamakkhita^eb^nti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddena aññampi sarīrassa, cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ ^a^P2.0411^ea^ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Senāsanaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddena pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Avisade^eb^ sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa tāni visayo? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. ^b^Cittacetasikesu^eb^ nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. ^b^Ñāṇampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayino aparisuddhiṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Samabhāvakaraṇa^eb^nti kiccato anūnādhikabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Saddheyyavatthusmiṃ paccayavasena adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena, paññāya avisadatāya, vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itarāni mandānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato ^a^V2.0301^ea^, itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ ^b^paggaho,^eb^ paggahova kiccaṃ ^b^paggahakiccaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘kātuṃ na sakkotī’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ.^eb^ Vikkhepapaṭikkhepo, yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so ^b^avikkhepo.^eb^ Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ ^b^dassanakiccaṃ. Kātuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti saddhindriyaṃ ^a^P2.0412^ea^. ^b^Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenā^eb^ti yassa saddheyyassa vatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ ^a^M2.0326^ea^ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti ‘‘ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo’’ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā, yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tathā amanasikārenā^eb^ti yenākārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato, vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya. Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito. Dutiyakappe pana yathā manasi karoto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena, vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ. Iminā nayena sesindriyesupi hāpanavidhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vakkalittheravatthū^eb^ti. So hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā ‘‘kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 3.87; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.208; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.380; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 2.2.130; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1007; theragā. aṭṭha. 2.vakkalittheragāthāvaṇṇanā) ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto ^a^P2.0413^ea^ paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi, atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsaṃ vissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
[21]‘‘Pāmojjabahulo ^a^V2.0302^ea^ bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane;
[22]Adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha’’nti. (dha. pa. 381) –

[03]Gāthaṃ vatvā ‘‘ehi vakkalī’’ti āha. So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Saddhāya balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati, taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnanaye ^a^M2.0327^ea^ ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana’’nti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti saddhindriyassa adhimattabhāve sesindriyānaṃ sakiccākaraṇe.

[03]^b^Itarakiccabheda^eb^nti upaṭṭhānādikiccavisesaṃ. ^b^Passaddhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Hāpetabba^eb^nti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā. Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘passaddhāadibhāvanāya hāpetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Soṇattherassa vatthū^eb^ti sukumārasoṇattherassa vatthu. (Mahāva. 242; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.205) so hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto ‘‘mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo’’ti taṃ ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānaṃ anuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ^a^P2.0414^ea^ ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavīthiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesupī^eb^ti satisamādhipaññindriyesupi.

[03]^b^Samata^eb^nti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ. Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññaṃ nātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhati. ^b^‘‘Balavasaddho’’^eb^tiādi byatirekamukhena vuttasseva ^a^V2.0303^ea^ atthassa samatthanaṃ. Tassattho yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so mudhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi ^b^avatthusmiṃ pasīdati^eb^ seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. ^b^Kerāṭikapakkha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0328^ea^ sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ ^b^bhajati.^eb^ Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto ‘‘deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī’’tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī’’^eb^ti. Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visamabhāvo na atthāvaho, anatthāvahova, evaṃ, samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ visamabhāvo na atthāvaho, anatthāvahova, tathā na avikkhepāvaho, vikkhepāvahovāti. ^b^Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,^eb^ tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. ^b^Uddhaccaṃ abhibhavatī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Tadubhaya^eb^nti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ, samādhivīriyadvayañca. ^b^Samaṃ kātabba^eb^nti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ ^a^P2.0415^ea^.

[03]^b^Samādhikammikassā^eb^ti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve satīti attho. ^b^Saddahanto^eb^ti ‘‘pathavī pathavīti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī’’ti acintetvā ‘‘addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī’’ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. ^b^Okappento^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto. ^b^Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati^eb^ samādhippadhānattā jhānassa. ^b^Ubhinna^eb^nti samādhipaññānaṃ. Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha ^b^‘‘samatāyapī’’^eb^ti, samabhāvenāpīti attho. ^b^Appanā^eb^ti lokiyappanā. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘hotiyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha ‘‘samathavipassanaṃ yuganandhaṃ bhāvetī’’ti (a. ni. 4.170; paṭi. ma. 2.5).

[03]Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ, samādhivīriyānañca samatāva icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha ^b^‘‘sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcasu indriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhikekadese gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘saddhāvīriyapaññāna’’^eb^nti āha. Aññathā pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā’’^eb^ icceva vuttaṃ, na ‘‘passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī’’ti. ^b^Sā^eb^ti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto ^b^sabbakammiko. Tenā^eb^ti tena sabbattha icchitabbaṭṭhena kāraṇena. ^b^Āha^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^ sabbattha līne, uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā, sabbe ^a^M2.0329^ea^ vā līne, uddhate ca citte bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā ^a^V2.0304^ea^ atthikā etāyāti ^b^sabbatthikā. Citta^eb^nti kusalaṃ cittaṃ. Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ ^a^P2.0416^ea^ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññāna^eb^nti pariyattibāhusaccavasenapi khandhāyatanādīsu appatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ. Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘samapaññāsa lakkhaṇapariggāhikāya udayabbayapaññāya samannāgatapuggalasevanā’’^eb^ti. Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā’’^eb^ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato ^b^gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,^eb^ tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā, tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā’’^eb^ti. Yathā sativepullappatto nāma arahā eva, evaṃ paññāvepullappattotipi so evāti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī’’^eb^ti. Vīriyādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]‘‘Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 3.250, 267; a. ni. 3.36) vuttapañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇā niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti, devadūtasuttādīsu tassa ādito vuttattā ca āha ^b^‘‘pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakaṭavahanādikāle^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tadaññamanussehi, tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^‘‘Ekaṃ buddhantara’’^eb^nti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ ^a^P2.0417^ea^ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ labhitvā ṭhito metteyyassapi bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ labhissatī’’ti vadanti, yaṃ tassa kappāyukatā vuttā.

[03]^b^Ānisaṃsadassāvino^eb^ti ‘‘vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokuttaro, lokiyo ca visesādhigamo’’ti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. ^b^Gamanavīthi^eb^nti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ, saha vipassanāya ariyamaggapaṭipāṭi ^a^M2.0330^ea^, sattavisuddhiparamparā vā. Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭaniyyānāya gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā ^b^gamanavīthi^eb^ nāma. ^b^Kāyadaḷhībahulo^eb^ti yathā tathā kāyassa daḷhīkammappasuto. ^b^Piṇḍa^eb^nti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ. Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano ^a^V2.0305^ea^ sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā ^b^piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^Nīharanto^eb^ti pattathavikato nīharanto. ^b^Taṃ saddaṃ sutvā^eb^ti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ attano vasanapaṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā. Manussasampatti, dibbasampatti, nibbānasampattīti imā ^b^tisso sampattiyo. Dātuṃ sakkhissasī^eb^ti ‘‘tayi katena dānamayena, veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo, ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī’’ti thero attānaṃ pucchati. ^b^Sitaṃ karonto vā^eb^ti ‘‘akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta’’nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.

[03]^b^Vippaṭipanna^eb^nti jātidhammakuladhammādilaṅghanena asammāpaṭipannaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī, ^b^evaṃ. Kusīto^eb^pi tena kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno ^a^P2.0418^ea^ satthu santikā laddhabbāriyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī. ^b^Āraddhavīriyova labhati^eb^ sammāpaṭipajjanato. Uppajjati vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti yojanā, evaṃ sabbattha.
[03]^b^Mahā^eb^ti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo. Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento ^b^‘‘satthuno hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjūpagamena sakyaputtassabhāvo sampajāyati, tasmā buddhaputtabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘asambhinnāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā ^b^kusītapuggalaparivajjanā.^eb^ ‘‘Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā’’tiādinā ^a^M2.0331^ea^ (ma. ni. 1.423; 3.65; saṃ. ni. 4.120; mahāni. 161) bhāvanāraddhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā ^b^āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘kucchiṃ pūretvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.64) pana jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā, sabrahmacārīmahattapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, thinamiddhavinodanatā, sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatāti ^a^V2.0306^ea^ idaṃ dvayaṃ gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva ^b^sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā^eb^ gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato. ^b^Thinamiddhavinodanaṃ^eb^ tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ hoti, vīriyuppādane yuttappayuttassa thinamiddhavinodanaṃ atthasiddhameva. Tattha thinamiddhavinodanakusītapuggalaparivajjanāaraddhavīriyapuggalasevana- tadadhimuttatāpaṭipakkhavidhamanapaccayūpasaṃhāravasena, apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādayo samuttejanavasena vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādakā daṭṭhabbā.

[03]Purimuppannā ^a^P2.0419^ea^ pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā visesakāraṇasabhāgahetubhāvato ^b^‘‘pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso. Yathā sā uppajjati, evaṃ paṭipatti ^b^tassā uppādakamanasikāro.^eb^
[03]‘‘Buddhānussatī’’tiādīsu vattabbaṃ ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.123) vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāva upacārā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno^eb^ti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammaguṇe anussarantassāpi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā, evaṃ sesānussatīsu. Pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāyañca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā. Saṅkhārānaṃ sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘samāpattiyā…pe… paccavekkhantassāpī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ‘‘vikkhambhitā kilesā’’ti pāṭho. Te hi na samudācarantīti. ^b^Iti^eb^-saddo kāraṇattho, yasmā na samudācaranti, tasmā taṃ nesaṃ asamudācāraṃ paccavekkhantassāti yojanā ^a^M2.0332^ea^. Na hi kilese paccavekkhantassa bojjhaṅguppatti yuttā. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena thūsasamahadayatā lūkhatā, sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve’’^eb^ti.
[03]Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhi eva yathāvuttabodhiaṅgabhūto passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa^eb^ evaṃ uppādo hotīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Paṇītabhojanasevanatā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0307^ea^ paṇītasappāyabhojanaseva natā ^a^P2.0420^ea^. ^b^Utuiriyāpathasukha^eb^ggahaṇena sappāyautuiriyāpathaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti. Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti pana ayaṃ dutiyo. Ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa so ^b^majjhattapayogo,^eb^ tassa bhāvo ^b^majjhattapayogatā.^eb^ Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati, eteneva sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanapassaddhakāyapuggalasevanānaṃ tadāvahanatā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva ^b^samathanimittaṃ.^eb^ Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti ^b^byaggo,^eb^ vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso, bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto, ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti ^b^abyaggo,^eb^ samādhi. So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimitta’’^eb^nti.
[03]Vatthuvisadakiriyā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca paññāvahā vuttā, samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Karaṇabhāvanākosallānaṃ avinābhāvato, rakkhanakosallassa ca taṃmūlakattā ^b^‘‘nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā’’^eb^^a^M2.0333^ea^ icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Kasiṇanimittassā^eb^ti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asubhanimittassāpi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti. ^b^Atisithilavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogamandataṃ ^a^P2.0421^ea^, pamodavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa paggaṇhana^eb^nti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjālitukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni gomayāni ^a^V2.0308^ea^ pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjālitunti. Evaṃ bhante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).

[03]Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva. ^b^Āraddhavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogabalavataṃ, pamodubbilāvanañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa niggaṇhana^eb^nti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ^a^P2.0422^ea^ ceva tiṇāni…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ bhante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).

[03]Etthāpi ^a^M2.0334^ea^ yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanāsamuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā, tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva. Samādhisambojjhaṅgassa anantaraṃ vakkhati. ^b^Paññāpayogamandatāyā^eb^ti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhapadhānaṃ, sīlaṃ adosapadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohapadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti, tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti, tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenāpi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ, pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ, duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādi aññamaññaṃ vibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0309^ea^ jīvikādukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanā^eb^ti ayaṃ bhāvanācittassa sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena tosanāti ^a^P2.0423^ea^ attho.

[03]^b^Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammā^eb^ti līnuddhaccavirahena, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma. ^b^‘‘Alīna’’^eb^ntiādīsu kosajjapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^alīnaṃ,^eb^ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^anuddhataṃ,^eb^ paññāpayogasampattiyā, upasamasukhādhigamena ca ^b^anirassādaṃ,^eb^ tato eva ^b^ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ^eb^^b^samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ.^eb^ Tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhatatā hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ, samappavattiyā vā ^b^alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ.^eb^ Samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ^b^anirassāda^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatā^eb^ti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṃ ^a^M2.0335^ea^ paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhuyya pekkhanā vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato, vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādhāna kiccanipphattiyā puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanaṃ evāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha ^b^‘‘upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. Anurodhavirodhavippahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato. So ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha ^b^‘‘sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā’’^eb^ti. Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘sattamajjhattatā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā’’^eb^ti. Upekkhāya hi visesato rāgo paṭipakkho. Tathā cāha ‘‘upekkhā rāgabahulassa ^a^P2.0424^ea^ visuddhimaggo’’ti (visuddhi. 1.267). ^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ, attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Dvīhevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhyāsamānatādassanatthaṃ. Saṅkhyā evettha samānā, na saṅkhyeyyaṃ sabbathā samānanti. ^b^Assāmikabhāvo^eb^ anattaniyatā. Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ, aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana koci natthevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Anaddhaniya^eb^nti na addhānakkhamaṃ na ciraṭṭhāyi, ittaraṃ aniccanti attho. ^b^Tāvakālika^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
[03]^b^Mamāyatī^eb^ti mamattaṃ karoti ‘‘mamā’’ti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati.
[03]^b^Mamāyantā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0310^ea^ mānaṃ dabbaṃ karontā.
[03]Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca’’^eb^nti. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Bojjhaṅgapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^386^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yathāsabhāvato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0336^ea^ aviparītasabhāvato. Bādhanakkhaṇato yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tato, ruppanādi kakkhaḷādisabhāvatoti attho. ^b^Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpika^eb^nti pavattalakkhaṇassa dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ. ^b^Purimataṇha^eb^nti yathāpariggahitassa dukkhassa nibbattito puretaraṃ siddhaṃ taṇhaṃ. Siddhe hi kāraṇe tassa phaluppatti. Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti pajānātīti yojanā. ^b^Ayaṃ dukkhanirodho^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Ubhinnaṃ appavatti^eb^nti dukkhaṃ, samudayo cāti dvinnaṃ appavattinimittaṃ, tadubhayaṃ na pavatti etāyāti ^b^appavatti,^eb^ asaṅkhatā dhātu. Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ ^a^P2.0425^ea^ parijānāti pariññābhisamayavasena paricchindatīti dukkhaparijānano, ariyamaggo, taṃ ^b^dukkhaparijānanaṃ.^eb^ Sesapadadvayepi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^388^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ vuttā^eb^ti evaṃ uddesavasena vuttā. ^b^Sabbasattānaṃ pariyādānavacanaṃ^eb^ byāpanicchāvasena āmeḍitaniddesabhāvato. ^b^Sattanikāye^eb^ti sattānaṃ nikāye, sattaghaṭe sattasamūheti attho. Devamanussādibhedāsu hi gatīsu bhummadevādikhattiyādihatthiādikhuppipāsikāditaṃtaṃjātivisiṭṭho sattasamūho sattanikāyo. Nippariyāyato khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti jātīti katvā ‘‘jananaṃ jātī’’ti vatvā svāyaṃ uppādavikāro aparinipphanno ^a^V2.0311^ea^ yesu khandhesu icchitabbo, te teneva saddhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘savikārāna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Savikārāna^eb^nti uppādasaṅkhātena vikārena savikārānaṃ. Jātiādīni hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dhammānaṃ vikāravisesāti. ^b^‘‘Upasaggamaṇḍitavevacana’’^eb^nti iminā kevalaṃ upasaggena padavaḍḍhanaṃ katanti dasseti. ^b^Anupaviṭṭhākārenā^eb^ti aṇḍakosaṃ, vatthikosañca ogāhanākārena. ^b^Nibbattisaṅkhātenā^eb^ti āyatanānaṃ pāripūrisaṃsiddhisaṅkhātena.

[03]Atha vā ^b^jananaṃ jātī^eb^ti aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ jātimāha. ^b^Sañjātī^eb^ti sampuṇṇāyatanaṃ. Sampuṇṇā hi jāti sañjāti. ^b^Okkamanaṭṭhena okkantī^eb^ti aṇḍajajalābujavasena ^a^M2.0337^ea^ jāti. Te hi aṇḍakosaṃ, vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. ^b^Abhinibbattanaṭṭhena abhinibbattī^eb^ti saṃsedajaopapātikavasena. Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti. Abhibyattā nibbatti ^b^abhinibbatti.^eb^ ‘‘Jananaṃ jātī’’tiādi āyatanavasena, yonivasena ca dvīhi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ…pe… abhinibbattī’’ti sattavasena vuttattā ^b^sammutikathā. Pātubhāvo^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena ‘‘āyatanānaṃ ^a^P2.0426^ea^ paṭilābho’’ti imassa padassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi hi paramatthakathāti. ^b^Ekavokārabhavādīsū^eb^ti ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu. ^b^Tasmiṃ^eb^ khandhānaṃ pātubhāve ^b^sati. Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho^eb^ti ekacatuvokārabhavesu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ vasena, sesesu rūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ pañcannaṃ, kāmadhātuyaṃ vikalāvikalindriyānaṃ vasena sattannaṃ, navannaṃ, dasannaṃ, punadasannaṃ, ekādasannañca āyatanānaṃ vasena saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Pātubhavantāneva,^eb^ na kutoci āgatāni. ^b^Paṭiladdhāni nāma honti^eb^ sattasantānassa tassa saṃvijjamānattā. ^b^Āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho^eb^ti vā āyatanānaṃ attalābho veditabbo.

[03]^b^389^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabhāvaniddeso^eb^ti sarūpaniddeso. Sarūpañhetaṃ jiṇṇatāya, yadidaṃ ‘‘jarā’’ti, ‘‘vayohānīti vā. Jīraṇameva ^b^jīraṇatā,^eb^ jīrantassa vā ākāro ^b^tā^eb^-saddena vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘ākārabhāvaniddeso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Khaṇḍitadantā khaṇḍitā nāma^eb^ uttarapadalopena. Yassa vikārassa vasena satto ‘‘khaṇḍito’’ti vuccati, taṃ ^b^khaṇḍiccaṃ.^eb^ Tathā palitāni assa santīti ‘‘palito’’ti vuccati, taṃ ^b^pāliccaṃ.^eb^ Valittacatāya vā vali taco assāti ^b^valittaco.^eb^
[03]^b^Phalūpacārenā^eb^ti phalavohārena.

[03]^b^390^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cavanameva ^a^V2.0312^ea^^b^cavanatā,^eb^ cavantassa vā ākāro ^b^tā^eb^-saddena vutto. ^b^Khandhā bhijjantī^eb^ti ekabhavapariyāpannassa khandhasantānassa pariyosānabhūtā khandhā bhijjanti, teneva bhedena nirodhanaṃ ^b^adassanaṃ gacchanti, tasmā bhedo antaradhānaṃ^eb^ maraṇaṃ. ^b^Maccumaraṇa^eb^nti maccusaṅkhātaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitindriyupacchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na khaṇikamaraṇa’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Maccu ^a^M2.0338^ea^ maraṇa’’nti samāsaṃ akatvā yo ‘‘maccū’’ti vuccati bhedo, yañca maraṇaṃ pāṇacāgo, idaṃ vuccati maraṇanti visuṃ sambandho na na yujjati. ^b^Kālakiriyā^eb^ti maraṇakālo, anatikkamanīyattā visesena ‘‘kālo’’ti vuttoti tassa kiriyā, atthato ^a^P2.0427^ea^ cutikhandhānaṃ bhedappattiyeva, kālassa vā antakassa kiriyāti yā loke vuccati, sā cuti, maraṇanti attho. ^b^Ayaṃ sabbāpi sammutikathāva^eb^ ‘‘yaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna’’ntiādinā sattavasena vuttattā. ^b^Ayaṃ paramatthakathā^eb^ paramatthato labbhamānānaṃ ruppanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ vinassanajotanābhāvato.

[03]Attāti bhavati ettha cittanti ^b^attabhāvo,^eb^ khandhasamūho, tassa ^b^nikkhepo^eb^ nikkhipanaṃ, pātanaṃ vināsoti attho. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^pana ^b^‘‘maraṇaṃ pattassā’’^eb^tiādinā nikkhepahetutāya patanaṃ ‘‘nikkhepo’’ti phalūpacārena vuttanti dasseti. ‘‘Khandhānaṃ bhedo’’ti pabandhavasena pavattamānassa dhammasamūhassa vināsajotanāti ekadesato paramatthakathā, ‘‘jīvitindriyassa upacchedo’’ti panettha na koci vohāraleso pīti āha ^b^‘‘jīvitindriyassa upacchedo pana sabbākārato paramatthato maraṇa’’^eb^nti. Evaṃ santepi yassa khandhabhedassa pavattattā ‘‘tisso mato, phusso mato’’ti vohāro hoti, so bhedo khandhappabandhassa anupacchinnatāya ‘‘sammutimaraṇa’’nti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha ^b^‘‘etadeva sammutimaraṇantipi vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jīvitindriyupacchedameva hī’’^eb^tiādi. Sabbaso pabandhasamucchedo hi samucchedamaraṇanti.

[03]^b^391^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Byasanenā^eb^ti anatthena. ‘‘Dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu (vibha. 721) viya ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo hetupariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘dukkhakāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Socananti lakkhitabbatāya ^b^socanalakkhaṇo.^eb^ Socitassa socanakassa puggalassa, cittassa vā bhāvo ^b^socitabhāvo. Abbhantare^eb^ti attabhāvassa anto. Attano lūkhasabhāvatāya sosento. Thāmagamanena samantato sosanavasena ^b^parisosento.^eb^

[03]^b^392^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Ādissa ādissa devanti paridevanti etenāti ādevo’’^eb^ti ādevana-saddaṃ katvā assumocanādivikāraṃ āpajjantānaṃ tabbikārāpattiyā ^a^M2.0339^ea^ so saddo kāraṇabhāvena ^a^P2.0428^ea^ vutto. ^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^V2.0313^ea^^b^taṃ vaṇṇa^eb^nti taṃ taṃ guṇaṃ. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti ādevaparidevasseva. ^b^Bhāvaniddesā^eb^ti ‘‘ādevitattaṃ paridevitatta’’nti bhāvaniddesā.

[03]^b^393^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nissayabhūto kāyo etassa atthīti ^b^kāyikaṃ. ^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyapasādavatthuka’’^eb^nti. Dukkaraṃ khamanaṃ etassāti ^b^dukkhamanaṃ,^eb^ so eva attho sabhāvoti ^b^dukkhamanaṭṭho,^eb^ tena. Sātavidhuratāya ^b^asātaṃ.^eb^
[03]^b^394^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cetasi bhavanti ^b^cetasikaṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana yasmā cittena samaṃ pakārehi yuttaṃ, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘cittasampayutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^395^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbavisayapaṭipattinivāraṇavasena samantato sīdanaṃ ^b^saṃsīdanaṃ.^eb^ Uṭṭhātumpi asakkuṇeyyatākaraṇavasena atibalavaṃ, virūpaṃ vā sīdanaṃ ^b^visīdanaṃ. Cittakilamatho^eb^ti visīdanākārena cittassa parikhedo. ^b^Upāyāso,^eb^ sayaṃ na dukkho dosattā, saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannadhammantarattā vā. Ye pana domanassameva ‘‘upāyāso’’ti vadeyyuṃ, te ‘‘upāyāso tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto’’ti (dhātu. 249). Imāya pāḷiyā paṭikkhipitabbā. ^b^Upa^eb^-saddo bhusatthoti āha ^b^‘‘balavataraṃ āyāso upāyāso’’^eb^ti. Dhammamattatādīpano ^b^bhāvaniddeso^eb^ dhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotano, asati ca kattari tena kattabbassa, pariggahetabbassa ca abhāvo evāti āha ^b^‘‘attattaniyābhāvadīpakābhāvaniddesā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^398^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jātidhammāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo pakatipariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘jātisabhāvāna’’^eb^nti, jāyanapakatikānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Maggabhāvanāya maggabhāvanicchāhetukatā icchitabbāti tādisaṃ icchaṃ nivattento ^b^‘‘vinā maggabhāvana’’^eb^nti āha. Aparo nayo ^b^na kho paneta^eb^nti yametaṃ ‘‘aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma, na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā’’ti evaṃ pahīnasamudayesu ^a^P2.0429^ea^ ariyesu vijjamānaṃ ajātidhammattaṃ, parinibbutesu ca vijjamānaṃ jātiyā anāgamanaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ icchantassāpi maggabhāvanāya vinā appattabbato ^a^M2.0340^ea^, anicchantassāpi bhāvanāya pattabbato na icchāya pattabbaṃ nāma hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Vakkhamānatthasampiṇḍanattho ^b^pi^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘upari sesāni upādāya pi-kāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ya^eb^nti hetuatthe karaṇe paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yenapi dhammenā’’^eb^ti. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo ^a^V2.0314^ea^, alabbhaneyyabhāvo ettha hetu veditabbo. ^b^Ta^eb^nti vā icchitassa vatthuno alabbhanaṃ, evamettha ^b^‘‘yampī^eb^ti yenapī’’ti vibhattivipallāsena attho vutto. Yadā pana ^b^yaṃ^eb^-saddo ‘‘iccha’’nti etaṃ apekkhati, tadā alābhavisiṭṭhā icchā vuttā hoti. Yadā pana ‘‘na labhatī’’ti etaṃ apekkhati, tadā icchāvisiṭṭho alābho vutto hoti, so pana atthato añño dhammo natthi, tathāpi alabbhaneyyavatthugatā icchāva vuttā hoti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ‘‘jarādhammāna’’ntiādinā āgatesu sabbavāresu.

[03]^b^400^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punobbhavo^eb^ uttarapadalopaṃ katvā mano-saddassa viya purimapadassa o-kārantatā daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā sīlanaṭṭhena ^b^ika^eb^-saddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakassa saddassa adassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā ‘‘asūpabhakkhanasīlo asūpiko’’ti. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘punabbhavaṃ deti, punabbhavāya saṃvattati, punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti ponobbhavikā’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 203) attho vutto so ‘‘taddhitā’’ iti bahuvacananiddesato, vicittattā vā taddhitavuttiyā, abhidhānalakkhaṇattā ^a^P2.0430^ea^ vā taddhitānaṃ tesupi atthesu ponobbhavikasaddasiddhi sambhaveyyāti katvā vutto. Tattha kammunā sahajātā punabbhavaṃ deti, asahajātā kammasahāyabhūtā punabbhavāya saṃvattati, duvidhāpi punappunaṃ bhave nibbattetīti daṭṭhabbā. Nandanaṭṭhena, rañjanaṭṭhena ca ^b^nandīrāgo,^eb^ yo ca nandīrāgo, yā ca taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā, ubhayametaṃ ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānanti taṇhā ^b^‘‘nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Tabbhāvattho hettha ^b^saha^eb^-saddo ‘‘sanidassanā dhammā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. dukamātikā 9) viya. Tasmā ^b^nandīrāgasahagatā^eb^ti nandīrāgabhāvaṃ gatā sabbāsupi avatthāsu nandīrāgabhāvassa apaccakkhāya vattanatoti attho. Rāgasambandhena ^b^uppannassā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhavarāgassa visuṃ vuccamānattā kāmabhave eva bhavapatthanuppatti vuttāti veditabbā.

[03]Tasmiṃ ^a^M2.0341^ea^ tasmiṃ piyarūpe paṭhamuppattivasena ^b^‘‘uppajjatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, punappunaṃ pavattivasena ^b^‘‘nivisatī’’^eb^ti. Pariyuṭṭhānānusayavasena vā uppattinivesā yojetabbā. ^b^Sampattiya^eb^nti manussasobhagge, devatte ca. ^b^Attano cakkhu^eb^nti savatthukaṃ cakkhuṃ vadati, sapasādaṃ vā maṃsapiṇḍaṃ. ^b^Vippasannaṃ pañcapasāda^eb^nti parisuddhasuppasannanīlapītalohitakaṇhaodātavaṇṇavantaṃ. ^b^Rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya^eb^ chiddaṃ abbhantare odātattā. ^b^Pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya^eb^ ālambakaṇṇabaddhaṃ. Tuṅgā uccā dīghā nāsikā ^b^tuṅganāsā,^eb^ evaṃ ^b^laddhavohāraṃ^eb^ attano ^b^ghānaṃ.^eb^ ‘‘Laddhavohārā’’ti vā pāṭho, tasmiṃ ^a^V2.0315^ea^ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te ^b^tuṅganāsā,^eb^ evaṃ ^b^laddhavohārā^eb^ sattā attano ^b^ghāna^eb^nti yojanā ^a^P2.0431^ea^ kātabbā. ^b^Jivhaṃ…pe… maññanti^eb^ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato, kiccato ca. ^b^Kāyaṃ…pe… maññanti^eb^ ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā. ^b^Manaṃ…pe… maññanti^eb^ atītādiatthacintanasamatthaṃ. ^b^Attanā paṭiladdhāni^eb^ ajjhattañca sarīragandhādīni, bahiddhā ca vilepanagandhādīni. ^b^Uppajjamānā uppajjatīti yadā uppajjamānā hoti, tadā ettha uppajjatī^eb^ti sāmaññena gahitā uppādakiriyā lakkhaṇabhāvena vuttā, visayavisiṭṭhā ca lakkhitabbabhāvena. Na hi sāmaññavisesehi nānattavohāro na hotīti. ^b^Uppajjamānā^eb^ti vā anicchito uppādo hetubhāvena vutto, ^b^uppajjatī^eb^ti nicchito phalabhāvena yadi uppajjamānā hoti, ettha uppajjatīti.

[03]^b^401^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sabbāni nibbānavevacanānevā’’ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘nibbānañhī’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^āgammā^eb^ti nimittaṃ katvā. Nibbānahetuko hi taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho. Khayagamanavasena ^b^virajjati.^eb^ Appavattigamanavasena ^b^nirujjhati.^eb^ Anapekkhatāya cajanavasena, hānivasena vā ^b^cajīyati.^eb^ Puna yathā nappavattati, tathā dūra khipanavasena ^b^paṭinissajjīyati.^eb^ Bandhanabhūtāya mocanavasena ^b^muccati.^eb^ Asaṃkilesavasena ^b^na allīyati.^eb^ Kasmā panetaṃ nibbānaṃ ekameva samānaṃ nānānāmehi vuccatīti? Paṭipakkhanānatāyāti dassento ^b^‘‘ekameva hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Saṅkhatadhammavidhurasabhāvattā nibbānassa nāmānipi guṇanemittikattā saṅkhatadhammavidhurāneva hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ nāmapaṭipakkhavasenā’’^eb^ti. Asesaṃ virajjati taṇhā etthāti ^b^asesavirāgo^eb^ti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – natthi etassa uppādo, na ^a^M2.0342^ea^ vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa uppādoti ^b^anuppādo,^eb^ asaṅkhatadhammo. ^b^‘‘Appavatta’’^eb^ntiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Āyūhanaṃ^eb^ samudayo, tappaṭipakkhavasena ^b^anāyūhanaṃ.^eb^

[03]Taṇhā appahīne sati yattha uppajjati, pahāne pana sati tattha ^a^P2.0432^ea^ tatthevassā abhāvo sudassitoti āha ^b^‘‘tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Apaññatti^eb^nti apaññāpanaṃ, ‘‘titta alābu atthī’’ti vohārābhāvaṃ vā. Tittālābuvalliyā appavattiṃ icchanto puriso viya ariyamaggo, tassa tassā appavattininnacittassa mūlacchedanaṃ viya maggassa nibbānārammaṇassa taṇhāya pahānaṃ, tadappavatti viya taṇhāya appavattibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Dutiyaupamāyaṃ ^a^V2.0316^ea^ dakkhiṇadvāraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, coraghātakā viya maggo. Dakkhiṇadvāre ghātitāpi corā pacchā ‘‘aṭaviyaṃ corā ghātitā’’ti vuccanti, evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi taṇhā ‘‘cakkhādīsu niruddhā’’ti vuccati tattha kiccakaraṇābhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimā vā upamā maggena niruddhāya ‘‘piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā’’ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttā, pacchimā nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāya ‘‘piyarūpasātarūpesu niruddhā’’ti vattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ etāsaṃ viseso.

[03]^b^402^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññamaggapaṭikkhepanattha^eb^nti titthiyehi parikappitassa maggassa dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadābhāvapaṭikkhepanatthaṃ, aññassa vā maggabhāvapaṭikkhepo ^b^aññamaggapaṭikkhepo,^eb^ tadatthaṃ. ^b^‘‘Aya’’^eb^nti pana attano, tesu ca bhikkhūsu ekaccānaṃ paccakkhabhāvato āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ. ^b^Ārakattā^eb^ti niruttinayena ariyasaddasiddhimāha. ^b^Ariyabhāvakarattā^eb^ti ariyakaraṇo ^b^ariyo^eb^ti uttarapadalopena, puggalassa ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaṃ karotīti vā ^b^ariyo,^eb^ ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā vā ariyaṃ phalaṃ labhāpeti janetīti ^b^ariyo.^eb^ Purimena cettha attano kiccavasena, pacchimena phalavasena ariyanāmalābho vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Catusaccapaṭivedhāvahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0433^ea^, catusaccaṃ vā uddissa pavattaṃ bhāvanākammaṃ yogino sukhavisesānaṃ ṭhānabhūtanti ^b^catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Purimāni dve saccāni^eb^^a^M2.0343^ea^^b^vaṭṭaṃ^eb^ pavattihetubhāvato. ^b^Pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ^eb^ nivattitadadhigamupāyabhāvato. ^b^Vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso^eb^ sarūpato pariggahasabbhāvato. ^b^Vivaṭṭe natthi^eb^ avisayattā, visayatte ca payojanābhāvato. Purimāni dve saccāni uggaṇhitvāti sambandho. Kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā hi tadatthasallakkhaṇena vācuggatakaraṇaṃ ^b^uggaho.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iṭṭhaṃ kanta^eb^nti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti, na abhinandanaṃ, tanninnabhāvoyeva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekapaṭivedhenevā^eb^ti ekañāṇeneva paṭivijjhanena. ^b^Paṭivedho^eb^ paṭighātābhāvena visaye nissaṅgacārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ. ^b^Abhisamayo^eb^ avirajjhitvā visayassa adhigamasaṅkhāto avabodho. ‘‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^pariññāpaṭivedho,^eb^ tena. Idañca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattiṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na pana maggañāṇassa ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’ntiādinā (ma. ni. 2.484; 3.104) pavattanato. Pahīnassa ^a^V2.0317^ea^ puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ, pahānameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^pahānapaṭivedho,^eb^ tena. Ayampi yasmiṃ kilese appahīyamāne maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ, asati ca ^a^P2.0434^ea^ maggabhāvanāya yo uppajjeyya, tassa kilesassa paṭighātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyaṃ paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto. ^b^Sacchikiriyā^eb^ paccakkhakaraṇaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ ‘‘idaṃ ta’’nti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho,^eb^ tena. Ayaṃ panassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti, tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāventameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto. ^b^Bhāvanā^eb^ uppādanā, vaḍḍhanā ca. Tattha paṭhamamagge uppādanaṭṭhena, dutiyādīsu vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena, ubhayatthāpi vā ubhayathāpi veditabbaṃ. Paṭhamamaggepi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ. Dutiyādīsupi appahīnakilesappahānato, puggalantarabhāvasādhanato ca uppādanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ, sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti ^b^bhāvanāpaṭivedho,^eb^ tena. Ayampi ^a^M2.0344^ea^ hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavattimeva gahetvā vutto.

[03]Tiṭṭhantu tāva yathādhigatā maggadhammā, yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti. Tenevāha ‘‘diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo’’ti (mahāva. 18; dī. ni. 1.299; ma. ni. 2.69) yato sacassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammālambaniyo maggavīthito parato maggaphalapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesanibbānānaṃ ^a^P2.0435^ea^ paccavekkhaṇā pavattanti, dukkhasaccammopi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo. Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā ^b^‘‘pariññābhisamayenā’’^eb^tiādīsupi vibhāvetabbā. ^b^Ekābhisamayena abhisametī^eb^ti etthāha vitaṇḍavādī ‘‘ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakara’’nti, so ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (kathā. 274) odhisokathāya saññāpetabbo. Idāni tameva ekābhisamayaṃ vitthāravasena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘evamassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pubbabhāge…pe… paṭivedho hotī’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu paṭivedho pubbabhāgiyo na hotīti? Saccametaṃ nippariyāyato, idha pana uggahādivasena pavatto avabodho pariyāyato tathā vutto. Paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ ‘‘paṭivedho’’ti vuttaṃ, na paṭivijjhanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Kiccato^eb^ti pubbabhāgehi dukkhādiñāṇehi kātabbakiccassa idha nipphattito, imasseva vā ñāṇassa dukkhādippakāsanakiccato, pariññāditoti attho. ^b^Ārammaṇapaṭivedho^eb^ti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhamāha. ^b^Sā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0318^ea^ imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Uggahādīsu vuccamānesu ^b^na vuttā^eb^ anavasarattā. Adhigame hi sati tassā siyā avasaro.

[03]Taṃyeva hi anavasaraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imassa cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbe pariggahato^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānapariggahato pubbe. Uggahādivasena saccānaṃ pariggaṇhanañhi pariggaho. Tathā tāni pariggaṇhanato manasikāradaḷhatāya pubbabhāgiyā dukkhapariññādayo honti yevāti āha ^b^‘‘pariggahato paṭṭhāya hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aparabhāge^eb^ti maggakkhaṇe. ^b^Duddasattā^eb^ti attano pavattikkhaṇavasena ^a^P2.0436^ea^ pākaṭānipi pakatiñāṇena sabhāvarasato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Gambhīreneva ca bhāvanāñāṇena, tathāpi matthakappattena ariyamaggañāṇeneva yāthāvato passitabbattā ^b^gambhīrāni^eb^^a^M2.0345^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lakkhaṇapaṭivedhato pana ubhayampi gambhīra’’^eb^nti. Itarāni asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikatāya accantasukhappattāya anuppattibhavatāya, anuppannapubbatāya ca pavattivasena apākaṭattā ca paramagambhīrattā, tathā paramagambhīrañāṇeneva passitabbatāya pakatiñāṇena daṭṭhuṃ na sakkuṇeyyānīti ^b^duddasāni.^eb^ Tenāha ^b^‘‘itaresaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Payogo^eb^ti kiriyā, vāyāmo vā. Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ, dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti ^b^‘‘bhavaggaggahaṇattha’’^eb^ntiādinā. ^b^Paṭivedhakkhaṇe^eb^ti ariyassa maggassa catusaccasampaṭivedhakkhaṇe. ^b^Ekameva taṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti dukkhādīsu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena ekameva taṃ maggañāṇaṃ ^b^hoti.^eb^

[03]^b^Imesu tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti imesu viramitabbatāvasena jotitesu tīsu kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkavatthūsu. Visuṃ visuṃ ^b^uppannassa^eb^ tividha^b^akusalasaṅkappassa. Padapacchedato^eb^ti ettha gatamaggo ‘‘pada’’nti vuccati, yena ca upāyena kāraṇena kāmavitakko uppajjati, so tassa gatamaggoti tassa pacchedo ghāto padapacchedo, tato padapacchedato. Anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ ^b^anuppattisādhanaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena. Maggakiccasādhanena ^b^maggaṅgaṃ^eb^ pūrayamāno ekova tividhakiccasādhano ^b^kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati.^eb^ Tividhākusalasaṅkappasamucchedanameva hettha tividhakiccasādhanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā nayena ^b^‘‘imesu catūsu ṭhānesū’’^eb^tiādīsupi attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Musāvādāveramaṇiādayo^eb^ti ettha yasmā ^b^sikkhāpadavibhaṅge^eb^^a^P2.0437^ea^ (vibha. 703) viraticetanā, sabbe sampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadānīti āgatānīti tattha padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena ‘‘viratiyopi honti cetanāyopī’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 703) ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ, tasmā keci ‘‘ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ pisuṇavācā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva saṅgaho, atha kho tādisānaṃ cetanānampi ^a^V2.0319^ea^ saṅgaho’’ti vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena vuccamānattā yujjeyya, musāvādādīhi viramaṇakāle vā viratiyo, subhāsitādivācābhāsanādikāle ca cetanāyo yojetabbā, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyova icchitabbā cetanānaṃ amaggaṅgattā. Ekassa ñāṇassa dukkhādiñāṇatā viya, ekāya viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya cetanāya sammāvācādikiccattayasādhanasabhāvābhāvā sammāvācādibhāvāsiddhito, taṃsiddhiyaṃ aṅgattayatāsiddhito ca.

[03]Bhikkhussa ^a^M2.0346^ea^ ājīvahetukaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ nāma ayoniso āhārapariyesanahetukameva siyāti āha ^b^‘‘khādanīya…pe… duccarita’’^eb^nti. Kāyavacīduccaritaggahaṇañca kāyavacīdvāreyeva ājīvapakopo, na manodvāreti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Anuppannāna^eb^nti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppannānaṃ. Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā nāma na santi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃ bhave’’^eb^tiādi. Yasmiṃ bhave ayaṃ imaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati, tasmiṃ ^b^ekasmiṃ bhave.^eb^^b^Janetī^eb^ti uppādeti. Tādisaṃ chandaṃ kurumāno evaṃ chandaṃ janeti nāma. ^b^Vāyāmaṃ karotī^eb^ti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. ^b^Vīriyaṃ^eb^^a^P2.0438^ea^^b^pavattetī^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ pakārato vatteti. ^b^Vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karotī^eb^ti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipento kosajjapātato nisedhanena paggahitaṃ karoti. ^b^Padahanaṃ pavattetī^eb^ti padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.

[03]^b^Uppannapubbāna^eb^nti sadisavohārena vuttaṃ. Bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro yathā ‘‘sā eva tittiri, tāni eva osadhānī’’ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idāni tādise’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uppannāna^eb^nti ‘‘anuppannā’’ti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ. ^b^Pahānāyā^eb^ti pajahanatthāya. ^b^Anuppannānaṃ kusalāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^kusalā^eb^ti uttarimanussadhammā adhippetā, tesañca ^b^uppādo^eb^ nāma adhigamo paṭilābho, tappaṭikkhepena ^b^anuppādo^eb^ appaṭilābhoti āha ^b^‘‘appaṭiladdhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Ṭhitiyā vīriyaṃ ārabhatī’’ti vutte na khaṇaṭhiti adhippetā tadatthaṃ vīriyārabbhena payojanābhāvato, atha kho pabandhaṭhiti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ uppattipabandhavasena ṭhitattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sammussanaṃ^eb^ paṭipakkhadhammavasena adassanamupagamananti tappaṭikkhepena asammussanaṃ ^b^asammoso^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘asammosāyāti avināsanattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhiyyobhāvo^eb^ punappunaṃ bhavanaṃ, so pana ^a^V2.0320^ea^ uparūpari uppattīti āha ^b^‘‘uparibhāvāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vepullaṃ^eb^ abhiṇhappavattiyā paguṇabalavabhāvāpattīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāyā’’^eb^ti, mahantabhāvāyāti attho. ^b^Bhāvanāya paripūraṇattha^eb^nti jhānādibhāvanāparibrūhanatthaṃ.
[03]^b^Catūsu^eb^^a^M2.0347^ea^^b^ṭhānesū^eb^ti anuppannākusalānuppādanādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu. ^b^Kiccasādhanavasenā^eb^ti catubbidhassapi kiccassa ^a^P2.0439^ea^ ekajjhaṃ nipphādanavasena.

[03]^b^Jhānāni pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānā^eb^ti yadipi samādhiupakārakehi abhiniropanānumajjanasampiyāyanabrūhanasantasukhasabhāvehi vitakkādīhi sampayogabhedato bhāvanātisayappavattānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena sammāsamādhi vibhatto, tathāpi vāyāmo viya anuppannākusalānuppādanādicatuvāyāmakiccaṃ, sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāppahānacatusatikiccaṃ, eko samādhi catujhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādhetīti pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇepi, tathā pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi eva maggakkhaṇe pīti attho. ^b^Nānāmaggavasenā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggādinānāmaggavasena jhānāni nānā. ^b^Dutiyādayo^eb^pi maggā ^b^dutiyādīnaṃ^eb^ jhānānaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ panassā^eb^ti ettha maggabhāvena catubbidhampi ekattena gahetvā ‘‘assā’’ti vuttaṃ, ^b^assa^eb^ maggassāti attho. ^b^Aya^eb^nti pana ayaṃ jhānavasena sabbasadisasabbāsadisekaccasadisatā viseso.

[03]^b^Pādakajjhānaniyamena hotī^eb^ti idha pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā vuttaṃ, yathā cettha, evaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniya^eb^mpi (vibha. aṭṭha. 205). ^b^Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 350) pana vipassanāniyamo vutto sabbavādāvirodhato, idha pana sammasitajjhānapuggalajjhāsayavādanivattanato pādakajjhānaniyamo vutto. Vipassanāniyamo pana sādhāraṇattā idhāpi na paṭikkhittoti daṭṭhabbo. Aññe ca ācariyavādā parato vakkhamānā vibhajitabbāti yathāvuttameva tāva pādakajjhānaniyamaṃ vibhajanto āha ^b^‘‘pādakajjhānaniyamena tāvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamajjhāniko hoti,^eb^ yasmā āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti maggassa ^a^P2.0440^ea^ attano sadisabhāvaṃ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa. ^b^Paripuṇṇāneva hontī^eb^ti aṭṭha satta ca hontīti attho. ^b^Satta honti^eb^ sammāsaṅkappassa abhāvato. ^b^Cha honti^eb^ pītisambojjhaṅgassa abhāvato. Maggaṅgabojjhaṅgānaṃ sattachabhāvaṃ atidisati ^b^‘‘esa nayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Arūpe catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ…pe… vuttaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhasāliniyanti adhippāyo. Nanu tattha ‘‘arūpe tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjatī’’ti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 350) vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0321^ea^, na ‘‘catukkapañcakajjhāna’’nti? Saccametaṃ, yesu pana saṃsayo atthi, tesaṃ uppattidassanena ^a^M2.0348^ea^, tena atthato ‘‘catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjatī’’ti vuttameva hotīti evamāhāti veditabbaṃ. Samudāyañca apekkhitvā ^b^‘‘tañca lokuttaraṃ, na lokiya’’^eb^nti āha ‘‘avayavekattaṃ liṅgasamudāyassa visesakaṃ hotī’’ti. Catutthajjhānameva hi tattha lokiyaṃ uppajjati, na catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ vāti. ^b^Ettha katha^eb^nti pādakajjhānassa abhāvā kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho. ^b^Taṃjhānikāvassa tattha tayo maggā uppajjanti,^eb^ tajjhānikaṃpaṭhamaphalādiṃ pādakaṃ katvā uparimaggabhāvanāyāti adhippāyo. Tikacatukkajjhānikaṃ pana maggaṃ bhāvetvā tattha uppannassa arūpacatutthajjhānaṃ, tajjhānikaṃ phalañca pādakaṃ katvā uparimaggabhāvanāya aññajhānikāpi uppajjantīti, jhānaṅgādiniyāmikā pubbābhisaṅkhārasamāpattipādakaṃ, na sammasitabbāti phalassāpi pādakatā daṭṭhabbā.

[03]^b^Keci panā^eb^ti moravāpīmahādattattheraṃ sandhāyāha. Puna ^b^kecī^eb^ti tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheraṃ ^a^P2.0441^ea^. Tatiyavāre ^b^kecī^eb^ti ‘‘pādakajjhānameva niyametī’’ti evaṃ vādinaṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherañceva anantaraṃ vutte dve ca there ṭhapetvā itare there sandhāya vadati.

[03]^b^403^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sasantatipariyāpannānaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ appavattibhāvena pariggayhamāno nirodhopi sasantatipariyāpanno viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘attano vā cattāri saccānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parassa vā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññāpemi, lokasamudayañca paññāpemi, lokanirodhañca paññāpemi, lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadañca paññāpemī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.107; a. ni. 4.45) kathaṃ pana ādikammiko nirodhamaggasaccāni pariggaṇhātīti? Anussavādisiddhamākāraṃ pariggaṇhāti. Evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissāpi pariggaho na virujjhati. ^b^Yathāsambhavato^eb^ti sambhavānurūpaṃ, ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ sesasaccavasena samudayavayāti veditabbāti attho.
[06]Catusaccapabbavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dhammānupassanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^404^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ ^a^M2.0349^ea^ samaṃsa’’ntiādikā satta sivathikā aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānatāya itarāsaṃ ^a^V2.0322^ea^ uddhumātakādīnaṃ sabhāvenevāti navannaṃ sivathikānaṃ appanākammaṭṭhānatā vuttā. ^b^Dveyevā^eb^ti ānāpānaṃ, dvattiṃsākāroti imāni dveyeva. ^b^Abhiniveso^eb^ti vipassanābhiniveso, so pana sammasaniyadhammapariggaho. Iriyāpathā, ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya. Nīvaraṇabojjhaṅgā ādito na pariggahetabbāti ^a^P2.0442^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iriyāpatha…pe… na jāyatī’’^eb^ti. Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti, nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃsampayuttā, taṃnissayadhammāti adhippāyena mahāsivatthero ca iriyāpathādīsupi ^b^‘‘abhiniveso jāyatī’’^eb^ti avoca. ^b^‘‘Atthi nu kho me’’^eb^tiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ. Apariññāpubbikā hi pariññāti.

[03]Kāmaṃ ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhū’’tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ kataṃ taṃpaṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatthaṃ, desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ ‘‘yo hi koci bhikkhave’’ icceva vuttaṃ, na bhikkhu yevāti dassento ^b^‘‘yo hi koci bhikkhu vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā ^b^aññā^eb^ nāma, tassa phalabhāvato aggaphalaṃ pīti āha ^b^‘‘aññāti arahatta’’^eb^nti.
[03]Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā. ^b^Niyyātento^eb^ti nigamento.
[06]Mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.

[03]^b^406^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhagavatā ^a^P2.0443^ea^^a^V2.0323^ea^^a^M2.0350^ea^ evaṃ gahitanāmattāti yojanā. Yasmā rājaputtā loke ‘‘kumāro’’ti voharīyanti. Ayañca rañño kittimaputto, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘rañño…pe… sañjāniṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti therassa. ^b^Puññāni karonto^eb^ kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca uppajjitvā ^b^visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi^eb^ indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā. ^b^Tatiyadivase^eb^ti pabbataṃ āruḷhadivasato tatiye divase.
[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ sāvakabodhiyā niyatatāya, puññasambhārassa ca sātisayattā vinipātaṃ agantvā ^b^ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ…pe… anubhavantānaṃ. Devatāyā^eb^ti pubbe sahadhammacāriniyā suddhāvāsadevatāya.

[03]‘‘Kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno’’ti vatvā taṃ evassa uppannabhāvaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sā cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sā^eb^ti kuladārikā. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo byatirekattho, tena vuccamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. ^b^Kulaghara^eb^nti patikulagehaṃ. ^b^Gabbhanimitta^eb^nti gabbhassa saṇṭhitabhāvanimittaṃ. Satipi visākhāya ca sāvatthivāsikulapariyāpannatte tassā tattha padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘visākhañcā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘brāhmaṇā āgatā vāsiṭṭhopi āgato’’ti. ^b^Devatā^eb^ti idhapi sā eva suddhāvāsadevatā. ^b^Pañhe^eb^ti ‘‘bhikkhu bhikkhu ayaṃ vammiko’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.249) āgate pannarasapañhe.

[03]^b^Setabyā^eb^ti itthiliṅgavasena ^b^tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ.^eb^^b^Uttarenā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0444^ea^ ena-saddayogena ‘‘setabya’’nti upayogavacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthavacanena pana uttarasaddaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^setabyato^eb^ti nissakkappayogo kato. ^b^Anabhisittakarājā^eb^ti khattiyajātiko abhisekaṃ appatto.

[03]^b^407^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Diṭṭhiyeva^eb^^a^V2.0324^ea^^b^diṭṭhigata^eb^nti gata-saddena padavaḍḍhanamāha, diṭṭhiyā vā gatamattaṃ ^a^M2.0351^ea^^b^diṭṭhigataṃ,^eb^ ayāthāvaggāhitāya gantabbābhāvato diṭṭhiyā gahaṇamattaṃ, kevalo micchābhinivesoti attho, taṃ pana diṭṭhigataṃ tassa ayonisomanasikārādivasena uppajjitvā paṭipakkhasammukhībhāvābhāvato, anurūpāhāralābhato ca samudācārappattaṃ jātanti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘uppannaṃ hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ apadisitvā^eb^ti tato idhāgacchanakassa, ito tattha gacchanakassa ca apadisanato ‘‘tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato’’ti evamādi taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭirūpakaṃ apadisitvā.
[03]^b^408^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āpannānadhippetatthavisaye ayaṃ ^b^purā^eb^-saddapayogoti āha ^b^‘‘purā…pe… saññāpetīti yāva na saññāpetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^411^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā candimasūriyā uḷāravipulobhāsatāya aññena obhāsena anabhibhavanīyā, evamayampi paññāobhāsenāti dassento ^b^‘‘candima…pe… aññenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘kittake ṭhāne ete pavattenti, kittakañca ṭhānaṃ nesaṃ ābhā pharatī’’ti evamādimpi codanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Paliveṭhessatī^eb^ti ābandhissati, anuyuñjissatīti attho. ^b^Nibbeṭhetuṃ^eb^ taṃ vissajjetuṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ^a^P2.0445^ea^ yathāvuttaṃ codanaṃ nibbeṭhetuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā. Attano anicchitaṃ saṅghātanaṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānanto ‘‘parasmiṃ loke, na imasmi’’ntiādimāha.

[03]Kathaṃ panāyaṃ natthikadiṭṭhi ‘‘devo’’ti paṭijānātīti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘bhagavā panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Devāpi devattabhāveneva ucchijjanti, manussāpi manussattabhāveneva ucchijjantī’’ti evaṃ vā assa diṭṭhi, evañca katvā ‘‘devā te, na manussā’’ti vacanañca na virujjhati. Evaṃ ^b^cande^eb^ti candavimāne, na ca cande vā kathiyante.

[03]^b^412^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ābādho etesaṃ atthīti ^b^ābādhikā.^eb^ Dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ etesanti ^b^dukkhitā.^eb^ Saddhāya ayitabbā ^b^saddhāyikā,^eb^ saddhāya pavattiṭṭhānabhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ tumhe’’^eb^tiādi. Paccayo pattiyāyanaṃ etesu atthīti ^b^paccayikā. ^eb^

[03]^b^413^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uddisitvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0325^ea^^a^M2.0352^ea^ upecca dassetvā. ^b^Kammakāraṇikasattesū^eb^ti nerayikānaṃ saṅghātanakasattesu. ^b^Kammamevā^eb^ti tehi tehi nerayikehi katakammameva. ^b^Kammakāraṇaṃ karotī^eb^ti āyūhanānurūpaṃ taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ karoti, tathā dukkhaṃ uppādetīti attho. ^b^Nirayapālā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tena tattha sabbaṃ nirayakaṇḍapāḷiṃ (ma. ni. 3.259) saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ suttato (ma. ni. 3.259) nirayapālānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttitopi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘manussaloke’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nerayike niraye pālenti tato niggantuṃ appadānavasena rakkhantīti ^b^nirayapālā.^eb^ Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^papañcasūdanīṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ gahetabbaṃ.
[03]^b^415^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nimmajjathā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0446^ea^ niravasesato majjatha sodhetha. Taṃ pana tassa tassa gūthassa tathā sodhanaṃ apanayanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘apanethā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Asucī^eb^ti asuddho, so pana yasmā manavaḍḍhanako manoharo na hoti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘amanāpo’’^eb^ti. Asucisaṅkhātaṃ asucibhāgataṃ attano sabhāvataṃ gato pattoti ^b^asucisaṅkhāto^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘asucikoṭṭhāsabhūto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Duggandho^eb^ti duṭṭhagandho aniṭṭhagandho, so pana na yo koci, atha kho pūtigandhoti āha ^b^‘‘kuṇapagandho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jigucchitabbayutto^eb^ti hīḷitabbayutto. ^b^Paṭikūlo^eb^ ghānindriyassa paṭikūlarūpo. ^b^Ubbādhatī^eb^ti uparūpari bādhati. ^b^Manussānaṃ gandho…pe… bādhati^eb^ ativiya asucisabhāvattā, asucimhiyeva jātasaṃvaddhanabhāvato, devānañca ghānapasādassa tikkhavisadabhāvato.
[03]^b^416^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dūre nibbattā^eb^ paranimmitavasavattiādayo.
[03]^b^419^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sundaradhamme^eb^ti sobhanaguṇe. ^b^Sugatisukha^eb^nti sugati ceva tappariyāpannaṃ sukhañca.

[03]^b^420^eb^^b^.^eb^ Puññakammato ^a^M2.0353^ea^ eti uppajjatīti ^b^ayo,^eb^ sukhaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhato ^b^anayo,^eb^ dukkhaṃ ^a^V2.0326^ea^. ^b^Apakka^eb^nti na siddhaṃ na niṭṭhānappattaṃ. ^b^Na paripācenti^eb^ na niṭṭhānaṃ pāpenti. ^b^Na upacchindanti^eb^ attavinipātassa sāvajjabhāvato. ^b^Āgamentī^eb^ti udikkhanti. ^b^Nibbisa^eb^nti yassa pana taṃ kammaphalaṃ nibbisanto niyuñjanto, ^b^nibbisa^eb^nti vā nibbesaṃ vetanaṃ paṭikaṅkhanto bhatapuriso yathā.
[03]^b^421^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubbhinditvā^eb^ti upasaggena padavaḍḍhanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘bhinditvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^422^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Nikkhamantaṃ vā pavisantaṃ vā jīva’’^eb^nti idaṃ tassa ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. So hi ‘‘sattānaṃ supinadassanakāle ^a^P2.0447^ea^ attabhāvato jīvo bahi nikkhamitvā taṃtaṃārāmarāmaṇeyyakadassanādivasena ito cito ca paribbhamitvā punadeva attabhāvaṃ anupavisatī’’ti evaṃ pavattamicchāgāhavipallattacitto. Athassa thero khuddakāya āṇiyā vipulaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto viya jīvasamaññāmukhena ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nīharitukāmo ‘‘api nu tā tuyhaṃ jīvaṃ passanti pavisantaṃ vā nikkhamantaṃ vā’’ti āha. Yattha pana tathārūpā jīvasamaññā, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘cittācāraṃ jīvanti gahetvā āhā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^423^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Veṭhetvā^eb^ti vekhadānasaṅkhepena veṭhetvā. ^b^Cavanakāle^eb^ti cavanassa cutiyā pattakāle, na cavamānakāle. ^b^Rūpakkhandhamattamevā^eb^ti katipayarūpadhammasaṅghātamattameva. Utusamuṭṭhānarūpadhammasamūhamattameva hi tadā labbhati, matta-saddo vā visesanivattiattho, tena kammajāditisantatirūpavisesaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Appavattā hontī^eb^ti appavattikā honti, na upalabbhatīti attho. Viññāṇe pana jīvasaññī, tasmā ^b^‘‘viññāṇakkhandho gacchatī’’^eb^ti āha, tattha anupalabbhanatoti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^424^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vūpasantateja^eb^nti vigatusmaṃ.

[03]^b^425^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āmato^eb^ti ettha ^b^ā^eb^-saddo āmisa-saddo viya upaḍḍhapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘addhamato’’^eb^ti, ^b^āmato^eb^ti vā īsaṃ darathena ^a^M2.0354^ea^ usmanā yuttamaraṇo marantoti attho. Mīyamāno hi ^a^V2.0327^ea^ avigatusmo hoti, na mato viya vigatusmo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘marituṃ āraddho hotī’’^eb^ti. Tathā ^a^P2.0448^ea^ rūpassa ^b^odhunanaṃ^eb^ nāmassa orato parivattanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘orato karothā’’^eb^ti. Orato kātukāmassa pana saṃparivattanaṃ ^b^sandhunanaṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana parato karaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘parato karothā’’^eb^ti. Paramukhaṃ katassa ito cito parivattanaṃ ^b^niddhunana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘aparāparaṃ karothā’’^eb^ti. Indriyāni aparibhinnānīti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘tañcāyatanaṃ na paṭisaṃvedetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^426^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saṅkhaṃ dhamati, dhamāpetīti vā ^b^saṅkhadhamo. ^eb^^b^Upalāpetvā^eb^ti uparūpari saddayogavasena sallāpetvā, saddayuttaṃ katvāti attho. Taṃ pana atthato dhamanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘dhamitvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^428^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āhito aggi etassa atthīti ^b^aggiko,^eb^ svāssa aggikabhāvo yasmā aggihutamālāvedisampādanehi ceva indhanadhūmabarihisasappitelūpaharaṇehi balipupphadhūmagandhādiupahārehi ca tassa payirupāsanāya icchito, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aggiparicārako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āyuṃ pāpuṇāpeyya^eb^nti yathā cirajīvī hoti, evaṃ āyuṃ pacchimavayaṃ pāpeyyaṃ. ^b^Vaḍḍhiṃ gameyya^eb^nti sarīrāvayave, guṇāvayave ca phātiṃ pāpeyyaṃ. ^b^Araṇī yugaḷa^eb^nti uttarāraṇī, adharāraṇīti araṇīdvayaṃ.

[03]^b^429^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘bālo pāyāsirājañño’’tiādippakārena. ^b^Tayā^eb^ti theraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Vuttayuttakāraṇamakkhalakkhaṇenā^eb^ti vuttayuttakāraṇassa makkhanasabhāvena. ^b^Yugaggāhalakkhaṇenā^eb^ti samadhuraggahaṇalakkhaṇena. ^b^Palāsenā^eb^ti palāsetīti palāso, parassa guṇe uttaritare ḍaṃsitvā viya chaḍḍento attano guṇehi same karotīti ^a^P2.0449^ea^ attho. Samakaraṇaraso hi palāso, tena palāsena.

[03]^b^430^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Haritakapatta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0355^ea^ haritabbapattaṃ, appapattanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antamaso’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sannaddhadhanukalāpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^kalāpa^eb^nti tūṇīramāha, tañca sannayhato dhanunā vinā na sannayhatīti āha ^a^V2.0328^ea^^b^‘‘sannaddhadhanukalāpa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āsittodakāni vaṭumānī^eb^ti gamanamaggā ceva taṃtaṃudakamaggā ca sammadeva devena phuṭṭhattā tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharitaudaka sandamānaudakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇasalilā maggā ca kandarā cā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Yathābhatenā^eb^ti sakaṭesu yathāṭhapitena, yathā ‘‘amma ito karohī’’ti vutte ṭhapesīti attho karaṇakiriyāya kiriyāsāmaññavācībhāvato. Tasmā ^b^yathāropitena, yathāgahitenāti attho^eb^ vutto.

[03]^b^434^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parājayaguḷa^eb^nti yena guḷena, yāya salākāya ṭhitāya ca parājayo hoti, taṃ adassanaṃ gamento ^b^gilati.^eb^^b^Pajjohana^eb^nti pakārehi juhanakammaṃ. Taṃ pana balidānavasena karīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘balikamma’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^436^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gāmapatta^eb^nti gāmo eva hutvā āpajjitabbaṃ, suññabhāvena anāvasitabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhitagāmapadeso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gāmapada^eb^nti yathā purisassa pādanikkhittaṭṭhānaṃ adhigataparicchedaṃ ‘‘pada’’nti vuccati, evaṃ gāmavāsīhi āvasitaṭṭhānaṃ adhigatanivutthāgāraṃ ‘‘gāmapada’’nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayamevattho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Susannaddho^eb^ti ^a^P2.0450^ea^ sukhena gahetvā gamanayogyatāvasena suṭṭhu sajjito. Taṃ pana susajjanaṃ suṭṭhu bandhanavasenevāti āha ^b^‘‘subaddho’’^eb^ti.
[03]Ayādīnampi lohabhāve satipi loha-saddo sāsane tambalohe niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘lohanti tambaloha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^437^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiraddho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0356^ea^ ārādhitacitto, sāsanassa ārādhitacittatā pasīdanavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘abhippasanno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañhupaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti pañhesu upaṭṭhānāni mayā pucchitatthesu tumhākaṃ vissajjanavasena ñāṇupaṭṭhānāni.

[03]^b^438^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅghāta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0329^ea^^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo padavaḍḍhanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘ghāta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vipākaphalenā^eb^ti sadisaphalena. ^b^Mahapphalo na hoti^eb^ gavādipāṇaghātena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Guṇānisaṃsenā^eb^ti uddayaphalena. ^b^Ānubhāvajutiyā^eb^ti paṭipakkhavigamanajanitena sabhāvasaṅkhātena tejena. ^b^Na mahājutiko hoti^eb^ aparisuddhabhāvato. ^b^Vipākavipphāratāyā^eb^ti vipākaphalassa vipulatāya, pāripūriyāti attho. ^b^Duṭṭhukhette^eb^ti usabhādidosehi dūsitakhette, taṃ pana vappābhāvato asāraṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nissārakhette’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dubbhūme^eb^ti kucchitabhūmibhāge, svāssa kucchitabhāvo asāratāya vā siyā ninnatādidosavasena vā. Tattha paṭhamo pakkho paṭhamapadena dassitoti itaraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘visamabhūmibhāge’’^eb^ti āha. Daṇḍābhighātādinā ^b^chinnabhinnāni. Pūtīnī^eb^ti gomayalepadānādisukhena asukkhāpitattā pūtibhāvaṃ gatāni. Tāni pana yasmā sāravantāni na honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nissārānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vātātapahatānī^eb^ti vātena ca ātapena ca vinaṭṭhabījasāmatthiyāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariyādinnatejānī’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ ^a^P2.0451^ea^ yathājātavīhiādigatena taṇḍulena aṅkuruppādanayogyabījasāmatthiyaṃ, taṃ ^b^taṇḍulasāro,^eb^ tassa ^b^ādānaṃ^eb^ gahaṇaṃ tathāuppajjanameva. ^b^Etāni^eb^ pana bījāni ^b^na tādisāni^eb^ khaṇḍādidosavantatāya. Dhārāya khette ^b^anuppavesanaṃ^eb^ nāma vassanameva, taṃ paṭikkhepavasena dassento āha ^b^‘‘na sammā vasseyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅkuramūlapattādīhī^eb^ti cettha aṅkurakandādīhi ^b^uddhaṃ vuddhiṃ,^eb^ mūlajaṭādīhi ^b^heṭṭhā viruḷhiṃ,^eb^ pattapupphādīhi ^b^samantato ca vepulla^eb^nti yojanā.

[03]^b^Aparūpaghātenā^eb^ti paresaṃ vibādhanena. ^b^Uppannapaccayato^eb^ti nibbattitaghāsacchādanādideyyadhammato. Gavādighātenapi hi tattha paṭiggāhakānaṃ ghāso saṅkīyati. ^b^‘‘Aparūpaghātitāyā’’^eb^ti idaṃ sīlavantatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ ^a^M2.0357^ea^. ^b^Guṇātireka^eb^nti guṇātirittaṃ, sīlādilokuttaraguṇehi visiṭṭhanti attho. ^b^Vipulā^eb^ti saddhāsampadādivasena uḷārā.

[03]^b^439^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atha kho tehi sakuṇḍakehi taṇḍulehi siddhaṃbhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘uttaṇḍulabhatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bilaṅgaṃ^eb^ vuccati āranālaṃ bilaṅgato nibbattanato, tadeva kañjiyato jātanti ^b^kañjiyaṃ,^eb^ taṃ dutiyaṃ etassāti ^b^bilaṅgadutiyaṃ,^eb^ taṃ ^b^‘‘kañjikadutiya’’^eb^nti ca vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhorakānī^eb^ti dhoviyāni. Yasmā thūlatarānipi ‘‘thūlānī’’ti vattabbataṃ arahanti, tasmā ^b^‘‘thūlāni^eb^^a^V2.0330^ea^^b^cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Guḷadasānī^eb^ti suttānaṃ thūlatāya, kañjikassa bahalatāya ca piṇḍitadasāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puñjapuñja…pe… dasānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuddisatī^eb^ti anu anu katheti.

[03]^b^440^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Asakkacca^eb^nti na sakkaccaṃ anādarakāraṃ, taṃ pana ^a^P2.0452^ea^ kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saddhāvirahita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Acittīkata^eb^nti cittīkārapaccupaṭṭhāpanavasena na cittīkataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittīkāravirahita’’^eb^ntiādi. Cittīkārarahitaṃ vā ^b^acittīkataṃ,^eb^ yathā kataṃ paresaṃ vimhayāvahaṃ hoti, tathā akataṃ. Cittassa uḷārapaṇītabhāvo pana asakkaccadāneneva bādhito. ^b^Apaviddha^eb^nti chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ viya apaviddhaṃ katvā, etena tasmiṃ dāne gāravākaraṇaṃ vadati. ^b^Serīsakaṃ nāmā^eb^ti ‘‘serīsaka’’nti evaṃ nāmakaṃ. ^b^Tuccha^eb^nti parijanaparicchedavirahato rittaṃ.

[03]^b^441^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassānubhāvenā^eb^ti tassa dānassa ānubhāvena. ^b^Sirīsarukkho^eb^ti pabhassarakhandhaviṭapasākhāpalāsasampanno manuññadassano dibbo sirīsarukkho. ^b^Aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti phalassa kammasarikkhataṃ dassento ^b^vimānadvāre^eb^ nibbattitvā aṭṭhāsi. ^b^Pubbāciṇṇavasenā^eb^ti purimajātiyaṃ tattha nivāsaparicayanavasena. Na kevalaṃ pubbāciṇṇavaseneva, atha kho utusukhumavasena pīti dassento ^b^‘‘tattha kirassa utusukhaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti ^a^M2.0358^ea^ uttaro māṇavo. Yadi asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā pāyāsi tattha nibbatto, pāyāsissa paricārikā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā kathaṃ tattha nibbattāti āha ^b^‘‘pāyāsissa panā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nikantivasenā^eb^ti pāyāsimhi sāpekkhāvasena, pubbepi vā tattha nivutthapubbatāya. ^b^Disācārikavimāna^eb^nti ākāsaṭṭhaṃ hutvā disāsu vicaraṇakavimānaṃ, na rukkhapabbatasikharādisambandhaṃ. ^b^Vaṭṭaniaṭaviya^eb^nti vimānavīthiyanti.
[06]Pāyāsirājaññasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca mahāvaggaṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsanā.
[06]Mahāvaggaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
